rudadēvō. pāraddhō tēṇa niratyaō cēva kōlāhalō. etthantarammi ya sīiyaṁ mē aṅgēhi, viyaliyaṁ sandhīhiṁ, uvyattiyaṁ pirva hiyaēṇaṁ,
bhamiyaṁ piva pāsāyantarēṇa, parivattiyaṁ piva puhavīē, avasā ahaṁ nivaḍiyā dharaṇivaḍhē. aō paramaṇācikkhaṇīyamavatthantaraṁ pāviūṇa
pubbasammattāṇubhāvaō caïūṇa dēhaṁ sōhammē kappē līlāvayaṁsaē varavimāṇē paliōvamahiī dēvattāē uvavaśnō mhi. tattha ya pavaraccharā
parigaō divvē bhōē uvabhuñjāmi jāva, ruddadēyō vi taṁ nāgadattasatyavāhadhūyaṁ pariṇīya tīē saddhiṁ jahāṇurūvē bhōē uvabhuciūṇa kāla.
māsē kālaṁ kāūṇa rayaṇappabhāē puḍhavīē khaṭṭakkhaḍābhihāṇē naraē paliōvamāū cēva nāragō uvavannō tti. taō ahaṁ ahāuyaṁ aṇupāli
ūṇa cuō samāṇō ihēva vijaē suṁsumārē raṇṇē suṁsumāragirimmi hatthittāē upavanō, saṁpattō ya kalabhagāvatthaṁ. etthantarammi ya iyarō
vi narayāō uvvahiūṇa tammi cēva girivarē sugapakkhittāē ubavannō tti. aïkantō ya sisubhāvaṁ, diṭṭhōya ahaṁ tēṇa tammi cēva girivarē
sahāvaramaṇīēsu nalavaṇēsu karēṇusaṁghāyaparigaō salīlaṁ paribhamantō tti. taō maṁ dardūṇa punvabhavabbhāsāō ukkaḍakammōdayāō ya
samuppannō mamōpari vērapariṇāmō. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ-kahaṁ puṇa ēsa kuñjarō imāō bhōgasuhāō vaściyacō tti. uvāē gavēsiumā
raddhō. annayā līlāraī nāma vijāharō, sō miyaṅkasēṇassa bijjāharassa bhaïṇiṁ candalēhābhihāṇiṁ avahariūṇa tabbhaēṇēvāgaō tamuddēsaṁ.
bhaṇiō ya tēṇa sō sugō-ahaṁ etya girinigubjē ciṭṭhāmi āgamissaï ya ettha ēgō vijjāharō, tō na tumaē tassa ahaṁ sāhiyanvō
gaō ya sō mamaṁ sāhiyabbō, taō tē kiṁci paḍirūvamukkhāraṁ karissāmi, ēvaṁ kaē muṭhṭha mē uvakayaṁ ti jaṁpiūṇamōiṇṇō viyaḍataḍā
bhōgasaṁṭhiya giriniguja. iyarō vi tammi cēvuddēsē nāraṅgapāyavasāhāgaē nīḍē ciṭṭhaï, jāva āgantūṇa gaō miyaṅkasēṇō. etthantarammi
ya karēṇupariṁgaō ahaṁ āgaō tamuddēsaṁ. taō maṁ daṇaṁ cintiyaṁ sugēṇa-atthi iyāṇi avasarō mē samīhiyassa. taō niyaḍibahulēṇa
sajāyāē sahābhimantiūṇa mama savaṇagōyarē bhaṇiyaṁ — sundari! suyaṁ maē bhayavaō siṭamaharisissa samīvē, jahā ihaṁ suṁsumārapancaē
savvakāmiyaṁ nāma paḍaṇamatthi; jō jaṁ abhilasiū paḍaï, sō takkhaṇēṇa cēva taṁ pāvaï tti. tō maē pucchiyaṁ-bhaya! kahiṁ puṇa tamuddēsa?
tēṇa sāhiyaṁ-jahā imassa sālataruvarassa vāmapāsēṇaṁ ti. tā alaṁ imiṇā tiriyabhāvēṇa, ēhi, vijāharapaṇihāṇaṁ kāūṇaṁ tahiṁ
nivaḍāmō. paḍissuyaṁ ca mē imaṁ jāyāē. gayāiṁ tamuddēsaṁ, kō paṇihī, niyaḍiyāī girinigulē, sāhiyaṁ līlāraïṇō. samuppaïō
ya saha candalēhāē gayaṇayalamalaṁkarentō līlāī. diṭṭhō ya amhēhi. satruppannā mē cintā-ahō sabyakāmiyapaḍaṇāṇubhāvō, jamēyaṁ
mugamihuṇayaṁ kayavijjāharapaṇihāṇamiha nivaḍiūṇa takkhaṇā cēva vijjāharamihuṇayaṁ jāyaṁ. tā alaṁ amhāṇa pi imiṇā tiriyabhāvēṇa.
taō dēvapaṇihiṁ kāūṇa nivaḍāmō ettha amhē vitti. ēvaṁ ca saṁpahāriūga paṇihiṁ kāūṇa niyaḍiyā tattha amhē. etthantarammi ya
uppaïyaṁ suyamihuṇayaṁ, na lakkhiyamamhē hiṁ. taō saṁcuṇiyaṅgōvaṅgō ahaṁ kilē samaṇuhaviūṇa aāmanijjarāē kamma khaviūṇa uvavannō
kusumasēharābhihāṇē vaṁtarabhommanayarē dēsūṇapaliōvamāū catarō tti. tattha ya udārē bhōē bhuñjāmi jāva, iyarō vi suyattāē mari
ūṇa rayaṇappabhāē cēva puḍhavīē lōhiyāmuhābhihāṇē naraē samuppannō dēsūṇapaliōcamaṭṭiī nāragō ti. taō ahaṁ ahāuyamaṇupā
liūṇa cuō samāṇō ettha cēva vidēhē annammi vijaē cakavālaürē nayarē appaḍihayacakarasa satyavāhassa sumaṅgalāē bhāriyāē
kucchisi puttattāē uvavanō tti. jāō ya uciyasamaēṇa, païṭāviyaṁ ca mē nāmaṁ cakkadēvō, pattō ya bālabhāvaṁ. etthantarammi ya sō
suyanāragō naragāō ubaṭṭi ūṇa tattha cēva nayarē sōmasammassa nivapurōhiyassa nandivaddhaṇābhihāṇāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē
uvavannō tti, jāō ya kālakkamēṇaṁ, païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāmaṁ jannadēvō, pattō ya kumārabhāva. etthantarammi ya jāyā mama tēṇa saha
pīī sabbhāvaō, tassa uṇa kaïyavēṇaṁ. taō pubbabhavabhatthakammadōsēṇaṁ ujjuyassa vi aṇujjuō mama saṁpayāmaccharī vaścaṇāchalēṇa
chidāī gavēsiumāraddhō. alahamāṇēṇa ya paricintiyamaṇēṇa-na ēsō ēvaṁ chaliuṁ pāriyaï, tā etya uvāō. candaṇasatthavāhagēhaṁ
musiūṇa ēyassa gēhē ritthaṁ muyāmi, pacchā ya kēṇaï uvāēṇaṁ nivēiūṇa rāiṇō saṁpayāō bhaṁsaïssaṁ ti. aṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa jahāci
ntiyaṁ. uvaṇēūṇa ya mē gēhē ritthaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa-vayaṁsa! ēyaṁ payattēṇa saṁgōvāvēsu tti. maē vi ya akālāṇavaṇajāyasaṅkaga aṇi
cchamāṇēṇāvi ēyassa dakkhiṇṇabahulayāē saṁgōviyaṁ ti. pabattō ya nayarē jaṇarayō, jahā muṭuṁ candaṇasatyavāhagēhaṁ ti. taō āsa
ḍiyaṁ mē hiyaēṇaṁ-nr̥ṇamēyaṁ ēvaṁ bhavissaï tti. gaō jannadēvasamīvaṁ, pucchiō ya sō maē-kahamēyaṁ vavatyiyaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — mā
annahā samatthēhi. tāya bhaēṇa maē ēyaṁ bhavaō samappiyaṁ, na puṇa annaha tti. taō avagayā mē saṅkā. patthantarammi ya jāṇāviyaṁ canda.
ṇasatyavāhēṇa rāiṇō, jahā ‘dēva! gēhaṁ mē muṭuṁ’ ti. ‘kimavahariya'ti pucchiyaṁ rāigā. nivēiyaṁ candaṇēṇaṁ, lihāviyaṁ ca rāiṇā, bhaṇiyaṁ
caṇēṇa-arē! āghōsēha ḍiṇḍi mēṇaṁ, jahā-muṭuṁ candaṇasatthavāhagēhaṁ, abahariyamēyaṁ ristha nāyaṁ. tā jassa gēhē kēṇaï vavahārajōēṇa taṁ ritthaṁ
ritthadēsō vā samāgaō, sō nivēēu rāiṇō caṇḍasāsaṇasma. aṇivēiōvalambhē ya rāyā sabadhaṇāva hārēṇa sarīradaṇḍēṇa ya nō kha
missaï tti. taō payaṭṭamāghōsaṇaṁ. aïkkantē ya taïmmi gaēsu pañcasu diṇēsu jāṇāviyaṁ jannadēvēṇa rāiṇō. jahā-dēva! na juttaṁ
cēva mittadōsapayāsaṇaṁ, kiṁ tu paralōyaïhalōyaviruddha sēviṇā ahiyāyaraṇēṇa attaṇō vi ya amittēṇa alaṁ mē mittēṇaṁ. na uvekkhi
yavvaṁ jāṇantēṇaṁ rāyajaṇāhiyaṁ. aō īisa pi dēvassa nivēīyaï. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaṇāu ajō. jannadēvēṇa bhaṇiya-dēva! suṇa.
suyaṁ maē cakadēvāsannapariyaṇāō, jahā imaṁ candaṇasatyavāhagēhaṁ cakkadēvēṇa muṭuṁ, saṁgōviyaṁ ritthaṁ niyayagēhē. ēvaṁ sōūṇa dēvō
pamāṇaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — aja! asaṁbhāvaṇijamēyaṁ, kulappasuō kkhu sō, tā kahaṁ imaṁ añcantaviruddhaṁ karissaï. jannadēvēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva! natthi annāṇalobhavasagāṇamasaṁbhāvaṇijja. kō ya dōsō kulassa, kiṁ na habanti surabhikusumēsu kimiō. tā nirū
vāvēhi tāva kēṇaï payārēṇa tassa gēhaṁ ti. tō ‘jutta mēya’ ti cintiūṇa samāṇattaṁ caṇḍasāsaṇēṇa karaṇaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya kāraṇiyā
nayaramahantagēhiṁ saha vettūṇa candaṇasatthavāha bhaṇḍāriyaṁ palōēha cakadēvassa gēhē taṁ paṇa8 ritthaṁ ti. taō' kimēiṇā asaṁbhāvaṇijjēṇaṁ,
ahavā āēsagāriṇō amhē’ tti mantiūṇa, mēlaviya nayaramahantagē ghettūṇa candaṇasatyavāhabhaṇḍāri jāmamettē vāsarē samāgayā mē gēhaṁ
pahāṇanayarajaṇāhiṭiyā kāraṇiya tti. pucchiō ya tēhiṁ aī-satyavāhaputta! na tē kiṁci kēṇaï ēvaṁjāiyaṁ ritthaṁ saṁvavahāravaḍiyāē
uvaṇīyaṁ ti. tō maē asaṁjāyasaṅkēṇa bhagiyaṁ-'nahi nahi’ tti. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ — na tara kuppiyavvaṁ rāyasāsaṇamiṇaṁ, jaṁ tē gēhamava
lōiyavvaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na etya avasarō kōbassa, payāparirakkhaṇanimittaṁ samārambhō dēvassa. taō paviṭṭhā mē gēhaṁ saha nayaravuḍḍēhi
rāyapurisā. avalōiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ nāgāpayāraṁ daviṇajāyaṁ, diṭṭhaṁ ca payattahāviyaṁ candananāmaṅkiyaṁ hiraṇṇavāsaṇaṁ, nīṇiyaṁ bāhi, daṁsiyaṁ
candaṇabhaṇḍāriyassa. abalōiūṇa sadukkhamiva bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēga-aṇuharaï tāva ēyaṁ, na uṇa nissaṁsayaṁ viyāṇāmi tti. kāraṇiēhi
bhaṇiya-vāēhi tāva avahariyanivēyaṇāpattagaṁ, kiṁ tatya imaṁ īisaṁ abhilihiyaṁ na pa ti. vāiyaṁ pattagaṁ, diṭṭhamabhilihiyaṁ sajjhasī
bhūyā nāyarakāraṇiyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhi-satthavāhaputta! kuō tuha imaṁ. tō maē vi cintiyaṁ-kaha sambhāvaṭhāviyaṁ mittanāsaṁ payā
sēmi. mā nāma tēṇāvi karhi ci ēsō ēvaṁ cēva samāsāiō bhavē. tā kahaṁ niyapāṇabahumāṇāō mittapāṇē paricayāmi’ tti cintiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ maē-'niyagaṁ cēva ēyaṁ’ ti. tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ — kahaṁ candaṇanāmaṅkiyaṁ? maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na yāṇāmō, kahiṁci vāsaṇaparāvattō bhavi
ssaï. tēhiṁ bhaṇiya-kisaṁkhiyaṁ kiṁ vā hiraṇṇajāyametthaṁ ti? maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na muṭhṭha mumarāmi, sēī cēva jōēha. kāraṇiēhi bhaṇiyaṁ —
vāēha pattagaṁ, kiṁdaviṇajuttaṁ kiṁsaṁkhiyaṁ vā taṁ candaṇasatyavāhavāsaṇaṁ ti. vāiyaṁ pattagaṁ jāva dīṇāradaviṇajuttaṁ dasasahassasaṁkhiyaṁ ca.
taō chōḍāviyamaṇēhiṁ miliō pattagatthō. vimhiyā nāgarakāraṇiyā. paricintiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ. kahaṁ appaḍihayacakkasatthavāhaputē
maē taṁ cēvāṇucintiūṇa taṁ cēva sihaṁ ti. tēhiṁ ciya ‘dhiratthu dēvassa’ tti bhaṇiūṇa mantiyaṁ. anaṁpi tē na kiṁci parasantiya
gēhē ciṭaï? maē bhaṇiya-na kiṁci. taō tēhiṁ pattagaṁ vāiūṇa savisēsamavalōiyaṁ mē gēhaṁ, diṭṭhaṁ ca jahāvāiyaṁ niravasēsa mēva ritthaṁ
etthantarammi ya kuviyā mamōvari ārakkhigā. nīō tēhiṁ naravaïsamīvaṁ. sāhiō buttantō caṇḍasāsaṇassa. bhaṇiō mhi rāiṇā.
satyavāhaputta! vināubhayalōyamaggō tuma, tā na tui ēyamērisamasāhucariyamasaṁbhāvaṇijja saṁbhāvēmi tti. tā kahēhi tātra,
paramatyō tti? taō maē taṁ cēva cintiūṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ na kiṁpijī pēyaṁ naravaïpuraō tti. taō rāiṇā samuppannāsaṁ
kēṇāvi tāyabahumāṇō asarisaṁ vayaṇamabhāsiūṇa kayatthaṇaṁ cākāūṇa nidhisaō samāṇattō mhi, nīgiōya rāyapurisēhiṁ nayarāō,
mukkō ya nayaradēvayāvaṇasamīvē. paḍiniyattā rāyapurisā. samuppanā ya mē cintā-kimēdahamettaparibhavabhāyaṇēṇaṁ aja vi jīviēṇaṁ.
tā ēyamni nayaradēvayāvaṇasamāsannē naggōhapāyavē ukkalambēmi appāṇaṁ ti. cintiūṇa payaṭṭō nagōhasamīyaṁ. etthantarammi ya kahiṁci
ābhōiūṇa imaṁ vaïyaramōhiṇā samuppannā mamōvari nayaradēvayāē aṇukampā. āvēsiūṇa rāyajaṇaṇi sāhiyaṁ jahaṭiyamēva ēvaṁ tīē
rāiyō. bhaṇiō ya rāyaḥ-imāē maïlaṇāē amugammi nayara jāṇāsannē naggōhapāyavē umbandhaṇēṇa attāṇayaṁ paricaïuṁ vavasiō cakka
dēvō. tā lahuṁ nivārēhi, taṁ sammāṇiūṇa ya pavēsēhi nayaraṁ ti. taō kōhanēhāulayāē saṁkiṇaṁ rasamaṇuhavantō rāyā ‘arē geṇhaha
durāyāraṁ jannadēvaṁ ti āisiūṇa pahāṇavārūyārūḍhō samaṁ ahāsannihiyapariyaṇēṇaṁ turiyaturiyaṁ nigaō nayarāō, pattō ya nayarujāṇaṁ.
diṭṭhō ya ahaṁ rāiṇā naggōhapāyavasāhāgaō uttarīyanibaddhapāsammi ḍhōiyāē sirōharāē attāṇayaṁ pavāhiukāmō tti. taō sō dūraō
cēva saṁbhamāisayaniyaḍiyasāraṁ ‘bhō cakkadēva! mā sāhasaṁ mā sāhasaṁ’ ti bhaṇamāṇō sigṣayaratajjiyāē vārūyāē samallīṇō pāyavasa
mīvaṁ. sayamēva avaṇīō pāsaō, geṇhiūṇa ya karammi ṭhāviō ahaṁ tēṇa vārūyāpaṭṭiyāē. bhaṇiō ya sabahumāṇaṁ-bhō satthavāhaputta!
juttaṁ nāma bhavaō maē vi pucchi yassa sambhāvāsāhaṇaṁ?. taō maē cintiyaṁ-hanta kimēyaṁ ti, payāsiyaṁ bhavissaï kēṇaï mittagujjhaṁ.

etthantarammi ya bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā-bhō sasthavāhaputta! sāhiō mama ēsa vaïyarō ambaṁ pavisiūṇa bhayavaīē nayaradēvayāē, jahā nidōsō
tumaṁ, dōsayārī ya ettha durāyārō jannadēvō. tā khamiyatvaṁ tumaē, jamaē amuṇiyaparamatyēṇaṁ kayatthiōsi tti. taō maē ‘hanta saṁpattō
vasaṇaṁ jannadēvō’ tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiō rāyā-dēva! rāyadhammō'yaṁ, payāparirakkhaṇasamujjayassa natthi dōsō dēvassa. jannadēvamūlamuddhiṁ
pi gavēsēu dēvō, na tammi mahāṇubhāvē aṇāyaraṇaṁ saṁbhāvīyaï. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — gaviṭṭhā mūlasuddhī, sāhiyaṁ bhayavaīē-'savvamiṇaṁ tēṇa
pāvēṇa vavasiyaṁ’ ti. sāhiya dēvayākahiyaṁ rāiṇā. ṭhiyaṁ ca mē cittē tuha dōsapayāsaṇēṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa sāhiō jannadēvakahiyavuttantō.
tō maē cintiyaṁ — hanta kimēyaṁ asaṁbhāvaṇija. etthantarammi ya āṇi yō rāyapurisē hi bandhē ūṇa jannadēvō, nivēiō rāigō.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-arē ēyassa jibbhaṁ chindiūṇa uppāḍēha lōyaṇāī. visaṇṇō jannadēvō. taō maē calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa vinnattō
rāyā-dēva! mama ēsa avarāhō khamīyaü, muccaü jannadēvō. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — satyavāhaputta! na juttamēyaṁ, durāyārō khu ēsō, tā anaṁ
vinnavēhi tti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva! alamannēṇaṁ ti, jaï mamōvari bahumāṇō dēvassa, tā imaṁ cēva saṁpāḍēu dēvō. rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ — alavaṇīyavayaṇō tuma ti, tuma cēva jāṇāsi! tō maē ‘dēvapasāō’ tti bhaṇiūṇa nivaḍiō(a) calaṇēsu mōyāviō
jamnadēvō, pēsiō ya ahaṁ rāiṇā niyayabhavaṇaṁ taō sammāṇiūṇa mahayā vibhūīē gaō sabhavaṇaṁ ti. jāō ya lōyavāō, ahō!
jannadēvassa jahannattaṁ. samuppannō ya mē nivvēō. peccha, īisō pariṇāmō tti. ahō! asārayā saṁsārassa, vicittayā kamma
pariṇaīē, dullakkhāṇi pāṇicittāṇi. tā na yāṇāmō kimettha juttaṁ ti.

etthantarammi ya samāgaō tattha mugihiyanāmō aggibhūī nāma gaṇaharō. ṭhiō ya nayarujjāṇē. diṭṭhō maē bāhiriyāgaēṇaṁ.
jāō ya mē taṁ paï bahumāṇō, paṇamiō ya sō maē, dhammalābhiyō ya tēṇaṁ ubaviṭṭhō tassa pāyamūlē. pucchiō bhayavaṁ savvadukkha
viuḍaṇasamatthaṁ dhammaṁ. sāhiō bhagavayā khamāigō sāhudhammō. taṁ ca suṇamāṇassa samuppannā dēsaviraïpariṇaī pavaṭṭamāṇasaṁvēgassa
jāō bhavavirāgō. cintiyaṁ ca maē-alaṁ saṁsārapavaḍaṇāmettaphalēṇaṁ imiṇā parikilēsēṇaṁ, pavajjāmō pavyajja ti
etthantarammi ya galiō kammasaṁghāō, payaliyā bandhapaṭṭiī, vihāviyaṁ attapiriēṇaṁ, samuppannā sabaviraïpariṇaï ti. kahāva
sāṇē ya vinnattō maē bhayavaṁ gurū. aṇuggihīō ahaṁ bhayavayā, virattaṁ ca mē cittaṁ bhavapaścāō, tā āisaü bhayavaṁ kiṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti.

taō tēṇa suya(yā)sayanāṇiṇāmama bhāvaṁ viyāgiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — jujjaï bhavaō mahāpurisasēviyaṁ samagattaṇaṁ kāuṁti. taōmaē tassa samī
vammi cēva pavanaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ, parivāliyaṁ ca vihiṇā. tō ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa kālamāsē kālaṁ kiccā dēhaṁ caïūṇa navasāgarōvamāū
vēmāṇiyattāē uvavannō mhi bambhalōē, iyarō vi ya jannadēvō tisāgarōvamaṭhiī sakarappabhāē nāragō ti. taō ahamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa
dēvalōgāō cuō samāṇō ihēva vidēhē gandhilāvaī vijaē rayaṇapurē nayarē rayaṇasāgarasta satthavāhassa sirimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi
puttattāē upavanō ti. iyarō vi ya taō naragāō uccaṣṭiūṇa āhēḍagamuṇaō bhakkhi mariūṇa tisāgarōvamāū tatthēva uvavajiūṇa
tō ya ucaṭṭō nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍi ūṇa tatthēva rayaṇapurē tāyagharadāsīē nammayābhihāṇāē suyattāē uvavannōti. uciyasamayammi
jāyā ya amhē, pattā ya bālabhāvaṁ. païṭāviyāī nāmāī, majjhaṁ candasārō, iyarassa aṇāhagō tti. pattā ya jovvaṇaṁ. kō maē dāra
saṁgahō. ēvaṁ ca visayāsattā ciṭṭhāmō. puvvabhakabhāsaō ya na imassa mamōvari vaścaṇāpariṇāmō avēi. annayā ya āgaōtattha māsa
kappavihārī bhayavaṁ vijayavaddhaṇāyariō. pavanō ya maē imassa pāyamūlē sāvagadhammō. annayā ya taṁ puraṁ dīhadaṇḍajattāgaē naravaïmmi,
gāmantaragaēsu amhēsu vijhakēunāmēṇa savarasēṇāvaïṇā hayavihayaṁ kāūṇa avaṇīō kōi lōō. suyaṁ ca amhē hiṁ. samāgayā taṁ puraṁ.
diṭṭhaṁ ca masāṇāgāramaṇugarintaṁ, gavēsāviyaṁ māṇusaṁ jāva sabamēva dharaï, navaraṁ candakantā mē bhāriyā avahaḍa tti. taō samuppannā
araī, jāyā ya cintā-hā! kahaṁ sā tavassiṇō mamādiviōgā pāṇē dhārissaï ti. etthantarammi ya bhaṇiō dēvasammābhihā
ṇēṇaṁ vuḍḍamāhaṇēṇaṁ-satthavāhaputta! mā saṁtappa. puṇō vi ēyammi cē disaē siritthalābhihāṇāō sanivēsāō ēvaṁ cēva savarēhi
avaṇīō jaṇō āsi. sō niravasēsō akhaṇḍiyacarittasabassō mahayā daviṇajāēṇa mukkō tti. taō ahaṁ ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa
aïkantēsu kaïvayadiṇēsu sabhūmimuvagaēsu sabarēsu aṇahagaduiō ghētūṇa savyasāraṁ daviṇajāyaṁ susaṇiddhasaṁbhiyaṁ ca pāhēyaṁ payaṭṭō
candakantāvimokkhaṇanimittaṁ ti.

iyō ya tīē mama viōgavihurāē cārittakhaṇḍaṇāsaṅkiṇīē ya karhici suṇgagāmāsannakūvayaḍāvāsiyāē sabaravāhiṇīē nisācara
masamayammi, pavattē ya payāṇagakōlāhalē pērantarakkhaṇāvāvaḍēsu savarasaṁghāēsu jīviyaniravekkhāē tammi cēva jiṇṇakūvammi pavāhiō
appā. paḍiyā ya jalamajjhē, na mayā ya jalappabhāvēgaṁ. tō taggaya cēva paḍikūvagamahiṭiūṇa ciṭṭhiumāraddhā. kicchapāṇā ya
jīviyasēsēṇaṁ cēva jāva pāṇē dhārēi, tāva pattā amhē tamuddēsaṁ. aṇahagassa vi ya punvabhavanimittaō tayatyasaṁdarisaṇaō ya samuppannō
mamōvari vañcaṇāpariṇāmō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-'kahamēsō vaściyanyō’ tti. taō sō aṇēyaviyappasamāuliyahiyō ahaṁ ca muddhasa
hāvō tti ēvaṁ vaccāmō. pāhē yadaviṇajāyāṇi ya pattēyaṁ hatthagōyarāṇi havanti. annayā ya mama hatthē pāhēyaṁ tassa daviṇajāyaṁ ti.
ēvamaṇugacchamāṇā pattā tamuddēsaṁ, jattha sā candakantā ciṭaï. diṭṭhō ya sō kūvō. etthantarammi ya atyamiō sahassarassī, luliyā
sajhā. taō cintiyamaṇahagēṇaṁ-hatthagayaṁ mē daviṇajāyaṁ, vijaṇaṁ ca kantāraṁ, samāsanō ya pāyālagambhīrō kūvō, pavattō ya avarāha
vivarasamacchāyagō andhayārō. tā ēyammi ēyaṁ pakkhiviūṇa niyattāmō imassa thāṇassa tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-satyavāhaputta!
dhaṇiyaṁ pivāsābhibhūō mhi. tā nihālē hi ēyaṁ jiṇṇakūvaṁ ‘kimettha udagaṁ atthi, natyi’ tti? taō maē gahiyapāhēyapoṭṭalēṇaṁ
cēva nihāliō kūvī. etthantarammi ya suvisatthahiyayassa lōyassa viya maccū āgaō mama samīyamaṇahagō. sahasā pakkhittō tammi
ahamaṇahagēṇa, paḍiō ya udagamajjhē. niyattō ya sō taō vibhāgāō. ahamavi ya sasaṁbhantō laggō paḍikūvagēkadēsē. parāmuṭṭhā ya
bhayavihalaṅghalā candakantā thīsahāvaō bhayakāyarā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē ‘namō arihaṁtāṇaṁ ti. taō maē pañcabhinnāō sadō. ūsasiyaṁ mē
hiyaēṇaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya sā ‘abhayamabhayaṁ jiṇasāsaṇarayāṇaṁ’ ti. tīē vi ya pañcabhinnāō mē sahō. rōviuṁ payattā, samāsāsiyā sā
maē, pucchiyā ya vuttantaṁ. sāhiō ya tīē, maē vi ya niyagō tti. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē-hā! duṭu kayaṁ aṇahagēṇa. mara bhaṇiyaṁ
sundari! na du? kayaṁ, paramośyārī khu sō mahāṇubhāvō, jaṁ tumaṁ saṁjōiya tti. appanihāṇa ya aïkannā rayaṇī, uggaō aṁsumālī.

taō maē dinnaṁ candakantāē pāhēyaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē-'kahamahaṁ tumaē agahiyammi geṇhāmi’ tti. taō maē nēhakāyaraṁ sē hiyayaṁ
kaliūṇamakālē cēva gahiyaṁ pāhēyaṁ, bhuttaṁ ca amhēhiṁ. taō cintiyaṁ maē-kēṇa puṇa uvāēṇa amhē imāō bhavasamudāō viva kūva
sasaṁbhrāntō lagnō pratikūpakaïkadēśē. parāmr̥ṣṭā ca bhayavihvalāṅgī candrakāntā, strīsvabhāvatō bhayakātarā. maṇiāṁ ca tayā ‘namō'hadbhaya'
gāō u tarissāmō tti. ēvaṁ ca cintayantāṇaṁ kaïvayadiṇēsu khīṇaṁ pāhēyaṁ, paṇaṭā jīviyāsā. jāyā ya mē cintā-kahaṁ pāviūṇa
jiṇamayaṁ akāūṇa paca jamakayatthō marissāmi tti. etthantarammi phuriyaṁ sē vāmalōyaṇēṇaṁ, mamāvi dāhiṇēṇaṁ. jaṁpiyaṁ ca tīē
ajjaputta! vāmaṁ mē lōyaṇaṁ phuriya'ti. taō sāhiō sē maē hiyayasaṁkappō iyaracakkhuphuraṇaṁ ca. samāsāsiyā ya ēsā. sundari!
imēhiṁ nimittavisē sēhiṁ avassa amhāṇaṁ na cirakālāṇusārī ēsa kilēsō, tā na tumaē saṁtappiyavvaṁ ti. paḍissuyamimīē. ēvaṁ ca
jāva ahōrattaṁ nivasāmō, tāva samāgaō sabararāyahāṇīō rayaṇapuranivāsiṇō nandivaddhaṇābhihāṇassa satyavāhassa santiō rayaṇapura
gāmī cēva satthō tti. uyaganimittaṁ ca samāgayā purisā gahiūṇa lambaṇā. divāī amhē imēhiṁ. nivēiyaṁ satyavāhassa. kayama
ciyāpaōēṇaṁ samuttārāviyāī tēṇaṁ,pañcabhinnāyāṇi ya. pucchiyāī vuttanta, sāhiō vittharēṇaṁ,vimhiō ēsō,taō patthiyāī rayaṇaüraṁ
jāva aïkkantēsu pañcasu payāṇa ēmu parivahantē satthē rāyapattaṇīō nāidūradēsabhāē diṭṭhō kaṅkālamettasēsō yāmapāsāvaḍiyadaviṇajāō
kēsariṇā dīhanidāvasamuvaṇīō aṇaḍagō tti. daviṇōbalambhēṇa pañcabhinnāō amhē hiṁ. taō taṁ tahāviha vivāgaṁ pecchiūṇa
samuppanō mē vivēgō, khōvasamamuvagayaṁ cārittamōhaṇīyaṁ. saṁjāō sayalajīvalōyadullahō caraṇapariṇāmō. taō ahaṁ tahāvihapa
baḍamāṇapariṇāmō cēva āgō sanayaraṁ. pavanō ya jahāvihīē vijayabaddhaṇāyariyasamīvē pavvajja. ahāuyamaṇuvāliūṇa vihiṇā
ya mottūṇa dēī, ukvannō sōlasasāgarōvamāū vēmāṇiyattāē mahāsukkakappammi, iarō vi ya aṇahagō sīhavāvāiyasarīrō satta
sāgarōvamahiī vālugappahāē nāragō tti. taō ahamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa dēvalōgāō cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē
vāsē rahavīraürē nayarē nandivaddhagasta gāhāvaïssa surasundarīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō mhi. iyarō vi taō
naragāō uvvaṭṭiūṇa vijhagiripacaē agasattaśavāyaṇaparō sīhattāē uvavannō. taō sīhattāē uvavajiūṇa puṇō vimariūṇa
sattasāgarōvamāū tatthēva uvavanjiya tō ya ucaṭṭō nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍiya tasyēva nayarē saümasatyavāhassa nandimaīē bhāriyāē
puttattāē upacannō ti. uciyasamayammi jāyā amhē, pacā bālabhāvaṁ. païṭāviyāī nāmāī-majjhaṁ aṇaṅgadēvō, iyarassa dhagadēvō
tti. ābālabhāvō jāyā piī mama sambhāvaō, iyaraspta kaïyavēṇaṁ. kumārabhāvammi ya pattō maē dēvasēgagurusamī vē sāṇṇubhāsi
ō dhammō. pattā ya jōvaṇaṁ. santē viya puvvapurisajjiē daviṇajāē abhimāṇaō ‘kimaṇēṇa punyapurisajiēṇaṁ’ ti dayasaṁgaha
nimittaṁ gayā rayaṇadīvaṁ. nihattāī rayaṇāī, kayā saṁjuttī, payaṭṭā niyadēsamāgantuṁ. etthantarammi ya puyakayakammadō sēṇa cintiyaṁ
dhaṇadēvēṇa-kahaṁ puṇō vaściyavyō ēsa agaṅgadēvō. viyapiyā ya tēṇaṁ aṇēgē micchāviyappā. ṭhāviō siddhantō. abābāiō
ēsa na tīraē vaściu ti, tā yāvārami ēyaṁ. paricintiō ubāō ‘bhōyaṇē sē visaṁ dēmi’ tti. annayā ya satthimaīsannivē
samaṇupattāṇaṁ bhothaṇanimittaṁ gaō dhaṇadēvō iṭṭamaggaṁ. kārāviyaṁ ca tēṇa bhōyaṇaṁ, phakkhittaṁ ca ēgammi laḍḍugē visa. cintiyaṁ
ca tēṇaṁ-ēyaṁ sē dāhāmi’ ti. āgacchantassa aṇēgaviyappāvahariyacittassa saṁjāō vivajī. bhōyaṇavēlāē gahiō tēṇa
visalaḍḍugō, dinō mamaṁ ca iyarō tti. pabhuttā anhē jāva thēvavēlāē cēva thāriō dhaṇadēvō. taō ‘kimēyaṁ ti’ āulīhūō ahaṁbīō bhavō
jāva kiṁkāyabvamūḍhō thēvakālaṁ ciṭṭhāmi, tāpa acnuggayāē visassa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa ubaraō dhaṇadēvō. jāyā mē cintā
'hā kēṇa uṇa ēvaṁ vavasiyaṁ’ ti. taō amuṇayavr̥ttantō mahāsōyābhibhūyamāṇasō āgaō sanayaraṁ. miṭhō vuttantō tassa māṇusāṇaṁ.
viiṇṇaṁ ca tēsiṁ amahiyayaraṁ rayaṇajāyaṁ. sēsarayaṇa nāyaṁ pi ya jahāṇurūvaṁ kusalapakkhē nijiūga tannivvaēṇa cēṣa tayappabhiimannā
yavisayasaṅgō pavannō dēvasēṇāyariyasamīvē pacanaṁ ni. parivāliūṇa ahāuyaṁ vihiṇā ya mōnūṇa dēhaṁ pāṇayammi kappē upabannō ēga
ṇavīsasāgarōvamāū dēvō tti, iyarō vi visamaraṇāṇantaraṁ paṅkappabhāē puḍhabīē navasāmavamāū nāragō ti. ta' ahamahāuyaṁ aṇuvā
liūṇa cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē ēravaē khētē hathiṇāurē nayarē harinandissa gāhāvaïssa lacchimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi
puttattāē uvavannō. iyarō di tō naragāō uccaṭṭiya uragattaṇaṁ pāviūṇamaṇēgasattavāvāyaṇaparō dāvāṇaladaḍadēhō mari ūṇa tīē cēya
paṅkappabhāē puḍhavīē kiṁcūṇadasasāgarōramāū nāragō hōūṇa taō ubaṭṭō, tiriēmu āhiṇḍiya tammi cēva hathigāurē indanāmassa
buḍḍasēṭissa nandimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi putta tāē ucavannō tti. uciyasamayammi jāyā amhē. païṭāviyāī nāmāī-majjhaṁ dhīradēvō,
iyarassa dōṇagō tti. pattā ya kumārabhāvaṁ, samappiyā ya lē hāyariyassa. jāyā ya amhāgaṁ puavaṇiyā cēva piī. taō gahiyakalā.
kalāvēṇaṁ maē paḍivannō māṇabhaṅgagurusamī vē jiṇadēsiō dhammō, mamokkhāravaścaṇakusalēṇa davyaō dōṇaēṇāvi. taō ya mē dhammā
ṇurāēṇa tappabhiī taṁ paï samupamā thirayarā piī. samappiyaṁ sē pabhūyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ēsō-'vakaharaha aṇindiēṇa maggēṇa'!
taō sō vavahariumāraddhō. vidvattaṁ ca tēga pabhūyaṁ daviṇajāya. etthantarammi puvakayakammavāsaṇādōsēga jāō sē mamōpari ahiṁgō
vañcagāpariṇāmō. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ-ajjiyaṁ pabhūyaṁ daviṇajāya, bhāgiō ya vīradēvō ēyasta, tā kēga uga uvāēṇa vañciyakō
lakṣmīmatyā bhāryāyāḥ kukṣaü putrāyōpapannaḥ. iārō'pi tatō narakāduvr̥ttya uragatvaṁ prāpyānēkasattvavyāpādanaparō dāvānaladagdhadēhō mr̥tvā
ēsō, na ya muṇaï jahaṭṭiyaṁ ṇē kōi vavahāraṁ. tā kiṁ abalambāmi? ahavā ēyammi paripanthagē na mē aliyavayaṇaṁ nivvahaï. tā
vāvāēmi ēyaṁ. taō ‘jamahaṁ :maṇissāmi, taṁ cēva agghissaï’ tti saṁpahāriūṇa pāraddhō tēṇa samuvayārō. kārāviō mahantō pāsāō,
ukaribhūmibhāē ya tassa aṇiyamiyakhīlajālō ṇijjūhagō. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ. vīradēvaṁ pāsāyapavēsanimittaṁ nimantiūṇa daṁsēmi sē
nijjūhagaṁ. taō sō rammadaṁsaṇīyayāē nijjūhagassa sahasā ārōhaïssaï. tō ya tanivaḍaṇēṇa nivaḍiō samāṇō na bhavissaï
tti. ēvaṁ ca kaē samāṇē lōyavāō vi parihariō hōi. saṁpāiyaṁ tēṇa jahāsamīhiya. bhututtarakālaṁmi ya ārūḍhā duvē vi amhē
saparivārā pāsāyaṁ. etthantaraṁmi ya paṇaṭṭhā sē maī. mama dēsaṇanimittaṁ kēvalō cēvārūḍhō nijjūhagaṁ. jāva ya nārōhāmi ahayaṁ, tāva
nivaḍiō. hāhāravaṁ karēmāṇō samōḍaṇṇō ahayaṁ jāva dihrō pañcattamuvagaō dōṇagō tti. samuppannō mē nivvēō. cintiyaṁ maē.
dhiratyu jīvalōyassa, ēvamavasāṇaṁ saṁsāraceṭṭiyaṁ. tō ahaṁ tassa mayakiccaṁ kāūṇa tannivēēṇa cēva paḍivannō māṇabhaṅgagurusamīvē
samaṇaliṅgaṁ. parivāliūṇa ahāuyaṁ uvavannō hechimōvarimagēvejjaē kiṁcūṇapaṇuvīsasāgarōvamāū dēvō; iyarō vi dōṇī tahāviharudda
jjhāṇōvagaō dhūmappabhāē puḍhavīē duvālasasāgarōvamāū nāragō tti. tō ahaṁ surāuyamaṇubhujiūṇa cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē
dīvē ettha cēva vijaē campāvāsē nayarē māṇibhaddassa sēṭissa dhāriṇīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō, jāō ya uciyasama
ēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ mē nāmaṁ puṇṇabhadō tti. paḍhamaṁ ca kila maē ghōsamuccārayantēṇa ‘amara’ tti saṁlattaṁ. aō duiyaṁ pi mē nāma amaraguttō
tti. sākkhagihuppattīē ya ā bālabhāvāō vēva papannō maē jiṇadēsiō dhammō. etthantaraṁmi ya iyarō vi taō naragāō ughaṭṭi
ūṇa sayaṁbhūramaṇē samuddē mahāmacchō bhaviya añcantapāvadiṭṭhī maō samāṇō tīē cēva dhūmappabhāē duvālasasāgarōvamāū cēva nāragō hōūṇa
ucaṭṭō samāṇō nāṇātiriēsu āhiṇḍiya taṁmi cēva nayarē nandāvattassa sēṭissa sirinandāē bhāriyāē kucchisi dhūyattāē uvavannō
jāyā ya uciyasamaēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma nandayanti tti. pattā ya jōvaṇaṁ, viigṇā ya majjhaṁ. nibattiyaṁ pāṇiggahaṇaṁ. samu
ppannō ya mē taṁ paï siṇēhō, tīē vi ya tahēba. ēvaṁ ca visayasuhamaṇuhavantāṇaṁ gaō kōi kālō. puvyakayakammadōsēṇa ya sē mamōvari
vaścaṇāpariṇāmō nāvēi, jēṇa samappiyasabagharasārā vi māyāē vavaharaï. sāhiyaṁ ca mē pariyaṇēṇaṁ, na uga pattiyāmi tti. annayā
ya sāhiyaṁ mē tīē. jahā paṇaṭaṁ savvasāraṁ kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ. taṁ puṇa sayaṁ cēva avahariūṇa samāulībhūyā. bhagiyā ya taō maē.
sundari, thēvamēyaṁ ti, kimēhahamettēṇaṁ saṁrambhēṇa. annaṁ tē kuṇḍala juyalaṁ kārāvēmi. kārāviyaṁ kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ. aïkantēsu kaïvayadi
ṇēsu abbhaṅgagavēlāē samappiyaṁ sē nāmaṅkiyamuddārayaṇaṁ, saṁgōviyaṁ ca tīē niyayābharaṇakaraṇḍaē. vattē ya ṇhāṇabhōyaṇasamaē kāūṇama
garāyaṁ parigeṇhiūṇa tambōlaṁ asaṁjāyāsaṁkēṇa cēva taō karaṇḍa gāō saī cēva gahiyaṁ maē muddārayaṇaṁ. diṭṭhaṁ ca puvvanaṭaṁ savyasāraṁ kuṇḍa
lajuyalaṁ. jāyā ya mē cintā ‘kimayaṁ puṇō laddhaṁ’ ti. etthantaraṁmi sasajjhasā viya āgayā nandayantī. diṭṭhaṁ ca tīē majjha hatthaṁmi
muddārayaṇaṁ. viliyā sā. lakkhiō sē bhāvō. taō ahaṁ sigdhamēva niggaō gēhāō. cintiyaṁ ca tīē-dilu imēṇa kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ
tā kimettha kāyavvaṁ. jāyaṁ mē lahuttaṁ, paṇaṭṭhō ēsō vi. tā jāva sayaṇavaggē vi mē lāghavaṁ na uppajjaï, tāva vāvāēmi ēyaṁ ti. ēsō
ya ettha uvāō, sajjaghāyaṇaṁ sē kammaṇajōgaṁ paüñjāmi. kō tīē kēvalāē cēva aṇēyamaraṇāvahadavyasaṁjōēṇaṁ jōgō. saṁṭhavantī ya tamē
gadēsē ḍakā bhuyaṅgamēṇaṁ. sāhiyaṁ ca mē purōhiēṇaṁ rudadēvēṇaṁ. gō ahaṁ sasambhantō gihaṁ. diṭṭhā ya kasiṇamaṇḍalavisavāviyasarīrā
jīviyametta mēsā nandayantī. taṁ ca tahāvihaṁ daṭṭaṇa samuppannā mē cintā. dhiratthu māindajālasarisassa jīvalōyassa. bāhajala
bhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ ca sagaggayakkharaṁ bhaṇiyā maē. sundari, kiṁ tē bāhaï? jāva na jaṁpaï tti. taō visaṇṇō ahaṁ, paṇaṭṭhā jīvi
yāsā. tahāvi ‘gāruḍiyā ettha pabhāṇaṁ, acintā mantasatti’ tti sadāviyā gāruḍiyā. diṭṭhā ya tēhiṁ. visaṇṇā ya tē. bhaṇiō ya
ṇēhiṁ. satthavāhaputta, kāladaṭṭhā khu ēsā na gōyarā mantastra. tā na kuppiyavvaṁ tumaē tti bhagiūga niggayā gāruḍiyā. tō
akkandaṇavilavaṇavāvaḍassa mē pariyaṇassa vimukkā jīviēṇaṁ, kayaṁ sē uddhadēhiyaṁ. tō ahaṁ tannivvēēṇaṁ cēva pavaḍḍamāṇasaṁvēgō
'dhiratthu jīvalōyassa’ ti paricintiūṇa ya asārayaṁ caïūṇa kilēsāyāsakāriṇaṁ saṅgaṁ pavanō pavvajja ti. sā uṇa tavassiṇī
tahā mariūṇa samuppannā tamappahābhihāṇāē narayapuḍhavīē. āuṁca sē igavīsaṁ sāgarāī. ēyaṁ mē cariyaṁ ti ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa
saṁjāō rāyanāyarāṇaṁ nivēō. pucchiyaṁ ca rāiṇā. bhayavaṁ, kō uṇa tīē avaō ya pariṇāmō bhavissaï? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
tīsē aṇantasaṁsārāvasāṇē muttī, mama uṇa ihēba jammē tti.

lg.l: taō ahamēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa tassa cēva bhayavaō samīvē aṇēyanāyarajaṇaparigaō pavanō pavvajja

div.p:
sīhakumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — sōhaṇaṁ tē nivvēyakāraṇaṁ. aha kaïgaïsamāvannarūbō uṇa ēsa saṁsārō, kiṁvisiṭṭāṇi vā iha sārīramāṇasā
ṇi suhadukkhāṇi aṇuhavanti pāṇiṇō, kō vā estha saṁsāracāragavimōyaṇasamatthō bhayava! dhammōti? dhammaghōsēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha!
suṇa, jaṁ taē pucchiyaṁ—

ettha tāva caügaïsamāvannarūvō saṁsārō. gaīō puṇa imāō. taṁ jahā-narayagaī, tiriyagaī, maṇuyagaī, dēvagaī. muhadukkha
cintāē puṇa, kuō saṁsārasamāvannāṇaṁ jāijarāmaraṇapīḍiyāṇaṁ rāgāidōsagahiyāṇaṁ visayavisāvahiyacēyaṇāṇaṁ ca sattāṇaṁ suhaṁ ti?
na kiṁci suhaṁ, bahuṁ ca dukkhaṁ. ettha mē suṇa nāyaṁ—

lg.l: jaha nāma kōi purisō dhaṇiyaṁ dālidukkhasaṁtattō
thēvēdiya hēhi navaraṁ kahaṁci panthāu pabbhaṭṭhō

div.p:
pattō ya sāla-sarala-tamāla-tālāli-baüla-tilaya-nicula-akolla-kalamba-vajula-palāsa-sallaī-tiṇisa-nimba-kuḍaya
naggōha-khaïra-sajja-'jjuṇa-mba-jambuyaniyaraguvilaṁ dariyamayaṇāhakharanaharasiharāvāyadaliyamattamāyaṅgakumbhatthalagaliyabahalaruhirāratta
muttāhalakusumapayaraciyavisthiṇṇabhūmibhāgaṁ vaṇakōla-saraha-vasaha-pasaya-vagdha-taraccha-'cchabhalla-jambuya-gaya-gavaya-sīha-gaṇḍayāi
ruṭaduṭṭhasāvayabhīsaṇaṁ dariyavaṇamahisajūhasamālōḍiyāsēsapallalajalucchalantuttasthanalayaramukkanāyabahiriyadisaṁ mahāḍaviṁ. tīē ya taṇhā
chuhābhibhūpaṇa dariyavaṇaduṭṭhasāvayaravāyaṇṇaṇuttatthalōyaṇēṇaṁ dīhapahaparissamuppannasēyajaladhōyagattēṇaṁ mūhadisācakaṁ visamapahakhalantapayasaṁ
cāraṁ paribhamantēṇa tēṇa diṭṭhō ya palayaghaṇavandrasannihō nidraviyāṇēyapahiya jaṇabaḍiucchāhō gaddavbhagajjiyaravāvūriyaviyaḍaraṇṇudēsō
maggaō turiyaturiyaṁ dhāvamāṇō uddhīkaüddaṇḍasuṇḍō vaṇahatthi tti. taha ya nisiyakaravālavāvaḍaggahatthā vigarālavayaṇakāyā bhīmaṭṭa
hāsasaṁjuttā asiyavasaṇā puraō mahādudarakkhasi tti. taō ya tē daṭṭaṇa maccubhayavēviraṅgō avalōiyasayaladisāmaṇḍalō puvadisāē
udayagirisiharasannihaṁ niruddhasiddhagandhavvamihuṇagaïyaṇapayāramaggaṁ mahantaṁ naggōhapāyavaṁ avalōiūga paricintiuṁ payattō. kahaṁ?

lg.l: taṁ pecchiuṁ visaṇṇō naggōhaṁ gayaṇagōyarāṇaṁ pi
ettō iō niyantō pecchaï kūrva taṇochannaṁ
uttuṅgabhittijāō sarathambhō tambhi tattha ya bilaggō
caüsu vi taḍīsu dariē visalavasaṁvaliyanayaṇasihi jālē
jāvēsō sarathambhō tāva mahaṁ jīviyaṁ ti cintantō
dhavalakasiṇē ya turiyaṁ duvē tahiṁ mūsaē mahākāē
tāva vaṇavāraṇēṇa ya vijjhāiṁ naraṁ apāvamāṇēṇaṁ
sīsammi nivaḍiyā kaha vi navaraṁ jōēṇa mahubindū
ōyaliūṇa ya vayaṇaṁ kahavi paviṭṭhā u uttimaṅgāō
jō purisō sō jīvō caügaïbhamaṇaṁ ca raṇṇapariyaḍaṇaṁ
vaṇavāraṇō ya maccū nisāyariṁ jāṇa taha ya jaraṁ
āruhiuṁ visayāuranarēhi na ya sakaṇijjō ti
maṇuyattaṁ puṇa kūbō bhuyaṅgamā taha ya honti u kasāyā
khaïō jēhiṁ maṇussō kajākajāhaṁ na muṇēi
jō vi ya puṇa sarathambhō sō jīyaṁ jēṇa jīvaï jīvō
jāō ya mahuyarīō ḍasanti taṁ tē u vāhiṇō vivihā
abhibhūō jēhi narō khaṇaṁ pi sokkhaṁ na pāvēi
ghōrō ya ayagarō jō sō naraō visayamōhiyamaṇō tti
paḍiō u jammi jīvō dukkhasahassāī pāvēi
iya vasaṇasaṁkaḍagaō vibuhō kaha mahaï bhottuṁ jē?
'tō bhē bhaṇāmi sāvaya! visayasuhaṁ dāruṇaṁ muṇēūṇa
cavalataḍivilasiyaṁ piva maṇuyattaṁ bhaṅguraṁ taha ya
suyaṇasamāgamasōvakhaṁ cavalaṁ jovvaṇaṁ pi ya asāraṁ
sokkhanihāṇammi syā dhammammi maī daḍhaṁ kuṇam

div.p:
sīhakumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya! kērisō dhammō tti? bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, khamāigō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
khantī ya manajjavamottī tavasaṁjamē ya boddhavvē. saccaṁ sōya ākiṁcaṇaṁ ca bammaṁ ca jaïdhammō.
tattha khantī nāma sammannāṇapudhagaṁ vatthusahāvālōyaṇēṇa kōhassa aṇudayō, udayapattassa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ. ēvaṁ madavayā vi
māṇassa aśudaō, udayapattaspa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ. ēvamajjavayā vi māyāē aṇudayō, udayapattāē vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ. ēvaṁ muttī vi
lōhassa aṇudayō, udayapattassa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ ti. tayō puṇa duvihō-bāhirō abbhintarō ya. bāhiraō aṇasaṇāigō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

lg.l: kāyakilēsō saṁlīṇayā ya bajjhō tabō hōi

div.p: abbhintaraō puṇa pāyacchittāiō. taṁ jahā—

lg.l: jhāṇaṁ ussaggō vi ya anbhintaraō tavō hōi

div.p: saṁjamō ya sattarasavihō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

saccaṁ puṇa nikhajabhāsaṇaṁ. sōyaṁ ca saṁjamaṁ paï niruvalēvayā. ākiṁcaṇaṁ ca dhammōvagaraṇāirēgēṇamapariggahayā. bambhaṁ ca aṭṭhā
rasavihā'bambhavajaṇaṁ ti. ēsō ēvaṁbhūō jaïdhammō ti.

ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa āvibbhūyasammattapariṇāmēṇa bhāvaō pavannasāvayadhammēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sīhakumārēṇaṁ-bhagavaṁ! sōhaṇō jaïdhammō.
ēyaṁ kāumasamatthēṇa tāva kiṁ kāyav ti? dhammaghōsēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘sāvayattaṇaṁ.’kērisaṁ tayaṁ ti? kahiyaṁ sammattamāiyaṁ. pavannō
davyaō vi. taō appāṇaṁ kayakiccaṁ mannamāṇō kaṁci vēlaṁ pajjuvāsiūṇa dhammaghōsaṁ bandiūṇa ya saviṇayaṁ paviṭṭhō nayaraṁ. sāhiō
tēṇa vuttantō kusumāvalīē. pavannā ya ēsā vikahaṁci kammakkhaōvasamaō sāvayadhammaṁ. aṇudiyahaṁ ca dhammaghōsagurupajjuvāsaṇaparāṇaṁ
aïkkantō māsō. bhāviyāṇi jiṇadhammē. annayā ya purisadattōrāyā amiyatēyagurusamīvē sōūṇa dhamma ahisiściūṇa rajjē sīha
kumāra saṁjāyasaṁvēgō saha mahādēvīē sirikantāē parannō muttimaggaṁ. sīhakumārō vi dhammādhammavavatthaparipālaṇaraō sayalajaṇamaṇāṇa
ndayārī aṇurattasāmantamaṇḍalō dīṇāṇāhakiviṇajaṇośyārasaṁpāyaṇaraī jahōiyaguṇajuttō rāyarisī samuvajāō tti. ēvaṁ ca añcantā
ṇurattaṁ ca piyapaṇaïṇi piva mēiṇi muṁjantassa aïkantō kōi kālō. etthantarammi sō aggisammatāvasadēvō taō vijjukumārakāyāō
caviūṇaṁ saṁsāramāhiṇḍiya aṇantarabhavē ya kiṁpi bālatavavihāṇaṁ kāūṇa mottūṇa taṁ dēhaṁ puncakammavāsaṇāvivāgadōsēṇa samuppanō kusu
māvalīē kucchisi. diṭṭhō tīē sumiṇaō. jahā-paviṭhṭhō mē uyaraṁ bhuyaṅgamō, tēṇaṁ ca niggacchiūṇa ḍakkō rāyā nivaḍiō siṅghā
saṇāō. taṁ ca daṭṭaṇa sasajjhasā viya viuddhā kumumāvalī. amaṅgalaṁ ti kaliūṇa na sāhiō tīē daïyassa. pavaḍamāṇagabbhā ya
taddōsaō cēva na bahu mannaē naravaī. rāyā ya ahiyaṁ siṇēhaparavasō. bhaṇiyā ya pariyaṇēṇaṁ sāmiṇi! na juttamēyaṁ ti. tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘krimahaṁ karēmi'? sāhiyaṁ pariyaṇēṇaṁ-jahā dēvaṁ na bahu mannasi tti. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — nūrṇa ēsa gambhadōsō bhavissaï. annahā
kahamahaṁ ajjaüttaṁ na bahu mannēmi. annayā samuppannō sē dōhalō, jahā-imassa cēva rāiṇō antāṇi khāija tti. cintiyaṁ ca tīē
pāvayārī mē ēsa gambhō, tā alaṁ imiṇā. itthīsahāvaō ya bhattāranēhaō ya samuppannō sē vavasāō, jahā pāḍēmi ēyaṁ ti. tō
ālōciūṇa pahāṇapariyaṇaṁ kajjagaruyayāē ya aṇunnāyā tēṇa gamaparisāḍaṇaṁ kāumāraddhā. na ya sō nikāiyakammadōsēṇa paḍaï tti.

taō sā aṇēgōsahapāṇēṇaṁ ḍōhalayāsaṁpattīē ya paridubalā jāyā. pucchiyā ya rāiṇā-sundari! ki tē na saṁpajjaï, kēṇa vā tē
khaṇḍiyā āṇā, kiṁ vā maē paḍikūlamāsēviyaṁ, jē nivvē ēṇa tuma appōyagā viva kumuiṇī ēvaṁ jhijasi tti? taō paḍihiyayaladdha
nēhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kusumāvalīē-ajjaütta! īdisō mē nivēō, jēṇa cintēmi ‘attāṇayaṁ vāvāēmitti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — sundari! kiṁni
mittotti? kusumāvalīē bhaṇiyaṁ — ajjaütta! bhāgadhēyāṇi mē pucchasu tti bhagiūṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇā sagaggayā saṁvuttā. taō
rāiṇā ‘mahantō sē nivēō, tā alaṁ tāva imiṇā kahāē cēva, ahaṁ ēyaṁ akkhivāmi’ ti cintiūṇa akkhitā kahā, kaō annō
pasaṅgō. puṇō ya sē samāhūō mayaṇalēhāpamuḍō pariyaṇō, sabahumāṇaṁ ca bhaṇi bhō rāiṇā. kiṁ juttaṁ tumhāṇaṁ suṇiyanibandhaṇāṇaṁ pi
ēvaṁ kasiṇapakkhacandalēhaṁ va parikhijamāṇiṁ dēviṁ uvekkhiuṁ ti. na ya asajjhavatthuvisaō ēsa nivvēō, aō jīvalōvasārabhūyā
mē dēvī. kiṁ ca taṁ vatthu, jaṁ mē pāṇēsu dharantēsu cēva dēvīē na saṁpajjaï tti. mayaṇalēhāē bhaṇiyaṁ — mahārāya! ēvamēya; navaramitthīya
ṇasulahō avivēgō cēva kēvalaṁ ettha avarajjhaï. tā suṇaü mahārāō. mahārāya! ēyamiyāṇi pi kahiuṁ pārīyaï, tahā vi ‘na
annō uvāō’ tti kāūṇa kahīyaï. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — aṇurūvamēyaṁ saṁbhamassa; jaṁ uvāyasajhaṁ taṁ sayamēva kīraha, iyaraṁ nivēiyaï tti,
tā kahēu bhōī, kō ettha paramatthō tti? taō mayaṇalēhāē sasajjhasāē viya ācikkhiō gambhasaṁbhavāō dōhalayadōsēṇa gabbha
sāḍaṇāvasāṇō vavahārō ti. rāiṇā cintiyaṁ-ahō! sē dēvīē mamōvari asāhāraṇī nēhō, jēṇāvaccajammaṁ pi na bahu mannaï tti.
asaṁpāyaṇēṇaṁ ca dōhalayassa mā gambhavivattī sē bhavissaï tti uvāyaṁ cintēmi. visajiō ya tēṇa ‘jamahaṁ kālōciyaṁ bhaṇissāmi, taṁ
tahā kāyavvaṁ’ ti bhaṇiūṇa dēvīpariyaṇō. sadāviō maïsāgarō nāma mahāmantī. siṭṭhō imassa ēsa vuttantō. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ, juttaṁ
dēvīē vavasiya. ahavā mā sē imiṇā uvāēṇa tīsē vi dēhapīḍā bhavissaï. tā ēsa tāva ettha uvāō-bubhukkhiyassa rāiṇō kā
rimā antā poṭṭavāhiṁ dāūṇa nettapaṭṭāiṇā susiliṭṭhā ya kariya pecchamāṇīē cēva dēvīē kaḍḍiūṇa dijanti. pacchā ya pamyāē cēva
gabbhamantarēṇa cintissāmō ti cinti ūṇa nivēiō naravaïssa niyayāhippāō. bahu maniō rāiṇā. bhaṇiyā ya maïsāyarēṇa
dēvī-sāmiṇi! tahā kaḍḍēmi dēvassa antē, jahā aïsō na vivajaï ti. gambhasahāvarattaṇēṇa paḍisuyaṁ tīē. kaō sō uvāō,
saṁpannō dōhalō. pacchā visāyamuragayāē darisiō sē rāyā. taō samāsatthā ēsā. bhaṇiyā ya mantiṇā-sāmiṇi! paḍhamapasyāē
na tāva dēvassa nivēyaṇīō gabbhajammō, avi ya mamaṁ ti; pacchā jahōciyaṁ karissāmi tti. paḍisuyaṁ tīē. annayā uciyasamaē
pariṇayappāē diyahē pasūyā dēvī. sadāviō tīē maïsāyarō. bhaṇiyā ya tēṇa-sāmiṇi! akusalō viya dēvassa ēsa gambhō lakkhī
yaï. tā alaṁ imiṇā, annattha saṁvaḍaü, maō dēvassa nivēiyaï tti. tīē bhaṇiya-juttamēyaṁ ti. mamaṁ ciya hiyaēṇa mantiyaṁ amaccēṇaṁ
ti. taō pēyaṭṭāviō māhavīyābhihāṇāē dāsacēḍīē dāraō. gayā thēvaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ. etthantarammi diṭṭhā rāiṇā, pucchiyā ya ‘ki
mēyaṁ ti? taō sasajjhasāē vēvamāṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ māhaviyāē ‘dēva! na kiṁci’ tti. etthantarammi ruiyaṁ bālēṇa. taō dārayaṁ dadrūṇa
kuviēṇēva bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā-ā pāvē! kimēyaṁ vavasiyaṁ ti? taō thīsahāvakāyarayāē sāhiō sayalavuttantō māhaviyāē. taō
rāiṇā gahiō dāraō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ, na ēsa ēyāṇa hatthē puṇō bhavissaï tti. samappiō annadhāvīṇaṁ sāviyāō ya tāō.
jaï kahavi dārayassa pamāō bhavissaï, tā viṇaṭṭhā mama hatthāō tubbhē. nibbhacchiyā dēvī maïsāyarō ya kārāviyaṁ ca dēvīmanti
cittāṇurōhiṇā īsi pacchannabhūyaṁ tahāvihaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ. ēvaṁ ca aïkkantō kōi kālō. païṭāviyaṁ nāma dārayassa āṇandō tti.
vaḍhiō ēsō, gāhiō kalākalāvaṁ. puvvakammadōsēṇa naravaī paï visamacittō. dinnaṁ sē juvarajaṁ.

anayā pacantavāsī āḍaviō dummaī nāma sāmantarāyā duggabhūmibalagaviō vitthakō sī harāyassa. nivēiyaṁ rāiṇō. visa
jiō tēṇa tassuvari vikkhēvō. sabhūmibalaguṇēṇaṁ ca sō parājiō tēṇa. nivēiē ya kuviō rāyā, payaṭṭō sayamēva amarisēṇaṁ. gaō
payāṇayatiyaṁ. etthantarammi sindhunaīpuliṇē parivahantē payāṇaē karivarōvariṭṭiēṇaṁ jalāō nāidūrammi ‘ahō kaṭaṁ’ ti jaṁpiraṁ dilu
maṇuyavandraṁ. gaō taṁ cēva bhūmibhāgaṁ rāyā jāva diṭṭhō tēṇa mahākāō aïkasiṇadēhacchavī viṇintanayaṇavisajālābhāsurō gahiyarasanta
maṇḍukkagāsō bhayāṇayaviyariyāṇaṇaduppechō duyayarapavelliraṅgō mahayā kurarēṇa gasijjamāṇō juṇṇabhuyaṅgamō, kurarō vi diggayakarōrukāraṇa
rattacchabībhaccha ēṇaṁ ayagarēṇa. jahā jahā ya ayagarō kuraraṁ gasaï, tahā tahā sō vi juṇṇabhuyaṅgamaṁ, juṇṇabhuyaṅgamō vi ya rasantamaṇḍukkayaṁ
ti. taṁ cēva ēvaṁ vihaṁ jīvalōyasahāvavinbhamaṁ mūḍhahiyayāṇandakārayaṁ sappurisanivvēyahēuṁ vaïyaramavalōiūṇa visaṇṇō rāyā. cintiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇaṁ, hanta! ēvaṁ vavatthiē kō uṇa iha uvāō? gasiyappāō kurarō ayagarēṇē, kurarēṇa vi bhuyaṅgamō, bhuyaṅgamēṇa maṇḍukkō tti kaṇṭhagaya
pāṇā vi ētē na annonnaṁ viramanti, avi ya ahiyayaraṁ pavattanti, na ya annayaraviṇāsaṇāē mōyāviyā ēē saṁpayaṁ jīvanti. tā
kiṁ imiṇā apaḍiyāragōyarēṇa vatthuṇā pulōipaṇaṁ. tajjāviō mattavāraṇō, gaō āvāsaṇiyābhūmi, ārāsiō saha kaḍaēṇaṁ, kayaṁ
uciyakaraṇijjaṁ. tō addhakhīṇāē jāmiṇīē suttaviuddhō rāyā. ayagarāivaïyaraṁ sariūṇa cintiuṁ payattō. kahaṁ
āvāyamettamahurā vivāgavirasā visōramā visayā. abuhajaṇāṇa bahumayā vibuha jaṇavivajjiyā pāvā.

lg.l: ēyāṇamēsa lōō karaṇa mōnaṇa sāsayaṁ dhammaṁ
sēvēi jīviyatthī visaṁ va pāvaṁ suhābhiraō
dukkhaṁ pāvassa phalaṁ nāsaō pāvassa dukkhiō niccaṁ
muhiō vi kuṇaü dhammaṁ dhammassa phalaṁ viyāṇantō
maṇḍukkō iva lōō tucchō iyarēṇa pannaēṇaṁ va
ettha gasijaï sō vi hu kurarasamāṇēṇa annēṇa
sō vi hu na ettha sabasō jamhā ayagarakayantavasagō ti

div.p:
tā alaṁ yē aṇēyadukkhataruvīyabhūēṇa ahōpurisigāvikārapāraṇaṁ rajjēṇaṁ ti. rajjaṁ hi nāma pāyālaṁ piva duppūraṁ, jiṇṇabhavaṇaṁ
piva sulahavivaraṁ, khalasaṁgayaṁ pica virasāvasāṇaṁ, vēsitthiyāhiyayaṁ piva atthavallahaṁ, vammīyaṁ pitra bahumuyaṅga, jīvalōyaṁ piva a
ṇiṭṭhiyakajja, sappakaraṇḍayaṁ piva jattaparivālaṇijja aṇabhinnaṁ visambhasuhāṇaṁ, vēsājōvaṇaṁ piva bahujaṇābhilasaṇīyaṁ, akāraṇaṁ ca
suddhaparalōyamaggassa tti. tā ēvaṁ pariccaïya payajāmō dhīrapurisasēviyaṁ ubhayalōyasuhāvahaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ ti. aha kahaṁ puṇa patthuya
vavisaē lāghavaṁ na bharissaï? ahavā thēvamēyaṁ ēgajammapaḍibaddhaṁ ti. ēvaṁ cintayantassa aïkkantā rayaṇī, kayaṁ gōsakiccaṁ,
païṭṭhaṁ mantimaṇḍalaṁ.

etthantarammi nivēiyaṁ sē vijayavaïnāmāē paḍihārīē-mahārāya! ēsō khu dummaī dēvaṁ sayamēva patthiyaṁ viyāṇiya caṇḍaṁ ca
dēvasāsaṇamakgacchiya sirōharāvaddhaparasū dēvasāsaṇāikkamaṇajāyapacchāyāvō kaïvayapurisaparivāriō ihēvāgaō dēvadaṁsaṇasuhābhilāsī
paḍihārabhūmīē ciṭṭhaï. ēyaṁ sōūṇa dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. taō pulōiō rāiṇā maïsāyarō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa ījiyāgārakusalēṇa-pavisaü,
kō etya dōsō? saraṇāgayavacchalā cēva rāiṇō havanti. taō rāiṇā aṇunāō paviṭṭhō dummaī ‘dēva ēsā sirōharā ēsō ya kuhāḍō'
tti bhaṇiūṇa paḍiō calaṇēsu. taō abhayaṁ dāūṇa bahu māṇiō rāiṇā, kaō sē ahiyayarasakārō. niyattiūṇa ya rāyā gaō
jayaüraṁ. nivēiō rāiṇā niyayābhippāō mantimaṇḍalassa. tēṇa vi ya ‘kiccamēvēyamiha vaṁsasaṁbhavāṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ sēsayāṇaṁ pi, kiṁ puṇa
tumhāṇaṁ jiṇavayaṇa bhāviyamaīṇaṁ ti, ubhayalōyasāhāraṇaṁ ca saphalaṁ jīviyaṁ dēvassa, vaṇadavasanihā ya kāmabhōgā indhaṇāō cēva jala.
nti kiṁpāgaphalasamāṇā ya vivāgē, ayaṇḍamaṇōrahabhaṅgakārī ya pahavaï viṇijjiyamurāsurō maccu’ tti kaliūṇa bahu maniō. tō
sadāviyā saṁvacchariyā, bhaṇiyā ya tēṇa-nirūvēha āṇandakumārassa rajjābhisēyadivasaṁ. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ — jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi. nirūviūṇa
sāhiō ṇēhiṁ pañcamō divasō. taō uvaṇīyāī ahisēyamaṅgalāī. taṁ jahā-macchajuyalaṁ puṇṇa kalasō dhavala kusumāī mahāpaümā siddha
tyayā puḍhavipiṇḍō vasahō mahantayaṁ dahiyapuṇṇaṁ ca bhaṇḍayaṁ mahārayaṇāī gōrōyaṇā sīhacammaṁ dhavalāyavattaṁ bhadāsaṇaṁ cāmarāō duruyā
acchasurā mahādhaō gayamaō dhannāī dugullāṇi annāṇi ya ēvamāiyāī pasatthadavyāī ti. etthantarammi paricintiyaṁ rāiṇā-kāūṇa
māṇandakumārassa rajāhisēyaṁ taō gamislāmi dhammaghōsagurusamī ti. ēvaṁ ca cintayantō ahisēyadiṇaṁ paḍicchamāṇō ciṭaï.
iō ya puvyakayakammadōsaō amuṇiyanarindāhippāō ghaḍiō dummaïṇā saha āṇandakumārō. mantiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ ‘kahaṁci vaścaṇā
paōēṇa vāvāēmō mahārāyaṁ’ ti. suō ahisē yavuttantō. micchāhinivēsēṇa sacittaduṭṭayāē ya viparīō pariṇaō āṇandassa.
cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ-nūṇamahamaṇēga imiṇā vayaē sēṇa māriuṁ vavasiō. tā kahamahamēvaṁ chalijjāmi. ahavā saccaē vi ēyammi vuttantē
alaṁ mē rajjēṇa, jaṁ mē ēēṇa dinnaṁ saṁpajjaï. taṁ puṇa salāhaṇijja, jamēyaṁ vāvāiūṇa balā gheppaï ti. etthantarammi sadāviō rāiṇā
āṇandō. jāva necchaï āgantuṁ, tō paḍihāraduiō gaō kumārabhavaṇaṁ rāyā. tēṇa vi ya ‘na iō sundaratarō patthāvō’ ti kaliūṇa
puvāṇusayadōsēṇa sahasā ‘haṇa haṇa’ tti bhaṇiūga ukkhāyāsiṇā akayaparirakkhaṇōvāō muvisatthacittō paḍihāraṁ vāvāiūṇa gāḍhappa
hārīkaōrāyā. etthantarammi samuṭṭhāiō kalayalō, saṁjāō nayarasēnasaṁkhōhō, pariveḍhiō samantaō rāyasāhaṇēṇa āṇandō, pāraddhō
saṁgāmō. taō rāiṇā niyasarīradōhasavahēṇa sāviyaṁ sennaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. kiṁ bhē iyāṇi jujjhiēṇaṁ? ahaṁ tāva vāvāiō cetra
davyō, mā ēyaṁ pi vāvāēha, tā karēha rāyābhisēyaṁ ēyassa, ēsa bhē rāya tti. etthantarammi samāṇanō dummaī ‘bandhēhi ṇa nibiḍa
bandhēhi.’taō ‘jaṁ kumārō āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa āsannībhūō ya sē dummaī. pāḍiyā kulaputtayā, nibhacchiō nāyarajaṇō.
taō bandhāviūṇa pañcaïyapurisēhiṁ sukayaparirakkhaṇōvāō kō rāyā. ahiṭṭhiyaṁ rajja,ṭhāviyāō vavatthāō, vasīkayaṁ sāmantamaṇḍalaṁ.

taō aṇusayavasēṇa nēyāviō nayaracārayaṁ naravaī. taṁ ca añcantanimmahamāṇapurīsakalamalagandhaṁ phuḍiyabhittipamuttasirīsivaṁ bhiṇi
bhiṇāyamāṇamasayamakkhiyājālaṁ darivivaramuhaviṇiggayamūsaükkaraṁ uparivilambamāṇōrayanimmōyaṁ lūyātantuviraïyaviyāṇayaṁ, vāsaharaṁ piva
dussamāē, līlābhūmi piva adhammassa sahōyaraṁ pitra sīmantayamsa, saṁhā viya sambadukkhasamudayāṇaṁ, kulaharaṁ pira savvajāyaṇāṇaṁ, vi
ssāsabhūmi piva maccuṇō, siddhikhettaṁ piba kayantassa tti. taō ‘mahācārayaṁ nīō dēvō’ tti sōūṇa sahasā vimukkakandabhēravaṁ
aṇavarayanivaḍamāṇēhi mahallamuttāhalasarisēhiṁ aphajalabāhabinduhiṁ saṁpāiyahārasōhaṁ dēvasōēṇaṁ cēva parimilāṇadēhaṁ nirujjhamāṇaṁ pi
niuttapurisēhiṁ maṅgalamaṇivalayajhaṇajhaṇāravuddāmaṁ sabhūyāhiṁ balāō pelliūṇa tē urapoṭṭakuṭṭaṇujjayaṁ taō ya aṇuiyadharaṇiparisakkaṇēṇaṁ
sāsasamājariyāṇaṇaṁ paricattakuḍilabhāvattaṇēṇa vi ya ‘adaṁsaṇīyā dēvāvastha’ tisūyagēhiṁ piva lambālaēhiṁ niruddhanayaṇapasaraṁ cārayamēva
pattaṁ kusumāvalīpamuhamantēuraṁ ti. diṭṭhō ya tēṇa kālalōhamayaniyalasamāūriō narabaī. taō asōyapallavāgārēhiṁ hatthēhiṁ ‘aṇuci
yāsēvaṇabahulō saṁsārō’ tti daṁsayantaṁ piva hāralayāvahaṇajaṇiyakhēyaṁ pitra vacchatthalaṁ tāḍayantaṁ ahiyayaramakkandiuṁ pabattaṁ ti. taō
rāiṇā ārakkhigēhiṁ ca kahakahavi nivāriyaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca rāiṇā-kimaṇēṇāyāsamettaphalēṇa ahammāṇubandhiṇā ya sōēṇaṁ. aïbahuvi
cittarūvō khu ēsa saṁsārō, khēlaṇayabhūyā imassa savvē sarīriṇō, dunnivārō ya pasarō puvakayakammassa, jalaharantaraviṇiggayasōyāma
ṇīvalayacañcalā lacchī, suviṇayasamō saṁgamō. ēvamavasāṇāṇi etya rāgavilasiyāṇi. tā kimēiṇā avivēyajaṇāṇusarisēṇa pala
viēṇa? pattamēva tubbhēhi jīvalōyasārabhūyaṁ jiṇavayaṇaṁ. tā taṁ cēva aṇuciḍhēha. na taṁ mottūṇa annō dukkhakkhaōvāō tti. taō
tamēyamāyaṇṇiya ēvamēvēyaṁ na annaha’ ti kaliūṇa ya aṇujāṇāviūṇa naravaī jīviyaniravekkhayāē balā cēvāṇandassa gandhavyadattāē
vijjāharasamaṇiyāē sayāsē pavanna pacanaṁ ti.

iō ya païdiṇaṁ kayatthaṇāē vi kōhavasabhagacchamāṇēṇa ‘ēdahamettaṁ mē jīviyaṁ kālōiyaṁ saṁpayamaṇasaṇaṁ’ ti paḍivanna rāiṇā. āra
kkhigēhiṁ nivēiyaṁ āṇandassa, kuviō ēsō, pēsiō tēṇa dēvasammō nāma niyamahallaō ‘gaccha bhuñjāvēhitti. vattavyō ya ēsō ‘abhu
ñjamāṇaṁ niyamā vāvāēmitti. gaō dēvasammō, diṭṭhō tēṇa rāyā, bhaṇiō ya-dēva! devvavasayāṇaṁ pāṇiṇaṁ visamā kajagaï tti. ēsō
ya dēvō nāma aṇārāhaṇīō viṇaēṇa, aguṇagāhī guṇīṇaṁ, akālannū samīhiyassa, kēvalamaṇatyō jaṇāṇaṁ, mattahatthi vva sacchandayārī,
gaṅgāpavāhō va ujjukuḍilō mahāhavō vva nivāyadakkhō, visagaṇṭhi va nāṇukūlō rasāṇaṁ, paḍikūlō ya samīhiyāṇaṁ aṇukūlō asamī
hiyassa. tā jaï vi ēsa ēvaṁbhūō tahāvi purisēṇa khaṇamavi na purisayārō mottavyō tti. jēṇa mahārāya! pucōvajjiyāṇaṁ kammāṇaṁ
cēva ēvaṁ nāmaṁ devyō, taṁ ca purisayārajēyamēva vaṭṭaï ti. tā āvalambēu dēvō purisayāraṁ, karēu āhāragahaṇaṁ. jīvamāṇō hi purisō
laḍiūṇāvayaṁ avassaṁ dēva! saṁpayaṁ pāvēitti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhō dēvasamma. na mukō maē cēva ahākālāṇurūvō purisayārō.
paḍivanā ya bhāvaō pavvajjā. aō na saṁpayābhilāsaparaṁ mē cittaṁ. uciyakālaṁ ca nāūṇa paḍivanna aṇasaṇaṁ. aō na āhāra
gahaṇaṁ karēmi tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — akīramāṇammi āharagahaṇē suō tē kuppissaï. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — akāraṇō sē kōvō, saccapaïnnā
khu tavassiṇō havanti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva! viiyavuttantō cēva tuma kumāracariyassa; tā mā tē pamāyaṁ karissaï. etthantarammi
cirāyaï dēvasammotti saṁjāyāmarisavēgō ghettūṇa khaggaṁ āgaō āṇandō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-jaï na āhāragahaṇaṁ karēsi, tā imiṇā
kayantajīhāṇugāriṇā karavālēṇa sīsaṁ tē chindāmi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ—

lg.l: kō udhiēja nara vara! maraṇassa avassa mantavvē
aṇusamayaṁ maramāṇaṁ jiyaï tti jaṇō kahaṁ bhaṇaï 1
jaï tattha kōi puraō vacaï bhayakāraṇaṁ kimiha 1
jīyamaṇiñcamavassaṁ maraṇaṁ ti maṇammi nicchayaṁ jassa
na gaṇēi pañcavāyaṁ na ya paḍiyāraṁ cirāṇuvati vā
sacchandasuhaṁ viharaï hari va maccū mayakulēsu
ēka cciya niviṇṇā puṇō puṇō jāiuṁ ca mariuṁ ca
maraṇaṁ magganti maṇōrahē hi dhīrā dhiisahāyā
jassa mayassēgayarō saggō mokkhō va hōi niyamēṇa
maraṇaṁ pi tassa naravara! ūsavabhūyaṁ maṇūsassa
kattha gaō vā muccaï kayanta kaṇhāhipōyassa
na vi juddhaṁ na palāyaṁ kayantahathimmi agghaï bhayaṁ vā
na ya sē dīsaï hatthō geṇhaï ya dadaṁ amokkhō ya
jaha vā luṇāi sāsāi kāsaō pariṇayāi kālēṇa
iya bhūyāī kayantō luṇāi jāyāiṁ jāyāī
jaï tāva maccupāsā sacchandamuhaṁ surēsa viyaranti
maccussa sō pamāō jaṁ jiyaï narō nimēsaṁ pi.
tā mā adhīrajaṇa sēviyassa ayasasta dēhi u(a)vayāsaṁ
na hu maccudāḍhalīḍhaṁ indō vi pahū niyattēuṁ.
iya mayamāraṇamettēṇa vaccha! mā niyakulaṁ kalaṅkēhi
geṇhāmi kahaṁ cattaṁ hanta! savāyāē āhāraṁ?
paricintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ ‘namō jiṇāṇaṁ’ ti muṇiyatattēṇaṁ
avarāhēsu guṇēsu ya nimittamettaṁ parō hōi
ēvaṁ ca cintayantō puṇō vi hantūṇa pāvakammēṇaṁ
mariūṇa ya uvavannō saṇaṁkumārammi mukharō juimaṁ
iyarō vi ya kāūṇaṁ rajjaṁ mariūga rayaṇapuḍhavīē

div.head: taïō bhayō

lg.l: vakkhāyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sīhā-padā ya taha piyāputtā

div.p:
atthi ihēva jambuddīvē, avaravidēhē khettē aparimiyajaṇanivāsa, aṇaṇuhūyavāhivēyaṇaṁ, adiṭṭhaparacakkavinbhama, sundarapuranāyagabhūyaṁ
kōsaṁbanāma nayaraṁ. jattha sarala sahāvō, thirasiṇēhāṇubandhō, aṇaṅgarāyahāṇī, dhammaphalakappō itthiyājaṇō. jattha piyaṁvaō, sañcavayaṇō,
paḍhamābhibhāsī, dhammaniraō ya maṇussabaggō. tattha ya aṇēyasamarasaṁghaṭṭaviṇijjiyadariyanarindāvaṇayapalhatthaviyaḍamaüḍakōḍirayaṇappa
hārajiyacaraṇajuyalō rāyā nāmēṇa ajiyasēgō tti. tassa ya sayalarajacintaō, attāṇanivisēsō indasammō nāma māhaṇasacivō.
muhaṁkarā sē bhāriyā. iō ya sō āṇandanāraō sāgarōvamantammi naraē khaviūṇa, annē vi kiṁcūṇē cattāri sāgarōvamē saṁsārē
samāhiṇḍiya indasammassa māhaṇassa muhaṁ karāē bhāriyāē kucchisi itthiyattāē upavanō ti. jāyā uciyasamaēṇaṁ. kayaṁ sē nāma
jāliṇi ti kahāṇayavisē sēṇa. pattā jovvaṇaṁ. dinnā tassa cēva rāiṇō buddhisāgarābhihāṇasacivaputtassa bambhadattassa. kayaṁ
pāṇiggahaṇaṁ. bhuñjamāṇāṇa bhōē gaō kōi kālō.

iō ya sō sīhadēvō taō dēvalōgāō caviūṇa acintamāhappayāē kammassa, tīsē cēva jāliṇīē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō
tti. diṭṭhō ya tīē tīē cēva rayaṇīē sumiṇaō-jahā kira suvaṇṇamayapuṇṇakalasō mē uyaraṁ paviṭṭhō, sō ya asaṁjāyapariōsāē
viṇiggaō samāṇō kahakaha vibhaggō tti. taṁ ca daṭhūṇa sasajjhasā vi ya viuddhā ēsā. jāō sē saṁkiṇṇō muharasō. na sāhiō
ya tīē sumiṇō daïyassa. taō sē vaḍiuṁ payattō gabbhō. jāyā sē dēhamaṇapīḍā. cintiyaṁ ca tīē-'vāvāēmitāva ēyaṁ pāva
gabhaṁ’ ti. paüttāī gabbhasāḍaṇāī. kammavivāmaō na vivannō gambhō. muṇiō ya vuttantō bambhadattēṇa. niuttō tēṇa pariyaṇō
pasūisamaē, jahā gambhavivattī na havaï tahā tubbhēhiṁ jaïyavvaṁ avi ya bhaṭṭiṇīpariōsanimittaṁ kaïṁci cittaṁ sē vañciūṇa mama nivē
iyavyō ti. taō jāō sē dōhalaō-karēmi savvasattāṇamāṇandaṁ, saṁpāḍēmi dēvayāyayaṇāṇaṁ mahāpūyāō, pūēmi bhayavantē dhammaniraē
mahātabassī, muṇimō kiṁci paralōyamaggaṁ ti. saṁpāḍiō sē bhattārēṇa ḍōhalō. gambhapabhāvēṇa jāyā maṇōramā lōyassa. pattō ya
sūisamaō. pasūyā ēsā. cintiyaṁ ca tīē-kahaṁ puṇa ēsa eddahamettapariyaṇasamakkhaṁ vāvāiyavyō tti? etthantarammi muṇiyataya
bhippāyāē bambhadattavayaṇaṁ sariūṇa bhaṇiya bandhujīvābhihāṇāē bālasahīē. bhaṭṭiṇi! pāvō khu ēsa gabbhō. tā alamimiṇā
kilēsā-''yāsakāraēṇa, varaṁ viiściō ēsō tti. taō kasāyaparavasāē vāvāyaṇammi sahiyaṇalajjāluyāē bhaṇiyaṁ jāliṇīē
'tumbhē jāṇaha’ tti. tamō avaṇīō dāraō, nivēiō bambhadattassa. kayaṁ sē tēṇa sayalaṁ sutthaṁ. nīṇiō lōgavāō ‘vāvana
gabbhā bhaṭṭiṇi’ tti. ēvaṁ ca aïkkantō kōi kālō. païṭāviyaṁ nāma bālayassa ‘sihi’ ti. vaḍiō kalākalāvēṇa dēhōvaca
paṇa ya. saṁpāiyaṁ sē niravasēsaṁ kālōciyaṁ bambhadattēṇaṁ. gahiyō pacchā ‘udaraputtō’ tti. vināō ya vuttantō imiṇā sumiṇaya
dasaṇa-gabbhasāḍaṇāiō ya jaṇaṇīē. vēraggiō ēsō.
etthantarammi muṇiyavuttantā puttassa kasāiyā sē jaṇaṇī. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇa-kiha?

lg.l: ettō kammavivuḍḍī, taō bhavō, tattha dukkhasaṁghāō

div.p: bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

lg.l: kalusaphalēṇa na jujjaï kiṁ cittaṁ tatya jaṁ vigayarāgō
santē vi jō kasāē nigiṇhaï sō vi tattullō

div.p:
takasāōdaēṇaṁ ca sā kuviyā bambhadattassa. paricattaṁ ca sayalakaraṇijja. bhaṇiō bambhadattō. ēyaṁ vā piyaṁ karēhi, mamaṁ vatti,
ēyammi aparicattē nāhaṁ pāṇasāhāraṇaṁ udayaṁ pi geṇhāmi tti. nisāmiō ēsa vuttantō sihikumārēṇa. accubiggō niggaō
gēhāō. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇa-peccha mē pāvapariṇaī, jēṇa jaṇaṇī vi ēvaṁ vaï ti. ēyavaïyarēṇaṁ ca tāō vi mē duhiō. tā na
juttaṁ mē iha acchiuṁ. ēvaṁ cintiūṇamaṇāpucchi ūṇa tāyaṁ niggaō nayarāō.

gaō asōgavaṇujjāṇaṁ. diṭṭhō ya tattha asōyapāyavatalaṁgō, sasissaparivāriō, ēgavihasaṁjamaraō, dōasajjhāṇavirahiō,
tidaṇḍarahiō, caükasāyamahaṇō paścindiyaniggahaparō, chajjīvanikāyavacchalō, sattabhayavippamukkō, aṭṭhamayaṭṭhāṇarahiō, navabambhacē
bhaṇitaṁ ca—

raguttō dasavihadhammamuṭṭhiyamaṇō, ekkārasaṁganāṇī, bārasatavacaraṇakammaniraō ya vijayasiṁhō nāmāyariō tti. tō taṁ daṭṭaṇa samu
pannā tassa pītī. cintiyaṁ ca tēṇa-dhannō khu ēsō, jō aṇavadviyasiṇēhavibhamē saṁsārē, ēvaṁ dhammē niraō ti. tā pucchāmi
tāva ēyaṁ, kiṁ puṇa ēyassa nivvēyakāraṇaṁ, jēṇa ēsō ēvaṁ dhammē niraō tti. gaō tassa samīvaṁ. saviṇayaṁ paṇamiō bhayavaṁ. kō
guruṇā vi dhammalāhō. ubaviṭṭhō tassa pāyamūlē. pucchiō ya bhayavaṁ-kiṁ tē nivvēyakāraṇaṁ? jēṇaṁ ēvaṁ pi sabaṅgasundarāhirāmō,
sundarāhirāmayāō cēva pisuṇiyaniyavibhavavitthārō, vibhavavityārā saṁghiyasayaṇabaggō, sayaṇavagganiravekkhamimaṁ īisaṁ nissaṅgayaṁ
pavannō si. guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, kimiha aḍhimaṁsaruhirasaṁgaē sarīrē vi sundarataṁ? kō vā āyāsamētaphalē vihavavitthārē paḍi
bandhō, kō vā mumiṇayasamāgamacañcalē sayaṇē tti. avi ya—

lg.l: sayaṇassa vi majhagaō rōgābhihaō kilissaï ihēgō
sayaṇō vi ya sē rōgaṁ na ‘viriścaī nē ya nāsēi
majjhammi bandhavāṇaṁ ēkō maraï kaluṇaṁ ruyantāṇaṁ
na ya ṇaṁ dhārēi taō bandhujaṇō nēva dārāī
ekkō karēi kammaṁ phalamavi tassekkaō samaṇuhōi
ekkō jāyaï maraha ya paralōyaṁ ekkaō jāi
kō kassa jaē sayaṇō kō kassa va hōi anajaṇō?
mariūṇa vēriō vi hu jāyaï jaïṇagō, muō vi hum̐ rivū tti
tā agavaṭṭhiyabhāvē sayaṇē saṅgō ti mōhaphalaṁ

div.p: annaṁ ca. suṇa, amhāṇamēva jaṁ vattaṁ—

atthi ihēva vijaē laïcchinilayaṁ nāma nayaraṁ. tattha sāgaradattō nāma satyavāhō, sirimaī sē bhāriyā, tāṇaṁ ahaṁ suō tti.
kumārabhāvē vaṭṭamāṇō gaō tannayarāsannamēva lacchipavayaṁ. diṭṭhō ya tattha ēgammi vibhāgē siṇiddhapattasaṁcaō, dharāpaviṭhṭhadīhapāyagō,
nāliēripāyavō tti. taṁ ca daṇi samuppannaṁ mē kōuyaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca maē-ahō! acchariyaṁ. eddahamettassavi pāyavassa ēdaha
mettāō vibhāgāō ōyariūṇa pāyaō dharaṇiṁ paviṭṭhō tti. tā nūṇametya kāraṇēma hōyavvaṁ.

etthantarammi ya ayaṇḍammi cēva saṁjāō mē pamōō, viyambhiō surahimāruō, vimukō sahajō vi vērāṇubandhō pasugaṇēhi,
bhuvaṇasirīē viya samaddhāsiō lacchipavvaō, sabbōuyakusumēhi vi puphiyāī kāṇaṇujjāṇāī, pamuiyā vihaṁgasaṁghāyā, maṇaharuttālaramma
ca guñjiyaṁ chappayāvalīhiṁ, visuddhapayāsamatāvaṁ ca tamuddēsamujjōiuṁ payattōravī. tō maē cintiyaṁ ‘aha puṇa kiṁ imaṁ bhuvaṇacchērayaṁ’ ti.
etthantarammi taruṇaravimaṇḍalanihaṁ, suvisuddhajaccakavaṇaṁ, aṇēyarayaṇamaṇḍiyaṁ, jayajayaravābūriyanahaṅgaṇaṁ, gijjantatiyasamaṅgalaṁ,
nivaḍantakusumavuddhi, aṇēyatiyasapariyariyaṁ, vijiyasaṁsāracakapisuṇaya, avara disāō samōvayanta bhayavaō ajiyadēvatitthayarassa
didaṁ maē dhammacakkaṁ ti. tayaṇantaraṁ ca mahagdhaguṇarayaṇabhūsiyā siyambaradhāriṇō aṇēgē sāhayō, taō suradhariyakundadhavalāyabattō
dunduhiniṇāyabahiriyanahaṅgaṇō, virāyantadivyabhāmaṇḍalō, suravaïsamukhittacārucāmarō, surāsuramaṇuyavandrasaṁthuō, kālāyarupavaratu
rukkadhūvamahamahentagandhō, gandhavaṭṭibhūō añcantasōmō kañcaṇamayadivdhakamalāvalīē parisakkamāṇō bhayavaṁ, tilōyanāhō, nitthiṇṇa
bhavasamuddō ajiyadēvatitthayarō tti. taṁ ca da ṭhūṇa samuppaṇṇō mē pamōō, paṇaṭuṁ micchattatimirēṇaṁ, viyambhiyaṁ dhammavavasāraṇaṁ.
cintiyaṁ ca maē-dhannō ahaṁ, jēṇa maē tilōyacintāmaṇī bhayavaṁ uvaladdhō tti.

etthantarammi ya kaya tiyasēhiṁ bhayavaō maṇikaṇayakalahōyamayanimmiyapāyāratiyaṁ suvihattadivyatōraṇaṁ, rayaṇamayavicittaka
visīsaya, ūsiyamahākē univahaṁ, guñjantamahuyarāmōyasōhiyaṁ, ūsiyasiyāyavattamaṇaharaṁ, vēruliyadivasīhāsaṇaṁ, mahallasīhadhayacakama
ṇḍiyaṁ samōsaraṇaṁ ti. paviṭṭhō bhayavaṁ. patthuyā dhammakahā. kahiō bhagavayā asāsaō jīvalōgō. agaō amhāṇaṁ. taō taṁ
puvvakōuyaṁ samaṇussarantēṇa pucchiō bhayavaṁ maē tilōyanāhō. bhaya! kiṁ puṇa tassa nāliēripāyavassa pāyaō ōiṇṇō, kiṁ
atthi tattha daviṇajāyaṁ kiṁ vā nahi (nihī), kiṁparimāṇaṁ vā, kēṇa vā taṁ ṭhaviyaṁ, kīisō vā tassa vivāgō tti? bhagavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ — muṇa, lōhadōsēṇa pāyō ōiṇṇō. atthi tattha daviṇanāyaṁ. taṁ ca dīṇārasattalakhaparimāṇaṁ. tumaē tēṇaṁ ca nāliēri
jīvēṇa ṭhāviyaṁ. dhammasāhaō ya vivāgō ēyassa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! kahaṁ puṇa maē imiṇā ya ṭhaviyaṁ, kahaṁ ca mama īdisō
vivāgō imassa vi īdisō tti. bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ—suṇa,

atthi ihēba vijaē amaraüraṁ nāma nayaraṁ. tattha amaradēvō nāma gāhāvaī hotyā. sundarī sē bhāriyā. tāṇaṁ ca tubbhē duvē vi
upparopparajāyagā guṇacandabālacandābhihāṇā ya puttaya tti. saṁpattajovvaṇā ya mahantaṁ cēlāibhaṇḍaṁ ghettūṇa vāṇijjavaḍiyāē āgayā
imaṁ dēsaṁ. viṇiōiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, samāsāiō iṭṭhalāhō. etthantarammi vijayavammanaravaïṇā āḍhattō lacchinilayasāmī sūratēō nāma
naravaī. sō ya nayarē gajhaṁ chōga gahiyasāranayaralōō ārūḍhō imaṁ pavyayaṁ. tumbhē vi tēṇēva naravaïṇā saha ghettūṇa daviṇajāyaṁ para
balabhaēṇa ārūḍhā lacchipavvayaṁ. ṭhiyā ya ēyammi paēsē nihāṇīkayamālōciūṇa imaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ. aïkantō kōi kālō. taō
lōhadōsēṇa ‘bhāgiō’ tti kariya visapōgakaraṇēṇaṁ vāvāviō tumaṁ guṇacandēṇa. suddhasahāvattaṇēṇaṁ ca uvavannō vaṁtarasurēsu. guṇacandō
vi ya aparibhujiūṇa taṁ davyaṁ ettha cēva pacaē mahābhuyaṅgaḍakō mariūṇa uppanō rayaṇappahāē narayapuḍhavīē nāraō. tō tuma dekhaṇa
paliōvamamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa taō cuō etthēva vijaē ṭēkaṇāurē nayarē hariṇandissa satyavāhassa vamumaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi putta
tāē upavanō si. jāō kālakkamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca tē nāmaṁ dēvadattō tti. pattō kumārabhāvaṁ. etthantarammi taō vi guṇacandō
naragāō udhvaṭṭiūṇa lōhadōsēṇametthēva lacchipavvaē ēyassa cēva nihāṇassa paccāsannapaēsē uppannō bhuyaṅgamō ti. pariggahiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa
taṁ davvaṁ. etthantarammi lacchinivāsiṇīdēvayāmahammi samāgaō tumaṁ lacchipavvayaṁ. kayā dēvayāē pūyā. dinnaṁ dīṇāṇāhāṇa davi
ṇajāyaṁ. saṁpāiō bhōyaṇōvayārō. taō tumaṁ puvyabhavasiṇē hēṇaṁ rammayāē pavvayassa paribhamantō āgaō imaṁ uddēsaṁ. diṭṭhō bhuyaṅgamēṇaṁ.
taō lōhadōsēṇa ‘ēsa ēyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ geṇhissaï, tti ḍakō caraṇadēsammi. accuggayāē visassa takkhaṇā cēva nivaḍiō dharaṇivaḍhē.
pāsavattiṇā ya tē pariyaṇēṇa vāvāviō bhuyaṅgamō. uppannō etthēva patraē sīhattāē ti. tuma pi mariūṇa etthēva vijaē kayaṅgalāē
nayarīē sivadēvassa kulaüttayassa jasōharāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō si. jāō kālakkamēṇa. païṭāviyaṁ ca tē nāma
indadēvō tti. pattō jovvaṇaṁ. iō ya tēṇa sīhajīvēṇa punvabhavanbhatthabhāvaṇāō ōhasannāē pariggahiyaṁ taṁ davyaṁ. ēvaṁ ca gaō kōi
kālō. annayā ya vīradēvanakhaṇā niyasāmiēṇa pēsiō tuma lacchinilayasāmiṇō māṇahaṅgassa samīvaṁ. āgacchamāṇō ya kaïvaya.
purisaparivāriō kālakkamēṇa pattō imaṁ uddēsaṁ. upaviṭṭhō nīvapāyavassa heḍhē. etthantarammi giriguhāmuhagaēṇaṁ diṭṭhō si sīhēṇaṁ.
taō lōhasannāvivajjāsiyacittaṇaṁ vāvāviō si imiṇā, imō vi ya tumaē ti. uvavannā ya tubbhē etthēva vijayammi siritthalagē
paṭṭaṇē jakhadāsasanniyassa caṇḍālasta māijakkhāē bhāriyāē jamalabhāugattāē tti. jāyā kālakkamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyāī nāmāī tujjhaṁ
kālasēṇō, iyarasma caṇḍa sēṇō tti. pattā ya jōjaṇaṁ. annayā āhēḍayanimittaṁ gayā lacchipavyayaṁ, vāvāiō kōlō. sō ya ēyammi
vēva nihāṇakapaēsē visasiō. pajāliō jalaṇō. jalaṇapakaṁ taṁ khāiuṁ payattā. etthantarammi kaṭṭārayaṁ nisāṇiūṇa kahaṁci aṇa
tthadaṇḍaō cēva dharaṇiṁ khaṇamāṇēṇa ukladō nihāṇayakalasassa ēgadēsō caṇḍasēṇēṇaṁ. pavattō gōviuṁ, lakkhiō ya tumaē. taō
dabalōhēṇaṁ ‘vīsatthō tumaṁ vāghāiō tēṇa. unabannō vālayappahāē naragapuḍhavīē pañcasāgarōvamāū nāragō. imō vi tahabalobhēṇa taṁ caïva
dēsaṁ amuścamāṇō aïkantēsu kaïvayavarisēsu anuciūṇa taṁ davvaṁ annavēriyacaṇḍālaviṇivāiō samāgō uppanō tamābhihāṇāē naraya
puḍhavīē aṭārasasāgarotramāū nāragō tti. taō tuma paḍi puṇṇē ahāuē naragāō ubaṭiūṇa etthē. vijaē sirimaīē sannivēsammi
sālibhahassa gāhāvaïssa nandiṇīra bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō tti. jāō ya kālakamēṇa. païṭāviyaṁ tē nāma bālasundarō
tti. pattō jōvaṇaṁ. etthantaramma sīladēvāṇagārasamīvē pattō taē apattapubbō jiṇavarapaṇīō dhammō. paripāliyaṁ sāvayattaṇaṁ. kaō ya
jahāvihiṁ dēhaccāō. upavannō lantayābhihāṇē dēvalōē kiṁcūga tērasasāgarōvamāū vēmāṇiō tti. tattha paribhunniūṇa divyabhōē
ahāuyaparikkhaēṇa cuō samāṇō etthēva vijaē hathigāurē nayarē muhatthissa nagarasēhissa kantimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē
uvavannō si, iyarō vitaō naragāō uvvaṭṭiūṇa tatthēva nayarē tujjha cēva piuṇō sōmilābhihāṇāē gharadāsīē kuñchisi puttattāē
tti. jāyā kālakamēṇa. païṭāviyāī nāmāī-tujjha samudadattō, iyarassa maṅgalagō tti. pattā ya tumbhē ahākamēṇēva kumārabhāvaṁ.

etthantarammi pavannō taē aṇaṅgadēvagaṇisamīvē jiṇadēsiō dhammō. kayā dēsaviraī. pariṇīyā ya lacchinilayaśasiṇō sāvayassa
acalasatthavāhassa dhūyā jiṇamaī. annayā ya maṅgaladuiō jiṇamaīnimittamēva payaṭṭō lacchinilayaṁ. āgaō ya kaïvayapayāṇagēhiṁ. pattō
tamuddēsaṁ, jattha nihāṇaṁ ti. taō bahulapattalayāē paēsassa vīsa miyō muhattayaṁ. diṭṭhō ya taē pāmāḍajjhāḍayassa imammi paēsē
viṇiggaō pāyō. bhaṇiyaṁ kōugēṇa-bhō maṅgalaga! ettha parasē kēṇaï daviṇajāēṇa hōyatvaṁ. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘nihālēmō’ ti. taē
bhaṇiyaṁ — alaṁ imiṇā. kōugamettamēva mē kahaṇanimittaṁ, na uṇa daïviṇalōhō. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — ahiyayaraṁ mē kōuyaṁ tā nihālēmō, kō
estha paramatthō tti? tō aṇabhippēyaṁ pi bhavaō payaṭṭō taṁ tahāvihēṇa tikkhasārakaṭṭēṇa khaṇium̐ ti. diṭṭō ya tēṇa thēvabhūmibhāē
kalasakaṇṭhaō. taō puvakayakammalōhadōsēṇa cintiyaṁ maṅgalagēṇa. ahō! mahatthō ēsa nihī. jaï kahaṁci bhaṭṭidārayaṁ vaściu gi
hiuṁ pāviyaï ti. etthantarammi diṭṭhō tumaē vi kalasa kaṇṭhagō. bhaṇiō ya ēsō-bhada maṅgalaga! alaṁ imiṇā; ēhi, nayaraṁ gacchāmō
tti. taō pūriūṇa tamuddēsaṁ hiṭṭhō viya payaṭṭō maṅgalagō. bhaṇiō ya tumaē-bhadda! na taē kassaï puraō ēsa vaïyarō ahigaraṇa
hēubhūō jaṁpiyavvotti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaṭṭidāraya! na jaṁpāmō. cintiyaṁ ṇēṇa-maē vi viṇā ēsa ēyaṁ geṇhissaïtti. aō sē ēsa
payāsō. tā kahaṁ ahaṁ imiṇā vaścijjāmi. tā jāva cēva na geṇhaï ēsa ēyaṁ, tāva cēva ahaṁ kēṇaï uvāēṇa vāvāissaṁ ti. etthantarammi
pattā nayaraṁ. ārāmasamīvaṭhiēṇaṁ bhaṇiō tumaē maṅgalagō. bhada maṅgalaga! gaccha, sasurakulapaütti mē kuō vi uvalahiya saṁvāēhi,
jēṇa pavisāmō nayaraṁ ti. payaṭṭō maṅgalagō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-paviṭṭhō khu ēsō lahuṁ cēva ēyaṁ geṇhissaï. tā tahāṇuciṭṭhāmi, jahā
na ēsa etya pavisaï. gacchantō ya mē suhavāvāyaṇijō bhavissaï. tā ēyaṁ sē nivēēmi. jahā, itthisahāvaō kulaviruddhamācari
ūṇa pavisiyā tē ghariṇī. aō añcantamubbiggaṁ tē sasurakulaṁ. suyaṁ ca amhāṇamāgamaṇamēēhiṁ, aō ahiyayaraṁ lajjiyāṇi. tā
na juttametya pavisiuṁ ti saṁpahāriya taō nayaraṁ pavisiūṇa kayakālakkhēvō māyācariēṇa vivaṇṇamuhacchāō āgō tē samīvaṁ.
nivēiyaṁ jahā cintiyaṁ. taō visaṇṇō tumaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-dhiratthu isthibhāvassa, jamēvaṁvihā vi sāvayakuluppannā vi suvinā
yajiṇavayaṇasārā vi ubhayalōyaviruddhamāyaraï. ahavā natthi dukaraṁ mōhabhāvassa. tā alaṁ mē iyāṇi pi gihavāsēṇa. pavajjāmō tittha
yarabhāsiyaṁ sāhudhammaṁ. ēvamavasāṇō khu ēsa siṇēhabandhō. tā alaṁ mē sagihagamaṇēṇaṁ pi. iō cēva gacchāmi, jattha bhagavaṁ aṇa
ṅgadēvō. ēsō vi maṅgalagō iō cēva vaccaü gharaṁ, krimimiṇā kilisiēṇaṁ ti saṁpahāriūṇa bhaṇiō jahācintiyamēva maṅgalagō.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-ahō!! ēsa māyācariēṇaṁ maṁ vaściūṁ ujaō. tā kahamahamimiṇā vañcijāmi tti. tā bhaṇāmi tāva ēyaṁ. jāva
tuma na cintiyadēsaṁ pattō si, tāva kahamahaṁ bhavantaṁ pariccayāmi. ēvaṁ kaïvayadiṇāṇi imiṇā saha gacchiūṇa vāvāissaṁ imaṁ ti.
cintiūṇa bhaṇiō tumaṁ imiṇā. paḍibhaṇiyaṁ ca tumaē. bhada maṅgalaga! jaï tē nibbandhō, tā ēvaṁ havaü ti. taō pucchissāmō
kaṁci sāhuṁ, kahiṁ bhayavaṁ aṇaṅgadēvō tti? mantiūṇa patthiyā tumbhē paḍipahēṇa. aïkantā kaïvi vāsarā. annayā aïvisamaraṇṇama
jjhattinahayalasarantaramabhigaē diṇayaramma ‘mahāsāhasa’ ti kaliūṇa accantakhuddahiyaēṇaṁ lōhadōsaō tahā vi aṇiyattamāṇēṇaṁ suvī
satthahiyō cēva pahaō tuma piḍidēsammi churigāē maṅgalagēṇaṁ ti. etthantarammi adāṇapaḍivannō aṇēyasamaṇapariyariō tatthēva parasē
sahasā samāgaō agaṅgadēvō. diṭṭhō tuma aggagāmiēhiṁ sāhūhiṁ. etthantarammi sajjhasēṇa churiyamavahāya naṭṭhō maṅgalagō. cintiyaṁ
ca tubhaē-hā! kimēyaṁ ti. kiṁ takarā samāgayā bhavē. jōviyaṁ piṭṭhaō, jāka diṭṭhō sasaṁbhamāulaṁ pāyamāṇō maṅgalagō cintiyaṁ ca
tumaē-na ettha annē cōrā dīsanti, palāyaī ya ēsō. tā kimēyaṁ ti? etthantaramni diṭṭhā sōṇiyāṇurañjiyā churiyā. gahiyā ya
sā taē paccabhinnāyā ya taō saṁjāō tē viyapō. kimēyaṁ maṅgalagēṇa vasiyaṁ bhavē? ahavā na ēyassa kiṁpi ēvaṁ vavasāyakāraṇaṁ
uspekkhāmi. tā sadēmi tāva ēvaṁ ti. ēsēva mē ettha paramatthaṁ sāhissaï. sadiō maṅgalagō, jāva ahiṁyayaraṁ palāiumāraddhō tō
avagaō tē viyappō. hanta! ēēṇa cēva kvasiya ti. tā kiṁ puṇa sē imassa vavasāyasta kāraṇaṁ. āmōiō nihāṇayavr̥ttantō.
cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-natthi akaraṇijja nāma lōhavasagāṇaṁ ti. aō cēva nimittaō jiṇamaīvuttantī vi imiṇā vigappiō bhavē.
annahā kahaṁ tārisī mahākūlapasūyā suvināyajiṇāyaṇasārā ya tārisaṁ ubhayalōgaviruddhaṁ karissaï. etthantarammi pattā tē sāhakō
tamuddēsaṁ. paccabhinnāō ya tēhiṁ. vandiyā ya tumaē. dhammalāhiō sāhūhiṁ. pucchiō ya tēhiṁ. sāvaya! kipēyaṁ ti? sāhiō
tumaē tēsiṁ jahāvattō vuttantō. samāsāsiō sāhūhiṁ. etthantarammi diṭṭhō aṇaṅgadēvēṇaṁ. vandiō sō taē. abhiṇandiō tuma
imiṇā dhammalāhēṇa. pucchiō paüttiṁ. sāhiyā tumaē. samāsāsiō guruṇā. niyattō tumaṁ samaṁ sāhugacchēṇa. pattō thāṇēsaraṁ
nāma sannivēsaṁ. ṭhiō tattha gurū māsakappaṁ. paüṇō tē pahārō. uvaladdhā jahaṭiyā jiṇamaīpaüttī. cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-ahō!
maṅgalassa vañcaṇāpagārō, ahō! vicittayā mōhassa, ahō! aṇuvāēyayā saṁsārassa. tā jaï vi akhaṇḍiyasīlā jiṇamaī, tahāvi
alaṁ gihāsamēṇa. saṁpāḍēmi ubhayalōgasuhāvahaṁ samīhiyaṁ. suvināyajiṇavayaṇasārā ya sā tullacittā ya mē pāēṇa. tā sōūṇa imaṁ
vaïyaraṁ sā vi ya pavvaïssaï tti. ēvaṁ ca kaē sā vi hu tavassiṇī imāō dukkhabahulāō bhavasamuddāō samuttāriyā havaï. alaṁ ca
apavvaïyassa tīē daṁsaṇēṇaṁ. bahuvigdhā caraṇapaḍipattī, suhāvahā ya ēsā cēva tti cintiūṇa pavvaïō aṇaṅgadēvagurusamīvē.
aïkkantō kōi kālō. suō ēsa vaïyarō kuōvi jiṇamaīē. saṁviggā ēsā. cintiyaṁ ca tīē. sōhaṇamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ ajjaü
tēṇa. kilēsāyāsabahulō ēsa saṁsārō, viōgāvasāṇō ya saṁgamō, dāruṇō ya vivāgō visayaparibhōgassa, dullahaṁ ca maṇuyabhāvaṁmi
jiṇamayaṁ, ubhayalōyasuhāvahaṁ ca ēvaṁ cēva tti. taō sā ēvaṁ vicintiūṇa aṇunaviya jaṇaṇijaṇaē aṇunāyā tēhiṁ āgayā taṁ
annēsamāṇī, jattha tumaṁ. diṭṭhō ya aṇāē. pecchiūṇa nivvuipurapaṭṭiyaṁ tumaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca aṇāē. ajjaütta, sōhaṇamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ tumaē.
chinnā mōhavallī. avalambiyaṁ sappurisacariyaṁ. samuttāriyā ahaṁ appā ya imāō bhavasamuddāō tti. ahiṇandiūṇa pavanā pavvajja
aṇaṅgadēvagurusamīvē. aïkkantō kōi kālō. niraïyāraṁ sāmaṇṇamaṇuvāliūṇa tumaṁ kālakkamēṇa maō samāṇō uvavannō paṇuvīsasā
garōvamāū gēvejjagasurō tti. iyarō vi maṅgalagō tamatthaṁ pariggahiya mahāsilāsaṁcaocchāiyaṁ ca kāūṇa tammamattēṇa tatthēva dēsē kuṇi
māhārēṇa kilēsasaṁpāiyavittī ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa maō samāṇō uvavanō tamābhihāṇāē narayapuḍhavīē bāvīsasāgarōvamāū nāragō tti.
tō ya mahayā parikilēsēṇa tamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa uvyaṭṭō samāṇō etthēva vijaē rahabaddhaṇaē gāmē velliyagassa caṇḍālassa gēhē
chēlagattāē uvavannō tti. pattō ya jōvaṇaṁ. annayā ya bahuchēlagamajjhagaō tō rahavaddhaṇāō jayatthalē nijamāṇō pattō imaṁ nihāṇa
guddēsaṁ. samuppannaṁ ca sē tamuddēsamavalōiūṇa puvvabhavabbhāsaō jāissaraṇaṁ. taō lōhadōsēṇa viyaṭṭō velliyagassa necchaï taō
uddēsāō annatthamabhigantuṁ, cōijjantō vi puṇō puṇō niyattaï tti. kōhābhibhūēṇaṁ vāvāiō velliyagēṇa. uppannō tatthēva nihā
ṇaguhēsē mūsaō. pariggahiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa ōhasannāē taṁ davvaṁ. aṇuvāliyaṁ kaṁci kālaṁ. annayā sōmacaṇḍō nāma jyāriō kahaci
parimbhamantō āgō tamuddēsaṁ. uvaviṭhṭhō sālapāyavasamīvē. taō annāṇalōhadōsēṇa tassa puraō sāmarisamiva paribhamiumāḍhattō.
vāvāiō ya tēṇaṁ. samuppannō ya tassēva paṇaṭṭhasavaṇanāsigāē duggiligābhihāṇāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē tti. jāō kāla
lakamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma ruddacaṇḍō ti. pattō aṇēganaṇasaṁtāvagārayaṁ visapāyavō na jovvaṇaṁ. asamañjasaṁ ca vavahariumā
rakhō. annayā gahiō khattamuhē. uvaṇīō rāiṇō samarabhāsurassa. samāṇattō vajjhō. bhinnō sūliyāē ārakkhiyanarēhiṁ. maō ya
samāṇō samuppannō sakkarābhihāṇāē nāyapuḍhavīē kiṁcūṇatisāgarōvamāū nāragotti. tō ahāuyamaṇuvāliūṇa uvvaṭṭō samāṇō
samuppannō etthēva vijaē etthēva lacchinilaē asōgadattassa sēhissa suhaṅkarāē bhāriyāē kucchisi itthigattāē tti. jāyā uci
yasamaēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma siriyādēvi tti. pattā jovvaṇaṁ. dinnā sāgaradattasatthavāhaputtassa samuddadattassa. vattō vivāhō
bhuñjanti bhōē tti. etthantaraṁmi tumaṁ gēvēja gēhitō caviūṇa imāē cēva kucchisi samuppannō puttattāē tti. jāō kālakkamēṇa. païṭṭā
viyaṁ ca sē nāma sāgaradattō tti. pattō jovvaṇaṁ. paḍibuddhō ya dēvasammāyariyasamīvē. pariṇīyā īsarakkhandasāvagassa dhūyā nandiṇi
tti. bhōgasuhamaṇuhavantāṇaṁ kālakamēṇaṁ jāō tē puttō. annayā ya puttajammabhudayanimittēṇaṁ cēva saparivārō āgaō ujjāṇigāē
imaṁ cēva nihāṇaguhēsaṁ. diṭṭhō ya tumaē puttajjhayanivēsaṇanimittaṁ khaḍḍē khaṇamāṇēṇaṁ nihāṇagakalasakaṇṭhēgadēsō tti. taō tamannattha
nivēsiūṇa taṁ ca paēsaṁ puṇaravi tahēva kariūṇa bhuttuttarakālē paviṭṭhō nayaraṁ. cintiyaṁ tumaē. kimetya juttaṁ ti ambaṁ tāva pucchāmi.
sāhiō imīē ēsa vaïarō. pucchiyā ēsā ‘kimettha juttaṁ’ ti. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. mama tāva taṁ paēsaṁ ‘daṁsēhi, taō jaṁ juttaṁ, taṁ
bhaṇissāmi tti. dāviō sē paēsō. annāgalōhadōsēṇa cintiyaṁ ca tīē. vāyāēmi ēyaṁ taō ēgāiṇī geṇhissāmi. ēya
cintiuṇa bhaṇiō tumaṁ. puttaya, pabhūyanēyaṁ davyaṁ. ēyaṁmi gheppamāṇē kayāi narabaī avagacchē. taō ya sō sēsadavāvahāraṁ pi
mā karissaï tā alaṁ tāva ēiṇā, avasarēṇa geṇhissāmō tti. taē bhaṇiyaṁ. amba, jaṁ tumaṁ āṇavēsi. paviṭṭhāī nayaraṁ. aïkantā
kaïvi diyadā tujhaṁ suhēṇaṁ, imīē puṇaṁ puyabhavanmatyalōhadōsēṇa tuha maraṇacintōvāyapajjāulāē dukkhēṇaṁ ti. paricintiō uvāō
dēmi sē pōsahōvavāsapāraṇayabhōyaṇē visaṁ ti. taō upāsalahusarīrō visappaōēṇa lahuṁ cetra na bhavissaï tti cintiūṇa paüttaṁ
visaṁ. laddhō tumaṁ tēṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi diṭṭhō nandiṇīē. kaō aṇāē kōlāhalō. taō ahiyayaraṁ tē kūjiuṁ payattā jaṇaṇī.
saṁmiliō lōyanivahō. taō ēkēṇa siddhaputtēṇa visāvahāramantasāmatthaō ‘sāhammiō’ tti kaliūṇa jīvāviō. samuppannā ya
tē cintā. ēvamaṇēgōvadayabhāyagaṁ maṇuyāga jīvitaṁ. tā alaṁ gihavāsēṇaṁ. mā pugō vi mē pamattassa ēvamēva pāṇāvagamō bhavissaï.
aō pavajjāmi pavaja ti cintiūṇa jahōciēṇa vihiṇā pavannō dēvasammagurusamīvē pavvaja ti. parivāliūṇa niraïyāraṁ
kāūṇa ya kālamāsē kālaṁ unabannō tīsasāgarōvamāū gēvējagasurō ti. ēsā ca tē jaṇaṇī tahavvalobhēṇa tattha cēva sahatyasippa
nimmiyaṁ mahāpeḍhē kāūga putta yahayariṇāmamaṇiyanarayāuyā abhuñjiūṇa taṁ davvaṁ mayā samāṇī dhūmappabhāē narayapuḍhavīē uvavannā
pannarasasāgarokmaḍhiī nāragō tti. taō ubaṭṭā samāṇī nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍiya pubbabhavabhatyobhadōsaō ettha nāliēri
pāyavattāē upabanna tti. tuma pi ya taō sāgaradatta sēṭigēhē sirimaīē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō si. doṇhaṁ pi tumhāṇaṁ saṁpayaṁ
imā avatthā. ēsa ettha baïyarō ti.

tō mamēyaṁ sōūṇa samuppannō saṁvēgō, virattō bhavacāragāō magō. aṇunnaviō bhayavantasannihāṇē tahavyavaïyaraṁ naravaī.
aṇunnāō ya tēṇa tō taṁ gēhāviya sayaladuhi yasattāṇaṁ dāūṇa pabannā maē vijayadhammagagaharassa samīvē pabyajja tti.

sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! ēvamēyaṁ, īisō cetra ēsa saṁsārō. dhannō tumaṁ, jō ēvamabhipayaïō tti. aha kaïvihī puṇa
dāṇāibhēyaṁ paḍucca paṇīō bhayavayā dhammō. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa

lg.l: dāṇaṁ ca hōi tivihaṁ nāṇā'bhaya-dhammuvaggahakaraṁ ca
jaṁ tattha nāṇadāṇaṁ tamahaṁ vocchaṁ samāsēṇaṁ
dinnēṇa jēṇa jīvō vinnāyā hōi bandha-mokkhāṇaṁ
dinnēṇa tēṇa jīvō puṇṇaṁ pāvaṁ ca bahuvihamasēsaṁ
sammaṁ viyāṇamāṇō kuṇaï pavittiṁ nivittiṁ ca
puṇṇammi pabattantō pāvaï ya lahuṁ narāmarasuhāī
tiriyāṇa va maṇuyāṇa va amuramurāṇaṁ ca hōi jaṁ mukkhaṁ
ēvaṁ ihalōyammi vi paralōyammi ya suhāi nāṇēṇaṁ
pāvēi jēṇa jīvō tamhā taṁ dāṇapavaraṁ tu
jīvāṇa phuḍaṁ savvannubhāsiyaṁ dēi jō nāṇaṁ
ēyaṁ khu nāṇadāṇaṁ sundara! saṁkhēvaō samakkhāyaṁ
icchanti savvajīvā ninbharaduhiyā vi jīviuṁ jamhā
tamhā taṁ cēva piyaṁ tēsiṁ kusalēṇa vinnēyaṁ
jamhā ya naravarindō maraṇammi uvaṭṭhiyammi rajja pi
dēi sajī viyahēuṁ tamhā taṁ cēva iṭṭayaraṁ
dāyavvaṁ ca maīmayā jaṁ iṭu hōi gāhagāṇaṁ tu
dīhāū u suruvō nīrōgō hōi abhayadāṇēṇaṁ
taṁ puṇa asaṇaṁ pāṇaṁ vatthaṁ pattaṁ ca bhēsayaṁ joggaṁ
dāyavvaṁ tu maïmayā tahēva sayaṇāsaṇaṁ pavaraṁ
kammalahuyattaṇēṇa ya sō appāṇaṁ paraṁ ca tārēi
kammagurū atarantō sayaṁpi kaha tāraē annaṁ 1
dāyavvaṁ puṇa taṁ kāraṇēhi caühi parisuddhaṁ
dāyagasuddhaṁ bhaṇṇaï jō dāyā dēi nāṇasaṁpannō
sukkhētammi va bīyaṁ vikkhittaṁ tassa bahuphalaṁ hōi
jō puṇa saddhārahiō dāṇaṁ dēi jasakittirēsammi
ahimāṇēṇa va ēsō dēha ahaṁ kiṁ na dēmi tti
taṁ saddhājalarahiyaṁ vīyaṁ va na hōi bahuphalaṁ tassa
dāṇaṁ bahuṁ pi pavaraṁ siyacittassa mōhēṇa
kāūṇa ya pāṇivaha jō dāṇaṁ dēi dhammasaddhāē
karmalaghutvēna ca sa ātmānaṁ paraṁ ca tārayati
mūḍhō lōyaviruddha dhammaviruddhaṁ ca dēi jō dāṇaṁ
sō appāṇaṁ taha gāhagaṁ ca pāḍēi saṁsārē
jāṇaha gāhagasuddhaṁ pañcamahavvayadharō u jō niyamā
taha khanti-madava-ujjavajuttō dhaṇiyaṁ ca vigayalōhō u
iha paralōē ya tahā savvattha dadaṁ apaḍibaddhō
mēru vva jō na tīraï uksaggasamīraṇēhi cālēuṁ
sīlanvayarahiyāṇaṁ dijaï jaṁ puṇa dhaṇaṁ kupattāṇaṁ
taṁ khalu dhōvaï vatthaṁ ruhirakayaṁ sōṇiēṇēva
dinnaṁ suhaṁ pi dāṇaṁ hōi kupattammi asuhaphalamēva
sappassa jaha va dinnaṁ khīraṁ pi visattaṇamuvēi
tucchaṁ pi supattammi u dāṇaṁ niyamēṇa suhaphalaṁ hōi
jaha gāvīē viiṇṇaṁ taṇaṁ pi khīrattaṇamuvēi
bhaṇṇaï ya kālasuddhaṁ dāṇaṁ kālōvavannayaṁ jaṁ tu
kālammi kīramāṇaṁ kisikammaṁ bahu phalaṁ jahā hōi
iya kālammi vi dinnaṁ dāṇaṁ pi hu bahuphalaṁ ṇēyaṁ
hōi ayālammi jahā avayāraparaṁ païṇṇaya bīyaṁ
dentassa gāhagassa ya ēvaṁ dāṇaṁ pi vinnēyaṁ
kayakiccaṁ mannentō appāṇaṁ dēi jō dāṇaṁ
aṭṭaksaṭṭōvagaō avi suddhaṁ dēi kalasiyamaṇō u
sanidāṇaṁ ca na ēyaṁ bhāvavisuddhaṁ havaï dāṇaṁ
mokkhatthaṁ jaṁ dāṇaṁ taṁ paī ēsō vihī muṇēyavyō
aṇugampādāṇaṁ puṇa jiṇēhi na kahiṁci paḍisiddhaṁ
ēsō u dāṇamaïō dhammō saṁkhēvaō samakkhāō
ettō ya sīlamaïyaṁ tu bhaṇṇamāṇaṁ nisāmēha
mēhuṇa-pariggahāṇa ya viraī jā savvahā sammaṁ
taha kōha-māṇa-māyā-lōhassa ya niggahō daḍhaṁ jō u
cittēṇa nirīhēṇaṁ mettī vi ya sabyajīvēsu
ēyaṁ ca sēviūṇaṁ dhammaṁ jiṇadēsiyaṁ susīlamayaṁ
mugaī pāvanti narā ṭhaenti saï duggaïduvāraṁ
ēsō u sīlamaïō bhaṇiō dhammō jiṇēhi savvēhiṁ
bhaṇṇaï tavōmaïō sa bāhira-'nbhantarassa ya tavassa
kāyakilēsō saṁlīṇayā ya bajjhō tavō hōi
jhāṇaṁ ussaggō vi ya abhintaraō tavō hōi
pāventi visālāī karenti dukkhakkhayaṁ taha ya
ēsō u tavōmaïō dhammō saṁkhēvaō samakkhāō
nisuṇaha ettō sundara! dhamma puṇa bhāvaṇāmaïyaṁ
vēraggabhāvaṇā vi ya paramā titthayaramattī ya
titthayarabhāsiyassa ya dhammassa pabhāvaṇā taha ya
mokkhasuhammi ya rāō aṇāyayaṇavajjaṇā ya supasatthā
saï appaṇō ya nindā garahā ya kahicikhaliyassa
ēyaṁ caünvihaṁ phāsiūṇa dhammaṁ jiṇēhi pannattaṁ

div.p:
ō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa āvibhūō sihikumārassa jiṇadhammabōhō. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇa bhayavaṁ vijayasiṅghō-bhayavaṁ! ēvamēva, īdisō
cēva ēsa dhammō, na ettha saṁdēhō tti. kiṁ tu dāṇamaïyaṁ mottūṇa na sēsabhēyā imassa samma aviyalā tīranti gihatyēṇa kāuṁ. tā
ācikkha bhayavaṁ! kērisō puṇa imassa mahāpurisasēviyassa, sayaladukkhāṇalajalassa, siddhivahusaṁgamēkahēuṇō samaṇattaṇassa jōgō tti.
bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, samaṇataṇārihō āriyadēsuppaśnō, visiṭajāikulasamaniō, khīṇappāyakammamalō, taō cēva vimalabuddhī
'dullahaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ, jammō maraṇanimittaṁ, calāō saṁpayāō, dukkhahēyavō visayā, saṁjōgē viōgō, aṇusamayamēva maraṇaṁ, dāruṇō
vivāgō’ tti ahigayasaṁsārasarūvō,taō cēva tamvirattō, payaṇukasāō, thēvahāsō, akōugō, kayanna, viṇīō, puvvaṁ pi rāyā-'macca
paürajaṇabahumaō, adōsagārī, kallāṇaṅgō, saddhāvantō, thirasaddhō samuvasaṁpannō ya. sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya. sōhaṇō samaṇatta
ṇārihō bhayavayā pavēiō. ahaṁ puṇa samuvasaṁpannō. tā ēvaṁ nivēiē bhayavaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti. taō paricintiyaṁ bhayavayā-jahā khu ēsō
mahābhāgavantō suhumapasiṇēsu viyakkhaṇō, añcantapasantarūvō, aïṇiuṇabhaṇiikusalō vi ya lakkhijaï, tahā bhaviyaramaṇēṇaṁ mahā
kulapamaēṇaṁ bhavavirattacittēṇa ya. tā imaṁ tāva ettha pattakālaṁ, jaṁ ēsō uvasaṁgahijjaï ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-mahāsāvaya!
na sēsaguṇavippahūṇō ihaṁ uvasaṁpajjaï. juttaṁ ca payaïnigguṇē saṁsāravāsē jamiṇaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ, kiṁ tu dukkaramidaṁ. ettha khalu savvakālamēva
samasattumittabhāvēṇa pāṇāivāyaviraī, appamattayāē aṇaliyabhāsaṇaṁ, dantasōhaṇamettassa vi adinnassa bajjaṇā, maṇa-vayaṇa-kārahi
abbambhacēranirōhō, vattha-pattō-vagaraṇēhiṁ pi nimmamattayā, caüvbiharāibhattaviraī, uggamu-ppāya-ṇēsaṇāvisuddhapiṇḍagahaṇaṁ, saṁjōṣaṇāi
paścadōsarahiyamiyakālabhōyaṇaṁ, pañcasamiyattaṇaṁ, tiguttayā, iriyāsamiyāibhāvaṇāō, aṇasaṇa-pāyacchitta-viṇayāisabāhiranbhinta
ratavōvihāṇaṁ, māsāiyā ya aṇēgāō paḍimāō vicittā ya davyādaō abhiggahā, aṇhāṇaṁ, bhūmisayaṇijja, kēsalobhō, nippaḍi
kammassarīrayā, savvakālamēva gurūṇaṁ nidēsakaraṇaṁ, khuhā-pivāsāiparīsahāhiyāsaṇaṁ, divvāiuvasaggavijaō, laddhāvaladdhavittiyā
kiṁ bahuṇā? accanta dubahamahāpurisavūhaaṭṭhārasasīlaṅgasahassabharavahaṇamavissāmaṁ ti. tā tariyavvō khalu ayaṁ bāhāhiṁ mahāsamuddō,
bhakkhiyabbō nirāsāya (ē) ēva vālugākavalō, parisakkiyadhvaṁ nisiyakaravāladhārāē, pāyavvā muhuyahuyavahajālāvalī, bhariyavbō
sahumapavaṇakotthalō, gantavvaṁ gaṅgāpavāhapaḍisīpaṇaṁ, tōliyanvō tulāē mandaragirī, jēyavvamēgāgiṇā cāuraṅgabalaṁ, vidhēyavyā
vivarīyabhamantaddhacakōvarithiulliyā, gahiyanyā agahiyapuvvā tihuyaṇajayapaḍāgā. ēōvamaṁ dukkaraṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ ti.
taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa pahaṭṭavayaṇakamalēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇa-bhaya! ēvamēyaṁ, jahā tumbhē āṇavēha. kiṁ tu viiyasaṁsārasa
rūvassa pāṇiṇō tandhiōgujayassa tasmucchēyakāraṇaṁ na kiṁci dukaraṁ ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiya-ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu taṁ cēva saṁsārasarūvaṁ
pañcakkhōvalabbhamāṇāsundaraṁ pi aṇēyabhavabhāvaṇāō mōhēi pāṇiṇaṁ, mūḍhō ya sō na cintēi taspta rūvaṁ, na gaṇēi āyaī, na mannaē
uvaēsaṁ, nābhiṇandaï guruṁ, na pecchaï kulaṁ, na sēvaï dhammaṁ, na vīhēi ayasassa, na rakkhaï vayaṇijja. savvahā taṁ tamāyaraï, jēṇa jēṇa
sō ihalōē paralōē ya kilēsabhāyaṇaṁ hōī. tā nihaṇiyabvō khalu ēsa mōhō tti. sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! tassa vi ya
nihaṇaṇē ēsēva uvāō, na ya aṇāḍhattakajjō purisō phalaṁ sāhēi, āḍhattē ya saṁsaō, ahavā uvāyapabattō asaṁsayaṁ cēva sāhēi.
uvāō ya ēsa, jaṁ bhayavaō samīvē samaṇattaṇapava jaṇaṁ. nittharanti khalu kāyarā vi pōyanijāmayaguṇēṇa mahaṇṇavaṁ. na ya appa
puṇṇāṇaṁ kusalabuddhī havaï. na ya samuppannāē vi imīē ēvaṁvihasayalaguṇasaṁpaōvavēyagurulāhō. tā karēhi mē bhayavaṁ! aṇuggahaṁ ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha! kaō cēva tuha maē aṇuggahō. kiṁ tu ēsā samayaṭṭiī amhāṇaṁ, jē saṁsiūṇa thēvamāgāstha, sikkhā
viūṇā''vasmayaṁ aïkantēṣu kaïbayadiṇēsu taō dikkhijjaï ti. sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! aṇugihīō mhi. annaṁ ca—
nikkhantēṇa vi maē samayahiī cēva pāliyabdhā. tā ēvaṁ havaü tti.

ēvaṁ ca jāva mantayantā ciṭṭhanti, tāva āgaō kahiṁci tappaüni sōūṇa aṇēyalōyaparigō karēṇuyārūḍhō imassa cēva jaṇaō
bambhayattotti. paṇamiō tēṇa bhayavaṁ vijayasiṁhāyariō. ahiṇandiō bhayavayā dhammalāhēṇa. uvaviṭhṭhō gurupāyamūlē. paṇamiūṇa
bhaṇiō sihikumārēṇa tāya! saṁpāēhi abhaggapaṇaïpatthaṇō mē ēgaṁ patthaṇaṁ ti. bambhayattēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha! bhaṇasu. tuhāyattamēva mē
jīviyaṁ. sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiya-tāya! viiyavuttantō cēva turma saṁsārasahāvassa. dullahaṁ khalu māṇusattaṇaṁ, aṇicā piyajaṇasamāgamā,
caścalāō riddhīō kumumasāraṁ jovvaṇaṁ, paralōyapañcatthiō aṇaṅgō, dāruṇō visayavivāgō, pahavaï sayā aṇivāriyapasarō maccū. tā
karēhi mē pasāyaṁ. ēvamavasāṇē iha jīvalōē aṇunāō tumaē vīyarāyappaṇīyajaïdhammāsēvaṇēṇa karēmi saphalaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ. tō
suyasiṇēhēṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ sagaggaya bhaṇiyaṁ bambhayattēṇa-putta! ayālō ēsa jaïdhammassa. sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya!
maccuṇō viya natthi ayālō jaïdhammassa ti.

etthantarammi bambhayattaparicāragēṇa nāhiyavādiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ piṅgakēṇa-bhō kumāra! kēṇa tumaṁ vippayāriō? na khalu ettha
pañcabhūyavaïrittō paralōgagāmī jīvō samatthīyaï. avi ya ēyāṇi cēva bhūyāṇi sahāvaō cēva ēyappagārapariṇāmapariṇayāṇi ‘jīvō'
tti bhaṇṇanti. jayā ya ēyāṇi caïūṇa samudayaṁ paścattamuvagacchanti, tayā ‘maō purisō’ ti ahihāṇaṁ pavattaē. na uṇa etya kōi
dēhaṁ caïūṇa ghaḍaciḍaō viva parabhavaṁ gacchaī. tā mā tumaṁ asantē vi paralōgē micchāhiṇivēsabhāviyamaī sahāvasundaraṁ visayamuhaṁ
paricayamu, daṁsēhi vā dēhavaïrittaṁ dēhiṇaṁ. aō jaṁ taē bhaṇiyaṁ — jahā dullahaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ, tamasaṁbaddhamēva. jaōna taṁ sukaya-dukkayāṇu
bhāvēṇa labbhaï, avi ya bhūyapariṇaīō, aō kimiyamāulattaṇaṁ. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ ‘aṇicā piyajaṇasamāgamā', ēyaṁ pi akāraṇaṁ.
jaō na tē nikkhantāṇaṁ pi annahā honti. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ ‘cañcalāō riddhīō', ēyassa vi na nikkhamaṇamēva paḍivakkhō, avi
ya uvāēṇa parirakkhaṇaṁ ti. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kusumasāraṁ jovvaṇaṁ', ettha viya rasāyaṇaṁ juttaṁ, na uṇa nikkhamaṇaṁ ti. tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ paralōyapaccatthiō aṇaṅgō’ tti, ēyaṁ pi na sōhaṇaṁ, jō paralōō cēva natthi, na ya kōi taō āgantūṇamappāṇayaṁ daṁsēi.
ēvamavi ya parigappaṇē aïppasaṅgō tti. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ ‘dāruṇō visayavivāgō’ tti, ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgaya; jō āhārassa vi
vivāgō dāruṇō cēva, ēvaṁ ca bhōyaṇamavi paricaïavvaṁ. na ya ‘hariṇā vijanti tti jakā cēva na vuppanti.’ [jayahiī ya ēsa ti] na
ya uvāyannuṇō purisassa dāruṇattaṁ pi saṁbhavaï. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ ‘pahavaï ya sayā aṇivāriyapasarō maccu’ tti, ēyaṁ pi bālavayaṇa
yētaṁ; jēṇa nikkhantassa vi ēsa aṇivāriyappasarō cēva, tēṇa vi ya samaṇēṇa pajjantē mariyavvaṁ ti. na ya ‘pajantē mariyavvaṁ’ ti
masāṇē cēvāvatthāṇamukvanna. na ya santē vi paralōē dukkhasēvaṇāō muhaṁ, avi ya suhasēvaṇāō cēva. jaō jaṁ cēva abbhasijjaï,
tassēva pagarisō lōē diṭṭhō, na uṇa vivajaō tti. tā virama ēyāō vavasāō ti. siddikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — savvamiṇamasaṁgayaṁ
muṇa. ahavā na juttaṁ bhayavaō samakkhaṁ mama jaṁpiuṁ. tā bhayavaṁ cēva ettha bhaṇissaï ti. taō bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhō mahāmāhaṇa!
suṇa. jaṁ taē bhaṇiya, jahā ‘kēṇa tumaṁ payāriō’ ti, ēsa jammantarambhatthakusalabhāvaṇābhāviyamaī appāvaraṇasaṁjuō vīyarāgavayaṇā
vibhūyakhaōvasamabhāvēṇa samuppannatattanāṇō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ bhavasahāyamavayujjhiūṇa tō virattō, na uṇa kēṇaï vippayāriō tti. tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘na khalu ettha pañcabhūyavaïrittō paralōgagāmī jīvō samatthīyaï, avi ya ēyāṇi cēva bhūyāṇi. sahāvaō cēva ēyappagārapari
ṇāmapariṇayāṇi jīvō tti bhaṇṇanti', ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgayaṁ. jaō savvahā acēyaṇāṇi bhūyāṇi. tā kahaṁ imāṇaṁ ēyappagārapari
ṇāmapariṇayāṇa vi ēsā pañcakkhapamāṇāṇubhūyamāṇā gamaṇāiceṭṭhānibandhaṇā cēyaṇā jujjaï tti. na hi jaṁ jēsu pattēyaṁ na vijaē, taṁ
tēsiṁ samudaē vi havaï, jahā vālugāthāṇaē tellaṁ. aha ‘pattēyaṁ pi imāṇi cēyaṇāṇi’ tti, taō siddhamaṇēgavēyannasamudaō purisō,
ēgindiyā ya jīvā, ghaḍādīṇaṁ ca cēyaṇataṇaṁ ti. na ya ghaḍādīṇaṁ cēyaṇa tti. aō atthi khalu paścabhūyavaïrittō cēyaṇāsvō para
lōgagāmī jīvō tti. taō ya ja bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘jayā ēyāṇi caïūṇa samudayaṁ pañcattamuvagacchanti, tayā ‘maō purisō’ tti abhihāṇaṁ
pavattaï', ēyaṁ pi vayaṇamettaṁ cēva. cēyannassa tadaïrēgabhāvavittīō. na yāṇubhūyamāṇasarūvā cēva cēyaṇā nisēhiuṁ pārīyaï. tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘na uṇa ettha kōi dēhaṁ caïūṇa ghaḍaciḍaō viva parabhavaṁ gacchaï’ tti, ēyaṁ pi aō cēva paḍisiddhaṁ vēiyavvaṁ, cēyaṇassa
acēyaṇabhēyāō ti. tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — tā mā tuma asantē vi paralōē micchābhiṇivēsabhāviyamaī sahāvasundaraṁ visayasuhaṁ
paricayasu, daṁsēhi vā mē dēhavaïrittaṁ dēhiṇa', ettha vi ya suṇa-cēyannabhēyasiddhīē kahaṁ natthi paralōgō? vijamāṇē ya tammi kaha
ēyassa micchābhiṇivēsō? kahaṁ ca pamugaṇasāhāraṇā viḍambaṇāmettarūvā cintāyāsabahulā maṇanivvāṇavēriṇō avinnāyavī
sambhasuhasarūvā sahāvasundarā visaya tti, kiṁ ca tēhiṁtō suhaṁ? jaṁ puṇa ‘sō dēhabhinnō na dīsaï', ettha kāraṇaṁ suṇa-muhumō
