annayā ya ahaṁ gayaṇayalapāsāyasaṁṭhiyaṁ ārūḍhō indanīlanijjūhayaṁ. tattha antēurāṇaṁ rasaṇanēuraniṇāyagabhiṇaṁ navajalaharasadaṁ
pitra guṇaṇiyāmurayanigyōsamāyaṇṇiūṇa naciuṁ payattō. tayavasāṇē ya vāyāyaṇavivarēgadēsēṇa dihā maē cittasāliyāē saha khujaēṇa
sayaṇucchaṅgē raïsuhamaṇuhavantī nayaṇāvalī. taṁ ca mē da?ṇa samuppanna jāissaraṇaṁ. taō kammavasayattaṇēṇa amarisāṇalapalitēṇaṁ
cañcunahaggēhi vi[la]kkhiumāraddhō. tīē vi tassa santiyaṁ khujjassa geṇhiūṇaṁ lōhamayalaüḍayaṁ kōhābhibhūyāē pahaō ahaṁ
pahāravihalō nivaḍiō sōvāṇavattaṇīē, luḍhamāṇō pattō tamuddēsaṁ, jattha naravaī jū khellaï tti. maggaō ya mē ‘geṇha geṇha’ tti
saṁlavantō samāgaō dēvīpariyaṇō. taṁ ca tahāvihaṁ sadaṁ sōūṇa taddēsavattiṇā tēṇa puvvabhavajaṇaṇīsuṇaēṇa dhāviūṇa gahiō ahaṁ.
gheppamāṇaṁ ca mēṁ pecchiūṇa rāiṇā hāhāravaṁ karēmāṇēṇa pahaō sō muṇaō akkhapāḍaēṇaṁ ti. pahāravihalaṁghalēṇa vamantaruhiraṁ mukkō
ahaṁ tēṇa. kaṇṭhagayapāṇā nivaḍiyā duvē vi amhē dharaṇivaḍhē. saügamuvagī rāyā. āṇattā tēṇa purōhiyappamuhā maṇussā. jahā
tāyassa uvarayassa ajjiyāē ya kālāyarulavaṅgacandaṇakaṭēhi mahantō sakkārō kaō, soggaïnibandhaṇāī dinnāī mahādāṇāī, tahā
ēyāṇa vi uvarayāṇa kāyavvaṁ ti. ēyapāyaṇṇiūṇa cintiyaṁ maē. ahō ṇu khalu puttaēṇaṁ savvasakārō pāviō, dināī ṇē soggaï
nirandhaṇāī dāṇāī, ahaṁ puṇa tirikkhajōṇīē vi abbocchinnāē chuhāē kimiē khāyantō suṇaēhi ya khajjamāṇō ciṭṭhāmi.
ahō garuyayā kammāṇaṁ. ēvaṁ cintayantassa vimukkaṁ sarīrayaṁ jīviēṇaṁ.
tō ahaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā, suvēlapavyayāvaradisābhāē atthi duppavēsaṁ nāma varṇa, tammi ya—

lg.l: ēyārisaṁmi ya vaṇē nīsēsaṁ ciya nirābhirāmaṁmi

div.p:
tattha ganbhē narayakumbhīpāgāirēgavēyaṇaṁ visahamāṇō asaṁpaḍiē cēva pasabakālē jāō mhi duppavēsē vaṇē. abbocchinnachuhā
pīḍiyāē ya paṇaḍhē mē jaṇaṇīē thaṇaēsu khīraṁ. tō ahaṁ bubhukkhāparimilāṇadēhō tattha paribhamantō gokkhurayakaṇṭaē khāiumāḍhattō.
taō samaṁ pāvēṇa vitthāramuvagayaṁ mē sarīraṁ. iō ya sō pubbayarajammamāisuṇaō aṭṭajjhāṇamuvagō mariūṇa samuppannō imami cēva
duppavēsē vaṇē bhuyaṅgamattāē tti. diṭṭhō ya sō maē kālapāsō va viddumamaṇirattanayaṇō ghaṇandhayāracchavī sasikalākōḍidhavaladāḍhō
calantajamalajīhō jalāsayasamīvē daduraṁ khāyamāṇō tti. taō bubhukkhāparigaēṇaṁ aviyāriūṇa pariṇaī gahiō maē pucchadēsē.
tēṇa vi ya nayaṇasihisihājālābhāmuramavalōiūṇa ḍakō ahaṁ vayaṇadēsē. ēvaṁ ca annāṇakōhavasayā duvē vi amhē parōparaṁ khāiumā
raddhā. etthantaraṁmi adiṭṭaputvēṇa gahiō ahaṁ taracchēṇa, pāḍiō mahiyalē. taō sō mamaṁ khāiuṁ payattō. kiha? cammaṁ caracarāē
phālayantō, chirāō taḍataḍāē tōḍayantō sōṇiyaṁ ḍheggaḍhaggāē ghoṭṭayantō aṭṭhiyāī kaḍakaḍāē mōḍayantō tti. avi ya—

lg.l: taha khāiuṁ pavattō naha majjhaṁ khajamāṇasadēṇa
bhīēṇa va nīsēsaṁ jīvēṇa kalēvaraṁ mukkaṁ

div.p:
tō ahaṁ, dēvāṇuppiyā, ēvaṁ sakammaviṇivāiō samāgō tatthēva visālāē nayarīē duṭṭhōdayābhihāṇāē ninnayāē mahādahaṁmi
tattha mīṇīē gambhapuḍaē rōhiyamacchattāē samuppannō mhi. sō vi ya kaṇhasappō tahā mariūṇa imāē cēva sariyāē suṁsumārattāē tti.
jāyā kālakkamēṇaṁ. annayā ahaṁ tattha cēva paribhamantō diṭṭhō susumārēṇa, gahiō pucchabhāē. etthantaraṁmi majaṇanimittaṁ samāgayāō
antēuracēḍiyāō. dinā cilāiyābhihāṇāē cēḍiyāē jhampā. taō mēṁ mōtūṇa sā gahiyā aṇēṇa. sayarāhaṁ ca palāṇō ahaṁ ।
tīē vi ya ‘hā kē(a)haṁ gahiyā gahiya’ tti mahantamāraḍiyaṁ. dhariyā lōēṇa. kalayalaravēṇa samāgayā macchabandhā. ōyariūṇa
muyāviyā cēḍi, gahiō ya suṁmumārō, māriō durakhamārēṇaṁ. aïkantō kōi kālō. etthantaraṁmi ahaṁ kēvaṭṭapurisēhi samāsāiō
jālēṇaṁ gahiō jīvantaō, ‘mahāmacchō’ tti kaliūṇa samuppannakajjēhiṁ pāhuḍanimittamuvaṇīō guṇaharassa. parituṭṭhō rāyā.
saṁpāḍiyaṁ paōyaṇaṁ tē siṁ. nīō tēṇa nayaṇāvalīē samīvaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya ēsā. amba, ēyassa rōḍiyamacchassa pucchabhāyaṁ tāyaṁ
ajjiyaṁ ca uddisiūṇa māhaṇāṇaṁ randhāvēhi, uvarimabhāyaṁ ca pakkataliyaṁ kāūṇa majjhamattaṇō ya visasaṁ[saṁ]karējāsi. ēvaṁ ca mē
suṇamāṇassa dēviṁ ca pecchiūṇa samuppanna jāissaraṇaṁ. ēvaṁ ca ranā samāṇattē chindiūṇa puccha khaṇḍaṁ pēsiyaṁ māhaṇāṇaṁ nayaṇāvalīē.
sēsadēhami nicchalliyāī khāllāī, dinnaṁ tigaḍukkaḍaṁ hiṅgulōṇaṁ, parisittō halihāpāṇiēṇa. taō uvvatantamakkhaṇabhariyāē
pakkhittō mahākavallīē, saṁvattuvvattaēṇa talijiuṁ payattō.

lg.l: tō chinnabhinnapakkaṁ khāhii puttō mamaṁ ti jāṇāmi
dahakammaniyalabaddhō na muyaï jīvō sarīraṁ ti

div.p:
iō ya visālānayarīē pāṇavāḍaē jā sā putra bhavajaṇaṇī suṁsumārabhavē vaṭṭamāṇī vāvāiyā, sā tattha chēliyattāē samuppannā.
taō tīē garbhami ēlayattāē pakkhittō mhi. jāō kālakkamēṇaṁ. pattō jōvaṇaṁ. mahāmōhamōhiyamaṇō mēhuṇanimittaṁ ārūḍhō
ammayaṁ. diṭṭhō ya niyajūhavaïṇā kasāyajōēṇaṁ tahā haō mammadēsē, jahā pāṇē paricaïūṇaṁ niyayavīēṇa cēva samuppannō tīē
gambhaṁmi. avi ya—

lg.l: appā hu appaṇa ciya jaṇiō jaṇaṇīē gabhaṁmi

div.p:
sā ya paccāsannē pasavakālē guṇaharēṇa ramnā pāraddhīō niyattamāṇēṇa aṇāsāiyannapāṇiṇā tahāvihacchettabhāyaṁmi kāyajaḍḍayāē
manda mandaṁ parisakamāṇī āyaṇṇamāyaḍiūṇa kōḍaṇḍaṁ viddhā kaṇṇiyasarēṇa. pahāragaruyayāē nivaḍiyā dharaṇivaṭhē. laddhalakkhō parituṭṭhō
rāyā, samāgaō tamuddēsaṁ. diṭṭhā phuraphurentapāṇā ‘āvanasattā ēsa’ tti lakkhiyā tēṇaṁ. taō ya sē uyaraṁ viyāriūṇaṁ nīṇiō ahaṁ.
samappiō ayāpālayassa. annathaṇapāṇēṇaṁ jīviō. pattō kumārabhāvaṁ. etthantaraṁmi pāradīphaïlaṇanimittaṁ guṇaharēṇa rannā kuladēvayā
pūyāvihāṇaṁ kaya. bhōyaṇatthaṁ vāvāiyā pannarasa mahisayā. bambhaṇajaṇabhōyaṇatthaṁ ca susaṁbhiyaṁ kayaṁ mahisamaṁsaṁ. iō ya ‘kira pavittamuhō
mēsō havaï’ tti lōyavāō(ā)āṇāviō ahayaṁ kāyasuṇaüciṭṭaraddhapakkaparisōhaṇanimittaṁ sūvayārēṇaṁ, ṭhāviō mahāṇasaduvārē. taō
maē ussiḍiyaṁ taṁ maṁsa, bhuttaṁ bambhaṇēhi, viiṇṇaṁ āyamaṇaṁ. uṭhiyā diyavarā, ṭhiyā ya pantiyā-pantiyāhiṁ. etthantaraṁmi
visēsujalanēvatthaṁ antēuraṁ ghettūṇa āgaō guṇaharō. taṁ ca mē dahraṇa samuppannaṁ jāissaraṇaṁ. vināō mē sancavuttantō. calaṇēmu
nivaḍiūṇaṁ vāiyā bambhaṇā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-ēsā pantiyā tāyassa uvaṇamaü, ēsā ya ajjiyāē, ēyāō ya kuladēvayāē tti.
taṁ paḍissuyaṁ bambhaṇēhiṁ. cintiyaṁ ca mara-ahō ēvaṁ pi nāma puttaē jayantē ahaṁ dukkhiō tti. etthantaraṁmi bhōyaganimittaṁ cēva
sayalamāilōyapariyō ubaviṭṭhō rāyā. diṭṭhāō dēvīō, na diṭṭhā nayaṇāvalī. taō maē cintiyaṁ-aha kahiṁ puṇa sā bhavissaï?

etthantaraṁmi annaṁ uddisiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēgāē cēḍīē. halā sundariē, iha ajja cēva imē mahisayā vāvāiyā, tā kiṁ puṇa ēsa
ēvaṁvihō pūigandhō tti? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — halā pemmamañjūsiē, na ēsa mahisagandhō; ēsō khu dēvīē nayagāvalīē tahā'jiṇṇē rasa
lōluyattaṇēṇa macchayaṁ khāiūṇa koḍhagahiyāē vaṇantaruggiṇṇō dēhanissandavāō. iyarīē bhaṇiya-halā-sundariē, na ēsa macchayā
hāramettasamuppannō koḍhō, kiṁ tu tahāsabbhāviyamahārāyavisappaōyavāvāyaṇamaṇiyapāvasamutthō tti. tā alamamhāṇamimīē. ēhi
anaō gacchamha, tā mā kiṁpi āṇattiyaṁ dēissaï ti. gayāō cēḍiyāō. taō savisēsaṁ palōiyā maē, divā ya ēkapāsōvavidyā
makkhiyasahassasaṁpāyasiyā viṇiggayātambanayaṇā nayaṇāvali tti. taō taṁ pecchiūṇa tivyaparadukkhasaṁtattō sōiuṁ pavattō. kahaṁ?

lg.l: hā kiha sā pañcakkhaṁ kammamalocchāiyā paṇaïṇī mē
vayaṇēṇa thaṇaharēṇaṁ caraṇēhi ya jīē nijiyā āsi
tīē cciya peccha kahaṁ aṅgulivigamakhayasaṁgamēhiṁ ca
tē cēva handi dēsā dhaṇiyaṁ uvvēvayā jāya'

div.p: sa ccēya kaha ṇu ēhi tēhiṁ ciya pāvapariṇaïvasēṇa. cinti jantī vi piyā kāmīṇa vi kuṇaï nivvēyaṁ.

ēvaṁ ca cintayanō jāva kaṁci kālaṁ ciṭṭhāmi, tāva sadāviō rāiṇā svayārō, bhaṇiō ya. arē na rucaï mē imaṁ mahisayamaṁsaṁ,
tā annaṁ kiṁpi lahuṁ āṇēhi tti. taō sūvayārēṇa kaliūṇa ‘caṇḍasāsaṇō dēvō, mā kālakkhēvō havissaï’ tti mamaṁ cēva ēkaṁ satthiyaṁ
chettūṇa kayaṁ bhaḍittayaṁ, pēsiyaṁ ca rabhō. tēga vi ya ‘tāyassa uvaṇamaü’ tti bhaṇiūṇa dēvāviyaṁ thēvamaggāsaṇiyabambhaṇāṇaṁ, pēsiyaṁ
ca kiṁpi nayaṇāvalīē, bhuttaṁ ca sēsamappaṇā. etthantaraṁmi ya jā sā mahaṁ jaṇaṇī guṇaharēṇa vāvāiyā āsi, sā kaliṅgavisaē mahi
sīē kucchisi mahisaō samuppannō; vaḍiō kālakkamēṇaṁ. sō ya bhaṇḍabharayaṁ vahantō samāgaō visālaṁ nayariṁ. vāvāiō ya tēṇa
jalapiyaṇaṇhāṇanimittaṁ sippānaī samōyaratō āsamandurāpahāṇō vollāhakisōrō. nivēiyaṁ ranō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇa-arē āṇēhataṁ
duṭṭamahisayaṁ. naravaïsamāēmāṇantaraṁ ca āṇīō ēsō. taō taṁ daṭṭaṇa rōsaphuriyāharēṇa sūtrayāra sadāviūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rāigā. arē
ēyaṁ durāyāraṁ duṭamahisayaṁ sajīvaṁ cēva lahum̐ bhaḍitayaṁ karēhi tti. tēṇa vi ya nihayā sayaladisāsu lōhakhōyā, lōhasaṅkalāhiṁ ca
niyāmiō lōhakhoṇṭaēmu. kayaṁ ca sē tigaḍugahiśulavaṇa jalabhariya puraō mahākaḍāhaṁ. panjāliō ya caüsu vi disāsu nāi
dūraṁmi cēva khaïkharasārakaḍēhi huyāsaṇō. taō ya sō mahāmahantēṇa aggiṇā pañcamāṇō sukkōṭa bhaṇṭhatālū tivyatipāpariṁgō
ahiyayaraṁ dukkhaṁ jaṇayantaṁ khārapāṇiyaṁ piviumāraddhō. palīviō tēṇa sō dēhamajjhē. niggayaṁ ca sē bīyapāsēṇaṁ kibdhisaṁ etyanta
raṁmi samāṇattaṁ rāiṇā-pēsēhi lahuṁ mahisayabhaḍittayaṁ ti. taō jattha ‘pakamaṁsaṁ, tō taō chidiūga pēsiyaṁ sūkkhārēṇa. sittō
ya ēsō ghayaüttēḍaēhiṁ. pakkhittaṁ ca sahiṇavaṭṭiyaṁ lōṇaṁ. visēsēṇa pajāliō jalaṇō. etthantaraṁmi āgaō rāyaparivēsaō।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-arē anna pi vijāīyaṁ bhaḍittayaṁ lahuṁ dēhi tti. taō pulaïō ahaṁ sūvayārēṇē. ‘bhaḍittayaṁ kajihāmi tti
saṁmūhō hiyaēṇa, ullukkaṁ sirājālaṁ, vihaḍiō aṭṭhibandhō, galiyāī samvindiyabalāī. taō kaṇṭhagayapāṇō cēva gahiō
sūvayārēṇa, chinnaṁ mē biiyapāsayaṁ. vimukō ya mē dēhō jīviēṇa.
taō dēvāṇuppiyā, ēgasamayaṁmi cēva sō mahisayajīvō ahaṁ ca mariūṇa uppannā visālāpāṇavāḍaē kukkuḍīē ganbhami.
aïkantō kōi kālō. um̐vahiē pasavalālē vāvāiyā ṇē jaṇaṇī majjārapōyaēṇa. kayavarōvariṁ ca taṁ khāyamāṇassa galiyaṁ aṇḍayadurga
gaō majjārō. pakkhittō ya ṇē uvari kāēvi caṇḍālīē suppakōṇēṇa kajjayō. taṁdumhāpahāvēṇa jīviyā amhē. phuḍiyāī aṁḍayāī।
niggayā amhē. gahiyāī aṇahulābhihāṇēṇa caṇḍāladāraēṇaṁ, jīvāviyā tēṇa. jāyāō ṇē candacandimāsacchahāō picchā
valīō, samunbhūyā mē suyamuhaguñjaddharāyasarisā cūlā garuḍacañcusarisā ya mē cañcū. etthantaraṁmi divāī amhē kāladaṇḍavāsiēṇa.
‘ahō imāī rāiṇō khellaïṇajoggāīti gahiyāī tēṇa. uvaṇīyāī ca guṇaharassa. parituṭō rāyā. samappiyāī ca ṇē ēyassa cēva
kāladaṇḍavāsiyassa. bhaṇiō ya ēsō-arē jattha jattha vaccāmi, tattha tattha ēyāī āṇēyabvāī. paḍissuyamaṇēṇa. annayā
sayalantēurapariyariō vasantakīlānimittaṁ gaō kusumāyarujjāṇaṁ rāyā. nīyāī amhē tahiṁ kāladaṇḍavāsiēṇaṁ. ṭhiō ujāṇa
tilayabhūē bālakayalīharayaparikkhittē māhavīlayāmaṇḍavē rāyā. iyarō vi saha amhēhiṁ gaō asōyabīhiyaṁ. diṭṭhō ya tattha bhayavaṁ
saïsissagaṇaparivuḍō sasippahābhihāṇō āyariō tti. taō aliyavandaṇaṁ karentō ucagaō sāhumūlaṁ, dhammalāhiō tēṇaṁ. taō
taṁ tavasirivirāyantadēhaṁ daṇaṁ āyaṇiūṇa payāsundaraṁ tassa vayaṇaṁ uvasantō viya ēsō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-bhayavaṁ, kōisō
tumhāṇa dhammō? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — muṇaï.

sayalasattasāhāraṇō ēgō cēva dhammō. mūḍhō ya ettha aṇahigayasatthaparamatthō jaṇō bhēē kappēi. sō usa samāsēṇa imō
maṇavayaṇakāyajōgēhiṁ parapīḍāē akaraṇaṁ, tahā suparisuddhassa aṇaliyassa bhāsaṇaṁ, taṇamettassa vi adattādāṇassa aggahaṇaṁ,
maṇavayaṇakāyajōgēhiṁ avambhacēraparivajjaṇaṁ, gōsuvaṇṇahiraṇṇāiēmuṁ ca apariggahō; tahā nisibhattavajjaṇaṁ, bāyālīsēsaṇādōsasuddha
piṇḍaparibhōō.

etthantaraṁmi bhaṇiyaṁ daṇḍavāsiēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, alaṁ ēiṇā; kahēhi gihidhamma. kahiō sē bhayavayā paścāṇuvvayāiō sāvayadhammō.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-bhayavaṁ, karēmi ahamēyaṁ dhammaṁ. navaraṁ puvvapurisakkamāgayaṁ vēyavihiēṇa vihiṇā na paricaēmi pasuvahaṁ ti. bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ — jaï na paricayasi, taō imaṁ kukkuḍamihuṇayaṁ jahā tahā pāvihisi saṁsārasāyarē agatthaṁ ti. deṇḍavāsiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ
vahō kaō, jahā ya

jāī ca ṇē pattāī tibdukkhāī, savvamēyaṁ suyāisayanāgiṇā sāhiyaṁ ti. ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa paraṁ saṁvēgamāvannō daṇḍa
vāsiō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-bhayavaṁ, alaṁ mē iya pariṇāmadāruṇēṇaṁ vēyavihiēṇāvi pasuvahēṇaṁ dēhi mē gihidhammōciyāī vayāī.
tō bhayavayā titthayarabhāsiēṇaṁ vihiṇā sē dinō saṁsārajalahibōhittha bhūō pañcanamōkārō, tahā thūlayapāṇāivāyaviramaṇāiyāī ca
vayāī. gahiyāī ca ṇēṇa niyacariya pakṣaṇasabhupanajāissaraṇēhiṁ paramasaṁvēgāgaēhi ya amhēhiṁ. tō pariōsavisēsaō saṁpatta
bhuvaṇagurudhammabōhēhiṁ nidvaviyasāṇubandhāsuhakammēhiṁ kūjiyaṁ amhē hiṁ. suyaṁ ca taṁ rāiṇā dūsaharantaragaēṇaṁ jayāvalīē saha suraya
sokkhāṇuhavantēṇaṁ ti. gahiyamaṇēṇa pāsatthaṁ dhaṇuvaraṁ, sandhiō tīriyāsarō, ‘dēvi, peccha mē sahavēhittaṇaṁ’ ti bhaṇiūṇa mukkō,
taō ṇēṇa vāvāiyāiṁ amhē.

samuppannāṇi takkhaṇaṁ cēva bhuttamuttāē jayāvalīē cēva kucchisi. ābibhūyajiṇadhammabōhigabbhapahāvēṇa samuppannō tīē daḍhaṁ
abhayadāṇapariṇāmō. dinnaṁ sattēsu abhayadāṇaṁ. jāyāiṁ kālakkamēṇaṁ ahaṁ dāraō jaṇaṇī mē dāriya tti. gabbhatthēhiṁ ca amhēhiṁ
jaṇaṇī abhayadāṇaparā āsi; aō païṭṭhāviyāī nāmāī manaṁ abhayaruī iyarīē abhayamaï tti. vaḍḍiyāī amhē dēhōvacaraṇa kalā
kalāvēṇa ya. cintiyaṁ ca rāiṇā — karēmi abhayamaīē vivāhaṁ abhayaruiṇō ya juyarajābhisēyaṁ ti.

etthantaraṁmi payaṭṭō pāraddhiṁ rāyā, niggaō visālāō, pattō ujāṇantaraṁ. chikō kusumāmōyasurahiṇā māruēṇaṁ. avalōiyaṁ
ca ṇēṇa tamujjāṇaṁ. divō ya tattha tilayapāyavāsannē jhāṇamuvagaō mudattō nāma muṇivarō. kuviō rāyā, ‘avasaüṇō khu ēsō
pāraddhīē payaṭṭassa, tā ēyasta kayatthaṇāē cēva māṇēmi ēyaṁ’ ti cintiūṇa chucchukkārasāraṁ muyāviyā suṇayā. ayālamaccū viya
sigghavēēṇa pattā muṇivarasamīvaṁ. muhuyahuyāsaṇō viva tavappahāē jalantadēhō divō tēhiṁ muṇivarō.

lg.l: tō taṁ samujjalantaṁ sāṇā daṇa niṣpahā jāyā

div.p:
taō taṁ daṭhūṇa viliō rāyā. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-ahō varaṁ ēē suṇahapurisā, na uṇa ahaṁ purisamuṇahō, jēṇa ēvaṁ tavacaraṇa
nirayassa bhayavaō vi akusalaṁ cintiyaṁ ti. etthantaraṁmi samāgaō sayalāē visālānayarīē pahāṇō sāhuvandaṇanimittaṁ rāiṇō cēva
bālamittō jiṇavayaṇabhāviyamaī arahadattō nāma seṭṭiputtō ti. vināō ya tēṇa rāiṇō paralō yaniravekkhayāē muṇivērōvasaggō.
taō paṇamiūṇa bhaṇiō tēṇa naravaī ‘dēva, kimēyaṁ’ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — jamuciyaṁ purisasāramēyassa. arahayattēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva,
purisasīhō khu tumaṁ, tā kiṁ ēiṇā. ōyaraha turaṅgamāō, vandaha bhayavantaṁ sudattamuṇivaraṁ. ēsō khu kaliṅgāhivassa amaradattassa
puttō sudattō nāma naravaī. ēyassa paḍhamajōvaṇē vaṭṭamāṇassa uvaṇīō ārakkhiēṇa takarō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇē-dēva, ēēṇa paragharaṁ
pavisiūṇa ēgaṁ mahallagaṁ vāvāiya muṭuṁ gharaṁ, nīsarantō gaḍiō amhēhi; saṁpayaṁ dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa sadāviyā ṇēṇa
dhammasatthapāḍhayā, bhaṇiyā ya. ēyassa imiṇā ārakkhiraṇa ēsa dōsō kahiyō, tā kīisō imassa daṇḍō tti. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ
dēva, purisaghāyō paradavyāvahārī ya ēsō; tā tiyacaükkacaccarēhiṁ nivēiūṇa jaṇavayāṇaṁ taō nettuppāḍaṇakaṇṇanāsukattaṇakaracaraṇa
chēyaṇēhiṁ jīviyanāsō cēva imassa daṇḍō tti risivayaṇaṁ. ēvaṁ cāyaṇṇiūṇa cintiyamaṇēṇa. ahō jahannā rāyakulajīviyā, jaṁ
īdisaṁ pi aṇumannīyaï ti. tā alaṁ mē aṇēgōvadavabhāyaṇēṇaṁ rajasuhēṇaṁ ti. āṇandasanniyassa bhāiṇēyassa dāūṇa rajjaṁ muhamma
gurusamīvē pavanō pavvaja ti. tā vandaṇīō khu ēsō.

ēyaṁ sōūṇa sasaṁbhantō gaō rāyā muṇivarasamīvaṁ. vandiō ṇēṇa bhayavaṁ sudattamuṇivarō. etthantaraṁmi samattō jhāṇajōgō.
taō dhammalāhiō ṇēṇaṁ bhaṇiō ya. ‘mahārāya, uvavisasu’ ti. taō ‘ahō maē akajja vavasiya'ti ahiyajāyapacchāyāvō lajjā
vaṇayavayaṇakamalō uvaviṭhṭhō rāyā. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. imassa risissa ghāyaō ahaṁ ti. ēvaṁ ca payāsiūṇa attaṇō siracchēyamanta
rēṇa na pāyacchittaṁ pekkhāmi. tā kiṁ bahuṇā; na sakkuṇōmi akajjāyaraṇakalaṅkadūsiyaṁ attāṇaṁ muhuttayaṁ pi dhārēuṁ. aō alaṁ mē
ihatthiraṇaṁ; saṁpāḍēmi jahā samōhiyaṁ ti. etthantaraṁmi samuppannamaṇapajjavanāṇāīsaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mudattamuṇivarēṇa. mahārāya, alaṁ tē
imiṇā cintiēṇa. na khalu ēyaṁ ettha pacchitaṁ, jaṁtaē pariyappiyaṁ. jō āyaghāō vipaḍikuṭṭō cē dhammapayatthajāṇaēhi. bhaṇiyaṁ ca —

lg.l: appāṇami paraṁmi ya tō vajjē pīḍamubhaō vi

div.p:
jaṁ ca aphajāyaraṇakalaṅkasiyaṁ attāṇaṁ mannasi tti, ēyassa vi jiṇavayaṇāṇuṭāṇajalaṁ cēva pakkhālaṇaṁ na uṇa annaṁ ti. jaṁ pi
cintiyaṁ ‘saṁpāḍēmi jahā samīhiyaṁ’ ti, etthaṁ pi alaṁ tēṇa bhavāṇubandhiṇā saṁpāḍiēṇa. saṁpāḍēhi asaṁpāḍiyapuvvaṁ tēlōkabandhavāṇaṁ
jāijarāmaraṇabandhaṇavimukkāṇaṁ titthayarāṇaṁ sāsaṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi maṇagayāhippāyapayaḍaṇēṇaṁ ‘ahō bhagavaō nāṇaṁ’ ti mannamāṇō ‘imāō
cēva pacchittamavayacchissaṁ’ ti āṇandabāhajalabhariyalōyaṇō paḍiō muṇivarassa calaṇēsu rāyā. viśnattō tēṇa bhayavaṁ muṇivarō ‘bhayavaṁ,
kahēhi kimestha pāyacchittaṁ’ ti? muṇivarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — mahārāya, paḍivakkhāsēvaṇaṁ. taṁ puṇa na niyāṇavajjaṇamantarēṇaṁ ti, niyāṇaṁ
parihariyavvaṁ. niyāṇaṁ ca ettha micchattamōhaṇīyasaṁgayaṁ annāṇaṁ. taṁ ca annahā ṭhiēma bhāvēsu anahā pavajjaṇaṁ ti. cintiyaṁ ca
tumaē ‘avasaüṇō khu ēsō, aō kayatthaṇāē māṇēmi’ tti. avasaüṇattē ya imaṁ tē nimittaṁ paḍihāi, jahā kila ēsa aṇhāṇasēvī
kayasiratuṇḍamuṇḍaṇō viruddhapāsaṇḍavēsadhārī bhikkhōvajīvagō tti. tā ettha mahārāya, majjhatthō bhaviūṇa nisāmēhi kāraṇaṁ, kē
vhāṇasēvaṇāsēvaṇāē guṇadōsa tti? tattha ṇhāṇasēvaṇaguṇā.

lg.l: dēhō khaṇamettasuī tami ya rāō tahāhimāṇō ya
vilayāṇa patthaṇijjō sui tti dappō ya akkhāṇaṁ

div.p: imē ya dōsā.
ēē cēva vivajjaēṇaṁ aṇhāṇaguṇā.

lg.l: dōsā uṇa vibuhajaṇaṁ paḍuca na hu kēi ettha vijanti

div.p: annaṁ ca—

lg.l: siratuṇḍamuṇḍaṇaṁ pi hu jaïssa sanyāsavā niyattassa
pāsaṇḍaṁ pi ya ēyaṁ sumaṅgalaṁ vīyarāyadōsēhiṁ
jamhā jiṇēhi bhaṇiyaṁ aō viruddhaṁ ti vāmōhō

div.p: ēvaṁ ca, mahārāya, paramaguṇajuttattaṇēṇa tiyasāṇa vi mahāmaṅgalaṁ samaṇarūvaṁ kahaṁ tē avasaüṇō tti?

ēyam āyaṇiūṇa paṇaṭaṁ rāiṇō micchattaṁ. ahō ‘nāṇāisaō’ tti japamāṇō nivaḍiō calaṇēsu. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-bhayavaṁ,
ēvamēyaṁ, jamāiṭēṁ bhayavayā. vajiyaṁ maē niyāṇaṁ. tā khaïmasu mē ēyamavarāhaṁ ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — uṭhēhi dēvāṇuppiyā uṭhēhi, alaṁ
tē saṁbhamēṇaṁ. khamāpahāṇā cēva muṇiṇō havanti. khamiyaṁ maē savyasattāṇaṁ. nisāmēhi tityayarabhāsiyaṁ samāē paraṁparābhāvaṇaṁ. viṇā
vi vaïyaraṁ bālēṇa'kōsiēṇāvi sāhuṇā khamā bhāviyavyā ‘sundarō khu ēsō jamēvamavi ahiṇiviṭṭhō na maṁ tālēi.’ tāliēṇāvi
sāhuṇā khamā bhāvēyavvā ‘sundarō khu ēsō, jamēvabhavi ahiṇiviṭṭhō na maṁ jīviyāō vavarōvēi’ tti. vavarōijjamāṇēṇāvi sāhuṇā
khamā bhāvēyavyā ‘sundarō khu ēsō, jamēvamavi ahiṇiviṭṭhō na mēṁ saṁjamāō bhaṁsēī, kiṁ tu mamaṁ cēva puvyakammapariṇaī ēsa’ tti. ēyaṁ
ca sōūṇa parituṭṭhō rāyā. cintiyamaṇēṇaṁ-natthi avisaō nāma bhayavaō nāṇasta. aō pucchāmi bhayavantaṁ tāyassa ajjiyāē ya
gaïvisēsaṁ ti. pucchiō bhayavaṁ, sāhiō ya bhayakkhā piṭakukkuḍavavaha nimittō maūrāilakkhaṇō jayāvalīgabbhasamuppattipajjavasāṇō
tti. rāiṇā cintiyaṁ-ahō jugucchaṇīyayā saṁsārassa, ahō aṇavatthiyasiṇēhayā itthiyāṇaṁ, ahō garuyayā mōhassa, ahō dāruṇa
vivāgayā akajjāyaraṇāṇaṁ, jamiha dēvayānimittaṁ piṭṭhamayakukkuḍavahō vi ēvaṁ pariṇaō tti.

lg.l: hā ahayaṁ ki kāhaṁ niratthayaṁ jēṇa jiyasayā bahuyā
tā nūṇaṁ gantavvaṁ nirayaṁ keṇḍujjuēṇa panthēṇa
natthi hu ettha uvāō ahavā pucchāmi bhayavantaṁ

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi muṇiyanarindāhippāraṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ mudattamuṇivarēṇa-mahārāya, atthi uvāō. sō uṇa tigaraṇavisuddhā jiṇadhamma
paḍivattī. sā puṇa puvvadukkaḍēsu añcantamaṇuyāvō, jiṇavayaṇajalēṇa cittarayaṇasōhaṇaṁ, savvārambhacāraṇa cārittapaḍivattī, mettīpa
mōyakāruṇṇamajhatthayāṇaṁ ca jīvaguṇāhiyakilissamāṇāviṇīēmu bhāvaṇā. paḍivanacaraṇabhāvaṇā ya pāṇiṇō taïppabhiimēva appamā
yāisaraṇa païvaḍḍamāṇasaṁvēgā niraïyārasīlayāē khaventi puvvadukkaḍāiṁ pāvakammāī, abhāvaō nimittassa na bandhenti navāī. tō
tē, dēvāṇuppiyā, paramasuhasamēyā suhaparaṁparāē cēva khaviūṇa kammajālaṁ pāventi jāijarāmaraṇarōyasōyarahiyaṁ paramāyaṁ ti.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ, jaï tāva tāyaajjiyāṇaṁ ēdahamettassa vidukkaḍassa īisō vivāō, tā kahamahaṁ mahāpāvakammayārī
vivāgaō nirayāiēmu abhujiūṇa taṁ kammavivāgaṁ soggaī lahāmi tti? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — mahārāya, muṁṇa. natthi asajhaṁ nāma
caraṇapariṇāmassa. ēsō khalu paramāmayaṁ pāvavisapariṇaīē, vajja kammapavyayassa,cintāmaṇī samīhiyāṇaṁ, kappapāyavō siddhisuhaphalassa.
jahēva mahārāya, visalēsabhōiṇō vi ettha pāṇiṇō akayapaḍiyārā pāventi āvaī, munjhanti hiyāhiēma, na sēvanti māṇussayamuhāī,
paricayanti jīviyaṁ tahēva ēē pamāiṇō jīvā kāūṇa pāvakammāiṁ akāūṇa paḍiyāraṁ pāvanti tapphalaṁ jāijarāmaraṇarōyasōyaṁ ti.
kayapaḍiyārā uṇa paramāmayasāmatthāō nijiṇanti kālakūḍa pi mahāvisa, kimaṅga puṇa visalēsaṁ ti; ēvaṁ ca aṇāibhavabhāvaṇāō
jīvā kāūṇa pāvakammaṁ sēviūṇa tassa paḍivakkhabhūyaṁ mahācaraṇapariṇāmaṁ nijiṇanti aṇēyabhavajaṇayaṁ pi pāvakammaṁ, kimaṅga puṇa
ēgabhaviyaṁ ti. aïyaṁ sōūṇa harisiō rāyā, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, aha kīisō puṇa ēsa caraṇapariṇāmō tti vuccaï? bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ — sammannāṇapuvvayaṁ tinvaruīē dōsanivattaṇaṁ ti. bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

lg.l: jāṇaï uppannaī jaï tā dōsā niyattaī sammaṁ
iharā apavittī ya vi aṇiyattī cēva bhāvēṇaṁ

div.p:
ēsō aṇuhavasiddhō kammavigamahēū. rāiṇā cintiyaṁ-bhayavantamaṇusēvantāṇaṁ na dullahaṁ sammannāṇaṁ, samuppannasammannāṇāṇa ya
saṁbhavaï tivvaruī, taō ya sāyattaṁ dōsaniyattaṇaṁ. tā dhannō ahaṁ, jassa mē bhaïyavayā dasaṇaṁ jāyaṁ ti. na appapuṇṇā mahānihi
pecchanti. tā alamannēṇa, bhayavaō cēva āṇamaṇuciṭṭhāmi tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, uciō ahaṁ sāmaṇṇapaḍivattīē?
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — mahārāya, kō annō uciō ti?

taō saṁjāyaharisēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā-arē nivēēha maïsāyarappamuhāṇaṁ aja mantīṇaṁ. jahā kāyavyō dēvāṇuppiēhiṁ abhayaruiṇō
rejjābhisēōni, na kāyanyō ya mama santiō khēō; pavajāmi ahaṁ bhayavayā surāsuranamiēṇa bhuvaṇaguruṇā paṇīyaṁ samaṇaliṅgaṁ. jaṁ
dēvō āṇavēi tti jaṁpiūṇa gayā niyōgakāriṇō. nivēiyaṁ tēhi mantijaṇavayāṇaṁ. suō ēsa vuttantō antēurēṇa. taō nēhamaya
saṁbhamēṇaṁ pariccaïya asamāṇiyaṁ ālekkhagandhadavyāi hāhāravasaṇāhaṁ payaṭṭamantēuraṁ. ahaṁ pi tēhitō cēva ēyaṁ vaïyaramāyaṇṇiūṇa abhaya
maīē samēō tti. calaṇaparisakaṇēṇēva pattā ya ṇē naravaïsamīvaṁ. diṭṭhō muṇindapāyamūlē saṁvēgamukgō rāyā rāyapattīhiṁ, kiha
tō tāhi sappaṇāma samayaṁ pakkhubhiyabhūsaṇaravēṇaṁ. aṇirūviyakkharatthō jayasadō sē samugghuṭṭhō.
ēvaṁ ca saṁbhāsiēṇa sambantēurajaṇēṇa pāyavaḍiēṇa vinattō naravaī.

lg.l: khayadāḍhō vya bhuyaṅgō ki ēyaṁ vāriniyaliyagaō vva
sīhō va pañjaratthō jhāyasi panbhaṭarajjō vtra

div.p:
taō ēvaṁ vighnattēṇa rāiṇā sāhiyaṁ niravasēsaṁ muṇivayaṇāiyaṁ ti. taṁ ca ṇē sōūṇa samuppannaṁ jāissaraṇaṁ. taō tassaṁbhamēṇaṁ
nivaḍiyāi dharaṇivaḍhē. hā kimēyamavaraṁ ti mannamāṇīhiṁ viruiyaṁ rāyapanīhiṁ. bāhajalasittagattaṁ ca ṇē uvari mucchamuvagayā ambā.
taō laddhāō cēyaṇāō, viuddhā amhē, samāsāsiyā ambā, viśnattō rāyā. tāya, alaṁ ṇē saṁsārakilēsāyāsakārarahiṁ visaēhi;
aṇujāṇāhi tāva amhāṇaṁ pi sayaladukkhavirēyaṇaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — ahāsuhaṁ dēvāṇuppiyāī, mā paḍibandhaṁ karēha.
taō vijayavaṁmmaṇō niyabhāiṇēyassa dāūṇa rajjaṁ kāūṇa aṭṭhāhiyāmahāmahimaṁ sayalantēurapahāṇajaṇasamēō ghettūṇa amhē abhiṇikkha
nō rāyā. viśnattō maē bhayavaṁ sudattamuṇivarō. bhayavaṁ, kaïrēhi aṇuggahaṁ nayaṇāvalīē dhammakahāē; pāvēu bhayavaō pabhāvēṇa ēsā
vi sayaladukkhacigicchayaṁ jiṇapaṇīyaṁ dhammaṁ. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -sōma, avisaō khu ēsā dhammakahāē. saṁtappiō imīē aka
jāyaraṇāpacchāsēvaṇāē kammavāhī, baddhaṁ ca taccapuḍhavīē parabhavāuyaṁ aō pāviyabvamavassaṁ tīē nāragattaṇaṁ, na pavajaï ya ēsā
mahāmōhāō jiṇadhammarayaṇaṁ ti. taō maē cintiyaṁ-ahō dāruṇavivāgayā akajāyaraṇassa, īisō ēsa saṁsārasahāvō; tā kiṁ
karēmi tti? taō aïsayanāṇāvalōyarēṇa bhayatrayā bhaṇiyaṁ — alaṁ tē imiṇā saṁsāravivaddhaṇēṇa tīē uvari aṇubandhēṇa. ēyaṁ cēva
sayalalōyadullahaṁ kahaṁci laddhaṁ pavvajjaṁ karēhi tti. taō guruguṇāṇubhāvēṇaṁ pāliyaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ, kālamāsē ya siddhantavihiṇā karē
ūṇa kālamuvavannāiṁ sahassārābhihāṇē dēvalōē.

tattha vi uvabhunniūṇa murāuyaṁ caviūṇa dēvalōyāō kōsalāē visayaṁmi sāraē nayarē viṇayaṁdharassa rabhō lacchimaīē mahā
dēvīē suyattāē uvavannō mhi. jāō kālakkamēṇaṁ. kayaṁ ca mē nāma jasōharō tti. abhayamaījīvadēvō vi caviūṇa dēvalōgāō
pāḍaliputtē nayarē īsāṇasēṇassa rāiṇō vijayāē mahādēvīē kucchisi dhūyattāē samuvavannō tti. jāyā kālakamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca
sē nāmaṁ viṇayapaï tti. vaḍḍiyāī ca amhē dēhōvacaēṇaṁ kalākalāvēṇa ya. pēsiyā ya mē sayaṁvarā īsāṇasēṇēṇa viṇayamaī. suyaṁ ca maē
ēyaṁ. parituṭṭhō hiyaēṇaṁ. pattā ya sā mahayā caḍayarēṇaṁ, bahumaniyā tāraṇaṁ, āvāsiyā nayarabāhi. kayaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ. gaṇāviō
vārējadiyahō, samāgaō mē maṇōrahēhiṁ. nivvattaṁ ṇhavaṇayaṁ. payaṭṭō ahaṁ mahāvibhūīē viṇayamaī pariṇēuṁ. vajantēhiṁ vivihamaṅgala
māṇō pāsāyamālātalagayāhiṁ purasundarīhiṁ pattō rāyamaggaṁ. etthantaraṁmi phuriyaṁ mē dāhiṇalōyaṇēṇaṁ, samuppannō harisavisēsō.
cintiyaṁ maē-bhaviyavvaṁ aō vi avarēṇaṁ mahāpamōēṇaṁ ti.

etthantaraṁmi diṭṭhō maē gōyarapaviṭṭhō kallāṇasedvibhavaṇaṅgaṇē sāhū. taṁ ca mē datr̥̄ṇa samuppannō saṁbhamō. taō abbhatyayāē sāhu
dhammassa vicittayāē kammapariṇaīra amōhadaṁsaṇayāē bhayavaō samuppanna jāissaraṇaṁ. mucchiō gaïndakhandhē, nivaḍamāṇō dhāriō
pāsavattiṇā rāmabhaddābhihāṇēṇa sayalahatyārōhapahāṇamayaharēṇaṁ. ‘hā kimēyaṁ ti visaṇō rāmabhaddō. ‘mā vāyaha’ tti vāriyā tūriyādī,
uvasantā ya khippaṁ. ‘hā kimēya'ti avisādī vi daḍhaṁ visaṇṇacittō samāgaō tāō. ‘pūgaphalāimayamaïō havissaï ti siñcā
viō candaṇapāṇiēṇaṁ. laddhā maē cēyaṇā, ummililayaṁ lōyaṇajuyaṁ, kō āsaṇapariggahō, virattaṁ saṁsārasāyarāō cittaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ
ca tāraṇa ‘putta, kimēyaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiya-tāya, dāruṇaṁ saṁsāravilasiyaṁ. tāraṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — putta, kō etya āsarō saṁsārasta?
maē bhaṇiyaṁ — taya, mahantī khu ēsā kahā, na saṁkhēvaō kahiuṁ pārīyaï. tā ēgaṁmi dēsē uvavisaü tāō, saddāvēu mē māilōyaṁ
pahāṇajaṇavayaṁ ca, jēṇa sāhēmi lāyasa saṁsārāvasarakāraṇaṁ ti. taō rāyamaggāsanāē mahāsahāē ubaviṭṭhō rāyā saha bhaē. saddā
viō ammayājaṇō pahāṇajaṇaō ya, ṭhiō uciyaṭhāṇēsu. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tāēṇa-putta, kimēya; sāhēhi taṁ saṁsāravilasiyaṁ. maē
bhaṇiyaṁ — āyaṇṇasu tāō, jahā maē aṇuhūyaṁ ti. taō pāraddhō kahēuṁ. tāya, nigguṇō ēsa saṁsārō. mōhābhibhūyā khu pāṇiṇō na
niyanti ēyasta sarūvaṁ, ālōcenti aṇālōciyabāī, payanti ahiē, na pecchanti āyaī. ettha khalu surāsurasāhāraṇā tāva ēē
jāijarāmaraṇarōyasōyapiyavippaōyāiyā viyārā. dārugō ya vivāō thēvassa vi pamāyaceṭṭhiyassa, jēṇa piṭṭhamayakukkuḍakahō vi
peccha kahaṁ pariṇaō ti? bhaṇiūṇa sāhiō surindadattajammāiō jāissaraṇapajjavasāṇō niyayavuttantō. taṁ ca sōūṇa ‘ahō
dāruṇavivāgayā akajjāyaraṇassa’ tijapamāṇō saṁvēgamuvagaō rāyā ambāō sēsajaṇavaō ya. taō maē bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, īdisaṁ akajjā.
yaraṇapariṇāmaṁ pecchiūṇa virattaṁ mē bhavacāragāō cittaṁ, viyambhiō jiṇakkhaṇapaḍibōhō. tā aṇujāṇaü tāō, jēṇa tāyappahāvē
ṇēva karēmi saphalaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ ti. taō agāibhavabbhatyamōhadōsēṇa aviyāriūṇāyaī jaṁpiyaṁ tāraṇa. putta, kō puttayassa paṇaya
bhaṅgaṁ karēi, saphalaṁ cēva bhavaü maṇuyattaṇaṁ, tā pariṇēhi tāva ēvaṁ īsāṇasēṇadhūyaṁ. tō karejjāsi sammaṁ payāparivālaṇēṇa mahantaṁ puṇṇa
khandhaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, vighnattaṁ maē tāyassa, virattaṁ mē cittaṁ bhavacāragāō. tā alaṁ mē dārapariggahēṇa. tāraṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — putta,
kō viya dōsō dārapariggahassa? maē bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, dārapariggahō hi nāma nirōsahō vāhī, jēṇa āyayaṇaṁ mōhassa, avacaō
dhiīē, su(sa)hā vikkhēvassa paḍivakkhō santīē, bhavaṇaṁ mayassa, vēriō suddhajjhāṇāṇaṁ, pahavō dukkha samudayassa, nihaṇaṁ suhāṇaṁ, ā
vāsō mahāpāvassa. paḍivajji ūṇa ēvaṁ pañjaragayā viya sīhā samatthā vi paralōyasāhaṇē māṇusabhāvalambhē vi sīyanti pāṇiṇō.
annaṁ ca-tāya, na juttaṁ rayaṇacittēṇaṁ kaścaṇathālēga purīsasōhaṇaṁ. purīsasōhaṇamettā ya ettha visayā, acintacintāmaṇisannihaṁ ca
jiṇavayaṇabōhasaṁgayaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ, kammabhūmī ya ēsā, paramapadasāhaṇaṁ ca caraṇāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ. tā alamannahāviyappiēṇa. aṇujāṇāhi mē
sayaladuvakhavium̐ḍaṇi pabajnaṁ ti. taō bāhollalōyaṇēṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ tāraṇa. putta, ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu paramatyaṁ pi jaṁpamāṇō nēhakāyaraṁ
pīḍēsi mē hiyayaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, alaṁ mē aparamatthapecchiṇā nē hēṇa. ēsō cēva ettha pahāṇaṁ saṁsārakāraṇaṁ, jēṇa
dīvō vva sabalōgō khaṇē khaṇē jāyaē viṇassaï ya. saṁsaraï ya nēhavasā niruvāyāṇō u ulhāi.
tāēpā bhaṇiya-ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu khijihii sā tavassiṇī īsāṇasēṇadhūya tti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, thetramēyaṁ kāraṇaṁ. annaṁ ca-nivēyā
vēu tāō tīē vi ya ēvaṁ vuttantaṁ. kayāi sā vi ēyaṁ sōūga paḍivōhaṁ pāvaï ti. tō tāraṇa ‘juttamēyaṁ’ ti maṇiūṇa pēsiō
saṅkṣavaddhaṇābhihāṇō purōhiō, bhaṇiō ya tāraṇa. jahāsuyaṁ nivēēhi rāyaduhiyāē, bhaṇāhi ya taṁ ēvaṁ ṭhiē kiṁ amhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ'
ti? gaō saṅkṣabaddhaṇō. āgaō thēvavēlāē, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. mahārāya, saṁsiddhā maṇōrahā kumārassaḥ suṇēu mahārāō. gaō ahaṁ
iō rāyadhūyāsamīvaṁ, pavēsiō sabahumāṇaṁ paḍi hārēṇa; ‘mahārāyapurōhiō’ tti ahiṇandiō rāyadhūyāē, davāviyaṁ āsaṇaṁ, uvaviṭṭhō
ahayaṁ. taō mara bhaṇiyaṁ — rāyaputti, atthi kiṁci vattavvaṁ ti. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaṇāu anjō. maē bhagiyaṁ-rāyaputti, dēvasāsaṇamiṇaṁ
apahiyāē sōyavyaṁ ti. taō tīē kāuṇa aṅgului ōyariūṇa āsaṇāō ‘jaṁ gurū āṇavēi’ tti baddhō añjalī. tō mara bhaṇiyaṁ
rāyaputti, iha āgacchamāṇassa kumārassa sāhudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ samuppanna jāissaraṇaṁ, saṁbhariyā ya nava bhavā, siṭṭhā ya tēṇaṁ. tē muṇāu bhōī.

atthi ihēva vāsē visālā nāma nayarī, tattha amaradattō nāma naraī hotyā, iō ya atīyanavamabhavaṁmi tassa puttō surindadattō nāma
ahamāsi tti, jaṇaṇī mē jasōharā, bhajjā ya nayaṇāvali tti. jāba ettiyaṁ jaṁpāmi tāva mōhaṁ gayā rāyadhūyā. āulīhūō pariyaṇō;
'hā kimēyaṁ ti visaṇṇō ya ahayaṁ. parisittā candaṇapāṇiēṇaṁ, laddhā tīē cēyaṇā. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — rāyaputti, kimēyaṁ’ ti? tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘vicittayā saṁsārassa' maē bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘kahaṁ vicittayā'? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jō saccēva ahaṁ jasōharā tassa māyā aīyapari
yāē tti sāhiūṇa siddhaṁ kumārasāhiyaṁ niyayacariyaṁ. taō maē bhaṇiyaṁ — rāyaputti, imiṇā vaïyarēṇa virattaṁ cittaṁ bhavacāragāō
kumārassa, icchaï khu sō pavvaïuṁ. taō mahārāēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — ‘tā ēvaṁ ṭhiē ki amhēhi kāyavvaṁ’ ti? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — vinnēvēhi mahā
rāyaṁ. jahā tāya, īisō cēva ēsa saṁsārasahāvō, kassa vā sayaṇṇavināṇassa na virāgaṁ karēi? tā alametya mumiṇayamētavimbhamē
paḍibandhēṇa, saṁpāḍēhi kumārassa samīhiya; aṇujāṇāhi ya mamaṁ pi pavvajjaṁ, jō mamaṁpi virattaṁ cēva cittaṁ bhavacāragāō tti. ēyaṁ
ca sōūṇa ‘ahō māindajālasarisayā jīvalōyassa’ tti bhaṇiūṇa paraṁ saṁvēgamuvagō rāyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-putta, na tuma mama puttō
avi ya dhammaniutraṇāō gurū. tā alaṁ amhāṇaṁ pi imiṇā parikilē sēṇaḥ ahaṁ pi pavajāmi tumaē cēva saha pavvajja. ambāhī
bhaṇiyaṁ — ajjaütta, juttamēyaṁ kimettha naḍapēḍagōvamē asāsayaṁmi jīvalōē paḍibandhēṇa. taō maē bhaṇiyaṁ — ahāsuhaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā!
mā paḍibandhaṁ karēha. taō tāraṇa davāviyaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā sabbāyayaṇēsu pūyā, saṁmāṇiō rāyasatthō, ṭhāviō rajjami khuḍḍa
bhāyā mē jasavaddhaṇābhihāṇō. pavvaïō tāō samaṁ maē ambāē viṇayamaīē pahāṇajaṇavaēṇa ya sugihīyanāmadhēyassa bhagavaō indabhū
issa samīvē. tā ēvaṁ niyayamēva mē cariyaṁ nivvayakāraṇaṁ ti.

dhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ, bhayavaṁ sōhaṇaṁ tē nivvēyakāraṇaṁ. kassa vā sahiyayassa annassa vi imaṁ na nivvēyakāraṇa? īisō ēsa saṁsārō.
tā āisaü bhayavaṁ, jaṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti. jasōharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — sōma, suṇa. dullahā caraṇadhammasāmaggī; jō bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavayā. duvihā
khalu jīvā havanti, thāvarā jaṅgamā ya. tattha thōparā puḍhavijalajalaṇamāruyavaṇassaïkāyabhēyabhinnā, jaṅgamā uṇa kimikīḍapayaṅgagōma
hisasarahavasahapasayamāiṇō. tattha thāvarattamuvagaō puḍhavāiēsu asaṁkhējāō vaṇassaïṁmi aṇantāō usappiṇisappiṇīō parivasaï
jīvō ti. aō thāvarattāō jaṅgamattaṁ dullahaṁ. jaṅgamattaṁ pi pattō samāṇō kimikīḍapayaṅgēsu aṇēyabhēyabhinnēsu āhiṇḍiūṇa tō
paścindiyatta pāuṇaï tattha vi kharakarahagōṇamahisuṭṭāiēsu parimbhamiūṇa māṇusattaṇa; tattha vi ya sagajavaṇasavarababbarakāyamuruṇḍōḍa
gōḍāiēmu āhiṇḍiūṇa āriyadēsajammā tattha vi ya caṇḍālaḍombilayarayayacammayarasāuṇiyamacchabandhāiēsu āhiṇḍiūṇa īkkhā
gāisu kulajamma, tattha vi ya kāṇakuṇṭakhujjapālayamūyandhavahiravāhivigaṁlindiyasarīragēsu paribhamiūṇa nirubadduyaṁ sarīraniphatti,
tattha vi ya ḍaṇḍakasasattharajjumāiēhiṁ jīviōvakkamēhi ahāuyāṇuhēvaṇaṁ, tattha vi ya kōhamāṇamāyālōharāgadōsandhayāramōhiōṁ
dhammabuddhiṁ, tattha vi ya bahuvihēsu indiyāṇukūlajaṇamaṇōramēsu annāṇipavattiēmu kuhammēsu paribbhamantō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ saccannubhāsiyaṁ
siddhisuhekkakulaharaṁ dhamma, tattha vi ya agāibhavaparaṁparabbhatthaasuhabhāvaṇāō asaṁpatta puvvaṁ siddhibahupaḍhamapāhuḍa saddha,
saparokkhāraya mahāpurisasēviyaṁ ēgantapasaṁsaṇīyaṁ caraṇadhammaṁ. saṁpattō ya imaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā, acirēṇēva pāvēi jāijarāmaraṇarōyasōya
virahiyaṁ paramapayaṁ ti. tā ēyasaṁpāyaṇē karēhi ujjama, kimannēṇa saṁpāiēṇa. asāsayā savvasaṁjōyā, pahavaï viṇijjiyasurāsurō
maccū, ēgarukkhanivāsisaüṇatullā bandhavā, vivāyadāruṇō ya visayapamāō ti.

taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa saṁjāyacaraṇapariṇāmēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ aṇuggihīō mhi imiṇā āēsēṇa. tā saṁpāḍēmi ēyaṁ.
karēu bhayavaṁ aṇuggahaṁ, jāva nivēiūṇa bhayavaō buttantaṁ ammāpiīṇaṁ pavajāmō pavvaja ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — jahāmuhaṁ, dēvāṇuppiyā,
mā paḍibandhaṁ karēhi tti.

taō gaō ammāpiisagāsaṁ dhaṇō. paramasaṁvēgamuvagaēṇa ya tēṇa sāhiō ēsa vuttantō ammāpiīṇaṁ. paḍibuddhā ēē. cintiyaṁ
ca tēhiṁ-alaṁ ṇē ēvamasuhapariṇāmē bhavē paḍibandhēṇaṁ, jogyō ya ṇē puttō; tā nikkhiviūṇa imassa bhāraṁ pavajjāmō pavanaṁ ti
bhaṇiō dhaṇō. vaccha, paḍiyaggēhi maṇimottiyāiyaṁ sāradavvaṁ pavajjāmō amhē mahāpurisasēviyaṁ pavvaja ti. dhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya,
juttamēya; saṁpattamaṇuyabhāvēṇa pāṇiṇā imaṁ cēva kāyavvaṁ ti. jaṁ puṇa samāi8 tāēṇa, jahā paḍiyaggēhi maṇimottiyāiyaṁ sāradavvaṁ
ti ettha kā uṇa sārayā maṇimottiyāidavyassa. kiṁ samatthamiṇaṁ maccuṇō rakkhēuṁ, kiṁ vā na honti ēyappahāvaō jammarāiyā
viyārā, kiṁ tīraï imiṇā samatthassa atthivaggassa maṇōrahāpūraṇaṁ kāuṁ, kiṁ vā na paricayaï imaṁ payattarakkhiyaṁ pi khīṇabhāgadhēyaṁ
ahōpurisiyāvaṣphārapāraṇaṁ; aṇumannaü tāō majjhaṁ pi attaṇō sarisamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ ti. sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha, aṇumayaṁ maē. kiṁ
puṇa visamā gaī jokṇassaettha khalu duimāī indiyāī, pahavaï saṁsārataruvīyabhūō aṇaṅgō, āyanti ya maṇōharā visaya tti. dhaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya, na khalu avivēgaō annaṁ jovvaṇaṁ ti. aṇāimantā imē jīvā, na ettha paramatthō kōi jōvaṇatthō na vā vuḍḍaō
tti. dīsanti avivēgasāmatthō vuḍḍā vi ettha jammē aṇiyattavisayavisāhilāsā agaṇēūṇa lōyavayaṇijja aviyāriūṇa paramatyaṁ
appāṇayaṁ viḍambēmāṇa tti hiyayāhiyamalēṇa vi ya davyantarajōēṇa kālapariṇāmamukkilē vi karenti kālaē kēsē, aṅgakaṭhiṇayāhēḍaṁ
ca sēvanti pārayamaddaṇaṁ, buḍḍhabhāvadōsabhīrū sāhenti ittaraṁ jammakālaṁ, viyārasīlayāē parisakkenti viyaḍayāī, payanti apayaṭṭiyavvē,
na pecchanti jhīṇamāuṁ, na cintenti jammantaraṁ ti. abarē uṇa suyambhatthaparalōyamaggā taruṇayā vi ettha jammē vivē yasāmatthēṇa
nāūṇa vijjulayāḍōvacañcalaṁ jīyaṁ asāraya visayasuhāṇaṁ vivāyadāruṇayaṁ ca pamāyaceṭṭiyasma maccubhayabhīyā viya hariṇayā uttatthā
pāvahēūṇaṁ sēvanti paralōyabandhavaṁ caraṇadhammaṁ ti. tā akāraṇaṁ etya jodhaṇaṁ ti. na ya vivē giṇō viiyasaṁsārasaruvassa duimāī
indiyāī. adantēhiṁ ēēhiṁ damiyanbō appā dōgāīē; damiēhi ya etya pasamamuhaṁ paralōē ya bhavaparaṁparāē mokkhanuhaṁ ti jāṇamāṇō
kō imē na damēi? aṇakō vi ya agajasaṁkappamūlō paricattēhi aṇajasaṁkappēhiṁ bhāviē bīyarāgadhayaṇē uvaladdhē païsamasuhasarūvē amuya
ntāṇa gurupāyamūlaṁ cintayantāṇa paḍivakkhabhāvaṇaṁ kahaṁ pahabaï tti? kiṁ vā maïṇōharattaṁ visayāṇaṁ?. poggalapariṇāmā hi ēē pharisara
sarūpagandhasadā vicittapariṇa mā poggalā suhā vi hōūṇa asuhā havanti, asuhā vi ya suhā; kiṁ vā ēēhiṁ attaṇō atyantarabhū
ēhi na ēēsiṁ saṁjōō paramatthaō muhahēū, avi ya dukkhahēū; ‘asaṁjōē ya niyasarūvapañcāsannayāē pāṇiṇō paramatthaō muhaṁ ’ti
manamāṇaṁ kēhaṁ āyaḍanti visaya tti. tā kiṁ ēiṇā. tāyapahāvaō cēva mē avigdhaṁ bhavissaï tti.

taō paḍi suyaṁ tēṇa, davā viyaṁ ca ghōsaṇāpuvvayaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, karāviyā aṭṭāhiyā mahimā. taō mahāpurisaïnikkhamaṇavihīē
ammāpiīsamēō annēṇaṁ ca pahāṇapariyaṇēṇa pavanō dhaṇō jasōharāyariyasamīvē pavvajjaṁ ti.

aïkkantō kōi kālō. ahijjiyaṁ suttaṁ, abbhatyō kiriyākalāvō, bhāviyāō bhāvaṇāō, vēraggāisayaō pavanō ēgalla
vihārapaḍimaṁ. viharamāṇō ya gāmē ēgarāyaṁ nagarē paścarāyavihārēṇaṁ samāgaō kōsambi.

iō ya sō nandaō gōsē tamapecchiūṇa dhagasirisamēō laḍiūṇa jalanihiṁ tīē vayaṇēṇaṁ thīdavvalōhēṇa ya agaṇiūṇa sēṭi
dhaṇakayāī mukayāī kōsambi āgaō tti. samuddadattanāmaparivattēṇaṁ ca ṭhiō tīē cēva nayarīē. uciyasamaēṇaṁ ca paviṭṭhō bhayavaṁ
gōyarē, tattha vi ya nandayagihaṁ. di@ō dhasirī ē pañcabhinnāō ya. cintiyaṁ ca tīē-kahaṁ na vivannō cēva sō samuhamajjhē vi. ahō
mē ahannayā,
jaṁ puṇō vi ēsō diṭṭhō ti. ahavā tahā karēmi saṁpayaṁ, jahā na puṇō jīvaï tti. etthantaraṁmi aïkkantō jāyaṇāsa
maō ti niggaō bhayavaṁ. ahiyayaraṁ sē pōsa pāvanā dhaṇasirī. ‘pañcabhinnāyā ahaṁ, annahā kahaṁ sigdhamēva niggaō’ ti cinti ūṇa
pēsiyā cēḍī. halā, kahiṁ puṇa ēsa samagaō ṭhiō tti sammaṁ viyāṇiūṇa lahuṁ mē saṁvāēhi. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jaṁ sāmiṇī āṇavēi'
tti bhaṇiūṇa niggayā cēḍī, laggā ēyassa mapaō. niyayasamaēṇaṁ ca nigaō bhayavaṁ. na paḍuppanō ya sē jahōciō āhārō,
gaō nayaridēvayāpaḍibaddhaṁ ujjāṇantaraṁ. etthantaraṁmi ōgāḍhā carimā, ṭhiō bhayavaṁ kāussaggēṇaṁ. saō kaṁci kālaṁ ciṭṭhiūṇa ‘na
ēsa iō gacchaï’ tti muṇiūṇa āgayā cēḍī, nivēiyaṁ dhaṇasirīē. bhaṇiō tīē nandaō. apaḍusarīrē tumaṁmi uvāiyaṁ bhayavaīē
nayaridēvayāē, jahā kiṇhapakvaṭamīē gahiōvayāsakkhāē āyayaṇavāsō kāyavyō tti. aïkkantā ya mē pamāyabhō aṭṭhamī. tō
mumiṇayami cōiyā ahaṁ bhayavaīē. pasuttāē cēva ya tumaṁ gōsē kiccakaraṇē niggō tti, aō na sāḍiō pahāē suviṇaō. kō
anja upavāsō. aō ahaṁ tattha gacchāmi tti. saṁpāḍē hi mē bhayāīē pūōvayaraṇaṁ ti. saṁpāḍiyaṁ nandaēṇaṁ. taō kammayaradugāhi
ṭiyā saha pubacēḍiyāē gayā dhaṇasirī tamujjāṇaṁ. diṭṭhō tīē tavassī. etthantaraṁmi āgaō sārakabhariēṇa pavahaṇēṇa tamuddēsaṁ
sāgaḍiō, bhaggō ya sē akhiō. tō atthamuvagayappāō diṇayarō. na kōi kaḍē geṇḍaï tti dhēnūṇa gōṇē gaō niyayagēhaṁ. taō
cintiyaṁ dhaṇasirīē-laṭṭayaṁ jāyaṁ, parahi cetra sārakaḍēhiṁ ḍahissāmi ēvaṁ ti. gayā caṇḍiyāyayagaṁ, kayā dēvayāē pūyā, dinaṁ
kammayarāṇaṁ pāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ, pasuttā ēē. tō ēyāiṇī cēva gayā muṇivarasayāsaṁ. annāṇakōhamūḍhāē viiyāī bhayavō sabhīmi
kaṭṭhāī, na lakkhiyāiṁ ca jhāṇanōyamugaēṇaṁ bhayavayā. pajjāliō jalaṇō, chikkō bhayavaṁ jalaṇajālāvalōē. saṁjāō sē karuṇapahā
ṇataṇēṇa jhāṇajōyasaṁkamō. kiha?
cintēi ya sō bhagavaṁ kāussaggami acaliyasahāvō. aṇuyampāgayacittō jaliē jalaṇaṁmi ḍajjhantō.

lg.l: iha dhannā sappurisā jē navaramaṇuttaraṁ gayā mokkhaṁ
jamhā tē jīvāṇaṁ na kāraṇaṁ kammabandhassa

div.p: ēsō u mōhavasaō kōi maṁ pāviūṇa kugaīē. baccihii ahō ka8 kaṭuṁ bahudukkhapaürāē.

lg.l: na hu hōi kajasiddhī bhaṇiyamiṇaṁ lōyanāhēṇa
sōēmi na niyadēhaṁ ēyaṁ sōēmi mōhaparatantaṁ

div.p:
iya sō suhapariṇāmō tīē viṇivāiō u pāvāē. pannarasasāgarāū uvavannō sukkakappami ।
iō ya sā dhaṇasirī sasajjhasā viya gayā. caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ, pavisamāṇī ya vēiyā cēḍiyāē. bhaṇiyā ca tīē — sāmiṇi,
kahiṁ gayā āsi? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — na kahiṁci, paraṁ addharattasaṁjhāē payāhiṇaṁ kayaṁ ti.

etthantaraṁmi uvaladdhō cēḍiyāē huyāsaṇujōō. kimēyaṁ ti viyappiūṇa pasunā ya ēsā. pahāyā rayaṇī. taō kāūṇa
dēvayāē pūrya saṁmāṇiūṇa kammayarē patthiyā dhaṇasirī sagihaṁ. dihō ya panthē vāvannō risī dhaṇasirīē kammayarēhi cēḍiyāē ya.
ahō kēṇa ēyaṁ vavasiyaṁ ti jaïpiyaṁ kammayarēhiṁ. ‘na yāṇāmi’ tti bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇasirīē. samuppanō cēḍiyāē viyappō. pēsiyā ahaṁ
bhayavaō annēsaṇanimittaṁ, niggayā ya ēsā addharatcasamaē, uvaladdhō ya maē tīē cēva vēlāē ujjōyō. tā na yāṇāmō kaha mēyaṁ;
mannēmi, jōiyā ahaṁ ēyāē mahāpāva(vā)dēsaṁmi. ēvaṁ cintayantī paviṭṭhā saha dhaṇasirīē gēhaṁ ti.

etthantarami agaō sāgaḍiō. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇaṁ pi ahimettasēsō muṇivarō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa-ahō mē adhannayā. paḍivannō
ahaṁ kassaï kiliṭṭhasattaspta bhagavaō uvasaggakaraṇēṇa sahāyabhāvaṁ. pāḍiō maē appā doggaīē. tā nivērami ēyaṁ naravaïsta.
addhajāmamettē ya vāsarē gaō naravaïsamīvaṁ. nivēiyamaṇēṇa. kuviō rāyā. niuttō ṇēṇa daṇḍavāsiō ‘arē lahu risipāyagaṁ lahēhi
tti. niggaō daṇḍavāsiō, gaō caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ. pucchiyā ṇēṇa bhōiyā. kō uṇa aja etthaṁ vasiō ti?. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — na
kōi bhuyaṅgappāō, jaï paraṁ samuddadattassa dhariṇī dhaṇasiritti. daṇḍavāsiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — kiṁ puṇa sē nivāsakajjaṁ?. bhōiyāē bhaṇiyaṁ
na yāṇāmō tti. daṇḍavāsiēṇa cintiyaṁ-na anja aṭṭhamī, na navamī, na caüddasī, tā kiṁ puṇa sē nivāsakāraṇaṁ? pavasaṇanimittaṁ
hōjā; taṁ pi aghaḍamāṇayaṁ, jaō kallaṁmi aṅgārayadiṇō, caramapōrisīē ya viṭṭhī āsi viṇivāyajōgō tti. na khalu duṭṭamisthiyā
yaṇaṁ mottūṇamēvaṁvihaṁ kammaṁ pi pāraṇa kassaï annassa saṁbhavaï. tā gacchāmi tāva samudadattagēhaṁ, tō cēva uvaladdhī havissaï tti.
gaō ēsō, diṭṭhā ya tēṇa duvāradēsabhāyaṁmi cēva cēḍī. pucchiyā ēsā. atthi iha satyavāhapariṇī na vatti? taō sasaṁkhōhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ
cēḍiyāē. kiṁ puṇa tīē pōyaṇaṁ? taō daṇḍavāsiēṇa ahippāyamaṇiikusalēṇa sāsyamiva jaṁpiyaṁ-ā pāvē visumariō tē risivu
tantō ti? taō samammaduhattaṇa niyaḍibaliyayāē ya bhaṇiya cēḍiyāē. anja, gavēsaṇanimittaṁ cēva bhagavaō tē ahaṁ sāmiṇīē
pēsiyā, na uṇa annaṁ viyāṇāmi. tabhō daṇḍavāsiēṇa ‘na ettha saṁdēhō, annahā kiṁ gavēsaṇanimittaṁ’ ti cintiūṇa pucchiyā ēsā.
sundari, alaṁ bhayasaṅkāē; kiṁ puṇuddisiya tumaṁ bhayavaśrō gavēsaṇanimittaṁ pēsiyā. cēḍiyāē bhaṇiyaṁ — ajja, sō khu bhayavaṁ kallē taïya
pōrisīē bhikkhānimitta iha paviṭṭhō tti, ameṇhi ūṇa bhikkhaṁ lahu cēva niggaō. taō niggacchamāṇaṁ pecchiūṇa bhaṇiyā ahaṁ
sāmiṇīē, jahā ‘mañjariē, gaccha, kahiṁ puṇa ēsa samaṇō ṭhiō tti jāṇiūṇa lahuṁ saṁvāēhi.’taō saṁvāiyaṁ maē, na uṇa kajja
viyāṇāmi. daṇḍavāsiēṇa bhaṇiya-rāō tattha gantūṇa kiṁ kayaṁ tassa tīē? cēḍiyāē bhaṇiya-anja, na kiṁci, na bandiō vi
ēsō sāmiṇīē, avi caṇḍiyāē kayā pūya tti. daṇḍavāsiēṇa cintiyaṁ. aō cēva kūradēvayāvihāṇanimittaṁ payāriūṇa pariyaṇaṁ
ēyāē vāvāiō havissaï. tā pecchāmi tāva satyavāhapariṇiṁ, taō muhaviyāraō cēva lakkhissāmi tti. gō tīē pāsaṁ, saṁkhuddhā
dhaṇasirī, lakkhiō sē bhāvō daṇḍavāsiē, bhaṇiyā ya ṇēṇa. pēsiō ahaṁ mahārāēṇa, [*bābāiō risī,] risivāvāyagaaṇṇēsaṇa
nimitta, pabattō ya tassa ghāyayaviyāṇaṇatyaṁ ti. pasuttā ya tumaṁ caṇḍiyāyayaṇē, viyāṇiō ya ēsa vuttantō maē. tā ēhi, naravaï
samīvaṁ gacchamha. ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa sasajjhasā bhayapavēviraṅgī nivaḍiyā dharaṇivaḍhē dhaṇasirī. daṇḍavāsiēṇa cintiyaṁ-kayamiṇamimīē,
kahamannahā ēvaṁvihaṁ bhayaṁ ti. nibbhacchiyā ēsā. miliō jaṇavaō. ēyaṁ ca vaïyaramāyaṇṇiūṇa jaṇasayāsāō ‘mā ahaṁ ca ēvaṁ
cēva gheppissāmi’ ti cintiūṇa appavisiūṇa niyagēhaṁ duvāraō cēva palāṇō nandaō. nīyā ya ēsā naravaïsamīvaṁ. sāhiō
vuttantō naravaïssa. pulaïyā ṇēṇaṁ, cintiyaṁ ca. hanta kahamēyāē āgiīē imaṁ īdisaṁ nisaṁsakammaṁ bhavissaï? pucchiyā ya
ṇēṇaṁ ।. aha kiṁnimittaṁ tuma caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ gayā āsi? taō ya taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa saṁkhuddhattaṇēṇaṁ na jaṁpiyamimīē. samuppannā
saṅkā rāiṇō. thēvavēlāē puṇō vi pucchiyā. kaō tumaṁ kassa vā dhūya tti? taō sāhiyamimīē. susammanayarāō, ahaṁ puṇṇa
bhahassa dhūyā, samuddadattassa ghariṇī dhaṇasirī nāma. gavēsāviō sē bhattā, nōvaladdhō ya. taō accantasuddhasahāvayāē jahāṭhiyaṁ
payāparivōlaṇasadamuvvahantēṇaṁ ‘kayāi na taraï rāyapuraō sāhiuṁ paōyaṇaṁ, tā vīsatthā sāhissaï’ tti kulappavāhapariyāṇaṇanimittaṁ
pēsiō rāiṇā puṇṇabhaddamantarēṇa ēyavaïyarapaḍibaddhalēhasaṇāhō lēhavāhaō. rakkhāviyā ēsā, païdiyahaṁ pucchāvaē naravaī, na ya
kiṁci jaṁpaï tti. āgaō lēhavāhaō, samappiō tēṇa paḍi lē hō, vāiō rāiṇā. lihiyaṁ ca tasya. atthi mē dhūyā dhaṇasirī
kuladūsaṇā ya. tō rāiṇā cintiyaṁ-asaṁsayaṁ kayamiṇamimīē, akajjāyaraṇasīlā cēva ēsā mahāpāvā. ahō sē mūḍhayā, ahō
mahāpāvakammāṇuḍhāṇaṁ, ahō kūrahiyayayā, ahō aṇālōiyattaṇaṁ. tahā vi ‘avajjhā itthiya’ tti dhāḍiyā ṇēṇa sarajāō. gaccha
māṇī ya vāsarantē taṇhāchuhābhibhūyā pamuttā gāmadēulasamīvē. ḍakkā bhuyaṅgamēṇaṁ. mahāparikilēsēṇa vimukkā jīviēṇaṁ. uvavannā
ya ēsā mariūṇa vālayappabhāē puḍhavīē sattasāgarōvamahiī nāragō tti.

div.head: pañcamō bhavō

lg.l: vakkhāyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadhaṇasirimō ya ettha païbhajā
jayavijayā ya sahōyara ettō ēyaṁ pavakkhāmi

div.p:
atthi ihēva jambuddīvē dīvē mārahē vāsē kāyandī nāma nayarī. jīē samuddōīsā viya paṅkayagāhāulāō pharihāō,
païvvayājaṇamaṇō viya parapurisālaṇijjō paügārō, dharaṇiharakandarāī viya sīhabālayasamaddhāsiyāī duvāratōraṇāī, sarayajalaha
rukkērā viya dhavalābhōyasundarā pāsāyā. avi ya
tīē akhaṇḍiyaniyabhuyaparakkamō sūratēō nāma rāyā.

tassa ya sayalantēurappahāṇā rūvi vva kusumacāvapariṇī līlāvaī nāma bhāriyā. tassa rāiṇō imīē saha visayasuhamaṇu
havantassa aïkkantō kōi kālō.

iō ya sō mahāmukkakappavāsī dēvō ahāuyamaṇuvāliūṇa taō cuō samāṇō samuppannō līlāvaīē kucchiṁsi. diṭṭhōya tīē
sumiṇayaṁmi tīē cēva rayaṇīē pahāyasamayami saṁpuṇṇamaṇḍalō sayalajaṇamaṇāṇandayārī candimāpasāhiyabhuvaṇabhavaṇō mayalanchaṇō vayaṇē.
ṇamuyaraṁ pavisamāṇō tti. pāsiūṇa ya taṁ suhavibuddhāē siṭō tīē jahāvihiṁ daïyassa. harisavasubhinnapulaēṇaṁ bhaṇiyā ya tēṇaṁ
sundari, sayalasāmantamiyakō puttō tē bhavissaï. paḍissuyamimīē. paritudvā ēsā. tibaggasaṁpāyaṇasuhamaṇuhavantīē pattō
pasūisamaō muhajōēṇaṁ ca pasūyā ēsā. jāō sē dāraō. nivēiō nivvuināmāē rāyadāriyāē naravaïssa. kayaṁ jahōciyamaṇēṇaṁ.
aïkkantō māsō. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāmaṁ dārayassa jayakumārō tti kahāṇayavisē sēṇa. pattō kumārabhā. gahiō tēṇa rāyakumārō
ciyakalākalāvō. puvvabhavabhāvaṇāō ya atthi sē dhammacaraṇami aṇurāō.

annayā ya niggaō āsavāhaṇiyāē. diṭṭhō ya tēṇa candōdayaüjjāṇē ahāśāmuē paēsē diṇayarō viya dittayāē candō viya
sōmayāē samuddō viya gambhīrayāē rayaṇarāsī viya mahagghayāē kusumāmēlō viya lāyaṇṇayāē saggō viya rammayāē mokkhō viya
nivdhayaṇijjayāē sēyaviyāhivassa jasavammaṇō puttō paḍivanasamaṇaliṅgō sasamayagahiyasārō aṇēyasamaṇapariyaō saṇaṁkumārō
nāmāyariō tti. taṁ ca daṭṭaṇa samuppanō kumārassa saṁvēgō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō ṇu khalu īisī ēsa saṁsārō, jēṇa ēvaṁvihēhiṁ pi
suralōyadullahēhiṁ anattasaṁpajantasayalamagōrahēhiṁ mahāpurisēhiṁ paricattō tti. tā kō puṇa ēsō, kiṁ vā sē paricāyavisēsakāraṇaṁ ti
pucchāmi ēyaṁ. gaō tassa samīvaṁ, bandiō tēṇa bhayavaṁ saṇaṁkumārāyariō sēsasāhuṇō ya. dhammalāhiō bhayatrayā sēsasāhūhi ya. uva
viṭṭhō gurupāyamūlē. viṇayaraïyakarayalacaliuḍaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, asārō cē ēsa saṁsārō kassa vā sayaṇṇavinnāṇassa na nivvē.
yakāraṇaṁ, tahā vi pāēṇaṁ na bajjhanimittamantarēṇa ēsa saṁjāyaï ti. tā ācikkha bhayavaṁ, kiṁ tē visēsanivvēyakāraṇaṁ, kē vā bhayavanta
mavagacchāmi tti. taō bhayakkhā ‘ahō sē vivēgō, ahō vayaṇavināsō, ahijjamāṇē mā alōiyaṁ saṁbhāvaïssaï’ ti cintiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma,suṇa. visēsakāraṇaṁ pi na saṁsāraviyāramantarēṇa, tahāvi viiyasaṁsārasahākssavi bhavaō kōuyaṁ ti kaïliūṇa sāhijaïtti.
kiha?

atthi ihēva bhārahē bāsē sēyaviyā nāma nayarī. tattha jasavammō rāyā. tassa puttō saṇakumārābhihāṇō ahaṁ. jāyamettassa
āiṭṭuṁ ca mē saṁvacchariēṇa vijāharanarindattaṇaṁ ti. aïballahō tāyassa kumārabhāvē tattha ciṭṭhāmi jāva gahiyā kēi takarā vajjhā
nijanti. divā ya tē maē vāhiyāliṁ gaēṇaṁ. bhagiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ. dēva, saraṇāgayā amhē, parittāyaü dēvō. taō mōyāviyā maē, ruvā
nāyarayā, nivēyamārakkhiēhi mahārāyassa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ. jahā kumārō na yāṇaï, tahā gēpiūṇa tē nivēiūṇa nāyarayāṇaṁ
vāvāēha tti. vāvāiyā ya takarā, vināō maē ēsa vuttantō. ruṭō mahārāyassa niggaō nayarīō balā pahāṇayariyaṇassa, āgō
tāmalitti. muṇiō ēsa vuttantō nannayarisāmiṇā īsāṇacandēṇa. niggaō paccōṇiṁ. bahumaniō ahaṁ tēṇa bhaṇiō ya. vaccha,
imaṁ pi tē niyayaṁ cēva rajjatā sundaramaṇucidviya, jamihāgaō si tti. paviṭṭhō nayariṁ, dinō mē kumārāvāsō. aïkkantēsu kaïva
yadiṇēsu bhaṇāviō ahaṁ tēṇa. gēhāhi jahicchiyaṁ jīvaṇaṁ ti. na paḍivannaṁ ca taṁ maē.

tō tatthēva ciṭṭhamāṇassa āgaō avivēyaṁgyaviyajaṇamaṇāṇandayārī vasantasamaō, viyambhiō malayamāruō, phulliyāī kāṇa.
gujjāṇāī, ucchaliō parahuyāravō, payattāō nayaricaccarīō. ēvaṁvihē ya vasantasamaē niyagēhāō cēva visēsujalanēvacchō vayaṁsaya
samēō payaṭṭō kīlānimittaṁ tāmalittītilayabhūyaṁ aṇaṅganandaṇaṁ nāma ujjāṇaṁ. aïyaō rāyamagga, diṭṭhō ya vāyāyaṇanividvāē
nayarisāmiṇō īsāṇacandassa dhūyāē vilāsavaīē. bhavarantabbhāsaō samuppanō sē mamōvari aṇurāō, vimukkā vāyāyaṇāsannaṁ
vaccama ṇassa tīē mamōvari sahatyagutthā baülamāliyā, lakkhiyā ya mē biiyahiyayabhūēṇa vasubhūiṇā, nivaḍiyā mē kaṇṭhadēsabhāē।
pulaïyaṁ maē uvarihattaṁ, diṭṭhaṁ sē vāyāyaṇaviṇiggayaṁ vayaṇakamalaṁ, samuppannō mē hiyayaṁmi pariōsō, pecchamāṇīē ya nimiyā sā
maē siṇēhabahumāṇaṁ kaṇṭhadēsē. etthantaraṁmi pariōsavisāyagambhiṇaṁ īsivihasiyasaṇāī nīsasiyamimīē. aïkantō ayaṁ tamuddēsaṁ
dēha mettēṇaṁ na puṇa cittēṇa, pattō aṇaṅganandaṇaṁ ujjāṇaṁ. tattha vi ya vayaṁsayāṇurōhēṇa vicittakīlāpavattō vi dēhaceṭṭāē taṁ cēva payaï
sundaraṁ tīē vayaṇakamalaṁ cintayantō ṭhiō kaṁci kālaṁ. uciyasamaēṇaṁ ca paviṭṭhō rāmalittiṁ. kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ. aïkkantō
vāsarō, samāgayā rayaṇī. saṁmāṇiūṇa ‘siraṁ mē dukkhēi’ tti lahuṁ cēva visajiyā vayaṁsayā. gaō vāsabhavaṇaṁ, ṭhiō sayaṇijjē.
tattha ya aṇācikṣaṇīyaṁ asaṁbhāvaṇīyaṁ aṇaṇuhūyapuvvaṁ tahāvihaṁ dukkhāisayamaṇuhavantassa khaṇamettaladdhaniddassa aïkkantā rayaṇī. kayaṁ
gōsakiccaṁ. samāgayā vasubhūippamuhā vayaṁsayā. viiṇṇāī taṁbōlāi. gayā amhē kīlānimittaṁ tamēva bhavaṇujjāṇaṁ. pavattā kīliuṁ
vicittakīlāhiṁ. sunnahiyayattaṇāō ya lakkhiō mē cittami mayaṇaviyārō vamubhūiṇā. ‘vittē, ya kīlāvaïyarē māhavīlayā
maṇḍavaṁmi ciṭṭhamāṇō bhaṇiō ahaṁ tēṇa. bhō vayassa, aha ‘kiṁ puṇa tumaṁ ajja vāsaraṁmiva sasī vicchāō dīsasi, khaṇaṁ ca jhāṇagaō
viya muṇī sayalacēṭuṁ nirumbhasi, taō ya laddhalāhō viya jūyārō pariōsamunbahasi tti. taō maē asamikkhiyakāriyāē mayaṇassa
bīyahiyayabhūyassa vi gr̥hamāṇēṇa niyayamāyāraṁ jaṁpiyaṁ ‘na kiṁci lakkhēmi’ tti. vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ‘ahaṁ lakkhēmi.’maē bhaṇiyaṁ
'kiṁ tayaṁ.’vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiya-ārōviō tē baülamāliyānihēṇa rāyadāriyāē garuyacintābhārō, viddhō ya tīē diṭipāyacchalēṇa
mayaṇasaradhōraṇīhiṁ. tajjaṇiō ēsa viyārō. annahā kahamayaṇḍammi cēva paripaṇḍuraṁ tē vayaṇaṁ, aladdhaniddāsuhāiṁ ca tāratambāī lōya
ṇāī, hiyayāyāsakāriṇō dīhadīhā nīsāsa tti. tā mā saṁtappa; icchaï sā taē saha samāgama, pēsiyā ya tīē siṇēhabahumāṇaṁ baü
lamāliyā dūī. annaṁ ca-avaḍiō vihī avassabhaviyadhvēsuṁ, ghaḍēi ēsa ahimuhīhūō niyamēṇa annadīvagayaṁ pi pāṇiṇaṁ. karēmi
ahaṁ ettha kaṁci uvāyaṁ ti. paḍissuya maē. kaō tēṇa vilāsavaïdhāvidhūyāē aṇaṅgasundarīē saha pasaṅgō. ahigamaṇīyapurisa
guṇajōgaō laggā ya sā tassa.

aïkkantā kēivi diyahā. taō ‘na kayamiha kiṁci vasubhūiṇā, na pahavaï vā sē maïgōyarō’ ti cintayantō mayaṇaparāyattayāē
gaō sayaṇijja. tattha puṇa mucchiō viya mūḍhō viya maïttō viya mūō viya bhīō viya gahagahiō viya vēvamāṇahiyō appa
havantō indiyāṇaṁ ciṭṭhāmi jāva thēvavēlāē cēva pahaṭṭavayaṇapaṅkō āgaō vasubhūī. vayaṇaviyārēṇa lakkhiyaṁ maē, jahā kayamaṇēṇa
paōyaṇaṁ bhavissaï tti. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. bhō vayassa, paricaya visāyaṁ, aṅgīkarēhi pamōya, saṁpannaṁ tē samīhiyaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ
‘kahaṁ viya.’tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa

gaō ahamiō aja aṇaṅgasundarīgēhaṁ. diṭṭhā maē pabvāyatrayaṇapaṅkayā aṇaṅgasundarī, bhaṇiyā ya. sundari, kiṁ puṇa tē
unvēya kāraṇaṁ; ācikkha, jaï akahaṇīyaṁ na hōi. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ—

lg.l: kaha taṁmi nivvarijjaï dukkhaṁ keṇḍujjuēṇa hiyaēṇa
adāē paḍibimba jaṁmi dukkhaṁ na saṁkamaï

div.p: maē bhaṇiyaṁ — sundari!

lg.l: viralā jāṇanti guṇā viralā japaïnti laliyakabāī

div.p:
tahāvi atthi mē tuha maṇōrahasaṁpāyaṇecchā. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jaï ēvaṁ, tā suṇa. atthi mahārāyadhr̥yā vilāsavaī nāma kannayā.
sā mē bhinnadēhā vi attāṇanivisēsā sāmisālī vi asāmisālisīlā. tīē apacchimā avasthā vaṭṭaï. taō maē bhaṇiyaṁ. kiṁ
puṇa ettha kāraṇaṁ. tīē bhaṇiya ‘mayaṇaviyārō.’taō maē bhaṇiyaṁ — kaṇa puṇa bhayavayā vīyarāgēga viya khaṇḍiyaṁ viṇijjiyasurāsurassa
raïmaṇāṇandayāriṇō pañcabāṇassa sāsaṇaṁ. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — na yāṇāmi khaṇḍiyaṁ na khaṇḍiyaṁ ti. ettiō uṇa mē saṁtāvō, jaṁ sē maṇō
rahavisaō na najjaï. maē bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kahaṁ viya.’tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — muṇa. pabattē mayaṇamahūsa niggayāsu nayaracaccarīsu caccariyāmettasaṁga
yāē dihrō imīē-aṇumāṇaō viyāṇāmi-muttimantō viya kusumāuhō kōvi juvāṇaō. annahā kēhaṁ īisassa kanayārayaṇassa aṇīisē
varē ahilāsō ti. na patthaï paṅkayasirī haḍhavaṇāī. mukkā ya tīē tassuvari sahatthagutthā baülamāliyā, nivaḍiyā sē imī vi ya kaṇṭha
dēsē maṇōrahēhiṁ. taō uparihuttamavalōiūṇa nimiyā ya tēṇaṁ annajaṇasaṁpāyabhīruyayāē ghettūṇa tīē hiyayaṁ piba kaṇṭhami. aïkkantō
ya sō. vilāvasaī vi ya tayappabhūimēva paricattaniyayavāvārā tahā kayā vammahēṇa, jahā avikkhiuṁ pi na pārīyaï tti. vināō ya
ēsa vuttantō maēm̐ babbariyāsayīsāō, puṇō rāyadhūyāō tti. samāsāsiyā sā maē. sāmiṇi, alaṁ visāēṇaṁ, saṁvāēmi sāmiṇi
hiyayavallahēṇa. na khaṇḍi jaï kōmuī mayalacchaṇēṇaṁ ti. maṇiūṇa paṇihilōyaṇēhiṁ nirūviō sō, na uṇa uvaladdhōti. taō ya sā
anja mayaṇaviyāraō cēva asaṁpāiyapaōyaṇaṁ maṁ avagacchi ūṇa nibbharukkaṇṭhā parāhīṇahiyayā saṁkantadūsahasarīrasaṁtāvaṁ pariccaïya sē yaṇīyaṁ
avalambiya sahīyaṇaṁ uvaritalamārūḍhā. dakkhiṇāṇilēṇa ya savisēsapajalijantamayaṇāṇalā uṇhaṁ ca dīhaṁ ca nīsasiya taṁ cēva rāyama
gudēsaṁ pulōiuṁ payattā. pavvāliyā ya sē ahiyayaraṁ bāhasalilēṇa diṭṭhī. taō sahasā cēva jhaṇajhaṇāravamuhalamaṇivalayaṁ vihuṇiya kara
pallavaṁ avahatthiya aṅgasaṁdhārayaṁ sahiyāyaṇaṁ mōhamuvagaya tti. taō sasaṁbhantō uḍhiō ahaṁ, bhaṇiyō ya vasubhūī. vayassa, kahiṁ sā
hiyayāṇandayāriṇī, daṁsēhi mē, alaṁ tīē accāhiē jīviēṇa. vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva, vattaṁ khu ēyaṁ, kahāvasāṇaṁ pi tāva hiyayā
ṇandakārayaṁ cēva, taṁ suṇaü dēvō. taō lajjāvaṇayavayaṇakamalaṁ īsi vihasiūṇa ṇuvannō ahaṁ. vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — taō, dēva, nimiyā
sahiyāhiṁ ucchaṅgasayaṇijjē,vījiyā maē bāhasalilasittēṇa tāliyaṇṭēṇa, dinnaṁ ca sē sahāvasīyalavacchasthalaṁmi candaṇaṁ,uvaṇīō muṇā
liyāvalayahārō, laddhā kahavi tīē cēyaṇā, ummilliyaṁ aladdhanidākkhēyapāḍalaṁ lōyaṇajuyaṁ. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — sāmiṇi, kiṁ tē bāhaï tti.
taō ukaḍayāē mayaṇaviyārassa agavē kkhiūṇa sahiyaṇaṁ avvattaṁ cēva jaṁpiyaṁ tīē ‘tassa cēvādasaṇaṁ’ ti. taō maē tīē sāhāraṇatthaṁ
aliyaṁ cēva jaṁpiyaṁ. sāmiṇi, dhīrā hōhi, uvaladdhā tassa maē paüttī, vinavissaṁ, sāmiṇi, tamantarēṇa. tō vihasiya tīē, dinnaṁ
ca mē kaḍisuttayaṁ. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā sē jaṇaṇī, bhaṇiyā ya tīē. jāya vilāsavaï, sārēhi vīṇaṁ, jō āṇattaṁ mahārāēṇa ‘ajja
taē vīṇāviṇōō kāyayō’ tti. taō guruyaṇalajjāluyāē jaṁpiyaṁ tīē. jaï ēvaṁ, tā lahuṁ vīṇāyariṇiṁ sadēhi. sadiyā vīṇāya
riṇī. etthantaraṁmi kiṁkāyabvamūḍhā avisajjiyā cēva rāyadhūyāē niggayā rāyagēhāō, āgayā sabhavaṇaṁ, nirūviō visēsēṇa, na laddhā
ya tassa paüttī. tā kiṁ puṇa ahaṁ sāmiṇīē vinavissaṁ ti samaddhāsiyā cintāpisāiyāē. tā ēyaṁ mē uvvēyakāraṇaṁ ti. maē
bhaṇiyaṁ — paricaya cintāpisāiyaṁ, jāṇāmi ahayaṁ taṁ juvāṇayaṁ. tā tahā karisaṁ, jahā tē sāmiṇī nivvuyā bhavissaha tti. aṇaṅga
sundarīē bhaṇiyaṁ — sāhēhi tāva, kahaṁ tumaṁ jāṇāsi, kō vā sō juvāṇaō. maē bhaṇiyaṁ — appāṇanivvisēsō vayaṁsaō, ahavā sāmi
sālō, aō viyāṇāmi. sō puṇō sēyaviyāhivassa mahārāyajasavammaṇō puttō sarṇakumārō nāma. tassa kīlānimittaṁ aṇaṅganandaṇaṁ
patthiyassa pēsiyā tīē baülamāliyā, bahumanniyā ya tēṇaṁ. aṇaṅgasundarīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jaï ēvaṁ, tā alaṁ tē sāmisālēṇa, jō ēvaṁ pi
sāmiṇī hiyayaṁ viyāṇiya nirujjamō ciṭaï. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. na nirujamō, kiṁtu uvāyaṁ vicintēi ‘kahaṁ puga aṇindiēṇa vihiṇā ēsā
pāviyaca’ tti. aṇaṅgasundarīē bhaṇiyaṁ — samāṇarūvāṇurāyakulakannayāharaṇaṁ pi aṇindiō cēva vihī. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. atthi ēvaṁ, kiṁtu
añcantasiṇēhavantō mahārāōsaṇaṁkumārassa, jaō apaḍihaō savvatthāmēsu gaïpasarō, uvannatthaṁ ca tassa sabahumāṇaṁ mahārāpaṇa jīvaṇaṁ.
tā kayāi pathiō cēva dēissaï tti. tā kiṁ ēiṇā. nivēēhi tāva ēvaṁ vuttantaṁ sāmiṇīē, cintēhi ya uvāyaṁ, kahaṁ puṇa ēyāṇaṁ
dasaṇaṁ saṁjāissara ti. aṇaṅgasundarīē bhaṇiyaṁ — nivēēmi ēyaṁ. dasaṇōvāō puṇē, nēissaṁ ahaṁ sāmiṇi mandirujjāṇaṁ, tumaṁ pi ya
kumāraṁ ghettūṇa tahiṁ cēva sannihiō havejjāsi ti. paḍissuyaṁ ca taṁ maē. saṁparya tumaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti.
taō ēyaṁ sōūṇa mōhadōsēṇāraṁ savvasokkhāṇaṁ piva gaō pāraṁ, pīīē vi yaṁ pāviō pīī, dhiīē va avalambiō dhiī ūsavēṇa
viya kaō mē ūsavō. dinnaṁ vasubhūiṇō kaḍayajuyalaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ēsō. vayaṁsa, na khu ahaṁ bhavantamappamāṇīkarēmi tti. gayā amhē
tamujjāṇaṁ. divā ya tattha rukkhasatyavikōviyapurisasaṁpāiyāgālaḍōhalapasyaviyārōvalakkhijjamāṇasarūvā savvē uū. paḍhamaṁ cēva kusu
miyatilayāsōyasinduvāramañjarīmaṇaharō vasantō, tō vi ya viyasiyasurahimalliyākusumasōhiō gimhō, taō kayambakusumagandhā
ṇuvāsiō ghaṇasamaō, tayō gaïndamayagandhāṇuvāmiyasattacchayakusumasamuggamō sarayakālō, taō paripicarapiyaṅgumañjarīkayāvayaṁmō
hēmantō, taō viyambhiuddāmakunda kusumaharahāsadhavalō sisirasamō tti. taō taṁ daṭṭaṇa cintiyaṁ maē. ahō maṇussalōyadullahā iyaṁ
ujjāṇariddhī. tahiṁ ca jāva thēvakālaṁ ciṭṭhāmi, tāva sā āgayā aṇaṅgasundarī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē. kumāra, āsaṇapariggahēṇa alaṁkarēhi
ēyaṁ candaṇalayāharayaṁ. taō maē pulōiyaṁ vasubhūivayaṇaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa ‘jaṁ ēsā bhaṇaï’ ti. taō amhē gayā candaṇalayāharayaṁ.
diṭṭhā ya tattha jalaharōyaraviṇiggayarayaṇiyarapaṇaïṇi vya tārāyaṇaparivuḍā rāyahaṁsi vva kalahaṁsiparivārā samuddavēla vva thūlamuttāhalaka
liyasalāyaṇṇapaōharā, aṇaṅgadhariṇi vva uulacchiparigayā cittāṇukūlāṇurattaniuṇasahiyaṇamajhagayā lahuiyarattakamala pōhē hiṁ
kummunnaēhiṁ ghaṇasaralakōmalaṅgulivihūliēhiṁ alavikha jamāṇasirājālamaṇaharēhiṁ nimmalanahamaūhōhapaḍi baddhapariēsamaṇḍalē hiṁ aladdha
hiyayapavēsēṇaṁ pitra puvyasēvāsaṁpāyaṇōvāyacaürēṇaṁ jāvayarāēṇaṁ paḍivannaēhiṁ calaṇēhiṁ, calaṇāṇurūvāhiṁ cēva pasannasukumālāhiṁ akkha
kuṅkumarāyapiñjarāhiṁ janiyāhiṁ, mayaṇa namalatōṇīrakaraṇillēṇaṁ païyāmathōrēṇaṁ ca nirantarēṇaṁ ca ūrujuyalēṇaṁ, uttattakaṇayanimmiēṇē
va pīvarēṇaṁ ghaḍiyavimalamaṇimēhalāharaṇēṇaṁ agaṅgabhavaṇēṇaṁ piva visthiṇṇēṇaṁ niyambabimbēṇaṁ, sayala tēlōkalāyaṇṇasalilanivāṇēṇaṁ piva
sahāvagambhīrēṇaṁ nāhimaṇḍalēgaṁ, kusumāuhacāvalē hāvinbhamāē taṇumajjhapasāhaṇāēṁ rōmarāīē, jovvaṇāruhaṇasōvāṇabhūpativalisaṇā
hēṇaṁ majjhēṇa, īsānaḍiēṇa lāyaṇṇāisayalampaḍēṇaṁ piva mayaṇēṇa saï samāliṅgiēhiṁ pariṇāhubhijjantaēhi apōharēhiṁ pōharē hiṁ,
supaïḍiyāhi bāhulayāhiṁ, asōyapallavavibbhamēhiṁ supasatthalēhālaṁkiēhi māṇikapajjuttakaṇayakaḍayasaṇāhēhiṁ aṇuciyakammākarēhi
(payāma) anupūrvasthalēna ca nirantarēṇa ca ūruyugalēna, uttaptakanakanirmitēnēva pīvarēṇa ghaṭitavimalamaṇimekhalābharaṇēna anaṅgabhavanēnēva vistī
karēhiṁ, parimaṇḍalāē mahallamuttāhalamālāparigayāē tilēhālaṁkiyāē sirōharāē,bandhūyakaraṇiralēṇaṁ sahāvāruṇēṇa aharēṇa, viṇijjiya
kundakusumasōhē hi viṇintamaūhajālasōhillēhiṁ dasaṇēhiṁ, uttuṅgēṇaṁ sahāvaramaṇijjēṇaṁ nāsāvaṁgapaṇa, kantipaḍipūriēhiṁ viṇijjiyacaṁda
vimbasōhēhiṁ asōyapallavāvayaṁsapēḍiyapaḍimēḍiṁgaṇḍapāsēhiṁ, viuddhanavakuvalayadalakantisukumālēhiṁ supamhalēhiṁ damaṇagōyarāvaḍiyaja
ṇamaṇāṇandaṇēhi nayaṇēhiṁ, gahakallōladaragahiyamiyaṅkamaṇḍalanihēṇa susiṇiddhālayāulēṇaṁ niḍālabaṭṭēṇaṁ, vayaṇāṇurūvēhiṁ jaccatavaṇija
taïlavattiyāsaṇā hēhiṁ appiyayayaṇāsavaṇēhiṁ savaṇēhiṁ, jiṇaśāṇāṇalaḍajjhantamayaṇadhūmuggārēṇaṁ pica kasiṇakuḍilēṇaṁ mālaīkusumada ma
surahigandhāyaḍiyabhamantamuhalabhamarōlipariyaēṇaṁ kēsakalāvēṇaṁ, tihuyaṇekkasundaraparamāṇurviṇimmiyaṁ piva apaḍirūvaṁ rūbasōhaṁ vahantī,
īsivihārāyāraddhasahiyaṇakahāpabandhā vimatramāṇikapajjuttakaṇayāsaṇōvaviṭhṭhā vilāsabaï tti. taō taṁ daṭṭhūṇa mōhatimiradōsēṇa
aṇirūviūṇa paramatthaṁ akkhippantahiyayaṁ phurantabāhujuyalō paricintiuṁ payattō. kiha—

lg.l: vihiṇō vi nr̥ṇamēyaṁ bahumāṇō āsi appāṇē

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi samāgaōṁ sē ahaṁ dasaṇagōyaraṁ, pulaïō ya tīē sasiṇēhamārata sagadhavalēhiṁ calantatāraēhiṁ nayaṇēhiṁ sasajjhasā
viya aṇācikkhaṇīyaṁ apatthantaramaṇuhavantī samuḍhaiyā ēsā. taō bhaṁgiya aṇaṁgasundarīē susāgayaṁ mayaraddhayassa,] maē vi bhaṇiyaṁ
sāgayaṁ vasantalacchīē. sundari, alaṁ saṁbhamēṇa. etthantaraṁmi taṁ cēvāsaṇamukdaṁsiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ aṇaṅgasundarīē. uvavisaü kumārō.
vilāsavaïāsaṇaṁ ti bahumāṇēṇa uvaviṭhṭhō ahaṁ. uvaṇīyaṁ ca mē kaladhōyamayataliyāē tambōlaṁ. taṁ ca ghettūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ maē. uvavisaü
rāyadhūya tti. uvaviṭṭhā ēsā. ṭhiyāṇi kaṁci vēlaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi samāgaō mittabhūī nāma kannantēuramahallaō. paṇamiō ahaṁ tēṇa, maē vi ya ahivāiō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa.
vilāsavaï, mahārāō āṇavēi. visumariyā tē vīṇāpaōgā. kuviō ahaṁ kallaṁ. tā lahuṁ sumarēhi ‘anja puṇa taē vīṇā
vāiyā’ tti. taō ‘jaṁ mahārāō āṇavēi’ ti bhaṇiūṇa nigagayā lahuṁ.
aha kancuiyasamēyā saṇēhamārattakasaṇadhavalē hiṁ. nayaṇēhiṁ apecchannaṁ pecchantī valiyatārēhiṁ.

tō vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. vayassa, ēhi gacchāmō, viṇā vilāsavaīē kimiha ciṭṭhiēṇaṁ ti. niggayā amhē, diṭṭhā ya ujjāṇa
duvāradēsabhāē aṇabaïnāmāē rāyapattīē. aphajjāyaraṇakulaharattaṇēṇa mayaṇassa samuppanō tīē vi mamōvari ahilāsō. gayā
amhē sagiha. vāsarantami ya ghettūṇa vijāharabandhagutthāī sinduvārakusumāī vilēvaṇasaṇāhaṁ ca tambōlamāgayā aṇaṅgasundarī.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē. kumāra, vinattaṁ sāmiṇīē ‘ēyāī sinduvārakusumāī avassaṁ ajjaüttēṇaṁ parihiyabvāī’ ti. taō ‘saṁvāiyaṁ cēva
imiṇā uvannāsēṇa mēṁ samīhiyaṁ’ ti cintiūṇa, jaṁ dēvī āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa gahiyaṁ kusumadāma, viraïyaṁ uttimaṅgē, ‘vilittō
vi piyayamābahum̐māṇēṇa puṇō vilittō appā; mottūṇamāvīlaṁ samāṇiyaṁ tambōlaṁ. etthantaraṁmi bhaṇiyaṁ vasubhūiṇā. aṇaṅgasundari,
diṭṭhaṁ taē piyavayaṁsassa viṇīyattaṇaṁ. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. na ēvaṁ vihēsu mahāpurisēsu viṇaō acchērayaṁ ti. taō kaṁci vēlaṁ gamēūṇa
payaṭṭā aṇaṅgasundarī. dinnō ya sē mara bhuvagasārō kaṇṭhaō. taō pahāvayaṇakamalā ‘saṁpannā sāmiṇīē maṇōraha’ ti cinta
yantī bhaṇiyā ya ēsā. sundari, sayaṁ tē gēhamēyaṁ, tā ihāgamaṇēṇa khēō na kāyavyō ti. taō ‘jaṁ kumārō āṇavēi’ tti
bhaṇiūṇa gayā aṇaṅgasundarī. pavaḍḍamāṇāṇurāyāṇa aïkantā kaïvi diyahā.

annayā ya rāyakulāō niggacchamāṇō bhaṇiō ahaṁ cēḍiyāē. kumāra, mahārāyapattī aṇagavaī' bhaṇāi ‘jaï nāīva uvarōhō, tā
ihāgacchaü kumārō’ tti. taō vīsatthayāē mahārāyassa ‘ambāē vi āṇāsaṁpāyaṇē na uvarōhō’ tti bhaṇiūṇa payaṭṭō aṇaṅgavaïī
samīvaṁ. duvārapavē sē ya phuriyaṁ mē bāmalōyaṇēṇaṁ, uparōhasīlayāē tahavi ya paviṭṭhō ahayaṁ. divā ya sā maē vāmakarayalapaṇāmiyaṁ
parimaliyakavōlapattalēhaṁ vayaṇakamalamuṭhavahantī paṇamiyā sāyaraṁ. apariphuḍakkharaṁ ca ‘kumāra saraṇāgayā, parittāyāhi’ ti jaṁpiyaṁ
tīē. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. amba, kuō bhayaṁ. tō mayaṇaviyāranibbharāē diṭṭhīra mēṁ pulōiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tīē. kumāra, aṇaṁgāō.
jayappabhii diṭṭhō maē mandirujjāṇāō niggacchamāṇō tuma, tayappabhii pañcabāṇō vi mayaṇō mamaṁ cittalakkhē dasabāṇakōḍī saṁvuttō.
tā hiyaēṇa samappiyaṁ niyaguṇēhiṁ saṁdāmiyaṁ aṇurāēṇa dhāriyaṁ mayaṇabāṇēhiṁ salliyaṁ nivvavēhi mē sarīraṁ attaṇōvaōgēṇa. tē ya
sattimantā purisā, jē abbhatthaṇāvacchalā, samāvaḍiyakajjā na gaṇenti āyaī, abbhuddharenti dīṇayaṁ, pūrenti païramaṇōrahē, rakkhanti
saraṇāgayaṁ. tā rakkhēhi maṁ imāō aṇaṅgāō tti. taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa tāḍiō vitha asaṇivarisēṇa bhinnō viya sūṭēṇaṁ
samāhaō viya mammēsu muccamāṇō viya jīviēṇaṁ mahantaṁ dukkhamaṇupattō mhi. taō ‘natthi akaraṇijjaṁ visayāurāṇaṁ’ ti cinti
ūṇa jaṁpiyaṁ maē. amba, pariccaya imaṁ ubhayalōyaviruddhaṁ aṇajjasaṁkappaṁ, ālōēhi attaṇō mahākulaṁ, avekkhāhi mahārāyasantiē
guṇē. saṁkappajōṇī ya nirayagamaṇekkadēsiō aṇaṅgō, na yāparicattēhi imēhiṁ ēsa uvaramaï. na ya vihāya calaṇavandaṇaṁ tuha sarīrēṇa
mē uvaōgō. sattimantā vi ya purisā, jē na pariccayanti dhamma, na khaṇḍenti sīlaṁ, na laṅghanti āyāraṁ, na karenti vayaṇijja,
na mujjhanti uciēK. aṇaṅgaparirakkhaṇaṁ pi ya na vivēyasannāhamantarēṇa. annaṁ ca-vallahō ahaṁ tē, tā kaha khaṇiyamuhaṁ cēva bahu
manniūṇa pāḍēhi mēṁ avijjhāyahuyavahajālāvalībhīsaṇē naraē. aō paricaya imaṁ avivēijaṇabahumayaṁ kāmāhilāsaṁ. sāmisālī
ya tumaṁ ti. aō ēvaṁ bhaṇāmi. bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

lg.l: jō pāvaṁ kuṇamāṇaṁ aṇuyattaï sāmiyaṁ va mittaṁ vā

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi lajjāvaṇayavayaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ aṇaṅgavaīē. sāhu kumāra sāhu, uciō tē vivēgō. maē vi rūvasīlāī viruddhāī ti
hiō suṇa.
atthi bhakō piirajjami satthimaī nāma sannivēsō. tattha vīrasēṇō nāma kula uttaō. sō ya—

tassa ya kappapāyavassa viya paratthasaṁpāyaṇēṇa saphalaṁ jammamaṇuhavantassa aïkkantō kōi kālō. jāyā ya
ghariṇī. tō sō taṁ geṇhiūṇa mahayā caḍayarēṇa payaṭṭō tīē kulaharaṁ jayatthalaṁ nāma nayaraṁ. pattō sēyaviyaṁ, āvāsiō bāhiri
yāē. etthantaraṁbhi samāgaō sāsasamāvūriyāṇaṇō bhayakāyaracakkhū khīṇagamaṇasattī kaṇṭhagayapāṇō turiyaṁ turiyaṁ kōi kulaüttaō.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. ajja, parittāyāhi parittāyāhi, saraṇāgaō ajjassa. kulaüttaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhada, alaṁ bhaēṇa, kō mama pāṇēsu
dharantēsu bhaddassa kēsaṁ pi uppāḍēi. ghariṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ — ajjaütta, mā ēvaṁ karēhi kayāi dōsayārī bhavē. kulaüttaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
mundari, adōsayārī kiṁ saraṇaṁ pavajjaï. tā kiṁ ēiṇā. jō hōu, sō hōu paḍivannō maē. bhaṇiō ya ēsō ‘bhada, uvavisāhitti.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ajja, kayantahatthilaviyāṇi viya mayakulāṇi sīyanti mē aṅgāṇi, bhayābhibhūyaïtthiyāhiyayaṁ viya tharaharanti mē
ūrū, paranindāē viya sajjaṇabhārahī na pasaraï mē gaī, atthijaṇullāvā viya paē paē khalanti calaṇayā, pēyanāhassa viya
dēvassa vijayavammaṇō āsannī havanti nisiyāriṇō tti. kulaüttaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhada, alaṁ bhaēṇa. kō mama pāṇēsu dharantēsu
bhahassa aṁgulīē vi damaïssaï tti. tā paricaya visāyaṁ, uvavisasu āvāsantarē. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā rāyapurisā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
tēhiṁ. arē rē pāvakamma, caṇḍaṁ dēvasāsaṇamaïkamiūṇa ajja vi pāṇē dhārēsi.

lg.l: jaï vacasi pāyālaṁ saraṇaṁ vā suravaī payattēṇaṁ
laḍḍēsi jalanihiṁ vā tahāvi jīyaṁ na pāvēsi

div.p:
kuuttaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhadda, kiṁ kayamaṇēṇaṁ. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ — paradavyāvahārēṇaṁ dēvasāsaṇāikkamō tti. kula uttaēṇa bhaṇiya-bhadda,
saraṇāgayaparivajjaṇaṁ cōrarakkhaṇaṁ ca duvē vi hu viruddhāṇi tahāvi amuṇiūṇa paramatthaṁ ṣaḍivanaṁ maē imassa saraṇaṁ. ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē samāṇē
bhaddā pamāṇaṁ ti. tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ — bhō kulaüttaya, jaï amhē pamāṇaṁ, tā samappēhi ēvaṁ pāyakamma, mā pavajjēhi dēvakōṣāṇalajālāvalīē
payaṅgattaṇaṁ. kulaüttaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — na īisō sappurisāṇa maggō, jaṁ saraṇāgaō samapijjaï. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, parirakkhēhi ēyaḥ
balā geṇhāmō tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kō mama pāṇēsu dharantē su ēyaṁ geṇhaï tti. bhaṇiūṇa maggiyaṁ maṇḍalaggaṁ kulaüttaēṇa, sannaddhō ya
sē parivārō. taō rāyapurisēhiṁ ‘mā ṇē avahāriyaṁ bhavissaï’ ti cintiūṇē nivēiyaṁ mahārāyassa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. sāsaṇāikantaṁ
pi ‘mē saraṇāgaya'ti rakkhaïḥ tā lahuṁ vāvāēha tti. taō samāgayaṁ ahiyayaraṁ narindasāhaṇaṁ, veḍhiyā kulaüttayastāvāsabhūmī, payaṭṭa
māōhaṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi samāgaō vāhiyālīō mahārāyaputtō mahayā āsasāhaṇēṇa jasōvammadēvō. pucchāviyaṁ tēṇa ‘arē kimēya'
ti. sāhiyaṁ ca sē rāyapurisēhiṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. arē maē aāvāiyaṁmi kō saraṇāgayavacchalaṁ bāāēi ti nivēēha tāyassa.
taō ubasantamāmōhaṇaṁ, nivēiyaṁ rāigō, atrahīriyaṁ ca lēṇa. bhada, vīsatyō gacchāhi tti bahu māṇiūṇa kulaüttayaṁ gaō kumārō.
kulaüttaō ya takaraṁ pūiūṇa aṇusāsiūṇa yaṁ taṁ pattō dumāsa mettēṇa kālēga jayatvalaṁ. pasūyā sē ghēriṇī. jāō sē dāraō; sō uṇa
kumāra, ahaṁ cēva. tā ēvaṁ sayalasattōvagāragōvi visēsaō uvayāri tē piyā tāyassa ambāē mamaṁ ca ti. nivēiyaṁ kumārassa, kāraṇaṁ
puṇa imaṁ. anja khalu samāgaya mētō cēva īsāṇa bandō mahārāō vāhiyālīō paviṭhṭhō aṇaṅgabaïmēhaṁ. diṭṭhā ya tēṇa kararuhavilihiyā
ṇaṇā vāha jaladhāyakavōlapattalēhā amaṅgavaī, bhaṇiyā ya ‘sundari, kimēyaṁ’ ti. tīē bhaṇiya-sīlaparirakkhaṇavivābhō. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ.
sāhēu sundarī, kassa sumariyaṁ kayantēṇa. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. na vinattaṁ cēva maē mahārāyassa; ‘kimagēga asaṁbaddhapalāvaṇaṁ’ ti. annahā
aïkkaṁtā kāvi vāsarā saṇaṁ hamārassa mēṁ patthēmāṇassa. na paḍivannaṁ ca taṁ maē. anja uṇa sayamēnāgacchiūṇa apaḍibajamāṇī sē
hiyayaïcchiyaṁ ēvaṁ kayatthiya mhi. taō kuviō rāyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. arē viṇayaṁdhara, lahuṁ taṁ durāyāraṁ kulaphaṁsaṇaṁ vāvāēhi tti.
maē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. tahā taē vāvāiyabō, jahā na kōi ṇaṁ lākhēi tti. tayō maē cintiyaṁ. ahō
dāruṇē niuttō mhi. ēvaṁphalā narindapañcāsannayā. dhannā khu tē jaṇā, sēvanti jē nidu jaṇāī tavōvaṇāī. hā kimettha kāyavvaṁ
tti. sōhaṇaṁ hōi, jaï sō dīhāū na bāvāijaï. samaddhāsiō cintāpisāiyāē ‘tahāvi ya alaṅghaṇīō dēvāēsō’ ti payaṭṭō
ēyavaïyarēṇa. etthantaraṁmi chīyaṁ kēṇāvi tōraṇapaēsē. tamāyaṇṇi ūṇa vilambamāṇō bhaṇiō siddhāpasanē mittiēṇa. bhadda viṇayaṁdhara,
patisēhamajattaṁ vā hāṇi buḍhēi khayaṁ asiddhiṁ vā
āroggamatyalābhaṁ chīyami payāhiṇadisāsu
taṁ ēsa imīē vivāgō. nimittantarajōgī ya agacchāmi, nidōsavatthuvisaō viiṇṇō tē ramnā viruddhāēsō, nāhippēō ya
bhavaō. tā mā saṁtappa. jahā tumaṁ cintēsi, tahā ēsō pariṇamissaï. kiṁ tu sigdhaṁ payaṭrēhi, annahā asōhaṇaṁ pariṇamaï. taō
maē cintiyaṁ. aṇēyasaṁjaṇiyapañcaō siddhāēsō khu ēsō, ēyaṁ ca ēvaṁ vihaṁ paōyaṇaṁ, vinavaṇāgōyarōya kōbō dēvassa, sabahā visa
mamēyaṁ ti cintayantō gaō niyayagēhaṁ. hā kō uṇa ihōvāō ti cintayantō gahiō uvvēēṇa. pucchiō ya jaṇaṇīē. puttaya,
kimēvamubbiggō viya likkhīyasi. taō maē ‘natthi jaṇaṇīō vi avaraṁ vīsāsathāma’ ti sāhiyaṁ tīē. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. puttaya
na taē ipamaṇuciṭṭhiyavvaṁ, kulōvayāriputtō khu ēsō puttayamsa tti. sāhiō kahiyavuttantō. tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē kumārō pamāṇē ti.
ṭhiō tuhikō viṇayaṁdharō. taō maē cintiyaṁ. ahō māyāsīlayā ithivaggassa. ahavā mahiliyā nāma muṁyaṅgamagaī viya
kuḍilahiyayā, vijjū viya diṭhunapemmā, sariyā viya ubhayakulucchāyaṇī, sasaṅgapavvajā viya apuṭṭhadhammā, hiṁsā viya jīvalōyagara
hiya tti. ahavā kiṁ imīē cintāē. avivēyabahulā visayavisalālasā īisī cēva mahiliyā hōi. aha kahaṁ puṇa mahārāēṇa tīē
kkhaṇaō ēyamēvaṁ cēva paḍivannaṁ ti. ahavā īdisī mē avatyā, jēṇa saṁbhavaï ēvaṁ pi. avimissagārīṇi kila jōvaṇāṇi havanti.
iṭā ya sā mahārāyassa. tā kimettha juttaṁ ti. kiṁ sāhēmi jahaṭṭhiyaṁ mahārāyassa. ahavā vāvāi jaï sā tavassiṇī avassaṁ mahārāēṇa.
na kayaṁ ca sē samīhiyaṁ. tā kahamannaṁ pi aṇatthaṁ sē saṁpāḍēmi. asāhijjamāṇē ya maïlaṇā mē kulaharassa. tahāvi varaṁ maïlaṇā, na uṇa
parapīḍa tti. cintayantō bhaṇiō viṇayaṁdharēṇa. tā āisaü kumārō, ki maē ettha kāyavvaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhada, āēsayārī
tuma, tā saṁpāḍēhi rāyasāsaṇaṁ; kiṁ vā maē durāyārēṇa kulaphaṁsaṇēṇa jīvamāṇēṇaṁ ti. addhabhaṇiē chikkiya siriharābhihāṇēṇa rāyamagga
cāriṇā narēṇaṁ ti. niyakahāpaḍibaddhaṁ ca rāyamagnagāmiēhi mahayā saddēṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ bambhaṇēhiṁ ‘bhō ki bahuṇā, na ēsa dōsayārī, ettha
amhē kōsavisarahiṁ pañcāēmō.’ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa bhagiyaṁ viṇayaṁdharēṇa. kumāra, na tumaṁ durāyārō, jaō jaṁpiyaṁ siddhāēsēṇa ‘nihōsa
vatthuvisaō viiṇṇō tē rannā viruddhāēsō tti. avitahāēsō ya sō bhayavaṁ, na sahiō ya bhavaō durāyārāisadō avitahasūyagēhi
chikkādinimittēhiṁ. tā kiṁ ēiṇā palāvappāraṇa. sāhēhi, kahaṁ puṇa imaṁ vavatthiya; jēṇa vinavēmi mahārāyassa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda,
kimahaṁ sāhēmi; ambā ettha pamāṇaṁ. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, na tujjha etya dōlō, duhā ya sā pāva tti sāmannaō nicchiyamiṇaṁ, visēsaṁ
nāvagacchāmi. tā kiṁ mamēiṇā. ēvaṁ cēva ēvaṁ vinavēmi mahārāyassa; taō sō cēva ettha antaṁ lahissaï tti. bhaṇiūga uḍiō
viṇayaṁdharō, dhariō maē bhuyādaṇḍē, bhaṇiō ya. bhadda, alaṁ ambāē uvari saṁrambhēṇa. cañcalaṁ jīviyaṁ. na khalu ēyaṁ bahu maniūṇa
guruyaṇasaṁkilēsakaraṇaṁ jujjaï. viṇayaṁdharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, puttō tumaṁ mahārāyajasavammaṇō, kimettha avaraṁ bhaṇīyaï. aō cēva mē
tīē pāvāē ubari kōvō. tā karēhi pasāya; muśca maṁ, jēṇa vinavē mi ēyaṁ vaïyaraṁ dēvassa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. alamimiṇā nibbandhēṇa.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, avassamiṇaṁ maē dēvassa vinaviyatvaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, jaï ēvaṁ, tā avassaṁ maē vi appā vāvāiyavō
tti. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa bāhullalōyaṇō visaṇṇō viṇayaṁdharō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō dēvassa asamikkhiyakāriyā, jaṁ īisaṁ purisarayaṇa
mēvaṁ saṁbhāvīyaï. dhiratthu ēyassa dēvasaddō. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhada, mā tāyaṁ ahikkhivāhi; kō ettha dōsō tāyassa, mama cēva puvakamma
pariṇaī ēsa tti. taō mahāsōyābhibhūēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ viṇayaṁdharēṇa. kumāra, jaï ēvaṁ, tā āisaü kumārō, kiṁ maē pāvakammēṇa kāyavvaṁ
ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ bhada, āēsayārī tumaṁ, pāvakammō ahaṁ, tā saṁpāḍēhi rāyasāsaṇaṁ. kiṁ maē duṭusīlēṇa jīvantaraṇa. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
mā ēvamāisaü kumārō, kiṁ imiṇā asaṁbaddhapalāvēṇa kkhaṇaviṇṇāsēṇa, jahāha duṭumīlō pāvakammō; dhannō tuma, bhāyaṇaṁ sayalakallā
ṇāṇaṁ, ālaō sayalaguṇarayaṇāṇaṁ, kappatarubhūō sayalasattāṇaṁ. kiṁ vahuṇā, nivvuidāṇakappō tēlōkassa vi. tā jaï na vinaya
vvamēyaṁ dēvassa, rakkhiyavyā sā rāyaduṭṭhapattī, tā cintēhi etthuvāyaṁ, jahā bhavaō pāṇadhāragāṇandiyamaṇō dēvassa aṇavarāhī
havāmi tti. tō mara cintiyaṁ na vāgāēi ēsō; avābārantō ya ēvamavarāhiyaṁ na pāvēi, jaï alakkhiō pariyaṇēṇaṁ vasubhūi
viḍaō vippagiṭṭhadēsantaramuragacchāmi tti. cintiūṇa imaṁ cēva bhaṇiō viṇayaṁdharō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēga. kumāra, kō annō uvāya
nnu ti, tā aṇuciṭṭhaü iṇamēva kumārō. annaṁ ca-payarṭa cēva vaïhaṇaṁ suvaṇṇabhūmi, ajjēba rayaṇīē mucissaï tti. tēṇēva muvaṇṇa
bhūmigamaṇēṇa aṇuggahēu maṁ kumārō. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ vō rōyaï tti.

etthantarami samāgō saṁjhāsamō. niggō ahaṁ vasubhūiviṇayaṁdharasamēō tāmalittīō, gaō vēlāulaṁ. samappiyā amhē
viṇayaṁdharēṇa sabahumāṇaṁ vahaṇasāmiṇō samuddadattassa, paḍicchiyā tēṇa. aïkantā thēvavēlā. samuggaō kāmiṇīgaṇḍapaṇḍurō candō,
samāgayā saṁkhuddhajalayaranināyagabhiṇā samuddavēlā. samārūḍhō ya ahayaṁ vasubhūiduīō jāṇavattaṁ. calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa ‘kumāra, na
mē kuppiyavvaṁ’ ti bhaṇiūṇa bāhollalōyaṇō ‘niyattō viṇayaṁdharō. kayāī maṅgalāī, uvaüttō kaïṇṇahārō, āpūriyaṁ jāṇavataṁ, payarṭa
pavaṇavēgēṇa. etthantaraṁmi vasubhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō vayaṁsa, kimayati. taō maē sāhiō aṇaṅgavaïvuttantō. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. aha kiṁ
puṇa jahaṭṭhiyaṁ cēva na nivē'yaṁ mahārāyassa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. vayaṁsa, aṇaṅgavaïpīḍābhaēṇaṁ ti.

pattā amhē dumāsamettēṇa kālēṇa suvaṇṇabhūmi, ōiṇṇā pavahaṇāō. gayā siriuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ. diṭṭhō ya tattha sēyaviyāvattha
vvaō samiddhidattaseṭṭiputtō vāṇijjasamāgaō maṇōrahadattō nāma bālavayaṁsaō ti, tēṇa vi ya amhē. taō asaṁbhāvaṇīyāgamaṇasaṁkēṇa
nirūviyā kaṁci kālaṁ, vihasiyaṁ ca amhēhiṁ. taō pañcabhinnāyā amhē. paṇamiūṇa harisavisāyagabbhiṇaṁ japiyaṁ tēṇa. kumāra, avi
kusalaṁ mahārāyassa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kusalaṁ.’nīyā tēṇa sagihaṁ. kaō ṇē vibhavapīisarisō uvayārō. bhuttuttarakālaṁmi pucchiō āga
maṇapaōyaṇaṁ. tāyanivvēēṇa viṇiggaō, sīhalēsaraniyamāulasamīvaṁ gamissāmi’ tti sāhiūṇa sabahumāṇaṁ bhaṇiō ya ēsō. sīhala
dīvagāmivahaṇōvalambhē avahiēṇa hōyavyaṁ’ ti. maṇōrahadattēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ kumārō āṇavēi. aïkkantō kōi kālō. pīilaḍiō
viōyabhīruttaṇēṇa na sāhēi ṇē uvaladdhaṁ pi sīhaladīvagāmiyaṁ vahaṇaṁ. annayā ya muṇiuṇa amhāṇamūsyattaṇaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa. kumāra,
kimakssamāsamnamēva gantavvaṁ kumārēṇa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. vayaṁsa, paōyaṇaṁ mē atthi tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā khamiyavvaṁ kumārēṇa,
jaṁ maē viōyabhīruttaṇēṇa padahamētaṁ kālaṁ kō pōyaṇavidhāō ti; jō pāraṇamimī païdiṇamēva vahaṇāī sīhaladīvaṁ gacchanti.
maē bhaṇiyaṁ. vayaṁsa, jaï ēvaṁ, tā ajjēva gacchamha. tēṇa bhaṇiya, ‘avigvaṁ kumārassa.’ubaladdhaṁ jāṇavattaṁ, pasāhiyaṁ karaṇijja.
uvaṇīō ya mē phurantabhāsuracchāō mahāpamāṇō accantasahiṇarūvō paḍaō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. kumāra, sakōuyaṁ ti kariūṇa gēhāhi
ēyaṁ nayaṇamōhaṇāgihāṇa paḍarayaṇa ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kīisaṁ kōugaṁ’ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. imēṇa pacchāiyasarīrō na dīsaï nayaṇēhi
purisō tti. maē vi (ni)nāsiyaṁ jāva tahēva tti. samuppannaṁ ca mē kōuyaṁ. bhaṇiō maṇōrahadattō. vayaṁsa, kahaṁ puṇa taē ēsa
pāviō tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa
ihēvāgayassa samuppannā mē pīī āṇandaüranivāsiṇā siddhavijjāpaōēṇa siddha sēṇābhihāṇēṇaṁ siddhaüttēṇa. bhaṇiyō ya sō maē.
vayaṁsa, kō uṇa iha vijjāsāhaṇaṁmi paramatthō, kiṁ havaï saccamēvēha divvasaṁvāō na va tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jahuttayāriṇō havaï tti
maē bhagiyaṁ. vayaṁsa, mahantaṁ mē kōuyaṁ; tā daṁsēhi mē dibavilasiyaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ thēvamiyaṁ, kiṁ tu ka yadhvaṁ maṇḍalaṁ. maē bhaṇiyaṁ
'karēu vayaṁsō.’tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā saṁjattīkarēha siddhatthamāiyaṁ maṇḍalōbagaraṇaṁ. saṁpāiyaṁ maē. taō atyamiē diṇayarē viya
mbhiē andhayārē raḍantēsu nissāyarēsu ghettūṇa maṇḍalōvagaraṇaṁ viṇiggayā amhē duvē vi nayarāō ti. patā ya pēyēvaṇaṁ. ālihiya
maṇēṇa tatthēya dēsammi maṇḍalaṁ, samappiyaṁ ca mē maṇḍalaggaṁ, jāliō jalaṇō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. vayaṁsa, appamattēṇa hōyacaṁ ti.
paḍissuyaṁ maē. pāraddhō tēṇa mantajāvō. taō thēbavēlāē cēva divā maē garuyaniyambavahaṇāyāsajhīṇamajjhā ahiṇavubhinnakaḍhiṇa
thaṇavirāyantavacchatthalā saṁpuṇṇamayalanchaṇamuhī viyasiyakandōnayaṇasōhā suratarukusumamālāvihūsiyaṁ dhammellamutrahantī pariṇaya
mahuyakusumavaṇṇā pavaṇadhuyavasaṇapayarḍa ūrujuyalaṁ ṭhaentī gayaṇayalāō samōvayamāṇā jakkhakanaya tti. taō maē cintiyaṁ. ahō
mahāpahāvayā mantassa. tōē pagamiō siddhasēṇō, bhaṇiō ya sabahumāṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kiṁ puṇa mē sumaraṇapaōyaṇaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
na kiṁci annaṁ, avi ya dincadaṁsagāṇurāī mē piyavayasō. tō tīē mēṁ pulōiūṇa bhagiyaṁ. bhadda, paritudvā tē ahaṁ imēṇa dinā
daṁsagāṇurāēṇa; tā kiṁ tē piyaṁ karēmi tti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. tuha dasaṇāō vi abaraṁ piyaṁ tiḥ. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. tahāvi amōhadaṁsa
gāō dēvayāō; gēhāhi ēvaṁ nayaṇamōhaṇaṁ paḍarayaṇaṁ ti. taō maē sasaṁbhamasaṁbhāsaṇajaṇiōvarōhēṇa paṇamiūṇa tīsē caṭaṇa
juyalaṁ sabahupāṇaṁ cēva gahiyaṁ imaṁ. gayā jakkha nayā. paviṭṭhā amhē pabhāyāē rayaṇīē nayaraṁ. tā ēvaṁ pāviō tti.
maē bhaṇiyaṁ. sundarā saṁpattī. gahiō paḍō. taō āucchiūṇa maṇōrahadattapariyaṇaṁ ahiṇandiyā tēṇa, saha maṇōrahadattēṇa gayā
vēlāulaṁ. diṭṭhaṁ ca suravimāṇāgāramaṇugarentaṁ vicittadhayamāloksōhiyaṁ jāṇavattaṁ. abbhuṭiyā jāṇavattasāmiṇā īsaradattēṇa. kaō
ṇēṇa paṇāmō. uvaṇīyāī āsaṇāī. samappiyā maṇōrahadattēṇa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. satyavāhaputta, ēē khu mama sāmiṇō vayasayā bandhavā
jīviya, na kēi tē jē na havanti tti; tā sundaraṁ daṭṭavā. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. vayaṁsa, kimaṇēṇaṁ puṇaruttaviṇṇāsēṇa; majjha vi imē īisā cēva
tti. taō uvārūḍhā jāṇavattaṁ, khittō balī samudassa, ūsiō siyavaḍō, dinnaṁ disisaṁmuhaṁ nijāmaēma pavahaṇaṁ ti. paṇamiūṇa amhē
ṭhiō maṇōrahadattō. payarṭa jāṇavattaṁ. gammaē sīhaladīvāhimuhaṁ ti. ēvaṁ gacchamāṇāṇa tērasamē diyahē unnaō amhāṇamuvari kālō vya
kālamē hō, jīviyāsā viya phuriyā vijjulēhā, ummūliyagirikāṇaṇō ya āgampayantō jalanihiṁ ukkhiyantō mahantakallōlē viya
mbhiśrō visamamāruō, nivaḍiyaṁ asaṇivarisaṁ. ummeṇṭhamattahatyī viya aṇiyamiyagamaṇēṇaṁ avasīhūyaṁ jāṇavataṁ, visaṇṇā nijāmayā.

taō maē aṭṭhambhaṁ kāūṇa chinnāō siyavaḍanibandhagāō rajjūō, maüliō siyavaḍō, vimukkā nagarā. tahāvi ya garuyayāē bhaṇḍassa
saṁkhuddhayāē jalanihiṇō ukaḍayāē asaṇivarisassa vilaṇṇayāē nijāmayāṇaṁ vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa vivannaṁ jāṇavataṁ. bandhavā
vi ya kālapariyāraṇaṁ viuttā sabapāṇiṇō. samāsāiyaṁ maē phēlayaṁ. taō ahaṁ āuyasēsayāē gamiūṇa diṇi ahōrattē phalayadu
iō pattō taḍasamīvaṁ. andhayāralē hā viya diṭṭhā vaṇarāī. sasasiyaṁ mē hiyaēṇa. uttiṇṇō jalanihīō. nippōliyāī pottāī. na
titaṁ ca nivasaṇagaṇṭhisaṁṭhiyaṁ paḍarayaṇaṁ. ahō ēyassa sāmatthaṁ ti jāō mē vimhaō. taō gantūga thēvaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ uvaviṭhṭhō jambu
pāyavasamīvē. cintiyaṁ ca maē. ēyāṇi tāṇi vihiṇō jahicchiyāvilasiyāṇi, ēsā ya sā kammuṇō acintaṇīyā sattī, jamēva
mavi asadahaṇijja avatthantaramaṇuhaviūṇa pāṇē dhārēmi. kiṁ vā ēgudaranivāsiṇā viya vasubhūiṇā viuttassa pāṇēhiṁ. ahavā vicittā
kammapariṇaī, na visāiṇā hōyacaṁ ti. divasanisisamā saṁjōyaviōyā; kayāi sō vi ēvaṁ cēva kahaṁci pāṇē dhārēi tti. tō
tāni pōtāni (vastrāṇi). na timitaṁ (āī) ca nivasanagranthisaṁsthitaṁ paṭaratnam. ahō ētasya sāmarthamiti jātō mē vismayaḥ. tatō gatvā
khuhāpivāsābhibhūō uyayaphalanimittaṁ payaṭṭō uttarāhimuhaṁ. gaō thēvaṁ bhūmiṁ. diṭṭhā ya phaṇasakayalayasahayārasaṁchannakūlā tīrataruku
mumarayaraṁjiyajalā giriṇaī. kayā pāṇavittī. ciṭṭhamāṇēṇa ya sahayārapāyavasamīvē giriṇaīpuliṇammi diṭṭhō piyāē cāḍuyaṁ karēmāṇō
sārasajuvāṇaō. sumariyaṁ vilāsavaīē. jāyā mē cintā. ahō ṇu khalu ēē adiṭṭhabandhuvirahadukkhā sāhīṇāhārapayārā avināyajā.
yaṇādīṇabhāvā pāsaṭṭhiyapaṇaïṇīpasaṅgadullaliyā asañjāyamahāvasaṇabhayā muhaṁ jīvanti miyapavikhaṇō. ēvaṁ cintayantassa atthagi
risiharamukgaō sahassarassī, rayaṇujjōvō viya sīyalīhūō āyō. kayaṁ maē vimalasilāyalammi pallavasayaṇijja. sampāḍiyaṁ
sabjhāvasmayaṁ. uciyasamaē kō dēvayāgurupaṇāmō. ṇuvannō vāmapāsēṇaṁ. ahiṇandiō kusumasurahiṇā māruēṇaṁ. bahudivasakhēyō
samāgayā mē niddā. aïkkantā rayaṇī. viuddhō nāṇāvihavihaṁgamaviruyapāhāuraṇa. kaō dēvayāgurupaṇāmō. payaṭṭō kāṇaṇantarāī pulō.
iuṁ. pecchamāgō ya vicittakāṇagabhāē pattō sukumāravāluyaṁ añcantasōmadaṁsaṇaṁ girisariyāpuliṇaṁ. divā ya tattha supaïṭiyaṅguli
talā pasatthalēhālatiyā takkhaṇuṭiyā cēva payapantī. nirūviyā harisiyamaṇēṇaṁ, vināyā ya lahuyasukumāra bhāvō itthiyāē iyaṁ
na uṇa purisassa. laggō payamaggaō. diṭṭhā ya nāidūraṁmi cēva sahiṇavakalanivasaṇā taviyakaṇayāvadāyadēhā hiyayanibhacchiēṇa viya
calaṇatalalaggēṇa rāēṇa avibhāviyasirāgupphasambāhēṇa mayaṇabhavaṇatōraṇēṇa viya jāṇujuyalēṇa rasaṇākalāvajoggēṇa viulēṇaṁ niya
mbabhāraṇaṁ bahudivasōvavāsakhinnēṇa viya kisayarēṇaṁ majjhēṇaṁ sajagacittagambhīrāē viya mayaṇarasakūviyāē nāhīē tavaviṇijjiēṇa
viya mōhandhayārēṇa puṇō hiyayappavēsakāmēṇaṁ rōmalayāmaggēṇa sukayapariṇāmēhi viya samunnaēhiṁ paōharēhiṁ ahiṇavuggayarattāsōyala
yāvibbhamāhiṁ bāhāhiṁ kambuparimaṇḍalāē sirōharāē pāḍalakusumarānnihēṇaṁ aharēṇaṁ añcantasacchavimalāhiṁ kabōlabālīhiṁ hariṇabahū
kayasaṁvibhāēhi viya lōyaṇēhiṁ pamāṇajuttēṇaṁ nāsiyāvaṁsēṇaṁ dīhapamhalāhiṁ āyaḍriyakōḍaṇḍasannibhāhiṁ bhamuhāhiṁ susiṇiddhadaṁsaṇēṇaṁ
candasannibhēṇa niḍālabaṭṭēṇaṁ paḍhidēsasaṁṭhiēṇaṁ niyambasukayarakkhaṇēṇa viya carakhussavāṇuya riṇā kuḍilakēsakalāvēṇa vāmahatyagahiya
chajiyā dāhiṇahatthēga kusumāvacayaṁ karentī tāvasa kanapatti. taṁ daṭṭaṇa cintiyaṁ maē. ahō vaṇavāsadukkhamaṇuhavantīē vi lāyaṇaṁ.
upagannūṇaṁ ca thēvabhūmibhāgaṁ savisēsaṁ pulaïyā layājālayantarēṇaṁ jāva mottūṇa vaṇavāsavēsaṁ savvaṁ cēva vilāsavaīē aṇugarēi tti.
taō sumaraṇapatraṇasandhukkiyō pajaliō mē maṇammi mayaṇāṇalō. bhariyā ya tīē kusumāṇa chajiyā. payaṭṭā tāva vaṇāhimuhaṁ.
taō ahaṁ nigr̥hiūṇa mayaṇaviyāraṁ niggō layājālayāō, gō tīē samīvaṁ. paṇamiūṇa bhaṇiyā ēsā. bhayavaï, vaḍaü tē
tavōkammaṁ. ahaṁ khu purisō sēyaviyāē vatthavvaō tāmalittīō sīhaladīvaṁ payaṭṭō. antarālē vivannaṁ mē jāṇavattaṁ. aō ēgā
gī saṁvuttō. tā kahēu bhayavaī, kō puna imō paēsō, kiṁ tāva jalanihitaḍaṁ, kiṁvā kōi dīvō, kahiṁ vā tumhāṇamāsamapayaṁ ti.
tō sā maṁ daṭhūṇa niuściyadidvipasarā disāmaṇḍalaṁ pulōēmāṇī mandavaliyavitiricchalōyaṇāyāma sasajjhasā viya khaṇamētaṁ
ahōmuhī ṭhiyā adinapaḍivayaṇā payaṭṭā tabōvaṇāhimuī. taō ‘jubaī tāvasī ēgāgiṇī ya, tāki iha imīē: annaṁ kaṁci pucchi
slāmi’ tti cinti ūṇa niyattō ahaṁ paviṭṭhō taṁ cēva sahāvasundaraṁ layāgahaṇaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca maē. pecchāmi tāva, kahiṁ puṇa ēsā
baccā tti. pulōiuṁ payattō. diṭṭhā ya savisēsamantharāē gaīē vacamāṇī. gayā ya thēvaṁ bhūmibhāyaṁ. maggaō pulōiyaṁ tīē. na diṭṭhō
kōi sattō. taō mottūṇa kusumachajjiyaṁ parihiyaṁ pi puṇō parihiyaṁ vakkalaṁ, parāmuṭṭhō kēsakalāvō, mōḍiyāī aṅgāī, uvvē
lliyāō bāhulayāō, payaṭṭa viyambhaṇaṁ ti. taō maē cintiyaṁ. aha kiṁ puṇa imaṁ, ahavā kimaṇēṇa viruddhavatthuvisaraṇaṁ ālōciēṇaṁ।
