purisa, dinnaṁ taē jīviyaṁ mama samīhiyasaṁpāyaṇēṇa rāyaüttassa, tā kiṁ tē karēmi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kayaṁ tē karaṇijja; gaccha
samīhiyaṁ saṁpāḍēhi. taō hēmakuṇḍalēṇa ‘ahō sē mahāṇubhāvaya’ tti cintiya paratyaṁ karejjāsi tti bhaṇiūṇa dinnaṁ ōsahivalaya
khaṇḍaṁ. paṇayabhaṅgabhīruttaṇēṇa gahiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. gaō vijjāharō, āgō ya dharaṇō niyayasatthaṁ. aïkantā kaïvi diyahā.
annayā ya girin itīraṁmi samāvāsiē satthē gavalajalayavaṇṇā vellinivaḍuddha kēsahārā bakkaladdhanivasaṇā kaṇṇiyakōḍaṇḍavāva
ḍaggahatthā suṇayavandrasaṁgayā sadukkhaṁ ruyamāṇā diṭṭhā dharaṇēṇa nāidūragāmiṇā savarajuvāṇaya tti. sadāviyā ṇēṇa pucchiyā ya. bhō
kiṁnimittaṁ ruyaha tti. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ajja, atthi amhāṇaṁ kālasēṇō nāma pallīvaī ।
jassa iha vimhiyāō sattiniyāṇāṇi cintayantīō
na samalliyanti duggaṁ paracakkabhaē vi vāhīō
ēkasaraghāyaladdhā jassa ya karikumbhadāraṇēkarasā. na vihalantasarīrā gacchanti paya pi kēsariṇō.
sō khu kēsarī āgō tti āyaṇṇiya ghettūṇa kordaṇḍaṁ kaṇṇiyasaraṁca ēgāgī cēva niggō pallīō. na diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa naggō
hapāyavantariō kēsarī. gaō tassa samīvaṁ. gahiō ya ṇēṇa paṭṭhidēsē. vāvāiō tēṇa valiūṇa kaṭṭāraraṇa kēsarī. tēṇa vi ya sē
tōḍiyaṁ uttimaṅgakhaṇḍaṁ. taō sō ‘natthi mē jīviyaṁ’ ti mannamāṇō jalaṇapavēsaṁ kāumāradō. muṇiō sē ēsa vuttantō rōhiṇīē.

taō sā vi āvanasattā taṁ cēva kāuṁ vavasiyā, vāriyā vi pallīvaïṇā na viramaï ti. taō tēṇa pēsiyā amhē tīē saṁdhāraṇatthaṁ
piuṇō sē āṇayaṇanimittaṁ. vīrarasapahāṇō khu sō sayaṇavacchalō ya. tā na yāṇāmō, kiṁ paḍivajismaï tti. mahādukkhapīḍiyā
asamatthā ya dhariuṁ imaṁ sōyāirēya avijamāṇōvāyā ya paḍijiūṇa itthiyābhāva kēvalaṁ ruyamha. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiya. bhaddā, alaṁ
sōēṇa. daṁsēhi mē taṁ pallīvaī. kayāi jīvāvēmi ahayaṁ. taō calaṇēsu nivaḍi ūṇa harisavasupphullalōyaṇēhiṁ jaṁpiyaṁ savarēhiṁ.
ēvaṁ tuma dēvāvayārō viya āgaīē. tā tumaṁ cēva samatthō si dēvaṁ samāsāsēuṁ. annaṁ ca. jaï amhēsu aṇuggahabuddhī ajassa,
tā turiyaṁ gacchaü ajō; mā tassa mahāṇubhāvassa acāhiyaṁ bhavē. taō ghettaṇa vijjāharaviiṇṇaṁ ōsahivalayaṁ āruhiya vēsaraṁ kaïvaya
niyapurisaparivāriō turiyaturiyaṁ gaō satyavāhaputtō. divō ya tēṇaṁ naggōhapāyavatalammi ciyagāsanasaṁṭhiō ruhiradhārāparisitta
gattō siṇēhasāramasadaṁ ca rōvamāṇīē jāyāē saṁgaō kālasēṇō. nivēiō sē vuttantō savarajuvāṇaēṇa. abbhuṭṭhamāṇō ya mucchāni
mīliyalōyaṇō nivaḍiō dharaṇibaḍhē. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. udayamudayaṁ ti. tō āṇīyamudayaṁ naïliṇipattēṇaṁ. ṭhūḍhamōsahivalayaṁ dāū
ṇamuttimaṅgakhaṇḍaṁ. sittō ya ṇēṇē, jāva acintayāē ōsahipahāvassa puvvarūvāō vi ahiyayaraṁ dasaṇīō alakkhijjamāṇavaṇavi
bhāō uḍhiō kālasēṇō. tuṭṭā ya sē ghariṇī saha pariyaṇēṇa. calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. anja, piyayamājī yarakkhaṇēṇaṁ
saṁpāḍiyamahāpaōyaṇā tuha santiyā pāṇā; kimettha avaraṁ bhagīya:. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. sabbasāhāraṇā cēva mahāpurisa, pāṇā havanti.
kimetya ahiyaṁ. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. tā āisaü ajō, jaṁ maē kāyanvaṁ ti. dharaṇēga bhaṇiyaṁ. mahāpurisō khu tuma; tā kiṁ
avaraṁ bhaṇīyaï tahā vi sattēsu dayā. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ parivajiyā jāvajīvamēva maē ajjavayaṇēga pāraddhī. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ—

aïkkantā kaïvi diyahā aṇavasyapayāṇaēṇa. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa pakkhasandhīē uvavāsahiēṇaṁ āyāmuhīsannivēsammi āvāsiē satthē
jaracīranivasaṇō gēruyavilittasavvagattō khandhadēsārōviyatikkhaliō acōrō cēva cōrō tti kariya gahiō vajjantavirasaḍiṇḍima
vajjhatthāmaṁ nīyamāṇō caṇḍālajuvāṇō tti. tēṇa vi ya mahantaṁ satthamavalōiya suddhayāē āsayassa vallahayāē jīviyassa tassa samī
vaṁmi cēva mahayā sadēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ. bhō bhō satthiyā, suṇēha tumbhē. mahāsaranivāsī mōriō nāma caṇḍālō ahaṁ, kāraṇēṇa ya kusatthalaṁ
payaṭṭō, vippaladdhabuddhīhi ya daṇḍavāsiēhi apecchiūṇa cōrē adōsayārī cēva mandabhāgō gihībhō mhi. tā mōyāvēha, bhō mōyā
vēhaḥ saraṇāgō ahaṁ ajjāṇaṁ. annaṁ ca, maraṇadukkhāō vi mē iyamanbhahiyaṁ, jaṁ tahāvihanikalaṅkapunyapurisajjiyassa jaïsassa viṇā
vi dōsēṇaṁ maïlaṇa tti. tā mōyāvēha, bhō mōyāvēha. tō suddhacittayāē cintiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. ṇa khalu dōsayārī ēvaṁ jaṁpaï. karuṇā
pavannēṇa bhaṇiyā ṇēṇa ārakkhiyā. bhō bhō kulaüttayā, mama karaṇa vihīraha muhuttayaṁ, jāva ēyamantarēṇa vinaviūṇa naravaī daviṇayāṇē
ṇāvi mōyāvēmi ēyaṁ. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā lahuṁ hōhi.’taō ghettūṇa narindadarisaṇanimittaṁ dīṇārasayasahassamullaṁ muttāhala
mālaṁ gaō naravaïsamīvaṁ. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa rāyā. sāhiūṇa vuttantaṁ vinattō caṇḍālamantarēṇa naravaī. kaō sē pasāō. dyasahiō ya
tassa mokkhaṇanimittaṁ āgaō tamuddēsaṁ. mōyāviō ēsō. ‘tumbhē imassa jīviyadāyaga’ tti bhaṇiūṇa pūiyā ārakkhiyā. dēvā
viūṇa pāhēyaṁ bhaṇiō ya caṇḍālō. bhadda, saṁpāḍēhi samīhiyaṁ. ‘ajja, mā tuha sā avasthā havaü, jīē maē ciya pōyaṇaṁ’ ti
bhaṇiūṇa [kaïyañjaliuḍō khiinimiyajāṇukarayalapnuttimaṅgō paṇamiūṇa satthavāhaputtaṁ] gaō caṇḍālō.

dharaïṇō vi ya kaïvayapayāṇarahiṁ pattō uttarāvahatilaya bhūyaṁ ayalaüraṁ nāma paṭṭaṇaṁ. diṭṭhō ya rāyā. bahumaniō tēṇaṁ. vibhāgasaṁpa
ttīē ya vikiṇiyamaṇēṇa bhaṇḍaṁ. samāsāiō advaïguṇō lābhō. ṭhiō tatthēva kayavikkayanimittaṁ cattāri māsē. puṇṇōyaēṇaṁ ca vidvattaṁ
pabhūyaṁ daviṇajāya. saṁkhāviyaṁ ca ṇēga, jāva atthi kōḍimettaṁ ti tō gahiyaṁ māyandisaṁvavahārōciyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ. bharāviō satthō.
payaṭṭō niyadēsāgamaṇanimittaṁ mahayā caḍayarēṇa.
païdiyahapayāṇēṇa ya savarabahū gēyasu (mu) hiyamayajūhaṁ. thēvadiyahēhi satyō pattō kāyambari aḍaviṁ.

lg.l: tīē vahiūṇa satyō tiṇṇi payāmāi pallalasamīvē
āvāsiūṇa tīrē sarassa majjhammi kīliūṇa muhaṁ
tō rayaṇīē satthō suttō dāūṇa thāṇāī
āvāē ciya khittā disō disaṁ hariṇajūha vya
tō vīrasēṇapamuhā savarā savvē puṇō vi miliūṇa
aha nijiō sa satyō kṣettaṇaō a sabarasēṇāē
payarō pivīliyāṇaṁ bhīmaṁ pi bhuyaṁgamaṁ ḍasaï
nijiṇiūṇa ya satthaṁ ritthaṁ ghettūṇa niravasēsaṁ pi
bandaṁ pi kiṁpi savarā uvaṭiyā kālasēṇassa

div.p:
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. ēvaṁ ritthaṁ satthāō dēva āṇīyaṁ bandaṁ ca kiṁpi thēvaṁ. saṁpaï dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. taō kālasēṇēṇa pucchiyā
bandayapurisā. bhō kuō ēsa satthō kasta yā santiō tti. etthantaraṁmi sīhakayapahārasaṁrōhaṇanimittaṁ satthavāhaputtēṇa saṁhāgaō
uvaladdhō pañcabhinnāō ṇēṇa saṁgamō nāma satyavāhaputtapurisō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhadda, kahiṁ tuma maē diṭṭhō tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. na
yāṇāmō, tuma cēva jāṇasi tti. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. avi āsi tumaṁ iō uttarāvahapayaṭṭassa mama pāṇapayāṇahēuṇō avināyanāmadhē
yassa satthavāhaputtassa samīvē. saṁgamēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. kō kahaṁ vā tuha pāṇapayāṇahēū. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. atthi iō aīyavari
saṁmi kayantēṇēva kēsariṇā kahaṁci kaṇṭhagayapāṇō ahaṁ kō āsi. taō iō uttarāvaha vaccamāṇa kēṇāvi satyavāhaputtēṇa na
yāṇāmō kahiṁci jīvāviō mhi. tā ēvaṁ majjha sō pāṇapayāṇahēu tti. taō sumariūṇa vuttantaṁ pañcabhiyāṇiūṇa kāla sēṇaṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ saṁgamēṇa. jaï ēvaṁ, tā āsi diṭṭhō tumaē. kālasēṇēṇa sabahumāṇamavaruṇḍiūṇa pucchiō saṁgamaō. bhadda, kahiṁ sō
satthavāhaputtō. taō bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ saṁgamaraṇa. bhō mahāpurisa, devyō viyāṇaī ti. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
kahaṁ viya. saṁgamaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa, ēsō khu tassa santiō cēva satthō. āvaḍiē ya kōdaṇḍasarasahāō dihō maē sabarasaṁmuhaṁ
dhāvamāṇō. tēō na saṁpayaṁ viyāṇāmi. taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa dīhaṁ ca nīsasiya ‘hā kayamakajja’ ti bhaṇiūṇa mōhamukgaō
kālasēṇō, vakalāṇilēṇa vīiō savarēhiṁ, laddhā cēyaṇā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. harē, na ettha kōi vāvāiō tti. abarēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ.
na vāvāiō, kēvalaṁ pahārīkō tti. taō nirūviyā paḍibaddhapurisā, na diṭṭhō ya dharaṇō. taō ēgattha ritthaṁ karēūṇa samā
sāsiūṇa satthaṁ paḍibaddhapurisāṇa ya vaṇakammamāisiya dharaṇagavēsaṇanimittaṁ payaṭṭāviyā disō disaṁ sabarapurisā. appaṇā vi yē
'hā duṭu kayaṁ’ ti cintayamāṇō gaō taṁ gavēsium̐. na diṭṭhō ya tēṇa dharaṇō. samāgaō satthaṁ. miliyā savvasabarā. nivēiyaṁ
ca ṇēhiṁ. dēva, na diṭṭhō tti. taō paraṁ sōgamukgaō kālasēṇō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa—

lg.l: jaha bhuyagassa vidinaṁ khīraṁ pi visattaṇamuvēi
dinā ya ṇēṇa pāṇā majjhaṁ jāyāē taha ya puttassa

div.p:
tā kiṁ ēiṇā ayālakusumaniggamēṇa viya nipphalēṇaṁ vāyāvittharēṇaṁ. bhō bhō satthiyā, bhō bhō sabarā, ēsā mahaṁ paīnnā.
jaï taṁ na ghaḍēmi ahaṁ imiṇā vihavēṇa pañcahi diṇēhiṁ. païsāmi suhuyahuyavahajālānivahami kiṁ bahuṇā.
ēvaṁ ca païnnaṁ kāūṇa kayaṁ kula dēvayāē kāyambarinivāsiṇīē ōvāiyaṁ.

lg.l: jaï taṁ mahāṇubhāvaṁ jīvantaṁ estha kahavi pecchissaṁ
damahi purisēhi bhayavaï tō tujjha baliṁ karissāmi

div.p:
ēvaṁ ca ōvāiyaṁ kāūṇa gahiyāṇēyadivasapāhēyā paṭṭaviyā dharaṇagavēsaṇanimittaṁ disō disaṁ sabarā. appaṇā vi ya añcantavi
maṇadummaṇō gaō taṁ gavēsiuṁ.

sō puṇa dharaṇō viṇijjiē satthē ‘na estha annō uvāō’ ti cintiūṇa ōsahivalayamettaritthō ghettūṇa lacchi palāṇō piṭṭaō
mē kammapariṇaī; jēṇa piyayamāē vi īīsī avastha tti. lacchīē cintayaṁ. kilēsō vi mē bahumō cēva ēyassa āvaīē. gaviḍhaṁ
dharaṇēṇa lacchīē pāṇasaṁdhāraṇanimitta phalōvayaṁ, na uṇa laddhati. aïkkantō vāsarō. pasunāī pallavasattharē. aïkantā rayaṇī.
(ugaō aṁsumālī. taō) biiyadiyahē ya jāmamettasēsē vāsarē khudāpivāsāhibhūyā naggōhapāyavacchāyāē nivaḍiyā lacchī.
saṁmilliyamimīē lōyaṇajuyaṁ, vimūḍhā sē cēyaṇā, nivaḍiyaṁ tāluyaṁ, milāyaṁ vayaṇakamalaṁ. taō dharaṇēṇa cintiyaṁ. ahō dāruṇō
jīvalōgō, acintā kammapariṇaī, na mē jīviēṇāvi ettha sāhārō tti. tahāvi bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ saṁvāhiyaṁ sē aṅga. samāgayā
cēyaṇā. taō avyattasada jaṁpiyamimīē. ajjaütta, daḍhaṁ tisābhibhūya mhi. taō sō ‘sundari, dhīrā hōhi, āṇēmi udaya, taē tāra
ihēva ciṭṭiyavvaṁ’ ti bhaṇiūṇa ārūḍhō taruvaraṁ. palōiyaṁ udayaṁ, na uṇa ubaladdhaṁ. tō ‘udayamantarēṇaṁ na ēsā jīvaï’ tti tuvariṭṭiyaṁ
pecchiūṇa tīē ya kira rasēṇa saṁgayaṁ silībhūyamavi sōṇiyaṁ udayasāricchaṁ havaï’ ti tā ēēṇa sumariyapaōēṇaṁ ‘dami sē tuvariṭriyā
rasēṇaṁ saṁpāḍiōdayabhāvaṁ bāhusirāmokkhaṇēṇa niyamēva ruhiraṁ, imiṇā ya vaṇadavaggiṇā païūṇa chuhāvaṇōyaṇanimittaṁ ūrumaṁsaṁ ti; annahā
nissaṁsaya na hōi ēsā, vivanāē ya imīē ki mahaṁ jīviēṇaṁ; atthi ya mē vaṇasaṁ gēhaṇaṁ ōsahivalayaṁ, tēṇa ruhirasaṁgaraṇēva avaṇīyavaṇa
vēyaṇō imīē vi na dukkhakāraṇaṁ bhavissaï’ ti cintiūṇa niyacchuriyāē palāsapattapuḍayaṁmi saṁpāḍiyaṁ samīhiyaṁ ti. gaō ya tīsē
samīvaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya ēsā. sundari, saṁpannamudayaṁ, tā piyaü sundarī. piyaṁ ca ṇāē. samāsatyā ēsā. uvaṇīyaṁ ca sē maṁsaṁ.
bhaṇiyaṁ ṇēṇaṁ. sundari, payaṁ khu vaṇadavavivannasasayamaṁsaṁ, bhukkhiyā ya tuma, tā āhārasu ti. āhāriyamimīē.
taō kaṁci vēlaṁ gamēūṇa payaṭṭāṇi diṇayarāṇusārēṇa uttarāmuhaṁ. pattāṇi ya mahāsaraṁ nāma nayaraṁ. atthamiō sūriō tti na paï
hāṇi nayaraṁ. ṭhiyāṇi jakkhālaē. taō aïkantē jāmamettē jaṁpiyaṁ lacchīē. ajjaütta, tisābhibhūya mhi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. sundari,
ciṭṭha tumaṁ, āṇēmi udayaṁ naīō. gahiō tattha vāraō, āṇīyamudayaṁ. pīyaṁ ca ṇāē. pasuttō dharaṇō. carimajāmaṁmi ya viuddhā
lacchī. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. aṇukūlō mē vihī, jēṇa ēsō īisa avatthaṁ pāviō ti. tā kēṇa uvāēṇa iō vi ahiyayaraṁ sē havēja
bhaṇiyaṁ cārakkhiyanarēhiṁ. arē, appamattā havējaha. gahiō khu ēsō, kahiṁ vaccaï tti. suyaṁ ca ēyaṁ lacchīē, āyaṇṇiō caṇḍa
ruddapayasadō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhaviyabvaṁ ettha kāraṇēṇa. tā pucchāmi ēyaṁ, kiṁ puṇa imaṁ ti. kayāi pujanti mē maṇōrahā. taō
dīhasuṁkārapimuṇiyaṁ gayā caṇḍaruisamīvaṁ. pucchiō ēsō. bhadda, kō tuma, kiṁ vā ēē duvāradēsaṁmi imaṁ vāharanti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
mundari, alaṁ maē. kiṁ tu pucchāmi sundariṁ ‘avi atthi kahiṁci thēvamudayaṁ ti. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. atthi, jaï mē paōyaṇaṁ sāhēsi.
tō cintiyamaṇēṇaṁ. ahō dhīrayā itthiyāē, ahō sāhasaṁ, ahō vayaṇavinnāsō; tā bhaṇiyabamimīē pattabhūyāē tti. cintiūga
jaṁpiyaṁ caṇḍaruddēṇaṁ. sundari, mahantī khu ēsā kahā, na saṁkhēvaō kahiuṁ pārīyaï. tahāvi suṇa. saṁpayaṁ tāva takarō ahaṁ, narindagē
hāō gahēūṇa rayaṇabhaṇḍaṁ nīsarantō nayarāō uvaladdhō daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ. laggā mē maggaō bahuyā daṇḍavāsiyā, ēgō ya ahayaṁ.
khīṇagamaṇasattī ya ettha paviṭhṭhō tti. ēē ya andhārayāē rayaṇīē sāvekkhayāē jīviyassa sāhāraṇayāē paōyaṇassa ‘saṁpannaṁ ca ṇē
ahilasiyaṁ’ ti mannamāṇā duvāradēsabhāyaṁ nirumbhiūṇa daṇḍavāsiyā ēvaṁ bāharanti. taō ‘saṁpanna mē samīhiyaṁ, jaï. vihī aṇuva
vattissaï’ tti cintiūṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ lacchīē. bhadda, jaï ēvaṁ, tā alaṁ tē uvvēēṇaṁ; ahaṁ tuma jīvāvēmi, jaï mē vayaṇaṁ sugasi. caṇḍarudēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. āṇavēu sundarī. lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa. ahaṁ khu māyandīnivāsiṇō kattiyaseṭṭhissa dhūyā lacchimaī nāma pubbavēriēṇa vi ya
pariṇīyā dharaṇēṇa. aṇiṭō mē bhattārō, pasuttō ya ēsō ettha dēvaülē. tā aṅgīkarēhi maṁ, paricayasu mōsaṁ,pāvēu ēsō sakanmasarisaṁ
gatiṁ. pahāyāē rayaṇīē gihīēhiṁ tubbhēhiṁ naravaïsamakkha pi bhaṇissāmi ēhayaṁ ‘ēsō mahaṁ bhattārō, na uṇa ēsō’ tti. taō sō
aō viyōṇaï mē ‘taṁ agihīyanāma sabalōō cēva ettha mahiliyaṁ tti. lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā kō puṇa iha uvāō. caṇḍa
ruddēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. atthi ettha uvāō, jaï thēvamudayaṁ havaï. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kahaṁ viya.’caṇḍarudēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa. atthi mē cintā
maṇirayaṇabhūyā bhayavayā khandaruddēṇa viiṇṇā diṭṭhapaccayā paradidvimōhaṇī nāma cōraguliyā. tīē ya udayapaṁjōēṇa aniēhiṁ nayaṇēhi
sahassalōyaṇō dēvāhivō vi na pecchaï pāṇiṇaṁ, kimaṅga puṇa maccalōyavāsī jaṇō. lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā karhi guliyā।
caṇḍarudēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘uṭṭiyāē. lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā kiṁ na abjēsi. caṇḍarudēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘natthi udayaṁ ti. lacchīē
bhaṇiyaṁ ahaṁ dēmi.’caṇḍaruddēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘jīvāviō bhōīra.’dinnamudayaṁ. duvēhi pi añjiyāī lōyaṇāī. bhaṇiyā ya ēsā.

sundari, aṇīṇiē satyavāhaputtami na taē gantavyaṁ ti. paḍissuyamimīē. muka rayaṇabhaṇḍaṁ dharaṇasamīvē. ṭhiyāī ēgadēsē.
pahāyā rayaṇī. uḍhiō dharaṇō. mahiō ārakkhiēhi. nihāliyaṁ rayaṇabhaṇḍaṁ, uvaladdhaṁ ca tassa samīvē. taō nīṇiō dēva
ulāō. baddhō khu ēsō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. hanta kimēyaṁ ti. ahavā na kiṁci anna; avi ya paḍikūlassa vihiṇō viyambhiya ti.
paḍikūlē ya ēyaṁmi amayaṁ pi hu visaṁ, rajjū vi ya kiṇhasappō, goppaïyaṁ pi sāyarō, aṇū vi ya girī, mūsayavivaraṁ pi rasāyalaṁ, suyaṇō
vi dujaṇō, suō vi vaïirī, jāyā vi bhuyaṅgī, payāsō vi andhayāraṁ, khantī vi kōhō, mahavaṁ pi māṇō, ajjavaṁ pi māyā, saṁtōsō vi
lōhō, saccaṁ pi aliyaṁ, piyaṁ pi pharusaṁ, kalattaṁ pi (mittaṁ pi) vēriō ti. tā kiṁ imiṇā vi cintiēṇaṁ. ēyarasa vasavattiṇō na tīraē
annahā vaṭṭiuṁ. imāō vi ya kayatthaṇāō imaṁ mē ahiyaṁ bāhaï, jaṁ sā tavassiṇī adiṭṭhabandhuvirahā na dīsaï. ahavā varaṁ na diṭṭhā
cēva. mā sā vi mē saṁsaggikalaṅkasiyā imaṁ cēva pāvissaï tti. cintayantō nīō rāyaülaṁ. appatthāvō narindassa tti dhaïriō rāya
maggē. aïkantō vāsarō. avasarō ti kaliya nivēiō narindarasa. dēva, salottaō cēva māyāpaōyakusalō vāṇiyayavēsadhārī gahiō
mahābhuyaṅgō. saṁpayaṁ dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. taō rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kiṁ tēṇa, vāvāēha tti. nīō ṇēhiṁ pāṇavāḍayaṁ. samappiō rāyaülakamā
gayāṇaṁ vahaniōgakārīṇaṁ paccaïyapāṇāṇaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya ēē. harē, dēvō samāisaï ‘ēsa takarō vāvāiyavyō’ tti. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ
dēvō āṇavēi ti. samappiūṇa tēsiṁ gayā ḍaṁḍavāsiyā. bhaṇiyaṁ caṇḍālamayaharēṇa. harē, kassa vāvāyaṇamāsabāraō. caṇḍālēhi
bhaṇiyaṁ ‘mōriyassa.’tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. lahuṁ sadāvēha mōriya. sadāviō mōriō, āgaō ya. bhaṇiō mayaharēṇa. harē mōriya, ēsa
takarō dēvēṇa pēsiō vāvāiyavyō ti. tā nēūṇa masāṇabhūmi lahuṁ vāvāēhi. jāmamettāvasēsō ya vāsarō, ēhi avāvāiē māraya
ṇīē pamāō bhavissaï. mōriyaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ tuma bhaṇasi ti si samappiō mōriyayassa paccabhinnāō ya ṇēṇaṁ. ‘kahaṁ sō cēva ēsō
jīviyadāyaō mē satyavāhaputtō; ahō kaḍaṁ, imassa vi īīsī avastha’ ti cintiūṇa visaṇṇō mōriyō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ.
ahavā pāventi candadivāyarā vi muhuttamettaṁ gahakallōlāō āvaī. bahumaō ya mē sāmisālasamāēsō ēyassa daṁsaṇēṇaṁ. tā nēmi
tāva ēvaṁ masāṇabhūmi. jāṇāmi ya imāō jahaṭṭiyaṁ vunantaṁ. nīō masāṇabhūmi, chōḍiyā bandhā, calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇaṁ pucchiō ya
ṇēṇaṁ. anja, avi sumarēsima āyāmuhīē vimōiyaṁ. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, na muṭhṭha mumarēmi. mōriyaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kaha ṇa sumarēsi,
jō bhavaṁ viya acōrō cēva ‘cōrō’ tti kaliya gahiō ahaṁ mahayā daviṇajāēṇa pecchiūṇa naravaī taē vimōiō ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
thēvamēyaṁ. mōriēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. tā sāhēu ajō, kahaṁ puṇa ajassa īisī atya tti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, devvaṁ ettha pucchasu
tti. mōriēṇa cintiyaṁ. na ettha kālakkhēvēṇa pēōyaṇaṁ, ahimāṇī ya ēsō kaha kēhaïsmaï. kiṁ vā kahiēṇaṁ. vicittāṇi vihiṇō
vilasiyāṇi. tā kiṁ mamēiṇā nibbandhēṇa. ahavā kahiyaṁ cēvāṇēṇa paramatthaō ‘devvaṁ pucchasu’ tti bhaṇamāṇēṇa. tā imaṁ tāva ettha patta
yālaṁ, jaṁ ēsō ibhō lahuṁ visajjīyaï tti. cintiūṇa bhaṇiō khu ēsō. anja, kiṁ bahuṇā jaṁpiēṇa; mottūṇa visāyaṁ lahuṁ avaïkamasu.
dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhada, na khalu ahaṁ paramāṇēhiṁ attaṇō pāṇē rakkhēmi. tā vāvāēhi maṁ, niddēsakārī khu tuma ti. mōriēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
ajja, alaṁ majjha pāṇaviṇāsapaṅkāē. sattapurisō khu ēsa rāyā, na amhāṇaṁ abarāhasaē vi ya pāṇavārvattiṁ karēi. agacchamāṇē ya
ajjē avassamahamappāṇaṁ vāvāēmi. tā gaccha u ajō. taō ‘nathi avisaō sajaṇasiṇēhassa’ tti cintiūṇa jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇaṁ. bhadda,
jaï ēvaṁ, tā avakamāmi. mōriēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. aṇuggihī bhō mhi. daṁsiō sē panthō. paṇamiūṇa ya niyattō mōriō. mittōvarō
hēṇa palāṇō dharaṇō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. aha kahiṁ puṇa sā muddhamayalōyaṇā bhavissaï. nūṇamuṁvarōhasīlayāē maṁ aṇuchaviya pāsavaṇani
mittamuṭṭhiyā kēṇāvi takkarēṇaṁ samāsāiyā bhavē, nīyā ya ṇēṇaṁ, mama viṇāsāsaṅkiṇīē na jaṁpiyamimīē; annahā kahaṁ na diṭṭa tti.
adaṁsaṇēṇaṁ ca tīsē vihalamēva pāṇalāhaṁ mannāmi tti. cintayantō payaṭṭō gavēsiuṁ. pahāō ujjuvāliyāē.
iō ya sō caṇḍaruddō tō dēvaülāō abakamiūṇa gaō ujjuvāliyaṁ naī. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō dāruṇayā ityivaggassa,
jamēsā ēgapaē cēva mahāvasaṇapāyālaṁmi pakkhiviya bhattāraṁ aṇavekkhiūṇa niyakulaṁ siviṇayaṁmi vi adiṭṭhapuvvēṇa maē saha payaṭṭa tti.

vijju va cañcalāō mahilāu visaṁ va pamuhamahurāō. maccu va nigdhiṇāō pāvaṁ piva vajaṇijāō.
tā alaṁ mē ēyāē; mā majjha pi iṇamēva saṁpāḍaïssaï ti cintiūṇa ghettūṇamaṅgalaggaṁ suvaṇayaṁ paricattā khu ēsā.
cintiyaṁ ca tīē. tahāvi sōhaṇaṁ cetra ēyaṁ, jaṁ sō vācāiō ti. tā gacchāmi annattha. payaṭṭā naītīrāē. diṭṭhā dharaṇēṇa
hārasavasupphullalōyaṇaṇaṁ. pucchiyā ēsā. sundāra, kuō tuma ti. tī sārō viu payattā bhaṇiyā ya ṇaṇaṁ. sundāra, mā rāva, iisī
ēsa saṁsārō. āvayābhāyaṇaṁ khu ettha pāṇiṇō. tā alaṁ visāraṇa. dhannō ya ahayaṁ, jēṇa tumaṁ saṁpatta tti. taō tīē bhaṇiyaṁ.
ajjaütta, pāsavaṇanimittamuṭṭhiyā gahiyā takaraṇa, itthīsahavāō ajjaüttasiṇēhāisaraṇa ya na kiṁpi vāhariyaṁ. ‘aṇicchamāṇī ya
itthiyā na gheppaḍa’ tti kariya musiūṇa ujjhiyā ihaī. annaṁ ca. takkarakayatthaṇāō vi mē ēyaṁ ahiyayaraṁ bāhaï, jaṁ tuma īisiṁ avattha
mukgō diṭṭhō tti. taō ‘na anahā mē viyappiyaṁ’ ti cintiūga bhaṇiyaṁ dharaṇēṇaṁ. sundari, thēmiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ. na mē uvvēvakāriṇō
iyēmavatthā tuha daṁsaṇēṇaṁ. tā kiṁ ēiṇā. ēhi, gacchamha. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. ahō mē pāvapariṇaī, kayantamuhāō viēsa āgaotti.
payaṭṭā ēsā. samāgayāiṁ viyāraüraṁ nāma sannivēsaṁ. kayā pāṇavittī. atyamiō sariō. aïvāhiyārayaṇī. cintiyaṁ dharaṇēṇaṁ. ēvaṁ
kayantābhibhūyassa na juttamiha ciṭṭhiuṁ. tā parāṇēmi tāva ēvaṁ dantaüranivāsiṇō khandadēvamāulassa samīvaṁ pacchā jahājuttaṁ
karessāmi tti. sāhiyaṁ lacchīē. bahumayaṁ ca tīē. payaṭṭāṇi dantaüraṁ.

iō ya na laddhō satthavāhaputtō tti saṁjāyasōēṇa paccaïyaniyayapurisāṇa samappiō satthō kālasēṇēṇa. bhaṇiyā ya ēē. harē,
pāviyanvō tumhēhiṁ ēsa mahāṇubhāvassa gurūṇaṁ ti. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. jaï vi na saṁpannamōvāiyaṁ, tahāvi kāyambarīē jahā bhaṇiya
mēva balivihāṇaṁ kāūṇa païnnaṁ pi tāva saphalaṁ karēmi tti. pēsiyā balipurisanimittaṁ sabarapurisā. karāviyā kāyambarīē pūyā,
majjiō girinaīē, parihiyāī vakalāī, kayā kaṇavīramuṇḍamālā, rayāviyā mahāmahallakaṭēhim̐ ciyā, payaṭṭō caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ.
iō ya dantaürapatthiō biīyadiyahami aruṇuggamē cēva kāyambari paribhamantēhiṁ samāsāiō satyavāhaputtō kālasēṇasabarēhiṁ ।
baddhō vallirajjūē. payaṭṭāviō samahiliō cēva caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ. gaō thēvaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ. didvaṁ ca ṇēṇa caṇḍiyāyayaṇapāsamaṇḍalaṁ.
kīisaṁ. parisaḍiyajiṇṇarukkhagudēhiyakhaïyakaṭṭhasaṁghāyasaṁkulaṁ bhuyaṅgamihuṇasaṇāhaviyaḍavammīyaṁ parattamuhalasaü gagaṇakayavamālaṁ viyaḍata
rukhandhabahalaruhirāyaḍḍiyatikhalasaṁghāyaṁ pāyavasāhāvabaddhamahisamēsamuhapucchakhurasiṅgasirōharācīranivahaṁ ti. avi ya—

kōdaṇḍakhaggaghaṇṭayamahisāsurapucchavāvaḍakarāē. kaccāiṇipaḍimāē vihūsiyaṁ ghōrarūvāē.
tō taṁ
daṭṭhūṇa cintiyaṁ dharaṇēṇaṁ

lg.l: sakkā sīhassa vaṇē palāiuṁ vāraṇassa ya tahēva
sukayassa dukkayassa ya bhaṇa kattha palāiuṁ sakkā
ēvaṁ ca cintayantō chūḍhō savarēhi vandramajhami
aha bandhiūṇa gāḍhaṁ puvvaviruddhēhi va khalē hi

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi samāgaō caṇḍiyāyayaṇaṁ kālasēṇō, paḍiō caṇḍiyāē calaṇēsu, bhaṇiyaṁ ca sagaggayakkharaṁ. bhayavaï, jaï vi na kaō
taē mahaṁ pasāō, tahāvi jammantarē vi jahā na ēvaṁ dukkhabhāyaṇaṁ havāmi, tahā tara kāyavvaṁ ti. ‘satthavāhaputtāvayārakaraṇēṇa jaṁ mahaṁ
dukkhaṁ, taṁ tumaṁ cēva jāṇasi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa bhaṇiō kuraṅgaō. harē, nivēēhi bhayavaīē baliṁ. tēṇa jaṁ dēvō āṇāvēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa
khittō ṇēṇa kēsēsu kaḍḍiūṇa bhayaparāyattasadhagattō duggilaō nāma lēhavāhaō. ḍhōiyaṁ rattacandaṇasaṇāhaṁ bhāyaṇaṁ. viyagapāgō viva
cacciō duggilaō. kālasēṇēṇa kaḍḍiyaṁ vijjuchaḍāḍōvabhāsura maṇḍalaggaṁ, vāhiyaṁ īsi niyabhuyāsiharē. bhaginī va duggilō. bhadda,
sudihēṁ jīvalōyaṁ karēhi. saggaṁ taē gantavyaṁ, jīviyaṁ mōtūṇa kiṁ vā tē saṁpāḍiyaü tti. taō bhayābhibhūēṇa na jaṁpiyaṁ duggila
ēṇaṁ. puṇō vi bhaṇiō, puṇō vi na jaṁpiyaṁ ti. aṇāvūriyamaṇōrahō ya na vāvāijjaï tti visaṇō kālasēgō. taṁ ca daṭṭaṇa cintiyaṁ
dharaṇēṇaṁ. hanta maē vi ēvaṁ mariyavyaṁ ti. tā varaṁ apecchiūṇa dīṇasattaghāyaṁ kāūṇa khaṇamettapāṇaparirakkhaṇēṇa imasma upayāraṁ paḍhama
vivannō mhi. vāvaḍō ya mē viṇivāyakaraṇēsu kayantō,ēsō vi nivvuō havaü ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiō kuraṅgaō. bhadda,nivēēhi ēyassa
mahāpurisassa, jahā ‘bhayavisaṇṇō khu ēpō tabassī, tā kiṁ ēiṇā;aṇabhinnō ahaṁ patthaṇāē; tahāvi bhavaō paōyaṇaṁ pasāhaṇīyaṁ cēva
patthēmi ēgaṁ patthaṇaṁ’ ti. nivēiyaṁ kālasēṇassa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. jīviyaṁ mottūṇa patthēu bhahō ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mōtūṇa ēvaṁ
maṁvāyāpasutti. tō bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇa ahē kō uṇa ēsō parōvayāratalicchayāē appāṇayaṁ vāvāyaṇē samappēi sumarāvēi mē sattha
vāhaputtaṁti bhaṇiūṇa mucchiō kālasēṇō, nivaḍiō dharaṇivaṭhē. vījiō kisōraēṇa. laddhā cēyaṇā. bhaṇiyaṁ ṇēṇa. bhadda
kisōraya, nirūvēhi ēyaṁ, kō uṇa ēsō mahāṇubhāvō satyavāha puttassa cēṭiyaṁ aṇukarēi. nirūviūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kisōraēṇa. bhō
imāē aṇamnasarisīē āgiīē sō cēvē mē paḍihāyaï tti. tā sayamēva nirūvēu pallīvaī. taō harisavisāyagambhiṇaṁ nirūviō
ṇēṇa pañcabhinnāō ya. chorḍiyā sē bandhā. khaggaṁ mottūṇa niviḍiō calaṇēsu. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. satthavāhaputta, khamiyanyō maha
avarāhō. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō mahāpurisa, ahippēyaphalasāhaṇēṇa guṇō khu ēsō, kahamavarāhō tti kālasēṇēṇa cintiyaṁ. nūṇaṁ
na ēsa mēṁ paccabhijāṇaï tti, tēṇa ēvaṁ mantēi tā payāsēmi sē attāṇayaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. satyavāha putta, kiṁ tē ahippēyaṁ phalaṁ
sāhiya ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, patthuē vāvāyaṇē ēyaṁ ujjhiūga mamēva maraṇamaṇōrahāvūraṇaṁ ti. kālasēṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. satthavāha
putta, kiṁ tē imassa nivvēyāisayassa maraṇavavasāyassa kāraṇaṁ. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō mahāpurisa, alamiyāṇi ēyāē kahāē. saṁpāḍēu
bhavaṁ attaṇō samīhiyaṁ ti. taō ‘ahō sē mahāṇubhāvaya’ ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kālasēṇēṇa. satthavāhaputta, na sumarēsi maṁ sī haviṇi
vāiyaṁ nāgapōyayaṁ piva attaṇō viṇāsanimittaṁ attaṇā cēva jīvāviūṇa kayagghasēharayabhūyaṁ kālasēṇaṁ. jīvāvibhō ahaṁ taē. maē puṇa
kaō tujha paccuvayārō; viōiō tubhaṁ sasthāō, pāviō ya appatta puvvaṁ imaṁ īisiṁ avatthaṁ ti. taō sumariūṇa puvyavuttantaṁ pañca
hiyāṇiūṇa ya kālasēṇaṁ lajāvaṇayavaṣaṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. bhō mahāpurisa, kō ahaṁ jīvāviyavvassa, tuha cēva puṇṇapariṇaī ēsa
tti. kahaṁ ca tumaṁ kayagyō, jō diṭṭametta vi jaṇē annāṇō kiṁpi kāūṇa ēvaṁ khijjasi tti. tā alamēiṇā. aha kiṁ puṇa imaṁ
patthuyaṁ ti. taō la jāparāhīṇēṇa na jaṁpiyaṁ kālasēṇēṇa. sāhiyaṁ ca niravasēsamēva saṁgamadaṁsaṇāiyaṁ niyapāṇapariccāyavavasāyāva
sāṇaṁ ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti kisōraēṇaṁ. taō ‘ahō sē kayannuyā, ahō thirasiṇēhayā, ahō mahāṇubhāvaya’ ti cintiūṇa jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa.
bhō mahāpurisa, juttamēva gurudēvapūyaṇaṁ pupphabaligandhacandaṇēhiṁ, na uṇa pāṇighāēṇaṁ. avi ya—

lg.l: hōjā jalē vijalaṇōṁ hōjā khīraṁ pi gōvisāṇāō
amayarasō vi. visāō na ya hiṁsāō havaï dhammō
dāūṇa ya ahiōyaṁ dēvayajannāṇa jē khalu abhavyā
ghāyanti jiyasayāī pāventi duhāi tē naraē

div.p:
tā virama ēyāō vavasāyāō ti. kālasēgēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ tuma āṇavēsitti. taō gāmadēsalūḍaṇē annābhāvē ya bhavakhaṇanimittaṁ
ca mottūṇa kō aṇēṇa kāyambariaḍa vipaviṭṭhassa satthassa pāṇighāyaṇassa jāvajjīvibhō niyamō. phullabaligandhacandaṇēhiṁ pūiyā
dēvayā. nīō ṇēṇa sayalabandasaṁgaō niyagēhamēva dharaṇō. kaō uciō uvayārō.

lg.l: dantā ya gayavarāṇaṁ camarāṇi ya jaccacamarīṇaṁ
dhettūṇa ya taṁ ritthaṁ dāūṇa ya kiṁci bandayāṇaṁ pi

div.p:
dharaṇō vi kālasēṇapīīē tatva kaṁci kālaṁ gamēūṇa visajjiō kālasēṇēṇa, payaṭṭō niyayapuri, pattō ya kālakkamēṇaṁ.
[vināō ammāpiīhiṁ nāyarēhi ya] parituṭṭhō sē guruyaṇō. niggayā nayarimahantayā. paccuvekkhiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ saṁkhiyaṁ ca mollēṇaṁ
nāva savāyā kōḍi tti. iō aïkkantē addhamāsē āgaō dēvanandī. tassa vi ya niggayā nayarimahantayā. paccuvekkhiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ
saṁkhiyaṁ ca ‘mollēṇaṁ jāva addhakōḍi ti. taō viliō dēvanandī. samaṇiyaṁ paürabhaṇḍamollaṁ. sē sēṇa ya paramagōrahasaṁpāyaṇēṇa
saphalaṁ purisabhāvamavaṇuhavantassa āgayā mayaṇatērasī. bhaṇiō ya ēsō nayarimahantarahiṁ ‘nīsarēhi rahabaraṁ.’dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ—
alaṁ bālakīḍāē. pasaṁsiō nayarimahanta ēhiṁ.

aïkāntō ya sē kōi kālō paratthasaṁpāyaṇasuhamaṇuhavantassa. niōiyapāyaṁ ca ṇēṇa niyabhuōbajjiyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ. samuppanā ya sē
cintā. avassamēva purisēṇa uttamakulapamaēṇa tivaggō sēviyabyō. taṁ jahā, dhammō atthō kāmō ya. tattha aparicattasavyasaṁgēṇa attha
pahāṇēṇa hōyavvaṁ ti. tō cēva tassa duvē saṁpanjanti. taṁ jahā, dhammō ya kāmō ya. annaṁ ca, ēsa atthō nāma mahantaṁ dēvayārūvaṁ ।
ēsō khu purisassa bahumāṇaṁ vaïddhāvēi, gōvaṁ jaṇēi, mahagghayaṁ uppāēi, sōhaggaṁ karēi, chāyāmāvahaï, kulaṁ payāsēi, rūvaṁ payāsēi, buddhi
payāsēi. atthavantō hi purisā adentā vi lōyāṇaṁ salāhaṇijjā havanti. jaṁ cetra karenti, taṁ caïva tēsiṁ asōhaṇaṁ pi sōhaṇaṁ vaṇṇi
jaē. abhaggapaṇaïpatthaṇaṁ ca aṇuvanti paratthasaṁpāyaṇamuhaṁ. tā jaï vi ēsa maha puncapurisōvajjiō aïpabhūō atthi, tahāvi alaṁ
tēṇa gurupaṇaïṇisamāṇēṇa. tā annaṁ uvajiṇēmi, gacchāmi disāvaṇijjēṇaṁ ti. cintiūga vinattā jaṇaṇijaṇayā. aṇumaniyō
ya ṇēhiṁ gaō mahayā satyēṇaṁ samahiliō puncasamuddataḍaniviṭuṁ vē jayanti nāma nayariṁ. diṭṭhō naravaī. bahumanniō ya ṇēṇaṁ.
niōiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, na samāsāiō iṭṭhalābhō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. samāgaō cēva jalanihitaḍaṁ. tā gacchāmi tāva paratīraṁ. tattha mē
gayassa kayāi ahilasiyapaōyaṇasiddhī bhavissaï tti. gahiya paratīragāmiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ. saṁjattiyaṁ pavahaṇaṁ. pasatthatihikaraṇajōgēṇa
niggaō nayarīō, gaō samuddatīraṁ, pūiō atthijagō, agghiō jalanihī. tō candiūṇa gurudēvaē uvārūḍhō jāṇavattaṁ.
āgaḍiyāō vēgahāriṇīō silāō, pūriō siyavaḍō, vimukkaṁ jāṇavataṁ, gammaē cīṇadīvaṁ ti.

annayā ya aïkkantēsu kaïvayadiṇēsu kusalapurisavimukkē viya nārāē vahantē jāṇavattē gayaṇayalamajjhasaṁhiē diṇayaraṁmi āgampa
yantō viya mēiṇiṁ dhuṇantō viya samudaṁ ummūlantō viya kula lajālāṇi payaṭṭō māruō. tō ēravaṇō viya gulagulentō paḍisotta
vāhiyasariyāmuhaṁ khuhiō mahaṇṇavō, visaṇṇā nijāmagā. taō samaṁ gamaṇārambhēṇa ōsāriō siyavaḍō, jīviyāsā viya vimukkā naṅga
rasilā nijāmaēhiṁ. tahāvi ya tattha kaści vēlaṁ gamēūṇa vivannaṁ jāṇavattaṁ. jīviyasēsayāē samāsāiyaṁ phaïlagaṁ, ahōrattēṇa laḍiūṇa
jalanihiṁ suvaṇṇadīvami laggō satyavāhaputtō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō pariṇaī dēivvassa. na yāṇāmi avatthaṁ piyayamāē pariyaṇassa
ya. avā kiṁ visāēṇaṁ. ēsō cēva etya pamāṇaṁ ti. taō kayalaphalēhiṁ saṁpāiyā pāṇavittī. atthamiō sūriō.
kaō ṇēṇa pallavasattharō, sīyāvaṇayaṇatthaṁ ca araṇīpaōēṇa pāḍiō jalaṇō. taïppiūga kaṁci kālaṁ paṇamiūṇa gurudēvaē ya
pasuttō ēsō. aïkantā rayaṇī, viuddhō ya. uggō asumālī. diṭṭhaṁ ca ṇēṇa taṁ jalaṇacchikkaṁ savvamēva suvaṇṇīhūyaṁ dhaïraṇikhaḍaṁ.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō ēvaṁ khu dhāukhēta; tā pāḍēmi ettha suvaṇayaṁ ti. kayāō īṭṭayāō, aṅkiyāō dharaṇanāmaēṇa, ullayāṇaṁ
cēva saṁpāiyā saṁpuḍā, pakkā ya suvaṇṇamayā jāyā. ēvaṁ ca kayā ṇēṇa dasa īṭṭayasaṁpuḍasahassā. nibaddhō bhinnapōyaddhaō.

iō ya cīṇāō cēva suvayaṇasatthavāhaputtasantiyaṁ asārabhaṇḍabhariyaṁ anadīvalaggasaṁpāviyalacchisahiyaṁ dēvaüragāmiyaṁ samāgayaṁ
tamuddēsaṁ jāṇavattaṁ. diṭṭhō ya bhinnapōyaddhō satyavāhēṇaṁ. lambiyā ya naṅgarā suvayaṇāēsēṇa. samāgayā nijāmagā. diṭṭhō ya ṇēhi
dharaṇō bhaṇiō ya. bhō bhō mahāpurisa, ēsō cīṇavatthavvagō dēvaüragāmī jāṇavattasaṁṭhiō suvayaṇō nāma sasthavāhaputtō bhaṇaï,
jahā ēhi kūlaṁ gacchamha. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, kiṁbhaṇḍabhariyaṁ khu taṁ jāṇavataṁ. nijāmarahiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, vihivasēṇa pari
vaḍiō khu ēsō satyavāhaputtō vihavēṇa, na uṇa pōrusēṇaṁ. tā na suṭu sārabhaṇḍabhariyaṁ ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā aṇu
varōhēṇaṁ āgacchaü aïttiyaṁ bhūmi satthavāhaputtō. nivēiyaṁ suvayaṇassa. āgaō ya ēsō, bhaṇiō dharaṇēṇa. satthavāhaputta, na taē
kuppiyavvaṁ, paōyaṇaṁ udisiūṇa kiṁci pucchāmi tti. suvayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṇāu ajō. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kē ttiyassa tē
daviṇajāyassa jāṇavataṁmi ritthaṁ. sutrayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, dēvassa paḍikūlayāē viṇaṭō khu ahayaṁ. tahāvi ‘purisayārō na
mottavyō’ tti ucchāhamettabhaṇḍamollō suvaṇṇasahassamettassa ghettūṇa kiṁpi bhaṇḍaṁ dēvaüraṁ payaṭṭō mhi. dharaṇēga bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ,
tā paricaya taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, bharēhi mē santiyamsa suvaṣṇassa jāṇavataṁ; kūlapattassa ya bhavō payacchissaṁ suvaṇṇalakkhaṁ ti. suvayaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. kiṁ suvaṇṇalakkhēṇa, tumaṁ cēva bahuō ti. ujhiyaṁ puvvabhaṇḍaṁ. bhariyaṁ suvaṇṇassa. ṭhāviyā saṁkhā. uvārūḍhō dharaṇō.
diṭṭhā ya ṇēṇa lacchī. parituṭṭhō ēsa hiyaēṇaṁ dūmiyā ya ēsā. ‘jāyā mahaṁ ēsa’ ti sāhiyaṁ suvayaṇassa dharaṇēṇaṁ. āṇandiō
ēsō. payarṭa jāṇavattaṁ. gayaṁ pañcajōyaṇamettaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi gayaṇayalacāriṇī vēgāgamaṇēṇāgampayannī samudaṁ ayālavijjū viya asuhayā lōyaṇāṇaṁ ‘arē rē dusatthavāhaputta,
akaōvayārō aṇaṇujāṇiyaṁ maē karhi imaṁ maīyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ geṇhiūṇa gacchasi tti bhaṇamāṇī suṣaṇṇadīvasāmiṇī samāgayā
suvaṇṇanāmā vāṇamaṁtarī. dhariyaṁ jāṇavataṁ, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhō bhō nijāmayā, adāūṇa purisabaliṁ na ettha atthō gheppaï tā
purisabaliṁ vā dēha, atthaṁ vā muyaha, vāvāēmi vā ahayaṁ’ ti dharaṇēga cintiyaṁ. ahō ṇu khalu muyāviō niyayaritthaṁ suvayaṇō,
uvayārī ya ēsō lacchī saṁpāyaṇēṇa, ēsā ya ēvaṁ bhaṇāi. tā imaṁ etya pattayālaṁ, ahamēva purisabalī havāmi tti. cintiūṇa
bhaṇiyā vāṇamaṁtarī. bhayavaï, ayāṇamāṇēṇa maē ēvaṁ kvasiyaṁ. tā pasīya. ahamēva ettha balipurisō; ma paḍicchasu tti. tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā ghattēhi appāṇayaṁ samuddē, jēṇa tē vāvāēmi tti. lacchīē cintiyaṁ. aṇuggihīyā bhayavaīē. taō dharaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. vayassa suvayaṇa, pāviyavvā taē lacchī maha gurūṇaṁti. bhaṇiūṇa pavāhiō appā. viddhō ya ṇāē sūlēṇa, nīō suvaṇṇa
dīvaṁ. uvasantā cāṇamaṁtarī. payarṭa jāṇavattaṁ dēvaürāhimuhaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi divō ya ēsō kaṇṭhagayapāṇō suvēlāō raṇadīvaṁ patthiēṇaṁ hēmakuṇḍalēṇaṁ, pañcabhinnāō ya ṇēṇa. puvapariciyā ya sā
hēmakuṇḍalassa vāṇamaṁtarī. taō ‘hā kimēyamaka jamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ ni bhaṇiūṇa mōyāviō vāṇamatarīō. puṣabhaṇiōsahivalayavaïyarēṇa
kayaṁ sē vaṇakammaṁ. jīviyasēsēṇa ya pannattō ēsō pañcabhinnāō ya ṇēṇa hēmakuṇḍalō. pucchiō dharaṇēṇaṁ lirivijayabuttantō. sāhiō
hēmakuṇḍalēṇa, jahā jīviō sō mahāṇubhāvō tti. parituṭṭhō dharaṇō. hēmakuṇḍalō ya ghettūṇa dharaṇaṁ payaṭṭō rayaṇadīvaṁ. pattō ya
ayaṅgagandhavvasundarījaṇāraddhamahuragēyaravāyaḍḍiyadinnāvahāṇanicalaṭṭhiyamayajūhaṁ dariyaṣaṇakōlaghōṇāhighāyaja jariyamahiyalucchaliya
mutthākasāyasurahigandhavāsiyadisāyakaṁ tīratarukhuḍiyakusumamayarandavāsiyāsēsavimalajaladullaliyarāyahaṁsāulasara pahassaliyaṁ maha
llatarusiharāvaḍiyakusumaniyaraciyavitthiṇṇabhūmimāgaṁ uddāmanāgavallīnivahasamāliṅgiyāsēsapūgaphalīsaṇḍaṁ viyaḍadhaṇa surahimandāra
mandirāradavijāhāmihuṇaraïsuhaṁ dariyavaṇahatthipīvarakarāyaḍḍaṇabhaggasamuttuṅgagalanta candaṇavaṇaṁ tīrāsanadviyaṣaṇatamālataruvī hiōhasi
yajalahijalaṁ taruṇataruviyaḍamaṇaharālavālayajalasahiyavivihavihaṁganiyaravāpūriuddēsaṁ siddhavijāharalamuttuṅgara yaṇagirimaṇāhaṁ dīvaṁ
bhagnasamuttuṅgagalacandanavana tīrāsannatthitaghanatamālāruvīthyupahasitajaladhijalaṁ taruṇataruvikaṭamanōharālavālajalamuhitavividhavihaṅgani
nāmēṇa rayaṇasāraṁ ti. avi ya—

kamalamahupāṇasēvaṇajaṇiyakalālāvamuhalabhamarēhiṁ. kayasāgayasammāṇō vdha aïṁgaō cūyatarusaṇḍaṁ.
uvaviṭhṭhō dīhiyātīraṁmi, vīsa miō muhuttayaṁ, gahiyāī sahayāraphalāī, majjiyaṁ dīhiyāē, kayā pāṇavittī. pucchiō hēmakuṇḍa
lēṇa dharaṇō. kahaṁ tuma imīē pāviō tti. sāhiō ṇēṇa jahaḍiō sayalavuttantō. hēmakuṇḍa lēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō sē kūrahiyayattaṇaṁ;
tā kiṁ ēiṇā, bhaṇa kiṁ tē karīyaü tti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kayaṁ sayalakaraṇijja; kiṁ tu dutthiyā mē jāyā, tā tīē saṁjōyaṁ mē karēhi।
tō ‘rayaṇagirīō pahāṇarayaṇasaṁjuyaṁ saṁjōēmi’ ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ hēmakuṇḍalēṇaṁ. karēmi saṁjōyaṁ, kiṁ tu atthi ihēva dīmi
rayaṇagirī nāma pavvayō. tattha sulōyaṇō nāma kinnarakumāraō mē mittō parivasaï. tā taṁ pecchiūṇa nēmi taṁ dēvaüramēva. tahiṁ
gayassa niyamēṇēva tīē saha saṁjōgō bhavissaï tti. paṁḍissuyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. tī ghettūṇa dharaṇaṁ payaṭṭō rayaṇapavvayaṁ.
pattō ya mahuramāruyamandandōlentakayalisaṁghāyaṁ. saṁghāyamiliyakipurisajakkhaparihattavaṇaraṇḍaṁ.

taō ya taṁ pāviūṇa mahāmahallu nurayaṇasiharuppaṅkaniruddharaviraha maggaṁ vivihavarasiddhavijāharaṅgaṇālaliyagamaṇacalaṇālattayarasara
ñjiyavitthiṇṇamuttāsilāyalaṁ darivivaraviṇiggayaninjharajharantajhaṁkāraravāyaḍḍiyadariyavaṇahatthiniyarasamāiṇṇaviyaḍakaḍaüddēsaṁ uddāmāha
vīlayāharucchaṅganiddayarayāyāsakhinnasuhapasuttavijāharamihuṇaṁ aïkōuhallēṇa āruhiuṁ payattō. kiha

pecchantō ya ruiradarimandirāmalamaṇibhittisaṁkantapaḍimāvalōyaṇapaṇayakuviyapasāyaṇūsuyadaïyadaṁsaṇāhiyakuviyaviya sahiyaṇōha
siyamuddhamiddhaṅgaṇāsaṇāhaṁ, katthaï ya payāracaliyavaracamariniyaranīhārāmalacandamaūhanimmaluddāmacamaracavalavikkhēvavīi jamāṇaṁ, katthaï ya
siddhāṅganāsanātham
niyambōvaïyaviyaḍaghaṇagajjiyāyaṇṇaṇubbhantadhuyasaḍājālanahayalucchaṅganimiyakamadariyamayaṇāharuñjiyaravāriuddēsaṁ, annattha sarasaghaṇa
candaṇavaṇucchaṅgavivihaparihāsakīlāṇandiyabhuyaṅgamihuṇaramaṇijjaṁ ti. taō āruhiūṇa rayaṇasiharaṁ rayaṇagiritilayabhūyaṁ tattha ya
bālakayalīpariveḍhiyaviyaḍapīḍhaṁ sōhāviṇijiyasurindabhavaṇaṁ uttuṅgatōraṇakhambhanimiyavarasālibhaciyāsaṇāī maṇaharālekkha vicitta
viyaḍabhittiṁ ruiragavakkhavēiōvasōhiaṁ nimmalamaṇikōṭimaṁ surahikusumasaṁpāiyapūōvayāraṁ ca gaō sulōyaṇasantiyaṁ mandiraṁ ti.
diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa gandhavvadattāē saha vīṇaṁ vāyantō sulōyaṇō. anbhuṭiō sulōyaṇēṇaṁ. saṁpāiō sē uciōvayārō. pucchiō
sulōyaṇēṇaṁ hēmakuṇḍalō. kuō bhavaṁ kuō vā ēsa mahāpurisō kiṁnimittaṁ vā bhavaō āgamaṇapaōyaṇaṁ ti. taō suvēlāō niyaṁ
dharaṇassa suvaṇṇabhūmimuvalanbhāiyaṁ cintiyarayaṇappadāṇapajjavasāṇaṁ sāhiyamāgamaṇapaōyaṇaṁ. tēṇa vi upphullalōyaṇēṇa paḍissuyaṁ ।
taō ciṭṭhiūṇa kaïvayadiyahē gahiyāī pahāṇarayaṇāī. nīō ya ṇēṇa dharaṇō dēvaüraṁ. mukkō nayarabāhiriyāē, samappiyāṇi sē
raïyaṇāṇi. bhaṇiō ya ēsō. ihaḍiō cēva jāyaṁ paḍivālamu ti. paḍissuyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. gaō hēmakuṇḍalō.
dharaṇō puṇa bāhiriyāē cēva kaści vēlaṁ gamēūṇa paviṭṭhō nayaraṁ. diṭṭhō ya ṭoppasēṭiṇā. ‘ahō kallāṇāgiī adiṭhṭhapuvvō
ēgāgī ya dīsaï, tā bhaviyavyaṁ etya kāraṇēṇaṁ ti cintiūṇa ahimayasaṁbhāsaṇapurassaraṁ nīō gēṇa gēhaṁ. kaō uvayārō.
pucchiō ya sēṭiṇā ‘kuō tumaṁ’ ti. sāhiō ṇēṇa māyandinivāsaniggamaṇāiō dēvaürasaṁpattipajjavasāṇō niyayavuttantō.
samappiyāī rayaṇāī. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇa seṭṭhī. ēyāī saṁgōvāvasu tti. saṁgōvāviyāṇi seṭṭhiṇā.

iō ya dharaṇasamuddapaḍaṇasamaṇantaramēva samāsāsiyā sukkhaṇēṇa lacchī. bhaṇiyā ya ṇēṇa. sundari, īisō aïsa saṁsārō, viyōgā
vasāṇāi etya saṁgayāī tā na taē saṁtappiyanvaṁ. na vivanō ya ēsa tujjha avi ya majjhaṁ ti. taō niyaḍippahāṇāē bāhajala
bhariyalōyaṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ lacchīē. taē jīvamāṇami kō mahaṁ saṁtāpō ti. tō aïkkantēmu kaïvayadiṇēsu jāṇavattasaṁṭhiyaṁ pahūyaṁ
suvaṇṇamavalōiūṇa cintiyaṁ suvayaṇēṇaṁ. vivannō khu sō tabassī, païbhūyaṁ ca ēvaṁ daviṇajāya, taruṇā ya sē bhāriyā rūpavaī ya,
saṁgayā ya mē cittēṇa; tā kiṁ ettha juttaṁ ti. ahavā iyamēva juttaṁ, jaṁ imīē gahaṇaṁ ti. kō nāma abālisō sayamēvāgayaṁ lacchi
paricayaï. tā geṇhāmi ēyaṁ. taō ‘parihāsasajjhā itthiya’ tti viyaḍanāyagāṇurūṣā kayā parihāsā, āvajjiyaṁ sē hiyayaṁ.
niviṭhṭhō ghariṇisahō. attaḍhiyaṁ suvaṇṇayaṁ. akkantā kaïvi diyahā. samāgayaṁ kūlaṁ jāṇavattaṁ. mahayā darisaṇijjēṇa diṭṭhō sutra
yaṇēṇa naravaī. parituṭō ēsō. ‘ussukamēva tuha jāṇavanē ti kaō sē pasāō. gaō jāṇavattaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi ‘cīṇadīvāō āgayaṁ jāṇavattaṁ’ ti muṇiūṇa niggaō dharaṇō. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa sukkhaṇō lacchī ya. parituṭṭhō hiya
ēṇaṁ, dūmiyā lacchī suvayaṇō ya. din sē āsaṇaṁ, pucchiō vuttantaṁ, sāhiō jēṇē. taō muvayaṇēṇa cintiyaṁ. ahō mē kammapari
ṇaī, ahō paḍikūlayā devvassa. kēvaḷaṁ kayamakajja, na saṁpannaṁ samīhiyaṁ ti. cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. aja, sōhaṇaṁ saṁjāyaṁ, jaṁ tuma
jīviō. tā geṇhāhi ēyaṁ niyayaritthaṁ ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. satthavāhaputta, pāṇā vi ēē tuha saïntiyā, jēṇa lacchīē saha samāgamō
kaō, kimaṅga puṇa ritthaṁ ti. aïkkantā kāi vēlā. bhaṇiyā ya lacchī gēṇa. ēhi, nayaraṁ pavisamha. lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta,
kallaṁ visissāmō, anja uṇa ajjaüttēṇāvi ihēva vasiyadhvaṁ ti. paḍissuyamaṇēṇa. abhaṅgiō ēsō. ālōciyaṁ ca lacchīē suvayaṇēṇa
ya. jahā, ajjēva ēvaṁ kayapāṇabhōyaṇaṁ kēṇaï uvāēga rayaṇīē vāvāissāmō tti. majiō ēsō, pāiō mahaṁ, kārāviō pāṇa
vittiṁ. aïkkantō vāsarō, samāgayā rayaṇī, atthuyaṁ sayaṇijja. nivaṇṇō ēsō lacchī ya. taō mayaparāhīṇassa simiṇaē viya
avaïttaṁ ceṭṭhamaṇuhavantassa dinō imīē galē pāsaō, vaïliō ya ēsō. pariōsaviyasiyacchīē lacchīē suvayaṇēṇa ya vimūḍhō
dharaṇō maō tti kāūṇa ujjhiō jalanihitaḍē. gayāiṁ jāṇavattaṁ. jalanihipavaṇasaṁgamēṇa ya samāsatthō ēsō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ.
hanta kimayaṁ ti. kiṁ tāva suviṇaō āō indajālaṁ āō maïvibbhamō āō saccayaṁ cēva tti. uvaladdhaṁ jalanihitaḍaṁ. saccaṁ cēva
tti jāō sē vinicchaō. uḍhiūga cintiyamaṇēṇa. ahō lacchīē cariya, ahō suvayaṇassa pōrusaṁ. ahavā durdaïguṁṭhō viya ummagga
patthiyā, kiṁpāgaphalabhōgō viya magulāvasāṇā, dussāhiyakiccē va dōsuppāyaṇī, kālarattī viya tamōvalittā, īīsā cēva
mahiliyā hōi. avi ya

jalaṇō vi gheppaï suhaṁ pavaṇō bhuyagō ya kēṇaï naēṇa. mahilāmaṇō na gheppaï bahuēhi vi nayasahassēhiṁ.
tā kiṁ imīē. suvayaṇassa na juttamēyaṁ ti. ahavā maïrā viya mayarāyabaḍhaṇī cē isthiyā havaï tti. visayavisamōhiyamaṇēṇaṁ
tēṇāvi ēvaṁ vavasiyaṁ ti.

lg.l: ēvaṁ ca cintayantō seṭṭhiniuttēhi kahavi purisēhiṁ

div.p:
bhaṇiō ya ṇēhiṁ. satyavāhaputta, rayaṇīē, na āgaō tumaṁ ti saṁjāyāsaṅkēṇa rayaṇīē cēva tujjha anēsaṇanimittaṁ pēsiyā amhē
ṭoppasē dviṇa tti. kahakahavi diṭṭhō si saṁpayaṁ. tā ēhi, gacchamha, nivvavēhi aṇēyacintāṇalapalittaṁ sēṭihiyayaṁ. taō ‘ahō purisā
mantaraṁ ti cinti ūṇa payaṭṭō dharaṇō, paviṭṭhō nayariṁ, diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa seṭṭhī. païrikami bhaṇiō sēṭiṇā. baccha, kuō tumaṁ kiṁ vā
vimaṇadummaṇō dīsasi tti. taō ‘lajjāvaṇijayaṁ aṇācikkhaṇīyamēyaṁ ti cintiūṇa vāhollalōyaṇēṇa nē japiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. sēṭiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ. vaccha, suyaṁ maē, jahā āgayaṁ jāṇavattaṁ cīṇāō, tā taṁ tumaē uvaladdhaṁ na vatti. tō sagaggayakakhara jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇaṁ.
anja, uvaladdhaṁ ti. sōgāirēgēṇa ya pavattaṁ sē bāhasalilaṁ. taō ‘nūṇaṁ vivannā sē bhāriyā, annahā kahaṁ īisō sōgapasarō’ tti cintiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ ṭoppasēṭiṇā. vaccha, avi taṁ cēva taṁ jāṇavattaṁ ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘āma.’seṭhiyā bhaṇiyaṁ. avi kusalaṁ tē bhāriyāē.
dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, kusalaṁ. sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. tā kimannaṁ tē uvvēvakāraṇaṁ. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, na kiṁci acikkhiyavvaṁ
ti. seṭhiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ tāki vimaṇō si. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘āma.’sedviṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kimāma.’dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘ēyaṁ. sēhigā
bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kimayaṁ. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘na kiṁci.’sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. vaccha, kimēēhiṁ munnabhāsiēhiṁ. acikkha sabbhāvaṁ. na ya ahaṁ
ajoggō ācivikhayabassa, paḍivannō ya taē gurū. taō ‘na juttaṁ guruāṇākhaṇḍaṇaṁ’ ti cintiūṇa jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. anja, ‘aja
ssa āṇa’ ti kariya īisa pi bhāsīyaï tti. sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. vaccha, natthi avisaō guruyaṇāṇuvattīē. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ajja,
jaï ēvaṁ, tā kusalaṁ mē bhāriyāē jīviēṇaṁ, na uṇa sīlēṇaṁ. sedviṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ viyāṇasi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kanjaō.’
seṭṭhiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. vaha viya. taō ācikkhiō sē bhōyaṇāiō jalanihitaḍapajjavasāṇō sayalavuttantō. taṁ ca sōūṇa kuviō ṭoppa
seṭṭhī suvayaṇassa. parisaṁṭhaviya dharaṇaṁ gaō naravaïsamīvaṁ. viśnattō ṇēṇa suvayaṇaṁ paï jahaṭṭhiyamēva narabaī. sadāviō rāiṇā muvayaṇō,bhaṇiō
kulakamāgayaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhāriyā kahaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. guruviiṇṇā. taō pulaïō ṭoppaseṭṭhī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. dēva, savvaṁ
aliyaṁ ti. sutrayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kiṁ puṇa ettha sañcayaṁ. sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. dharaṇasantiyaṁ ritthaṁ bhāriyā yā ēyaṁ saccayaṁ ti. taō saṁkhu
ddhahiyaēṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ sutrayaṇēṇa. bhō bhō aüvvajōisiya, kō ettha pañcaō; rāyakulaṁ khu ēyaṁ. ṭoppasēṭiṇā bhagiyaṁ sāhāraṇaṁ rāyakulaṁ;
paccaō puṇa, sō cēva jīvaï tti. suvayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, na maē dharaṇassa nāma pi āyaṇṇiyaṁ ti. parikkhaü dēvō. rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō bhō sēhi, āṇēhi dharaṇaṁ, tuma pitaṁ mahiliyaṁ ti. pēsiyā ṇēhi saha rāyapurisēhiṁ niyayapurisā. āṇiō ya ṇēhi
hiyaēṇāṇiccha māṇō vi sēṭiubarōhabhāviyacittō dharaṇō, iyarēhi ya bhayahitthahiyayā lacchitti pulaïyāī rāiṇā, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa.
sundari, diṭṭhō taē ēsa karmipi satthavāhaputtō. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva. na diṭṭhō tti. taō pucchiō dharaṇō. satyavāhaputta, avi ēsā tē
bhāriyā. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, kimaṇēṇa pucchiēṇa; suyaṁ cēva dēvēṇaṁ, jaṁ jaṁpiyamimīē. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. satyavāhayutta, aō cēva
pucchāmi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, jaï ēvaṁ dēvasta aṇubandhō, tā āsi bhāriyā, na uṇa saṁpayaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ēmō satyavāha
puttō viṭṭhō taē āsi. dharaṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēsō cetra jāṇaï ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiō suvayaṇō. satyavāha putta; kiṁ viṭṭhō tumaē ēsa
kahipi. sukkhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, maē tāva ēsō na diṭṭhō tiṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. hōu, kiṁ ēiṇā; sāhēha tubbhē kiṁ ettha rittha
māṇaṁ. suvayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ettha khalu dasasahassāṇi sōvaṇṇigāṇa iṭāsaṁpuḍāṇaṁ, anaṁ pi thēvayaṁ khu surittaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ ti. pucchiō
iyarō vi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēvamēyaṁ. rāigā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō kiṁpamāṇā khu tē saṁpuḍā. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, na yāṇāmi.
rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ niyayabhaṇḍassa vi pamāṇaṁ na yāṇāsi. dharaṇēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēvaṁ cēva tē kayā, jēṇa na jāṇāmi. taō
pucchiō suvayaṇō. bhadda, tumaṁ sāhēhi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ahamavi nissaṁsayaṁ na yāṇāmi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō ēvaṁ vavatthiē
kiṁ maē kāyabvaṁ ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, thēgamēya' kāraṇaṁ. kiṁ bahuṇā jaṁpiēṇaṁ. avivāugō ahaṁ ēyassa; tā giṇḍaü ritthaṁ
bhāriyaṁ ca ēsō tti. mukkhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō mahāpurisa! ēyaṁ pi bhavaō pahūyamēva, jaṁ mē ālō na dinō tti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
pasiddhō ahaṁ āladāyagō. suvayaṇēga bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï na āladāyagō, tā kimēyaṁ patthuyaṁ ti. ṭōpasē dviṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē rē
nillajja pāvakamma, ēvaṁ pi vahariuṁ ēvaṁ jaṁpasi tti. puṇō vi amarisāisaraṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ṭoppasēṭigā. mahārāya, kiṁ bahuṇā
jaṁpiēṇaṁ. jaï ēyaṁ na dharaṇasantiyaṁ ritvaṁ ēlā yē bhāriyā, tā majjha sabassasahiyā pāṇā niyaraṇaṁ ti. āṇāvēu dēvō mayalē
divvē ti. dharaṇēṇaṁ cintiyaṁ. avahariō khu ēsō maha siṇēhāṇubandhēṇa tā na juttaṁ saṁpayaṁ pi udāsīṇayaṁ kāuṁti.
jaṁpiyamaṇēṇa. dēva, jā pattha aṇubandhō tāyassa, tā alaṁ divvēhi; annō vi ettha āō atthi cēva. rāiṇā
bhagiyaṁ. kahēhi, kīisō uvāō ti. dharaṇēṇa maṇiyaṁ. dēva, tē maē saṁpuḍā sanāmēṇaṁ va aṅkiya tti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ।
kiṁ tujjha nāma. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, dharaṇō ti. iyarō vi pucchiō. tēṇa bhagiyaṁ. dēva, suvayaṇō tti. rāiṇā
maṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tō chinnō khu bāha.rō; navaraṁ āṇēha etyēva kavi saṁpuḍē tti. taō pēsiyaṁ paścaülaṁ, āṇiyā saṁpuḍā, nihā
liyā rāiṇā bāhiṁ, na diḍhē dharaṇanāmayaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇa. bhō natthi ettha dharaṇanāmayaṁ. sutrayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti.
annaṁ ca dēva, dēvasta puraō ēsa mahantaṁ pi aliyaṁ jaṁpiūṇa ajja vi pāṇē dhārēi tti. jāṇiyaṁ dēvēṇa, jaṁ ēēṇa pamāṇīkayaṁ.
rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō dharaṇa kimayaṁ ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, na annahā ēyaṁ phōḍāviūṇa majjhaṁ nirūvēū dēvō. taō ēyamā
yaṇṇiūṇa saṁkhuddhō subayaṇō, harisiō ṭoppaseṭṭhī. sadāviyā suvaṇṇayārā, phōḍāviyā saṁpuḍā, diṭṭhaṁ dharaganāmayaṁ. kuviō rāyā
sukkhaṇassa lacchīē ya. bhaṇiyaṁ ca mēṇaṁ. harē vāvāēha ēvaṁ vāṇiyagavēsadhāriṇaṁ mahābhuyaṁgaṁ, nibāsēha ya ēyaṁ mama rajjāō vivanna
sīlajīviyaṁ alacchi, samappēha ya samatthamēva ritthaṁ dharaṇasatthavāhassa. annaṁ ca bhaṇa, bhō mahāpurisa, kiṁ tē avaraṁ kīraü. dharaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, alaṁ mē ritthēṇa. karēu dēvō pasāyaṁ suvayaṇasta abhayappayāṇē. tō ‘ahō sē mahāṇubhāvaya’ tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiya
rāiṇā. satyavāhaputta, na juttamēya, tahāvi alaṅghaṇīyavayaṇō tumaṁ ti; tā tumaṁ cēva jāṇasi. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēvapasāō tti, aṇu
ggihīō ahaṁ dēvēṇa. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō satthavāhaputta, geṇhāhi niyayaritthaṁ. dhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi. taō narinda
paścaülāhiḍiō saha suvayaṇēṇaṁ gaō vēlāulaṁ dharaṇō, uvagaṇiyaṁ suvaṇṇaya paṁcaülēga, samappiyaṁ dharaṇassa. taō dharaṇēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ.
bhī suvayaṇa! paricaya visāyaṁ, aṅgīkarēhi pōrusaṁ, devyōvarōhēṇa kassa yā khaliyaṁ na jāyaï tti. annaṁ ca, bhaṇiō maē tujjha
suvaṇṇalakkhō, taē puṇa mahāṇubhāvattaṇēṇa ahamēva bahumanniō, na uṇa suvaṇṇalakkhō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca taē āsi ‘kiṁ suvaṇṇalakkhēṇa,
tumaṁ cēva mē bahumō tti. agagdhēyaṁ ca ēvaṁ saṁbhamāyaṇaṁ. tā gelhāhi saṁpayaṁ, jaṁ tē paḍihāyaï. ēvaṁ ca bhaṇiō samāṇō lajiō
suvayaṇō. na jaṁpiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. taō dāūga aṭṭha supaṇṇalakkhē saṁpūiūṇa naravaī taō kāuṁ sayalasutthaṁ bhaṇḍassa gaō ṭoppasēṭi
gēhaṁ. ṭiō kaṁci vēlaṁ saha sēṭiṇā. uvagayāē bhōyaṇavēlāē kayamajjaṇā pabhuttā ēē. bhuttuttarakālē.ya calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa
bhaṇiō dharaṇēṇa ṭoppaseṭṭhī. jāēmi ahaṁ kiṁci vatthu tāya, jaï na karēi mama paṇayabhaṅgaṁ tāō. tō harisavasupphullalōyaṇēṇa
'ahō ahaṁ kayatthō, ahō ahaṁ dhanō, ahō mama sunīviyaṁ, ahō mama suladdhō jammō tti, jaō īisēṇāvi mahāṇubhāvēṇa sayalasatta
kappatarukappēṇa tihuyaṇacintāmaṇībhūēṇa vi ahaṁ patthi jāmi’ ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ṭoppasēṭiṇā. vaccha, jaha vi sakalattaṁ saputta
pariyaṇaṁ dāsattanimittaṁ mamaṁ jāēsi, tahāvi ahaṁ tuha mahāpurisacedviēṇa ākari siyacittō na khaṇḍēmi tē patthaṇāpaṇayaṁ. dharaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. tāya, jaï ēvaṁ tā dēhi tinni vāyāō. īsi vihasiūṇa ‘jāya, jō ēgaṁ vāyaṁ loppaï, sō tinni vi loppayantō kiṁ
kēṇāvi dhariuṁ pārīyaï’ tti bhaṇiūṇa ṭoppasēṭiṇā ka.yāō tini vāyāō. ‘tāya, aṇuggihīō’ tti bhaṇiūṇa hēmakuṇḍalavi
jāharavidinamaïhagdhēyapubbasamappiyarayaṇasahassaṁ maggiō ṭoppasēṭibhaṇḍāriō. tēṇa vi ya ‘jaṁ ajjō āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa sama
ppiyāī gahiūṇa rayaṇāī. taō tāṇa majjhē addhaṁ gahēūṇa ṭoppasēṭissa calaṇapūyaṁ kāūṇa puṇō vi ṇivaḍiō pāēmu ‘tāya, ēsā
sā patthaṇati bhaṇamāṇō dharaṇō. taō ‘aha kahaṁ chaliō ahamaṇēṇaṁ’ ti suira cininaūṇa ‘agahiē ya vilakkhībhavissā ēsō,
nivāriō ahaṁ imiṇā aṇāgayaṁ cēva' uḍhaviyō dharaṇō ‘vaccha, paḍivannā tē patthaṇā' bhaṇamāṇēṇa ṭoppasē dviṇā.

taō bahumaniō seṭhiṇā mahayā satyēṇa samāgaō niyayanayariṁ. āvāsiō bāhiṁ. jāō lōyavāō, jahā āgaō dharaṇō
tti. niggaō rāyā paccōṇiṁ. pavēsiō ṇēṇa mahāvibhūīē. nēūṇa niyayabhavaṇaṁ, pūiō majjaṇāiṇā niyābharaṇapajjavasāṇamuvayāra
ppayāṇēṇaṁ. gō niyayabhavaṇaṁ. tuṭṭhā ya sē jaṇaṇijaṇayā. viiṇṇaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, kayā savvāyayaṇēsu pūyā. aïkantā kāi vēlā.
taō uvaṇimantiyaṁ mahārāyaṁ pūiō aṇēṇē savisēsaṁ. sammāṇiyā ya jahāruhapaḍivattīē paüracāuvējōiyā, paḍipūiō ya tēhiṁ.
taō pucchiō jaṇaṇijaṇaēhiṁ. vaccha, avi kahiṁ tē dhēriṇi ti. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. alaṁ tīē kahāē. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. hanta kayaṁ
tīē, jaṁ itthiuciyaṁ. tā alaṁ imassa mammaghaṭṭaṇēṇa imiṇā jaṁpiēṇaṁ. annō avagacchisaṁ ti. etthantarami mahāpurisayākhittahiyaō
vimhayavasēṇupphullalōyaṇō karyamuddaṅgasāsaṇāvaṇanimittaṁ puṇō vi dharaṇasamīvaṁ samāgaō rāyā. kaō dharaṇēṇa samuciōvayārō.
pucchiō ya āgamaṇapaōyaṇaṁ. siṭṭhō sē niyayāhippāō rāiṇā. tō calaṇēsa nivaḍiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. dēva, alaṁ muddaṅgēḍiṁ; kiṁtu
'māṇaṇīō dēvō’ tti kariya patthēmi patthaṇīyaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṇāu ajō. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. payacchaü dēvō niyarajjē savva
sattāṇaṁ bandimokkhaṇaṁ savvasattāṇamabhayappayāṇaṁ caï. tō ahō sē mahāṇubhāvayā, ahō mahāpurisaceṭṭhiyaṁ satyavāhaputtassa’ tti
bhaṇiūṇa āṇattō paḍihārō. harē kāravēhi cārayaghaṇṭapaōēṇa mama rajjē sayalabandimokkhaṁ, savvasattāṇamabhayapayāṇaṁ ca davāvēhi
tti. tō ‘jaṁ dēvō āṇavēī’ ti bhaṇiūṇa saṁpāḍiyaṁ dēvasāsaṇaṁ. sappurisaceṭṭiēṇa ya parituṭṭhā sē jaṇaṇijaṇayā. pariōsa
viyasiyacchēhi kayamaṇēhiṁ rāiṇō uciyaṁ karaṇijjaṁ. taō dharaṇēṇa saha kaṁci vēlaṁ gamēūṇa niggaō rāyā.
dharaṇō vi cirayālamiliyavayaṁsayasamēō gaō malayasundarābhihāṇaṁ ujjāṇaṁ. uvaladdhō ya nāgalayāmaṇḍabaṁmi kīlānimitta
māgaō kuviyaṁ piyapaṇaïṇiṁ pasāyantō rēvilaïṁgō nāma kulaüttagō. sumariyaṁ lacchīē. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō ṇu khalu ēvamaē
vēlāṁ gamayitvā nirgatō rājā.
ramatthapecchīṇi kāminaṇa hiyayāī havanti. samāgaō saṁvēgaṁ. gaō ya ujjāṇēkadēsasaṁṭhiyaṁ asōyavīhiyaṁ.

lg.l: diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa tahiyaṁ phāyadēsaṁmi viyaliyaviyārō
taṁ pecchiūṇa cintā jāyā dharaṇassa ēsa lōyaṁmi
jīvaï saphalaṁ ēkō cattō jēṇaṁ gharāvāsō
ghariṇī atthō sayaṇō māyā ya piyā ya jīvalōyaṁmi
jā vi uvayārabuddhī pariṇīpamuhēsu sā vi mōhaphalaṁ

div.p: sō puṇa

lg.l: niyamā tatyārambhō ārambhēṇaṁ ca vaḍuī hiṁsā
hiṁsāē kō dhammō na dēsiō satthayārēhiṁ
pajantē vi ya ēsō samvēṇaṁ cēva jīvalōyaṁmi
aha vandiō ya ṇēṇaṁ bhagavaṁ savayaṁsaraṇa sāhū ya
tēhiṁ ciya dhammalāhō dinō savvēsi vihipuvvaṁ
upaviṭṭhā ya muvimalē muṇīṇa puraō u uvavaṇucchaṅgē
aha pucchiyā ya guruṇā kattō tumbhē ti mahuragiraṁ

div.p:
ēvaṁ ca pucchiē samāṇē jaṁpiyaṁ dharaṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, iō cēva amhē. annaṁ ca; atthi mē gihāsamaparicāyabuddhī. tā āisaü bha
yavaṁ, jaṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti. tō ‘ahō sē āgiī, ahō vivēgō’ tti cintiūṇa āsayaparikkhaṇanimittaṁ aṁpiyaṁ araïhayattēṇaṁ. vaccha,
paricattagihāsamēṇaṁ nibhacchiūṇa niyaniyavisayalālasāī indiyāī vijjhaviya kasāyāṇalaṁ nirī hēṇaṁ cittēṇaṁ sayalasokkhanihāga
bhūō saṁjamō kāyayō. annahā paricattō vi aparicattō gihāsamō tti. sō puṇa aṇāivisayabhāvaṇābhāviyassa jīvassa accanta
dukkhayarō. pavajiūṇa vi ēvaṁ puncakayakammadō sēṇa kēi na taranti parivāliuṁ, mujjhanti niyayakajjē, parikappenti asayālamba
ṇāī; vimukkasaṁjamā ya tē, āusō, na gihī na pāiyagā ubhayalōgavihalaṁ nāsanti maṇuyattaṇaṁ. ēvaṁ vavatthiē amuṇiūṇa hēō
vāēyāī atuliūṇamappāṇayaṁ na juttō gihāsamapariccāō tti. dharaṇēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. ēvamēyaṁ, jaṁ tumbhē āṇavēha. kiṁtu
hēō gihāsamō mē buddhī samaṇataṇaṁ uvārayaṁ. tulaṇā vi vivēgō cciya kilēsavasayāṇa sattāṇaṁ.
bhayavayā cintiyaṁ. ahō sē saüṇṇayā, muṇiō ṇēṇa jahaḍiō saṁsārō, samuppannā jigadhammabōhī. tā pasaṁsēmi ēvaṁ sāhēmi ya
imassa imīē dullahattaṇaṁ, jēṇa vayaṁsagāṇa vi sē saṁbōhō samupajjaï. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. vaccha, dhannō tuma, nāyaṁ taē jāṇiyanvaṁ,
saṁpattā sēyalalōyadulla hā jiṇadhammabōhī. tā jaïhaṭṭhiyāsēvaṇēṇa ēvaṁ cēva saphalaṁ karēhi, saṁsijjhaï ya tu: samīhiyaṁ. na khalu
aṇabhatthaniraïyārakusalamaggā ēvaṁvihā havanti, avi ya aparamatthapecchiṇō visayalōluyā ya. ēyavaïyaraṁ ca nisuṇēhi mē cariyaṁ.
dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kahēu bhayavaṁ.’arahadattāyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa.

atthi ihēba vāsē ayala uraṁ nāma nayaraṁ. tattha jiyasattū rāyā, pum̐ttā ya sē abarājiō samarakēū ya. aparājiō juvarāyā,
iyarō ya kumārō. dinnā imassa kumārabhuttīē ujjēṇī. ēvaṁ ca aïkkantō kōi kālō. annayā ya vithakkō mārakērī nāma
pañcantanaravaī. taō aparājiō tappasāhaṇanimittaṁ gaō. pasāhiō ya ēsō. āgacchamāṇēṇa ya muttimantō viya puṇṇōdaō
saṁpatō imēṇa dhammārāmasannivēsē sayalamaṇōrahacintāmaṇī rāhō nāma āyariō tti. taṁ ca daṭṭhūṇa samuppannō ēyassa saṁvēgō.
pucchiō ṇēṇa jēhāvihīē dhammō. kahiō bhayavayā jahōvaïṭṭhō paramagurūhiṁ. paḍibuddhō ya ēsō. khaōvasamamuvagayaṁ cāritta
mōhaṇīyaṁ. taō māindajālasarisaṁ jīvalōyamavagacchiya pavaïō ēsō. karēi tavasaṁjamujjōyaṁ. annayā ya gurupāyamūlaṁmi ahā
saṁjamaṁ viharamāṇō gaō tagarāsannivēsa. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā tattha ujjēṇīō raühāyariyassa antēvāsiṇō ajarāhukhamāsamaṇa
santiyā gurusamīvaṁ sāhuṇō tti. kayā ‘sē uciyapaḍibattī. pucchiyā niruvasaggavihāramujjēṇīē. kahiō ya ṇēhiṁ mundarō
vihārō; kēvalaṁ rāyaputtō purōhiyaputtō ya abhaddayā, tē jahōvaladdhīē khaliyārenti sāhuṇō, tanimittō uvasaggō tti. taō
ēyamāyaṇṇiya cintiyamavarājiēṇa. ahō pamattayā samarakē ugō, jēṇa pariyaṇaṁ pi na niyamēi. tī aṇunaviya guruṁ gacchāmi aha
mujjēṇi. upasāmēmi tē kumārē, mā saṁciṇantu abōhimūlāī. saṁsārabaddhaṇē ya sāhupaōsō. atthi mē taduvasāmaṇasattī. taō
aṇunaviya guruṁ pēsiō guruṇā samāgaō ujjēṇiṁ, paviṭṭhō ya ajjarāhukhamāsamaṇagacchē. kayaṁ sē uciyakaraṇijja. samāgayā
bhikkhāvēlā. payaṭṭō ēsō. bhaṇiō ya sāhūhiṁ. pāhuṇayā tubbhē, tā acchaha tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. na acchāmi, attaladdhiō
ahaṁ, navaraṁ ṭhavaṇakuṁlāīṇi daṁsēha. taō dinō sē cellaō, dasiyāṇi kulāṇi, vāriō ya ṇēṇaṁ ‘ēyaṁ paḍaṇīyagēhaṁ; mā pavi
senjama’ ti bhaṇiūṇa niyattō cellaō. paviṭṭhō ya ēsō paḍhamamēva kumāragēhaṁ. mahayā saddēṇa dhammalāhiyamaṇēṇaṁ. taṁ ca daṭṭaṇa
bhīyāō antēuriyāō. ‘hā kaṭuṁ, isī kayatthijissaï’ ti cintiūṇa saniō ya ṇāhiṁ ‘lahu nigacchasu’ tti. taō ava
hīriūṇa baïhirāviḍaṁ ca kāūṇa mahayā saddēṇa dhammalāhiyamaṇēṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi dhammalāhasadaṁ sōūṇa hammiyatalāō pahaṭṭamuhapaṅkayā
samāgayā kumārayā. kiyaṁ duvāraṁ. aïsaēṇaṁ vandiō ṇēhiṁ sāhū. kayaṁ dhammalāhaṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ṇēhiṁ. bhō pabvaïyagā, ‘naccasu’ tti.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ gīyavāiēṇa viṇā nacāmi. kumārēhi bhaṇiyaṁ. amhē gīyavāiyaṁ karēmō. sāhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ‘mundaraṁ’ tti.
visamatālaṁ kayaṁ gīyavāiyamaṇēhiṁ. akuddhō vi hiyaēṇaṁ kuddhō sāhū. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. arē rē gōvāladārayā, imiṇā vināṇēṇa
mamaṁ naccāvēha tti. ēyaṁ sōūṇa kuviyā kumārā, sāhutāḍaṇanimittaṁ ca dhāviyā abhimuhaṁ. tēṇa vi ya ‘na annō uvāō’ tti
kaliūṇa karuṇāpahāṇacittēṇa nijjuddhavāvārakusalēṇaṁ saṇiyaṁ cēva vētūṇa savvasaṁdhīsu viōiō ēkō. taō dhāviō duiō, sō
vi tahēva. taō duvāramugghā ḍiūga gaō sāhū. ēgantē ṭhiō sajjhāyajōgēṇaṁ. iyarē vi niccedvā tahēva ciṭṭhanti. divā pariya
ṇēga, udaēṇa siściūṇa sasaṁbhamaṁ vāhittā, jāva na jaṁpanti, taō nivēiyaṁ rāyapurōhiyāṇaṁ, jahā imiṇā vuttantēṇa kēṇaï sāhuṇā
kumārā ēvaṁ kaya ti. taō tē nirūviūṇa āyariyasamīvaṁ gaō rāyā. paṇamiō ya ṇēṇāyariō, bhaṇiō ya. bhayavaṁ, khamēha
ēyamavarāhaṁ bālayāṇaṁ. āyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimēyaṁ ti nāvagacchāmi. kahiō sē vuttantō rāiṇā. tō āyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
vīyarāgasāsaṇasaṁpāyaṇarēyā tappahāvō viiyaparamatthā paralōyabhīruyattaṇēṇa ya ihalōyasarīrē daḍhamapaḍibandhayāē khamenti sayalasattāṇaṁ
sāhuṇō na puṇa pāṇabhaēṇaṁ ti. tahāvi kāraṇaṁ paï samāyariyaṁ jaï kēṇāvi bhavē, taō pucchāvēmi sāhuṇō. taō āyariēṇa
pucchiyā sāhuṇō. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, na amhē viyāṇāmō tti. āyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, nēyamiha sāhūhiṁ vavasiyaṁ.
rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, sāhuṇā na ettha saṁdēhō. āyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, jaï ēvaṁ, tā ēvaṁ bhavissaï. atthi ēgō āgantugō
sāha tēṇēyamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ bhavē. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kahiṁ puṇa sō sāhū. āyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. daṁsēha sē tayaṁ. daṁsiō ēgēṇa
sāhuṇā nāidūraṁmi cēva sālataruvarasamīvē jhāṇasaṁṭhiō ti. paccabhinnāō ya rāiṇā. kumārāvarāhalajjiēṇaṁ paṇamiō ya ṇēṇaṁ ।
dinō sē dhammalāhō. bhaṇiō ya pacchā. bhō mahāsāvaga, juttamēyaṁ jaṁ tujjha santiē rajjē isīṇaṁ kayatthaṇā kumārāṇaṁ aṇāhanaṇaṁ
ca. taō bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇa rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ lajiō mhi ahiyaṁ imiṇā pamāyacariēṇaṁ. atthi mama ēsa daüsō;
tahāvi bhayavaṁ karēha aṇuggaha, saṁjōēha tē kumārē. sāhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. saṁjōēmi caraṇaguṇavihāṇēṇaṁ na uṇa annaha tti. rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, aṇumayaṁ mamēyaṁ, navaraṁ kumārā pucchiyavva tti. sāhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. lahuṁ pucchēda. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, na sakenti
tē jaṁpiuṁ. sāhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ēhi, tatthēva vaccāmō; ahaṁ jaṁpāvēmi tti. āgayā kumārāṇa samīvaṁ. diṭṭhā ya ṇēhiṁ païramajōgiṇō
vya niruddhasayalaceṭṭhā kumārā. āyattīkayaṁ ca tē siṁ sāhuṇā vaïyaṇamettaṁ. pucchiyā ya ṇēṇaṁ. bhō kumārayā, isikayatthaṇāpamāya
jaṇiyakammatarukusumuggamapuvvarūvamēyaṁ, phalaṁ tu niraïyāivēyaṇā. tā jaï bhē atthi pacchāyāvō, tā pavajaha kammatarumahākuhāḍaṁ pavvajja.
mōēmi ahaṁ imāō uvavāō, bhavāmi ya paralōyasāhaṇujjayāṇaṁ sahāō tti. kumārēhi, bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, aṇuggahō tti ।
lajjiyā amhē imiṇā pamāyacariēṇaṁ, atthi "ṇē mahantō aṇuyāvō, paba jāmō ya panajaṁ jaï gurū aṇujāṇanti. taō aṇumāyā
gurūhiṁ. saṁjōiyā sāhuṇā asaṁghāraṇa paramaguṇasaṁdhāraṇa ya. taō pavanā pavvajja. pariṇayā ya tēsi samaṇaguṇā. ēvaṁ ca
jahuttakārīṇaṁ aïkantō kōi kālō. tāṇaṁ ca purōhiyakumārassa kammōdaēṇaṁ viiyajiṇadhammasārassa vi ‘balā imiṇā pavāviya'
tti samuppanō gurupaōsō. na nindiō ṇēṇaṁ nālōiō guruṇō. taō mariūṇaṁ ahāuyakkhaēṇa samuppannō īsāṇadēvalōē
bhujēi divabhōē. aïkkantō kōi kālō raïsāgarāvagāḍhassa.
annayā ya varaccharāparigayassa milāṇāī surahikusumadāmāī, payampiō kappapāyavō, paṇaṭāō hirisirīō, uvarattāī dēvadū
sāī, samuppannō dīṇabhāvō, utthariyaṁ nidāē, viuḍiō kāmarāgō, bhamaḍiyā diṭṭhī, samuppannō kampō, viyambhiyā araï tti. taō
tēṇa cintiyaṁ ‘hanta, kimēyaṁ’ ti. viyāṇiyāī cavaṇaliṅgāī, visaṇṇō hiyaēṇaṁ, viddāṇō pariyaṇō, vilaviyaṁ accharāhiṁ. taō
'kimimiṇā mōhacēṭiēṇaṁ; pucchāmi tāva bhayavantaṁ paümanāhaṁ titthayaraṁ, kahi mē uvavāō, sulahabōhiō vā na va’ tti samāgaō
puvvavidēhaṁ. paṇamiō tēlōkanāhō pucchiō ya. sihaṁ bhayavayā. uvava ō tē jambuddīvadāhiṇabharahē kōsambīē nayarīē. dullaha
bōhiō tuma. saṁciṇiyaṁ tumaē gurupaōsēṇa imiṇā pagārēṇa abōhibīyaṁ. nīsēsamācikkhiō.puvvabhavavaïyarō. taō tēṇa cintiyaṁ.
hanta ēbahamettassa vi gurupaḍaṇīyabhāvassa dāruṇō vivāgō tti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, na ēsa thēvō. iha khalu ihalō
senti annāṇatimiraṁ, ṭhēventi paramapayasāhiyāē kiriyāē, cōinti khaliēma, saṁthaïventi guṇarayaṇē. ēvaṁ ca, dēvāṇuppiyā
mōenti jammajarāmaraṇarōyasōyabahulāō saṁsāravāsāō, pāventi sāsayaṁ suhaṁ siddhiṁ ti. tā ēvaṁvihēsu vi paōsō guṇapaō
sabhāvēṇa nāsēi sammattaṁ, jaṇēi annāṇaṁ, cālēi sāhukiriyaṁ. tō ya sē jīvē tahāvihakiliṭṭhapariṇāmapariṇaē khaṇamettēṇāvi,
dēvāṇuppiyā, tahā bandhēi kammaṁ, jahā pāvēi aṇēgamaviyaṁ micchattamōī ti. aō cēva bēmi.

na ḍhaṁga sēsa tti. dēvēṇa cintiyaṁ. ēvamēyaṁ, na annahā. tā na yāṇāmi, kiṁpajavasāṇō mē ēsō avōhilābhō tti. bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ. thēvaniyāṇō khu ēsō; tā aṇantarabhavē cēva bhavistaï avasāṇaṁ ti. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kuō sayāsāō. bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ. mūyagāvaranāmāō niyabhāuṇō ti. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayaba, kiṁ puṇē tassa paḍhamanāmaṁ, kēṇa vā kāraṇēṇa imaṁ sē duiyaṁ ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. muṇa.

paḍhamanāma sē asōgadattō; myagō puṇa imēṇaṁ kāraṇēṇaṁ. imīē cēva kōsambīē aīyasamayaṁmi tāvasō nāma seṭṭhī ahēsi. sō
ya dāṇāikiriyāsamēō vi païmāī, bahuvihavasaṁpannō vi nicavāvaḍō. taō ajjhāṇadōsēṇa mariūṇa samuppannō niyayagēhaṁmi cēva
sayarō. jāyaṁ sē puvvōvabhuttapaēsāvalōyaṇēṇaṁ jāīsaraṇaṁ. annayā ya uvaṭṭhiē piidivasaē siddhapāē bhōyaṇē samāsanmāē parivēsaṇavēlāē
avahariyamajjāramaṁsāē savayārīē vēlāikkamagiham̐baïbhaēṇaṁ maṁsanimittaṁ pacchannamēva vāvāiūga visasibhō kōlō. tahā kōhābhibhūmō ya
mariūṇa samuppannō taṁmi cēva gēhē bhuyaṅgamattāē ti. tattha vitaṁ cēva daṭṭhūṇa hammiyaṁ taṁ ca svayāri bhayasaṁbhamāmibhūyassa pariṇāma
visēsaō samuppannaṁ sē jāisaraṇaṁ. vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa na gahiō kasā pahi, aṇugampiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi uvaladdhō
sūvayārīē. taō ṇāē kaō kōlāhalō ‘sappō sappō’ ti. taṁ ca sōūṇa samāgayā moggaravāvaḍaggahatyā kamma yarā. vāvāiō
ṇēhiṁ. samuppannō yatahā akāmani jarāē mariūṇa niyayaputtassa cēva nāgadattābhihāṇassa bandhumaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē tti.
jāō uciyasamaēṇaṁ. kayaṁ ca sē nāmaṁ asōgadattō ti. taō aïkkantasaṁvaccharassataṁ cēva sūpayāri pecchiya jaṇaṇijaṇaē ya acinta
yāē kammasāmatthassa samuppannaṁ sē jāīsaraṇaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. vahuyā jaṇaṇī, subhō cēva ya piyā. aō pecchaṇayasamāṇassa
dhiratyu saṁsāravāsassa. tā kahamahaṁ vahuyaṁ cēva jaṇaṇi suyaṁ ca tāyaṁ vāharēmi tti. paḍiyannaṁ mūyagavayaṁ. jāō lōyavāō ‘ahō ēsa
mūyagō’ ti. ēvaṁ ca aïkkantā duvālasa saṁvaccharā. samāgaō tattha caüṇāṇāisayasaṁpannō mēhanāō nāma muṇivarō. muṇiō ya sē
aṇēṇa hiyayabhāvō. pēsiō vayaṇavinnāsakusalō sumaṅgalābhihāṇō isī nāgadēvagēha, bhaṇiō ya ēsō. vattavyaō taē tattha
gihālindēganiviṭṭhō asōgadattō. jahā, bhō kumārayā, pēsiō mhi guruṇā, sō ya ēvaṁ bhaïṇāi.

lg.l: tāvasa kimiṇā mūṇavvaēṇa paḍivajja jāṇiuṁ dhammaṁ
mariūṇa sūarōraṁga jāō puttassa puttō tti

div.p:
taō ‘jaṁ bhayavaṁ āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa gaō sō risī. sāhiō gurusaṁdēsaō. paṇāmapuvvayaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ
kattha sō gurū. isiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, sakāvayārē cēiyaṁmi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ēhi, gacchamha. vimhiśō mūyagapariyaṇō. cintiyaṁ
ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō sāmatthaṁ bhayavaō; tā jāu ēsō, kayāi sōhaïṇayaraṁ bhavē. gō mēhanāyagurusamīvaṁ. vandiō gurū. dhammalāhiō
guruṇā. pucchiō asōgadattēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kahaṁ puṇa tumaṁ maīyaṁ vuttantaṁ jāṇāsi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. nāṇabalēṇaṁ ti. ‘ahō tē nāṇāi
saō’ ti vimhiō asōgadattō. taō bhayavayā ‘pēḍibujhissaï’ tti nāūṇa kahiō sē dhammō. paḍibuddhō ēsō. pulavā
saṇāē ya nāvagayaṁ sē mūyagābhihāṇaṁ. tā ēēṇa kāraṇēṇa imaṁ duiyaṁ nāmaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ ca siṭṭhē samuppannō sē pamōō. pucchiō ya bhayavaṁ. aha kahiṁ kēṇa vā pagārēṇaṁ ahaṁ saṁbujhissaṁ ti. bhayāyā bhaṇiyaṁ.
vēyaḍrapavvaē niyakuṇḍalajubalayadarisaṇēṇaṁ bhavissaï tē paḍibōhō. taō vandiūṇa bhayavantaṁ gaō kōsambi nayariṁ. di@ō mr̥yagō,
sāhiō sē vuttantō, jahā upphāliō bhayavayā. sabahumāṇaṁ hatthē geṇhiūṇa bhaṇiyō ya ēsō. tā avassamaha taē paḍivōhiyabī
tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaïssamahaṁ jahāsattīē. taō tēṇa nīō vēyaḍḍapavvayaṁ, daṁsiyaṁ siddhāyayaṇakūḍaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ēsō. bhī mama
duvē cēva accantapiyāṇi etya jammaṁmi, imaṁ siddhāyayaṇakūḍaṁ rayaṇāvayaṁsagābhihāṇaṁ ca kuṇḍalarjuyalaṁ ti. tā ciṭṭhaü imaṁ ihaṁ, kāyavvaṁ
taē ē sāhiyaṁ ti. ‘nimiyaṁ silāsaṁghāyavivarēgadēsē kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ, samappiyaṁ ca imassa cintāmaṇirayaṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ēsō. ēya
khu cintāmettapaḍivānasahāyabhāvaṁ sāhēi ihalōyapaḍibaddhaṁ ēgadivasē ēgapaōyaṇaṁ. tā ēyasāmatthaō vēyaḍagamaṇamaṇuciṭṭhiyavvaṁ ti.
paḍivannamaṇēṇa. āgayā kōsambi. gaō dēvō niyayavimāṇaṁ. vāvannō kālakkamēṇaṁ. samuppannō bandhumaīkucchīē. jāō sē sarayasa
mayaṁmi sahayārēsu dōhalō. asaṁpajamāṇē ya taṁmi samuppannā sē araī, pavvāya kkhaṇakamalaṁ, pīḍiō gambhō, saṁjāyaṁ kisattaṇaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi payaṭṭō lōyavāō. ahō ēsā asaṁpāiyadōhēlā na jīvaï tti. taō māinēhamōhiēṇaṁ asōgadattēṇaṁ ‘na titthayarabhāsiyaṁ
niphalaṁ, tā bhavissaï, na annēhā vi vēyaḍagamaṇa’ ti cintiūga cintiyāī cintāmaṇirayaṇasannihāṇami sahayārāī. samuppannāṇi
ya imāī. saṁpāḍiō dōhaïlō. pasūyā ēsā. jāō ya sē dāraō. kayaṁ ca sē nāma arahadattō tti.

pattō ya bālabhāvaṁ. taō sō asōgadattō nēi taṁ sāhusanīya, pāḍēi calaṇēsu, ruyaï ya ta bhō. ēvaṁ ca kanō kōi kālō.
pattō kumārabhāvaṁ. sāhiō ṇēṇa jiṇabhāsiō dhammō, na pariṇaō ya tassa. puṇō vi sāhiō, puṇō vi na pariṇaō tti. ēvaṁ
ca aïkkantō kōi kālō. puṇō vi kahiō asōgadattēṇa putrabhavavaïyarō, na pariṇaō ya arahayattasta. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇaṁ asōga
dattō. kimimiṇā palaviēṇaṁ ti. taō sō ēyāiyarēṇēva ‘ahō sāmatyaṁ kammaparigaīē’ ti cintiūṇa paḍiyanō samagaliṅgaṁ.

lg.l: arahadattaṇa vi ya pariṇīyāō cattāri sēṭidāriyāō

div.p:
taō parivāliūṇamaṇaïyāraṁ sāmaṇṇaṁ ahāuyassa kharaṇa dēvalōyamuvagaō asōyadattō. suyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ, jahā agōgadatta samaṇagō
pañcattamuvagaō tti. taō samubhūō arahadattassa sōgō. kayaṁ uddhadēhiyaṁ. samuppannō yasō bhalōē. dinnō upaōgō, vinnāō ya
ōhiṇā arahadattavaïyarō. ābhōiyaṁ ca ṇaṇaṁ ‘na ēsa ēvaṁ paḍibujjhaï’ ti. patthuō uvāō. ayaṇḍaṁmi cēva samuṣpāiō sē bāhī.
saṁjāyaṁ jalōyaraṁ, parisukkāō bhuyāō, sūrṇa calaṇajuyalaṁ, milāṇāī lōyaṇāī, jaḍḍiyā jīhā, paṇaṭṭhā niddā, uvagayā araī, samunbhūyā
mahāvēyaṇā. visaṇṇō ya ēsō. saddāviyā vējā. uvannatthaṁ savvasāraṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca gēṇa. atrahara ēyaṁ vēyaṇaṁ. paüttāī ōsa hāī; na
jāō sē visēsō. paccakkhāō vejjēhiṁ. tō vēyaṇāisayamōhiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. na caēmi ēyaṁ aṇēgatibbavēyaṇābhibhūyaṁ divasamettamavi
sarīragaṁ dhārēuṁ. tā dēhē mē kaṭṭhāṇi, pavisāmi jalaṇaṁ ti. aïyaṁ sōūṇa vidāṇā bandhavā, mucchiyāō pattīō, parōviō pariyaṇō.

etthantaraṁmi sō dēvō sabaravējasvaṁ kāūṇa gahiyagōṇattaō āgaō kōsambi. ugghōsiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa arahadattagharasamīvē. ahaṁ khu sabara
vējō phēḍēmi sīsavēyaṇaṁ, mugāvēmi bahiraṁ, avaṇēmi timiraṁ, paṇāsēmi khasaraṁ, ummūchēmi malavāhi, pasamēmi mūlaṁ, nāsēmi jalōyaraṁ
ti. ēvaṁ sōūṇa sadiō sabahumāṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya sē pariyaṇēṇaṁ. bhadda, apaṇēhi imassa mahōyaraṁjaṁ maggiyaṁ dijjaï tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
dhammavējō ahaṁ, na uṇa atthalōluō; tā alaṁ mē atthēṇaṁ. kiṁtu kicchasajjhō ēsa vāhī, na suhēṇaṁ avēi. ettha khalu parihariyavvaṁ
niyāṇaṁ, sēviyacō paḍivakkhō. niyāṇaṁ ca duvihaṁ havaï, ihalōiyaṁ pāralōiyaṁ ca. tattha ihalōiyaṁ apacchāsēvaṇanaṇiō vāyāidhāu
kkhōhō, pāralōiyaṁ pāvakammaṁ. tattha ‘ihalōiyaṁ pi na pāralōiyasaṁbandhamantarēṇaṁ’ ti pāralōiyaṁ parihariyavvaṁ ti. tattha vi pahāṇabhāvaō
micchattaṁ. parihariē ya taṁmi samuppannasammattabhāvēṇa païdivasamēva āsēviyavvāiṁ nāṇacaraṇāī, kāyayō paḍhamacarimapōrēsīsuṁ cittamala
visōhaṇō niṇavayaṇa majjhāō,sōyavyō biiyapōrusīē hiyāhiyabhāvadaṁsagō tassa atthō,maṇavayaṇakāyajōgēhiṁ na hisiyayā pāṇiṇō,
na jaṁpiyavyamaliyaṁ, na geṇhiyavvamadattayaṁ, na sēviyavyamabambhaṁ, na kāyavō mucchāi pariggahō, na bhuniyavvaṁ rayaṇīē, khāyavvā khantī,
bhāviyavyaṁ mahavaṁ, vajjaṇijjā māyā, nihaṇiyavyō lōhō, hiṇḍiyavvaṁ apaḍibaddhaṇaṁ, vasiyavyaṁ sēlakāṇaṇujjāṇēsu, vajjiyavyō ārambhō,
bhaviyavvaṁ nirīhēṇaṁ. ēvaṁ ca, bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, avēi bhavajalōyaraṁ pi, kimaṅga puṇa ēyaṁ ihalōyamettapaḍibaddhaṁ.
taō pariyaṇa cintiyaṁ ‘maraṇāō varamimaṁ ti. bhaṇiō ya ēsō pariyaṇēṇa. bhō arahadatta, alaṁ maraṇēṇaṁ, ēyaṁ karēhitti.
taō ‘maraṇāō vi ēyamahiyayaraṁ, tahāvi kā annā gaï’ ti cintiūṇa jaṁpiyamaṇēṇaṁ ‘jaṁ vō rōyaï tti

sabaravejjēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā peccha mē vējasattiṁ. iyāṇi cēva pannavēmiḥ kiṁ tu nicchiēṇa hōyavvaṁ, na dāyavvō mōhapasarō,
na sōyavvaṁ vayaṇamakallāṇamittāṇaṁ, na kāyavvā kusīlasaṁsaggī, na bahu manniyanvaṁ ihalōyavatthu, na mottavyō ahaṁ, na khaṇḍiyā mama
āṇattī.’paḍissuyamaṇēṇaṁ. taō ālihiyaṁ vejjēṇa mantamaṇḍalaṁ, miliō nayarijaṇavaō, ṭhāviō maṇḍalaṁmi arahadattō, savvajaṇa
samakkhamēva ahimantiūṇa paüttāī ōsahāī, ṭhaïō dhavalapaḍaēṇaṁ, mumariyā māiṭṭhāṇavijjā, dēvasattīē kōlāhalī kō aïsō. tī
mōyāvēūṇa akkandabhēravē, lōhāviūṇa mahiyalaṁmi, bhannāviūṇa aṅgamagāī. gamiuṁ vicittamōhē jambālakalamalō aïbhīsaṇō rūvēṇaṁ
asōyavabhāsī [savaṇapanthāō puṭṭhō kiṁ puṇa daṁsaṇassa] durahigandhiṇā dēhēṇa niyarūvasarisaaṭhṭhattaravāhisayaparivāriō vivāga
sabassaṁ piva pāvakammassa nipphēḍiō sē muttimantō cēva māyāvāhi tti. diṭṭhī ya lōēṇaṁ. taō vimhiō lōō. kō pēṇa
kōlāhalō. ahō mahāṇubhāvayā sabaravejjassa, aübavejjamaggēṇa adiṭṭapuvvēṇa amhārisēhiṁ nipphēḍi kō muttimantō.cē vāhi tti.
ahō acchariyaṁ paüṇō arahadattō, vāhivigamēṇa samāgayā sē nidā. thēvavēlāē paḍibōhiō sabaravejjēṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇaṁ. bhadda,
pecchappaṇoccayaṁ mahāpāvakammavāhiṁ. tā tahā karejjāsi, na uṇō jahā imēṇaṁ gheppasi tti. diṭō arahadattēṇaṁ. vimhiō ēsō. jāyaṁ
sē bhayaṁ. bhaṇiō ya sabaravejjēṇaṁ. bhadda, mōyāviōtāva tumaṁ maē imāō pāvakammavāhikilēsāō, pāviō āroggasuhekkadēsaṁ. aō:
para bhadaṇa sayamava tahā kāyavya, jahā sayalapāvakammavāhāvagamā hāi, tāvagama yasapājassaï ta janmajarāmaraṇāvarāhaya ēgantāna
ppañcavāyaṁ āsaṁsāramēpattapuvvaṁ āroggasuhaṁ ti. ahaṁ pi gahiō cēva imiṇā pāvakammavāhiṇā; avaṇīyā ya bhavī viya kāi mattā
imassa maē, sēsāvaṇayaṇatthaṁ ca ‘ajōgō uttimōvāyarasa’ tti payaṭṭō imiṇā payārēṇaṁ. tā tumaṁ pi uttamōvāyaṁ vā paḍivajja ēyaṁ vā
majjha santiyaṁ ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti. lōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ‘kō uṇa ettha uttamōvāō. sabaravejjēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jiṇasāsaṇaṁmi pavajjāpavajjaṇaṁ.
tattha khalu paḍivannāē pavvajjāē parivālijjamāṇīē jahāvihiṁ na saṁbhavaï ēsa vāhī, sigyamēva ya avēi avasēsaṁ ti. īisā ya majjha
jāī, jēṇa na hōi sā imīē sayaladukkhasēlavajjāsaṇī mahāpavvajjā. tumaṁ puṇa bhada uttamajāiguṇaō joggō imīē mahāpabajjāē. tā
ēyaṁ vā geṇha, gahiyagōṇataō maē vā saha viharasu tti. lōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō sundaramimaṁ, tujjha bhāyā vi pavyaïō cēva, tā ēyaṁ
vavasasu’ ti.

taō arahadattēṇa aṇicchamāṇēṇāvi cittēṇaṁ paḍivanamēyaṁ. āgaō kōi tahāvihō sāhū. taō paḍivanō ēyassa samīvē
pavvajja davvaō, na uṇa bhāvaō tti. gaō sabaravējō.

aïkkantā kaïvi diyahā. micchattōdaēṇaṁ ca samuppannā imassa araī. taō paricaya pōrusaṁ, aṇvekkhiūṇa niyayakulaṁ,
agaṇiūṇa vyaṇijja, aṇālōiūṇa āyaī pariccattamaṇēṇa davvaliṅgaṁ. āgō sagihaṁ. pabattō paḍikūlasēvaṇē. gayā kaïvi vāsarā.
ābhōiyaṁ dēvēṇa. kaō sē puvyavāhī. visaṇṇō ēsō. nindiō lōēṇaṁ. saṁsārasiṇēhēṇaṁ gaviṭhō sē bandhavēhiṁ sabaravē jō. laddhō
devvajōēṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya ṇēhiṁ. bhadda, kuviō sō tassa vāhī. tā karēhi sē aṇuggaha, uvasāmēhi ēyaṁ’ ti. savaravejjēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
kiṁ kayamapacchaṁti. bandhavēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadda, lajjiyā amhē tassa cariēṇaṁ; tahāvi karēha aṇuggahaṁ ti. sabaravejjēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
jaï ēvaṁ puṇō vi pavvayaï. taō aṇicchamāṇō vi hiyaēṇa pavvaïō. tahēba upasāmiūga vāhiṁ gattō sabaravē jō.

aïkkantēsu kaïvayadiṇēsu tahēva uppannaïō. āhōiyaṁ dēvēṇaṁ. kaō sē tivvayaravēyaṇō vāhī. bhaṇiō ya bandhavēhiṁ. kiṁ
tuma ēvaṁ pi attāṇayaṁ na lakkhēsi. tā paricayasu vā jīviyaṁ, karēhi vā tassa vayaṇaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. karēmi saṁpayaṁ, jaï ta
pecchāmi tti. gavēsiō sabaravējō bandhavēhi, diṭṭhō ya dēvajīēṇaṁ. lajāvaṇayavayaṇaṁ bhaṇiō ya ṇēhiṁ. ajuttaṁ cēva vavasiyaṁ tē puttaēṇa,
gahiō ya ēsō tivvayarēṇa vāhiṇā; tā kō uṇa iha uvāō tti. sabaravejjēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. natthi tassa uvāō;
visayalōluō khu ēsō purisayārarahiō ya. tā thēvamiyamēyassa, bahuyayarāō ya aggaō tiriyanāraēsu viḍambaṇāō. tahāvi
tumhāṇa uvarōhaō cikicchāmi ekkasi, jaha mara cēva saha hiṇḍaïtti. paḍivanamaṇēhiṁ, sāhiyaṁ ca arahadattassa. saṁkhuddhō ya ēsō.
tahāvi kā annā gaï’ ti cintiūṇa paḍivanamaṇēṇa. āṇiō sabaravejjō. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇaṁ. bhadda, pacchimā kheḍḍiyā; tā
sundarēṇa hōyanvaṁ. savvahā jama karēmi, taṁ cēva tumaē kāyavvaṁ na mottavyō ya ahayaṁ ti. paḍivannaṁ arahadattēṇaṁ. tigicchiō
ya ēsō. bhaṇiō ya lōēṇaṁ. bhō satyavāhaputta, mā saṁpayaṁ pi kupurisacedriyaṁ kaïrissasi. samappiō sē gōṇattaō. niggayā
nayarīō, gayā ya gāmantaraṁ. kayā dēvēṇa māyā. didaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ dhūmandhayāriyaṁ nahayalaṁ, suō hāhārabagabbhiṇō saphuṭṭaṇasaddō,
pulaïyā didvidukkhayā jālāvalī. vināyaṁ ya ṇēhiṁ, jahā palittō ēsa gāmō tti. taō vijjhatraṇanimittaṁ ghettūṇa taṇabhārayaṁ
dhāviō dēvō. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇaṁ. bhō ki taṇabhārapaṇaṁ palittaṁ vijhavijjaï. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimettiyaṁ viyāṇāsi. tēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ na-yāṇāmi. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï jāṇasi, tā kahamannāṇapavaṇasaṁdhukkiyaṁ aṇēgadēhindhaṇaṁ kōhāisaṁpalittaṁ gahiya
dēhindhaṇō puṇō vi gihavāsaṁ pavisasi. ṭhiō tuhikkō, na saṁbuddhō ya.

gayā kaṁci bhūmibhāgaṁ. payaṭṭō dēvō tikkhakaṇṭayāulēṇaṁ aṭavimaggēṇaṁ. iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō kiṁ puṇa turma panthaṁ mottūṇa aḍaviṁ
pavisasi. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimattiyaṁ jāṇasi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ na-yāṇāmi. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï jāṇasi, tā kahaṁ mokkha
maggaṁ mottūṇa aṇēgavasaṇasāvayasaṁkulaṁ saṁsārāḍaviṁ pavisasi. ṭhiō tuṇhikkō, na saṁbuddhō ya. gayā kaṁci bhūmibhāgaṁ. āvāsiyā
gāmadēvaülē. tattha puṇa vāṇamaṁtarō lōēṇa accijamāṇō heḍhāmuhō paḍaï; puṇō vi ṭhaviō, puṇō vi paḍaï. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō
vāṇamaṁtarassa ahannayā, jō acciō uvarihuttō ya kaō hēṭāmuhō paḍaï. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimēyaṁ viyāṇasi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimettha

gayā kaṁci bhūmibhāgaṁ. diṭṭhō ya nāṇāpayārē kaṇiyakuṇḍaē caïūṇa añcantadurahigandhaasuiyaṁ bhuñjamāṇaō sūyarō. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
ahō avivēgō sūyarassa, jō kaṇiyakuṇḍaē caïūṇa asuiyaṁ bhuñjaï tti. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimettiyaṁ riyāṇasi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
kimetya viyāṇiyabvaṁ. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā kīsa tumaṁ añcantasuharūvaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ caïūṇa asuiē visaē bahu manasi tti.
ṭhiō tuhikō na saṁbuddhō ya.

gayā thēvaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ. kayā dēvēṇa māyā. diṭṭhō ya ṇēhiṁ chettantarōvāriyādradēsaṭṭhiyavimukajuṁjumayacārī sukavataḍekkadēsa
saṁjāyadurubyāpavālalavabaddhāhilāsō tannimittamēva ajjhavasāēṇaṁ kūṣapaḍaṇēṇaṁ aṇāsāiūṇa durubyāpavālalavaṁ visamapaḍikūvēkādēsēsu
saṁcuṇiyaṅgōvaṅgō baïllō tti. taṁ ca daṇaṁ bhaṇiya āhadattaṇaṁ. ahō mūḍhayā badallassa, jēga mottūṇa jujumayacāriṁ kūvavaḍataḍa
saṁṭhiyaṁ duruvyālavamahilasantō tatthēva paḍiō. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kimettiyaṁ viyāṇasi. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kahaṁ na-yāṇāmi. dēvēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï jāṇasi, tā kahaṁ chettantarōvāriyajujumayacārikappaṁ mahantaṁ surasokkhamujjhiya durubvāpavālalavatullē tucchē māṇusa
sokkhaṁmi baddhāhilāsō pāḍēsi appāṇayaṁ sukkakūbasarisīē doggaīē ti.

ēyam āyaṇṇiūṇa viyaliō sē kammarāsī. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō amāṇusō ēsō. kahamanahā ēvaṁ vāharaï. sōhaṇaṁ ca
ēyaṁ. bhāyā vi mē ēvaṁ cēva kahiyavvaṁ ti. tā pucchāmi tāva, kō uṇa ettha paramatthō tti. pucchiō ya. bhō kō uṇa tumaṁ
asōyadattō viya mama vacchalō tti. dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. pariyāyantaragaō sō cēva asōyadattō mhi. iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kō paccaō।
5paṇa māṇaya! tuma5 ma5.5 pāḍavāhānāmata āāsa jahā vayapatraē kuṇḍalajuvalaya ṭhāvaya, tā ta cavaṁ dasāma ti; kimannaṇa
paca ēṇaṁti. paḍissuyamaṇēṇaṁ. taō divvarūvēṇa hōūṇaṁ nīō vēyaḍūpavvayaṁ, daṁsiyaṁ sē siddhāyayaṇakūḍaṁmi rayaṇāvayaṁsayaṁ kuṇḍalajuvalayaṁ.
taṁ cēva pekkhi ūṇa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa samupapannaṁ jāīsaraṇaṁ. paḍibuddhō ēsō, padaïō ya bhāvaō. khāmiō dēvēṇaṁ.
gaō dēvō.

tāṇaṁ ca ahayaṁ, bhī dharaṇa, purōhiyakumārō tti. tā na ēvaṁ, dēvāṇuppiyā, aṇabhatthakusalamūlāṇaṁ virāyāṇaṁ ca buddhī havaï,
na ya avirāhayāṇaṁ viṇijiyamahāmōhasattūṇaṁ aṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ na nivvahaï, na ya imāō annaṁ sundarayaraṁ ti. tā samīhiyasaṁmāyaṇēṇa karēhi
sakalaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ. dharaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ bhayavaṁ āṇavēi, kiṁ tu sāhēmi jaṇaṇijaṇayāṇamēyavaïyaraṁ, kayāi saṁbujjhani ti. bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ. juttamēyaṁ. taō paḍibuddhavayaṁsayasamēō paviṭhṭhō nayariṁ. kahiō ya ṇēṇa jaṇaṇijaṇayāṇa vaïyarō. paḍibuddhā ya ēē. salā
hiō gihāsamapariccāō. kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijja. pavanō jahāvihīē saha jaṇaṇijaṇaēhiṁ vayaṁsaēhi ya arahadattagurusamī vē samaṇattaṇaṁ.

aïkkantō kōī kālō. ahijjiyaṁ sutaṁ, āsēviō kiriyākalāvō. saṁpattaü ēgallavihārapaḍimāpaḍivattijoggayaṁ. samuppannā
sē icchā. pucchiyā ya ṇēṇa guravō, ‘uciō’ tti kaliūṇa aṇujāṇiō ya ṇēhiṁ. bhāviyāō bhāvaṇāō. paḍivannō ēgalla
vihārapaḍimaṁ. gāmē ēgarāēṇa nagarē paścarāēṇa ya viharamāṇō samāgaō tāmalittiṁ. ṭhiō paḍimāē.
iō ya sā lacchī dēvaüranivāsiyā gavēsāviyā suvayaṇēṇa, diṭṭhā ya nandivaddhaṇābhihāṇasannivēsē, ghaḍiyā ya ṇēṇaṁ. taō
sō taṁ gahēūṇa gaō niyayadīvaṁ.

aïkkantō kōi kālō. puṇō āgaō tāmalittiṁ. ṭhiō bāhiriyāē. diṭṭhō va sō risī ujāṇamuvagayāē kahavi lacchīē,
paccabhinnāō yaṇāē. taō garuyayāē kammēpariṇāmassa viyambhiō sē kōvāṇalō. āhayā viya vajjēṇaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. ahō
mē pāvapariṇaī, puṇō vi ēsō diṭṭhō tti. tā imaṁ etya pattayālaṁ. ṭhavēmi aïyassa samīvē chinnakaṅkaṇaṁ kaṇṭhāharaṇaṁ, ‘ahō muṭṭhā muṭṭha’ tti
karēmi kōlāhalaṁ. tō vivittayāē ujjāṇassa darisaṇēṇa kaṇṭhāharaṇassa saṁbhāviyacōrabhāvō caṇḍasāsaṇēṇa rāiṇā vāvāijissaï ti.
gahiyā ya suē bhikkhurūvadhāriṇō salottā cēva takrā vāvāiyā ya. tā ‘liṅgiṇō vi cōriyaṁ karenti’ samuppannā pasiddhi ti. cinti
ūṇa saṁpāḍiyamimīē. dhāviyā ārakkhiyā, gahiō sō risī. bollāviō tēhi ya jāva na jaṁpaï tti, gavēsiyaṁ kaṇṭhāharaṇaṁ diṭaṁ ca
nāidūrē. taō ‘chinnakaṅkaṇaṁ’ ti sadāviyā nayarijaṇavayā. sāhiyaṁ naravaïssa. ‘ahō aünbō takkarotti vimhiō rāyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇaṁ, nirūviūṇa vāvāēha tti. pucchiō daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ. jāva na jaṁpaï ti, tō ‘ahō sē kavaḍavēsō’ tti ahiyayaraṁ kuvirahiṁ
pāviō vajjhathāma ti. nihayā mūliyā. ukkhittō muṇivarō. āghōsiyaṁ caṇḍālēṇaṁ. bhō bhō nāyarayā, ēēṇa samaṇavēsadhāriṇā
paradavyāvahārō kō tti vāvāijjaï ēsō; tā annō vi jaï paradavyāvahāraṁ karissaï, taṁ pi rāyā sutikkhēṇaṁ daṇḍēga ēvaṁ cēva vāvā
issaï tti. bhaṇiūṇa mukkō ya sō bhaya caṇḍālēhimuvari sūliyāē. tavappahāvēṇa dharaṇitalamuvagayā sūliyā, na viddhō khu ahā
sannihiyadēvayāniōēṇaṁ, niyaḍiyā kusumavuṭṭī. ‘jayaï bhayavaṁ dhammō'ni uhāiō kalayalō. sāhiyaṁ naravaïssa. saṁjāyapamōō
ya āgaō rāyā. vandiō ṇēṇa bhayavaṁ. pucchiō vimhiyamaṇēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kahaṁ puṇa imaṁ vattaṁ ti. na jaṁpiyaṁ bhayavayā. bhaṇiya
mantiṇā. dēva, vayavisēsasaṁgaō khu ēsō, kahamiyāṇi pi mantaïssaï. tā taṁ cetra satthavāhapariṇi saddāvēūṇa pucchēha ।
tō pēsiyā daṇḍavāsiyā. jagaravāō imaṁ vaïyaraṁ āyaṇiūga palāṇā ēsā, na diṭṭhā daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ. nivēiyaṁ ca rāiṇō
dēva, palāṇā khu aïsā, na dīsaē gēhamāiēmuṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. arē samma gavēsiūṇaṁ āṇēhaï. gayā daṇḍavāsiyā. gaviṭṭhā
ārāmasunnadēvaülāiēsuṁ. na diṭṭhā ēsā. divō ya kuōi ēyamāyaṇṇiya ēyavaïyarēṇēva palāyamāṇō suvayaṇō. gahiō daṇḍavāsi
ēhiṁ, āṇīō naravaïsamīyaṁ. nivēiyaṁ rāiṇō. dēva, nathi sā tāpalittīē, ēsō ya kila tīē bhattārō tti, diṭṭhō ya palāyamāṇō
gahiō amhē hiṁ; saṁpayaṁ dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. nirūviō suvayaṇō, bhaṇiō ya ēsō. bhadda, kahiṁ tē ghariṇi tti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva,
na jāṇāmi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. tā kīsa tumaṁ palāṇō tti. mutrayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, bhaēṇa. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kuō niravarāhassa
bhayaṁ. suvayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, atthi aparāhō. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kō abarāhō. suvayaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, tahāvihakalattasaṁgahō
tti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhō abhayamēva tujhaṁ. tā sāhēhi avitaha, kō uṇa bhayavō tīē ya vaïyarō ti. nirūviō suvayaṇēṇa
bhayavaṁ, paccabhinnāō yaṇēṇaṁ. taō mahāpurisacariyavimhayakkhittahiyaēṇaṁ bāhollalōyaṇaṁ jaṁpiyamaṇēṇaṁ. dēva, agācikkhaṇīō vaï
yarō, tā ṇa sakkuṇōmi ācikkhiuṁ. rāiṇā maṇiyaṁ. bhadda, īisō ēsa saṁsārō, kimetya apubvayaṁ ti; tā sāhēu bhadō. suyavaṇēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, jaï ēvaṁ, tā vivittamāisaü dēvō. taōrāiṇā pulōiō pariyaṇō ōsariō ya. taō dharagadaṁpaṇasaṁjāyapacchāyāvēṇa
jaṁpiyaṁ muvayaṇēṇaṁ. dēva pāvakammō ahaṁ purisastāramēō, na uṇa ‘purisō tti. nivēiyaṁ dēvassa. purisō khu dēva akajjāyaraṇaviraō
saccāhisandhī kayannuō paralōya bhīrū parōvayāraniraō ya havaï, jahā ēsa bhayavaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kahamēvaṁvihō purisasāramēō
havaï tti,tā patthuyaṁ bhaṇasu. taō sāhiō suvayaṇēṇaṁ dīvadaṁsaṇāiō advasubannalakkhapayāṇapajjavasāṇō dharaṇavaïyarō. tuṭhō ya sē rāyā।
mukkō ya ṇēṇa suvayaṇō. vandiūṇa bhayavantaṁ lajjāparāhīṇayāē turiyamēva gaō sutrayaṇō. dharaṇāṇurāēṇa ya ajjamaṁgusamīvē sōūṇa
dhamma pariyāṇiūṇa micchattaṁ pacchāṇuyāvāṇaladaṭṭakammindhaṇō pavannō samaṇakṣaṇaṁ. rāyā vi pūiūṇa bhayavantaṁ paviṭṭhō nayariṁ.
lacchī vi mahābhayābhibhūyā palāiūṇa tāmalittīō avahariyavasaṇālaṁkārā takarahiṁ jāmamettāē sabarīē pattā kusatthalābhi
hāṇaṁ sannivēsaṁ. tattha puṇa tīē cēva rayaṇīē pāradaṁ purōhiēṇaṁ rāyamahisīē sabavigyavidhāyayaṁ carukammaṁ. pajjāliō sanni.
vēsapāhiriyāē caüppahathaṇḍilaṁmi jalaṇō, viiṇṇā nisiyakaḍriyāsiṇō disāvālā, samārōviō nahabhinnatandulasamēō carū,
patthuō mantajāvō. etthantaraṁmi jalantamavalōiūṇa ‘satyō bhavissaī’ ti āgayā lacchī, sivārāsamaṇantaraṁ ca diṭṭhā disābālēhiṁ.
pecchiūṇa ‘ahō ēsā sā rakkhasi’ tti bhīyā ya ēē, mukkāī maṇḍalaggāī, thambhiyā ūruyā, payampiyāō bhuyāō, vimukkā viya
jīviēṇaṁ nivaḍiyā dharaṇivaḍhē. etthantaraṁmi ‘bhō bhō mā bīhasu, itthiyā ahaṁ’ ti bhaṇamāṇī samāgayā purōhiyasamīvaṁ. diṭṭhā
vigayavasaṇā. taō pōrusamavalambiūṇa ‘svakhasī ēsa’ tti kēsēsu gahiyā aṇēṇaṁ. ‘arē mā bīhasu’ tti vibōhiyā disāvālā.
uṭṭhiyā ya ēē. baddhā khu ēsā. pēsiyā sanivēsaṁ. sāhiyaṁ naravaïssa. tēṇa vi ya ‘na pīisajjhā rakkhasi’ ti khāviūṇa
niyayamaṁsaṁ, vidyāliūṇa asuiṇā, kayatthiūṇa nāṇāviḍambaṇāhiṁ, nimacchi ūṇa ya sarōsaṁ taō nivāsiya tti. alabhamāṇī ya
gāmāisu pavēsaṁ paribhamantī aḍavīē puvakayakammapariṇāmēṇa viya ghōrarūvēṇaṁ vāvāiyā maïndēṇaṁ. samuppannā ya ēsā dhūmappahāē
nirayapuḍhavīē sattarasasāgarōvamaṭṭiī nāragō ti.

dharaṇō vi bhagavaṁ ahāsaṁjamaṁ vihariūṇa pabaḍḍamāṇamuhapariṇāmō kāūṇa saṁlēhaṇaṁ pavannō pāyavagamaṇaṁ. vivannō kālakkamēṇaṁ,
samuppannō āraṇābhihāṇē dēvalōē candakantē vimāṇē ēkavīsasāgarōvamāū vēmāṇiō tti.

lg.l: vakkhāyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ dharaṇō lacchī ya taha ya païbha jā

div.p:
atthi ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē sēsaphaṇābhōyasagnihēṇa pāyārēṇa himagirisiharasarisēhiṁ bhavaṇēhi lahuiyanandaṇa
vaṇēhi uvavaṇēhiṁ viṇijiyamāṇasasarēhiṁ sarēhiṁ campā nāma nayarī. jīē ahiṭṭhāṇaṁ viya rūvassa bīyaṁ viya sundarayāē jōṇī
viya viṇayassa ceṭṭhiyaṁ viya mayarakē uṇō saṁsāraṁmi vi ramaṇīyabuddhijaṇaō itthiyāyaṇō. jīē ya apisuṇō amaccharī kayannū
dakkhō suhābhigamaṇīō purisavaggō. tīē ya dariyārimaddaṇō amara sēṇō nāma naïravaī hotthā.

iō ya sō āraṇakappavāsī dēvō ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa taō cuō samāṇō avasundarīē gambhaṁmi upavanō tti. diṭṭhō ya gāē
suviṇayaṁmi tīē cēva rayaṇīē pahāyasamayaṁmi kaṇayamayatuṅgadaïṇḍō aṇēyarayaṇabhūsiō dēvadūsāvalambiyapaḍāō maharapavaṇandōlirō
nivāsō vya rammayāra bhūsaṇaṁ viya nahayalassa utpattī viya vimhayāṇaṁ cakkarayaṇacūḍāmaṇī mahādhō vaïyaṇēṇagyaraṁ pavisamāṇō tti.
pāsiūṇa taṁ suhaviuddhā ēsā. siṭṭhō ya ṇāē jahāvihiṁ daïyassa. harisaksapayaṭṭapula ēṇa bhaṇiyā ya ṇēṇaṁ. sundari, sayalanarindakēu
bhūō puttō tē bhavissaï. paḍissuyamimīē. ahiyayaraṁ paritudvā ēsā. taō ya savi sēsaṁ tibaggasaṁpāyaṇarayāē pattō pasūisamaō.
pasūyā ēsā. jāō sē dārō. nivēiyaṁ ca rāiṇō amarasēṇasta harisamaïnāmāē cēḍiyāē, jahā ‘mahārāya, dēvī jayasundarī
dārayaṁ pasya’ tti. parituṭṭō rāyā. dinnaṁ imīē pāritōsiyaṁ. kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijja. aïyantō māsō. païṭṭhādhiyaṁ nāmaṁ dāra
yassa sēṇō ti. aïkantō saṁvaccharō.

etthantaraṁmi sō lacchījīvanārakō taō narayāō uvyaṭṭiya puṇō ya saṁsāramāhiṇḍiya agantarabhavē tahāvihaṁ kipi aṇuṭāṇaṁ
kāūṇa samuppanō amarasēṇabhāuṇō haï risēṇajubarāyaspa tārappahāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē ti. jāō uciyamamaēṇaṁ.
païṭṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāmaṁ bisēṇō tti. aïkantō kōi kālō. vaḍiō kumārasēṇō dēhōvacaēṇaṁ kalākalāvēṇa ya. atthi ya imassa
pīī visēṇakumārē, na uṇa tassa iyaraṁmi.

annayā ya samuddhāiō nayarī ē jayajayaravō, ahiṭiyaṁ nahayalaṁ surasiddhavijjāharēhi, niyaḍiyā kusumavuṭī. taō gaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ.
bhō bhō kimēyaṁ ti gavēsiūṇa lahuṁ saṁvāraha. taō gavēsiūṇa nivēiyaṁ sē paḍihārēṇaṁ. dēva, samuppannametya bhūyabhavissavattamāṇatya
gāhayaṁ sayalalōyālōyavisayaṁ sāhūṇīē kēvalanāṇaṁ ti. āṇandiyā nayarī, pamuiyā surasiddhavijāharā thuṇanti mahuravaggr̥hi.
ēyaṁ sōūṇa dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. taō harisiō rāyā payaṭṭō bandaṇanimittaṁ bhayavaīē.

lg.l: pattō ya sō kamēṇaṁ paḍissayaṁ dhamnagihiyaṇiyacittō
diṭṭhā ya tēṇa tēhi ya nisthiṇṇabhavaṇṇavā tahiṁ gaṇiṇī

div.p:
ahiṇandiyā rāiṇā bhayavaī. vimukaṁ kusumavarisaṁ, uggāhiō dhūyō. karayalakayañjaliuḍaṁ nivaḍiō caḷaṇēsu, uvaviṭṭhō
