bhōyaṇaṁ sāṇāibhaēṇaṁ ca bandhiūṇa kiṁḍiyāduvāraṁ gayā tattha ēsā. thēvavēlāē ya samāgaō saggō. vimukkaṁ sāgindhaṇaṁ. nirūviyā
jaṇaṇī. jāva natthi tti khuhāpivāsāhibhūyattaṇēṇa kuviō ēsō. na nirūviyamaṇēṇa sikkayaṁ. thēvēlāē ya vūḍhē vi pāṇiē
vāvaḍayāra sēhimāṇu sēhiṁ na kiṁci vi dinnaṁ ti paḍivanā dīṇayāē avaṭhṭhaddhā mahāvisāraṇaṁ vidāṇacittā samāgayā candā. taṁ
ca tahā pecchiūṇa kōhavasaraṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ saggēṇaṁ. tahiṁ gayā cēva maliyāē bhinnā tuma ti. vīsariyā vēlā amhāṇaṁ chuhābhibhūyāṇaṁ—

lg.l: tīē vi kiṁvaṇabhāvēṇa tahā dukkhapīḍiyāē jaṁpiyamiṇaṁ
tujha puṇa chinnā hattha tti, jēṇa sikamāō vi geṇhiūṇa na bhuñjasi

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi ēvaṁvihavayaṇaducariyapaccayaṁ baddhamimēhi kammaṁ. aïkkantō kōi kālō. annayā ya vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa
bhaviyavvayāē ya ēēsi visiṭṭhaphalasāhagattaṇēṇa jīvavīriyassa māṇatuṅgagaṇisamīvē pattā imēhiṁ jiṇadhammabōhī, gahiyaṁ sāvayattaṇaṁ,
pāliyaṁ kaṁci kālaṁ. pavaḍḍamāṇasuhapariṇāmāṇa ya jāō caraṇapariṇāmō. pavannāṇi pavajja. pāliyaṁ cārittaṁ. carimakālē ya kāūṇa
saṁlēhaṇaṁ āgamamaṇiēṇa vihiṇā caïūṇa dēha pañjaraṁ samuppannāṇi surēlōē. tattha vi ya ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa paḍhamayaramēva cuō sagga
dēvō. samuppannō ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē tāmalittīē nayarīē kumāradēvassa sēhissa jujiyāē bhāriyāē kucchisi
puttattāē ti. jāō kālakkamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma aruṇadēvō tti. pattō kumārabhāva. esthantarammi cuō candājīvadēvō.
samuppannō pāḍalāvahē nayarē jasāiccasedvissa īluyāē bhāriyāē kucchisi itthiyattāē. jāyā kālakkamēṇaṁ. païṭāviyaṁ ca sē
nāma dēiṇi tti. pattā kumāribhāvaṁ. bhaviyadhayāniōgēṇa dinnā aruṇadēvasta. attē cēva vivāhē jāṇavattēṇa vavaharaṇanimita
mahākaḍāī gaō aruṇadēvō. samāgacchamāṇassa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa vivannaṁ jāṇavattaṁ. tannayaravatthavvayamahēsaraduiō
phalahaēṇa lajiūṇa jalanihiṁ laggō samudatīrē. kahāṇa yavisē sēṇa samāgaō pāḍalāvahaṁ. bhaṇiō ya mahēsarēṇa. kumāra, ettha
bhavaō sasurakulaṁ ti; tā tahiṁ pavisamha. aruṇa dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, na juttō mē ēyāvatthagayarasa sasurakulapavēsō. mahēsarēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, jaï ēvaṁ, tā ciṭṭha tātra tumaṁ entha dēvaülē, jāva āṇēmi haṭāō ahaṁ kiści bhōyagajāyaṁ ti. paḍissuyamaruṇa
dēvēṇaṁ. taō mahēsarō paviṭṭhō pāḍalāvahaṁ. nuvannō aruṇa dēvō tattha dēvaülē. addhāṇakhēēṇa ya samāgayā sē nidā.

etthantaraṁmi uiṇṇaṁ dēiṇīē punmabhava paściyaṁ ‘tujjha puṇa chinnā hattha tti, jēṇa sikayāō vi gihiūga saṁyaṁ na bhuñjasi’ tti
ēvaṁvihavayaṇaduccariyapaccayaṁ saṅkiliṭṭakammaṁ. bhavaṇu jāṇasaṁṭhiyā gahiyā takarēṇa. diḍhaṁ sē mahāmahagdhaṁ māṇikakaḍayajuvalaṁ. addhagahiyama
ṇēṇaṁ jāva aïgāḍhattaṇēṇaṁ na tīraïi geṇhium̐, kaḍḍiyā ṇēga churiyā. guṁjjiyaṁ sē vayaṇaṁ, chinnā ya hatthā. geṇhiūṇa kaḍayajuyalaṁ palāi
umāraddhō. diṭṭhō ujāṇavālīē. akkandiyaṁ ca ṇāē. dhāviyā daṇḍavāsiyā. palāṇō takarō. diṭṭhōya daṇḍāsiēhiṁ. dhāviyā ēē
takarāṇusārēṇa. takarō vi duyagamaṇakhīṇasa tī sāsasamātriyāṇaṇō ‘na caēmi aō paraṁ palāium̐’ ti putrabhaṇḍiyaṁ cēva paviṭhṭhō taṁ
jiṇṇadēvaülaṁ, jatya aruṇadēvō tti. etthantaraṁmi ya uiṇṇaṁ aruṇadēvassa pubbabhavasaṁciya, jahā ‘tahiṁ gayā cēva sūliyāē bhinnā tuma,
vīsariyā vēlā amhāṇaṁ chuhābhibhūyāṇaṁ' ēvaṁ vihavayaṇaduccariyapaccayaṁ saṁkiliṭukammaṁ. takarō vi ya ‘ēsa etya upāō’ ti aruṇadēva
samīvē mēliṁūṇa kaḍayajuvalayasa gāhaṁ churiyaṁ puvvabhaṇḍiyaṁ cēva ahiṭiō andhayārasaṁgayaṁ siharadēsaṁ. uḍiō aruṇadēvō. diṭṭhamaṇēṇa
kaḍayajuvalaṁ churiyā ya. kammapariṇaïvasēṇa gahiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ‘nūṇamēyaṁ dēvayāviinna’ ti saṅgōviyaṁ uḍḍiyāē. gahiyā churiyā. ‘ēsā
puṇa kaha’ ti nirūpayantassa samāgayā daṇḍavāsiyā. tē pecchiūṇa saṁkhuddhō aruṇadēvō. bhaṇiyō ya ṇēhiṁ. arē durāyāra, kahi
vaccasi. taō hatyāō cēva nivaḍiyā churiyā. gahiō daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. anja, kiṁmaē kayaṁ. daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ devyacōiyā karanti; tā samappēhi taṁ kaḍayajuyalaṁ. aruṇadēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. anja, na yāṇāmi kaḍayajuvalaṁ ti. taō
kuviyā daṇḍavāsiyā. tāḍiō ya jēhiṁ. bhayābhibhūyassa ajattagōviyaṁ paḍiyaṁ kaḍayajuyalaṁ. gahiyaṁ daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ. niyamiō
ēsō. nīō naravaïsamīvaṁ. sāhiō ēsa vaïyarō naravaïssa. saritthaṁ pecchi ūṇa ajāyasaṅkēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā. nēha, sūlāē
bhindaha tti. taō naravaïsamāēsāṇantaramēva nīō vajjhatthāmaṁ ti. bhimrō sūliyāē.

etthantaraṁmi ghettūṇa bhōyaṇaṁ āgaō mahēsarō. nirūviyaṁ dēvaülaṁ. na diṭṭhō aruṇadēvō. gavēsiō āsanadēsēsu, tahavi na diṭṭhō
tti. āulīhūō mahēsarō. pucchiyā ṇēṇa dēvaülasamīvārāmavāsiṇō māliyā. bhō ēvaṁvihō seṭṭiputtō imāō dēvaülāō kuōi
gacchamāṇōna divō bhavantēhiṁ. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. ajja, na diṭṭhō gahiō etya cōrō, saṁpayaṁ vāvāiō ya. tā na yāṇāmō jaï kōuēṇa
tattha gaō tti. taō saṁkhuddhō mahēsarō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhaddā bhaddā, kahiṁ taṁ vajjhathāmaṁ. sāhiyaṁ māliēhiṁ. visaṇṇacittō gaō
mahēsarō. divō ya ṇēṇa mūliyāvibhinnadēhō dāruṇaṁ atthamaṇuhavantō aruṇa dēvō. ‘hā seṭṭiputta’ tti bhaṇamāṇō nivaḍiō mahēsarō;
mucchiō ya ēsō. kōuyāṇuyampāhi samāsāsiō pecchayajaṇēhiṁ. pucchiōya ṇēhiṁ. anja, kō ēsō sēṭiputtō tti. taō sagaggayaṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ mahēsarēṇa. hanta, kimēyāē kahāē. nivvattaṁ kahāṇayaṁ. ēsō khu tāmalittitilayabhūyassa puttō kumāra dēvassa iha nayaravatthavya
yassa jāmāuō jasāiccassa vahaṇabhaṅgēṇa viuttapariyaṇō ajjēva imaṁ nayaramāgaō ti. bhaṇiō ya maē. kumāra, ettha bhavaō sasura
kulaṁ ti; tātahiṁ pavisamha. tō jampiyamaṇēṇa. anja, na juttō mē ēyāvatyagayassa sasurakulapavēsō. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, jaï ēvaṁ,
tā ciṭṭha tāva tumaṁ ettha dēvaülē, jāva āṇēmi haṭāō ahaṁ kiṁpi bhōyaṇajāyaṁ ti. taō paḍissuyamaṇēṇa. gaō ya ahayaṁ pāva
kammō. samāgaō ghettūṇa bhaüyaṇaṁ. nirūviyaṁ dēvaülaṁ, jāvaṁ na diṭṭhī ti. tō pucchiyā mālāgārō. pisuṇiyamaṇēhiṁ, jahā
'gahiō saṁpayaṁ cēva ettha dēvaülāō cōrō bābāiō ya; tā nirūvēhi tattha; jaï kōugēṇa gaō’ tti. nirūviō vajjhathāmē.
aō paraṁ ‘ēsa didyō’ tti bhaṇiūṇa nivaḍiō dharaṇika tattavāluyāgaō viya macchō taḍaphaḍiō dharāē. uhiūṇa silāō
appāṇayaṁ vahiumāḍhattō ti. dhariō pecchayanaṇēhiṁ. phuṭṭō ya ēsa vaïyarō lōē. taō āyaṇṇiō jasāiccēṇa. dēiṇi ghettūṇa
āgaō ēsō. divō ṇēṇa aruṇadēvō pañcabhinnāō ya. ‘ahō mē ahannaya’ tti mucchiō saha dēiṇīē. samāsāsiō pariyaṇēṇa.
bhaṇiyaṁ jasāiccēṇa. kaṭṭāṇi mē nīsārēha. na sakkuṇōmi ēvaṁ sōyasaṁtā visahiuṁ; tā paricaēmi jīviyaṁ ti. savaṇaparaṁparāē
ēyaṁ sōūṇa kuviō daṇḍavāsiyāṇa rāyā. bhaṇiyamaṇēhiṁ. dēva, salottaō ēma diṭṭhō, na uṇa amhē jōiṇō tti. pañcāiō
ṇēhiṁ rāyā. samāgō jasāicapaccāyaṇanimittaṁ vajjhatyāmaṁ rāyā. bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇa seṭṭhī. anja, devyaṁ ettha avarajmaï, na uṇa
amhāṇa buddhī. tā alaṁ imiṇā yavasāēṇaṁ. ēvaṁvihā dēvapariṇaï ti.

etthantaraṁmi ‘ēyavaïyarēṇaṁ paḍibujjhanti etya bahavē pāṇiṇō’ tti muṇiūṇa samāgaō bhayavaṁ caüṇāṇī dēvasāhusamēō amarēsarō
nāma gaṇaharō।tappahāvēṇa mahēsarāīṇaṁ viyaliō sōyāṇubandhō. ahō aüvvadaṁsaṇō bhayavaṁ pasantō tiyasapūiō ya. jāyā dhammasa
vaṇabuddhī. kayaṁ bhayavaō tiyasēhi uciya karaṇijjaṁ, sōhiō dharaṇibhāō, varisiyaṁ gandhōdayaṁ, vimukkaṁ kusumavarisa, viubviyaṁ kañca
ṇapaümaṁ. uvaviṭṭhō tattha bhayavaṁ amarēsarō, patthuyā dhammakahā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhō bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, pariccayaha mōhanidaṁ, jaggēha
dhammajāgarēṇaṁ, pariharaha pāṇavahāiē pāvaṭṭhāṇē, aṅgīkarēha khantipamuhē guṇē, ujjhēha bhāvavēriyaṁ pamāyaṁ. pamā yavasaō hi jīvō thēvēṇa
vi aṇāyāradōsēṇa vivāyadāruṇāī pabhūyakālavēyaṇijjāī bandhēi kammāī, tavvivāēṇaṁ ca pāvēi sārīramāṇa sē dukkhē, jahā ēsa aru
ṇadēvō dēiṇī ya. taō naravaïpamuhēhiṁ pucchiō gaṇaharō. bhayavaṁ, kiṁ kayamaṇēhiṁ. etthantaraṁmi sāhiyaṁ bhayavayā nāṇamarēṇa puvaka
hiyaṁ kahāṇayaṁ. ahō ēihamettassa vi dukkaḍassa īisō vivāgō ti saṁviggā parisā. mucchiō aruṇadēvō dēśī ya. laddhā cēyaṇā,
samuppanna jāisaraṇaṁ, avagaō saṁkilē sō, āvaḍiō muhapariṇāmō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ, jaṁ bhayavayā āiṭēṁ ti. saṁbha
riyā amhēhiṁ puvvajāī. pāviyā jiṇadhammabōhī. ēvaṁ vihā kammapariṇaï ti avagayaṁ aṭṭajjhāṇaṁ, samuppannō saṁvēgō. tā paccakkhēhi
bhayavaṁ amhāṇamaṇasaṇaṁ ti. avaṇēhi jāijarāmaraṇarōgasōgabhayaṁ. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. aṇurūvamēyaṁ imāē apatyāē. visuddhapaccakkhāṇaṁ
hi avaṇēi bhavaparaṁpara, ucchāēi doggaī, ghaḍēi soggaīē, sāhēi suranarasuhāī, jaṇēi paramanivvāṇaṁ. taō naravaïsēṭisaṁmaēṇa pacca
kkhāyamaṇasaṇaṁ, ahiṇandiō ṇēhiṁ bhayavaṁ amarēsarō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. bhayavaṁ, suladdhaṁ ṇē māṇusattaṇa, jattha tumaṁ dhammasārahī. vici
ttakammapariṇāmavasayāṇaṁ ca ja kiṁci vasaṇamēyaṁ. tā āisaü bhayavaṁ, kiṁ amhēhiṁ kāyacaṁ ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. kayaṁ kāyavvaṁ.
tahāvi chaḍḍhēha sabvabhāvēsu dukkhamūlaṁ mamattaṁ, bhāvēha niravasē sēsu jīvēsu paramapayakāraṇaṁ metti, duguṁchēha suddhabhāvēṇaṁ puvvadukkaḍāī, bahu
mannēha titthayarapaṇīē nāṇadaṁsaṇacarittē, cintēha pamāyavajaṇēṇa paramapayasarūvaṁ ti. paḍissuyamaṇēhiṁ. pāraddhaṁ ca ēyaṁ jahāsattīē.

etthantaraṁmi saṁvēgamāgaēṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ narindēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, jaï ēdahamettassa vi dukkaḍassa īisō vivāō, tā kiṁ puṇa aṇuhavissanti
ēē uddāmapamāyavasayā aṇavekkhiyakāriṇō amhārisā pāṇiṇō tti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, īisī cēva ēsā kammapariṇaī, edda
hamettapamāyajaṇiyassa cēva ēvamāiyaṁ phalaṁ; ahiyayarasaṁciyassa u tiriyanāradamuṁ ti. tattha tivāō viḍambaṇāō pahūyakālāō ya।
tayavekkhāē ya ja kiṁci ēvaṁ ti. ēēṇaṁ cēva kāraṇēṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ tilaüyaguruṇā. suhāhilāsiṇā khu thēyō vi vajjiyavō pamāō. avi
ya. bhakkhiyavvaṁ visaṁ, saṁtappiyanyō vāhī, kīliyavvaṁ jalaṇēṇaṁ, kāyavyā sattusaṁgaī, vasiya bhuyaṅgēhiṁ; na uṇa kāyayō pamāō.
ihalōyāvagāriṇō visāī, ubhayalōyāvagārī ya pamāō tti. avi ya. pamāya sāmatthō, mahārāya, pariccayanti jīvā sayatthaṁ, paya
ṭṭanti sarahasamakajjē, na jōenti āyaī, na pecchanti patthuyaṁ, na muṇanti gurulāghavaṁ, na bahu mananti guruṁ, na bhāventi suhāsiyaṁ. taō
ya tē bandhiūṇa pāvakammayāiṁ vivāēṇa tēsiṁ nārayāiēmu paramāsuhaṭāṇēsu natthitaṁ saṁkilēsaṭṭhāṇaṁ, jaṁ na pāventi tti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ
bhayavaṁ, atthi uṇa kōi uvāō imasta āsēviyassa bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ, atthi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ, kīisō. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sanyā
rambhapariggahacāēṇa carittamettadhaṇēhiṁ appamāyārāhaṇaṁ ti. appamāō hi nāma, mahārāya, ēgantiyaṁ kammavāhiōsahaṁ, aṇindiyaṁ
savvalōē, āṇandiyaṁ buhāṇaṁ, savvassaṁ mahāṇubhāvassa, nippañcāyaṁ ubhayalōēmuṁ, ucchāyaṇaṁ miccha tassa, saṁghaṭṭaṇaṁ nāṇapariṇaīē, jaṇayaṁ
appamāyāisayassa, sāhaṇaṁ sayalakallāgāṇaṁ nivyattayaṁ paramāroggasokkhassa. paḍivanapamāyā khu pāṇiṇō tayappabhūimegha appamāyasā
matthēṇa pavamāṇasaṁvēgā niraïyārasīlayāē khaventi mahāpamāyasaṁciyāī kammāī, abhāvaō nimittassa na bandhanti ya navāī. tō ya,
tē dēvāṇuppiyā, khaviūṇa kamma jālaṁ saṁpāviūṇa kēvalaṁ apuṇarāgamaṇaṁ jāijarāmaragarōgasōgarahiyaṁ niruṣamasuhasamēyaṁ mokkhamaṇugaccha.
nti, na sēvanti tē puṇō pamāya ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ kinna paḍivanō appamāō ēēhiṁ, jēṇa eddahamētaṁ pi pamāyaceṭṭhiyaṁ ēēsi
mēvaṁ pariṇayaṁ ti. bhayavayā bhagiyaṁ. mahārāya, paḍivanōḥ kiṁ tu visamā kammapariṇaī na appamāyamettēṇa nirabasēsā khavīyaï, avi ya
appamāyāisaēṇaṁ, na paḍivanō ya ēsō imē hiṁ. appamāyamettēṇa vi ya khaviyāī ēvaṁ vihāī bahuvihāī bahuyāī ēēhiṁ, chinō ya puṇō
vi ēvaṁviha duccariyahēū aṇubandhō sēsakammayāṇaṁ, bhāviyaṁ bīyaṁ appamāyāisayassa. tā dhanāṇi ēyāṇi. ēdahamettō cēva ēēsi ēsa
kilēsō. aō cēva bhaṇiyaṁ bhayacyā viiyasaṁsāramokkhasarūvēṇa païsamayamēva kāyayō appamāō, visēsēṇa saṁbhariyavvāī puvadukka
ḍāī, saṁvēgāisaēṇa nindiyavvāṇi, appaṇā visuddhaviraïbhāvēṇa nivēiyabvāṇi guruṇō, niviyappēṇa kāyavvaṁ vihipuvvayaṁ pacchittaṁ.
ēvaṁ vivakkhabhūyavisiṭasuhapariṇāmanindaṇāijalaṇadaṭṭāṇaṁ kammabīyāṇaṁ appamāyāisayasamubhūyasuhajhāṇavaṇadavāṇuppattāṇa vā na hōi niya
mēṇa vivāgaṅkurappāī, na uṇa sēsayāṇaṁ. tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē pattē vi appamāē pamāyaceṭṭiyasaṁjāyakammapariṇaī aviruddha tti. taō
paḍibuddhō rāyā. karāviyaṁ savvabandhaṇavimōyaṇāiyaṁ uciyakaraṇijja. pavanō pavvajja saha jasāiccamahēsarēhi. ēyaṁ ca vaïyaramāyaṇṇi
ūṇa saṁjāyapacchāyāvō samāgaō sō kaḍayacōrō. nivvēyasāraṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, pāvakammō ahaṁ. maē kayamiṇaṁ nisaṁsacariyaṁ,
nāvekkhiō ubhayalōyasāhāraṇō dhammō, bahu manimō ahammō, dūsiyaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ, aṅgīkayā dukkhaparamparā. tā kiṁ imiṇā vayaṇamē
taphalēṇaṁ vāyāvittharēṇaṁ. bhayavaṁ, avassamahaṁ pāṇē pariccaēmi. ēvaṁ vavatthiē jahājuttamāīsasu tti. taō dinō bhayavayā uvaōgō,
āhōiō sē niyamakaraṇāṇubandhī nicchaō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. na tīraē imō ahiyayaraguṇamāyaṇaṁ kāuṁ, akantō mōhaparamabandhuṇā
sōēṇa, paṇaṭṭhā suddhadhīrayā, samāgayaṁ lōiyasundarattaṇaṁ. tā imaṁ patya pattayālaṁ ti. samālōciūṇa sāhiō aṇasaṇavihī. paḍivannaṁ
cōrēṇa aṇasaṇaṁ. dinō sē namōkārō. paḍicchiō cōrēṇa. nindiō bahuvihaṁ appā. vandiō bhayavaṁ. ahāuyakkhaēṇaṁ ca kāla
gaō aruṇadēvō dēiṇī ya takarō ya, samuppannāṇi suralōē. tā ēvaṁ varathiē asārarajjasaṁsāhaṇatyaṁ mahāsaṁgāmō tti asōhaṇamaṇuci
ṭṭhiyaṁ bhavayā. ēvaṁ sōūṇa samupapannacaragapariṇāmēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sēṇakumārēṇa. bhayavaṁ, kulaparihavāmarisiēṇāṇuciṭṭhiyamiṇaṁ, amundaraṁ ca tti
avagayamiyāṇi. suō bhayavaō sayāsē imassa uvasamōvāō. tā kimannēṇa; jaï uciō ahaṁ pavvajāē, tā karēha aṇuggaha, dēha
mama ēvaṁ ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sāhu, bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, sāhu, sōhaṇamajhavasiyaṁ. hēō cēva ēsa saṁsārō. vivēgasaṁpannō guruguṇabahu
māṇi tti uciō tuma paṁca jāē. tī lahuṁ saṁpāḍēhi samīhiyaṁ. pahavaï maṇōrahācalabajāsaṇī aṇiñcayā. tō kumārēṇa bhaṇiyō
amacō. aja, suyaṁ taē bhayavaō vayaṇamēyaṁ. saṁpāḍēmi ahamēyaṁ kiriyāē. hiyacintaō ya mē tuma. tā aṇumanasu tumaṁ ti. ama
ccēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. avigdhaṁ dēvassa. kiṁ tu vinavēmi dēvaṁ, aṭṭha divasāṇi imiṇā cēva samudācārēṇa aṇuggahēu maṁ dēvō. taō paricatta
mēva maē sāvajja. ‘ēsō vi cirayālōvaüttō suhī hōu’ ti cintiūṇa paḍissuyaṁ kumārēṇa. taō davāviyamamaccēṇāghōsaṇāghuvayaṁ
mahādāṇaṁ, karāviyā aṭṭhāhiyā mahimā, ṭhāviō rajjē kumāraputtō amarasēṇō, ahiṇandiyāō payāō, sammāṇiyā sāmantā, niuttā
mahantayā. tō pasatyē tihikaraṇamuhuttajōē aṇukūlēṇaṁ saüṇasaṁdhāraṇaṁ pavayaṇavaṇṇiēṇa vihiṇā samaṁ santimaīē amaraguruṣamuhapahā
ṇapariyaṇēṇa ya pavvaïō harisēṇagurusamīvē kumārō.

aïkkantō kōi kālō. ahijjiyaṁ sutaṁ, avahāriō tayatyō, āsēviyā kiriyā. uciō jiṇakappapaḍivattīē tti aṇubha
viya guruyaṇaṁ bahu manniō tēṇa ahāvihīē paḍivannō jiṇakappaṁ. kaha—

lg.l: tavēṇa muttēṇa atthēṇaṁ ēgantēṇa balēṇa ya
paḍhamā uvassayaṁmī bīyā bāhiṁ taïyā caükami

div.p: ēvamāi tuliūṇaṁ appāṇaṁ.

taō gāmē'garāyaṁ nagarē pañcarāēṇa viharamāṇō aïkkantē pahūyakālē samāgaō kollāgasannivēsaṁ. ṭhiō ēgattha paḍimāē. dihrō
ya bhaṭṭarajjēṇaṁ kahavayapurisapahāraṇa parinbhamantēṇa visēṇēṇa. durantapuvyakayakammadōsēṇa jāō ya sē kōyō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō
mē pāvapariṇaī, puṇō vi ēsa diṭṭhō tti. ahavā sōhaṇamiṇaṁ, jaō ēsa ēyāī mukkāuhō. vivittadēsaṭiō ya. tā vāvāēmi ēyaṁ
pāvakammaṁ, pūrēmi attaṇō maṇōrahē. ahabā na juttamēēsi niyakulaüttayāṇa puraō vāvāyaṇaṁ ti. tā puṇō vāvāissaṁ ti. cintiūṇa
payaṭṭō tayāsannadēvaülasamīvaṁ. [mā viyāṇissanti ‘ēēṇa vāvāiyaṁ ti na sāhiuṁ niyayapurisāṇaṁ gaō tayāsanamēvāvāsathāmaṁ dēvaülaṁ.]
thēvavēlāē ya aïkantō vāsarō, samāgayā rayaṇī. pasuttō dēvaülapīḍhiyāē disēṇō. aḍḍarattasamaē ya ghettūṇa maṇḍalaṁggaṁ ēkaō cēva gaō
sēṇamuṇivarasamīyaṁ. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇaṁ jhāṇaniñcalamaṇō muṇī. viyambhiyā sē araī, baḍḍiō mōhō, avagayā viyāraṇā, pajjaliō kōvā
ṇalō, phuriyaṁ dāhiṇabhuyāē, kaḍḍiyaṁ maṇḍalaggaṁ, bhaṇiō ya bhayavaṁ. arē durāyāra, sudiṭṭhaṁ jīvalōyaṁ karēhi; vivannō saṁpayaṁ mama
hatthāō. paramajjhāṇaṭṭhiyamaṇēṇa nāyaṇiyaṁ bhayavayā. āyaṇiyaṁ ca bhayavaō guṇāṇurāiṇīē khettadēvayāē. kuviyā ēsā visēṇassa.
vāhiyamaṇēṇa maṇḍalaggaṁ bhayavaō, avahaḍaṁ khettadēvayāē, thambhiō ēsō, bhaṇiō ya ṇāē. ahō tē pāvakammayā, ahō saṁkilēsō,
ahō aṇajjattaṇaṁ, ahō vivēyasunayā, jō ēvaṁ vāsīcandaṇakappassa bhayavaō vi ēvaṁ vavasasi. tā gaccha, adaṭṭavvō tumaṁ ti. bhaṇiya
utthambhiō sadayaṁ dēvayāē. tibbakasāōdaēṇaṁ ca avagaṇiūṇa dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ payaṭṭō puṇō vi ghāiuṁ bhayavantaṁ. talappahāriō
dēvayāē, viṇintaruhiruggāraṁ nivaḍiō dharaṇivaḍhē, mucchiō viyaṇāē. ‘bhayavaō uggahō’ ti saṁkhuddhā dēvayā. āsāsiō saka
ruṇaṁ, avaṇīō uggahāō, mukkō nēūṇa vaïṇaniuchu. tirōhiyā dēvayā. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō mē pāvapariṇaī. kahaṁ puṇa na ēsa
vāvāiō tti. gahiō amarisēṇa. bhāviyaṁ rōdajjhāṇaṁ. baddhaṁ narayāuyaṁ pōsiyaṁ ahiṇivēsēṇa. aïkkantō kōi kālō. annayā
viuttē pariyaṇē vāhijjamāṇō chuhāē ēgāī cēva vaccamāṇō vorpilāḍavīē majjhabhāgaṁmi giddhāvayaraṇanimittaṁ picchasaṁpāyaṇujaēhi
savarēhiṁ payampamāṇō dīṇavissaraṁ vāvāiō visēṇō. samuppanī tamābhihāṇāē narayapuḍhavīē bāvīsasāgarōvamāū nāragō ti.
bhaya pi sēṇāṇagārō vihariūṇa saṁjamujjōēṇa bhāviūṇa ubasamasuhaṁ kāūṇa saṁlē haṇaṁ vandiūṇa vīyarāē paḍivajiūṇamaṇasaṇaṁ
kāūṇa lagaṁḍasāittaṁ ārāhiūṇa bhāvaṇāō caïūṇa dēhapañjaraṁ samuppanō navamagēvējaē tīsasāgarōvamāū dēvō tti.

div.head: aṭṭhamō bhavō

lg.l: vakkhāyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sēṇavisēṇā u pittiyamuya tti

div.p:
atthi ihēva jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē mahāmahalluttuṅgamavaṇasiharuppaṅkaniruddharavirahamaggā dēvaülavihārārāmasaṁgayā niccussavāṇanda
pamuiyamahājaṇā nivāsō tihuyaṇasirīē nidarisaṇaṁ dēvanayarīē vissakammaviṇimmiyā aojjhā nāma nayarī. jīē uppattī viva lāya
ṇṇassa āgarō viva vilāsāṇaṁ kōsallapaïgarisō viva payāvaïssa jammabhūmī viva pimhayāṇaṁ visuddhasīlasamāyārō itthiyājaṇō. jīē
ya guṇēgantapakkhavāī accuyāracariō nivāsō paramalacchīē piyaṁvō paṇaïvaggassa saṁpāḍaō samīhiyāṇaṁ purisavaggō tti. tīē
ya aïsaïyapuvvapatthivacariō payāvasarisapasāyavasīkaya sayalasattū, rāyasirīē viya aviuttō kittīē, nīīē viya avirahiō
dayāē, accantapayāhiyapīī mettībalō nāma rāyā. tassa sayalantēurappahāṇā paümāvaī nāma dēvī. sa (sō)imīē saha visayamuhamaṇu
visu tti. iō ya sō navamagēvējayanivāsī dēvō ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa cuō samāṇō samuppanō paümāvaīē kucchisi. didvaṁ ca ṇāē
sumiṇayaṁmi tīē cēva rayaṇīē pahāyasamayaṁmi vimalamahāsalilapaḍihatthaṁ samaddhāsiyaṁ naliṇisaṇḍēṇaṁ virāyamāṇaṁ viuddhakamalāyarasirīē
haṁsakāraṇḍavacakavāōvasōhiyaṁ ruṇaruṇantēṇaṁ bhamarajālēṇaṁ samaniyaṁ kappapāyavarāīē samāsamnadivyōvavaṇasōhiyaṁ paṇaccamāṇaṁ piva kallō
lalīlākarēhi mahantaṁ saravaraṁ vayaṇēṇamuyaraṁ pavisamāṇaṁ ti. pāsiūṇa ya taṁ muhaviuddhā ēsā. sāhiō ya tīē jahāvihiṁ daïyassa.
harisavasagghaviyapulaēṇaṁ bhaṇiyā ya tēṇaṁ. sundari, sayalamēiṇīsaranarindakamalāyarabhōyalālāsō mahārāyahaṁsō tē puttō bhavissaï. paḍi
ssuyaṁ tīē. ahiyayaraṁ paritudvā ēsā. taō savisēsaṁ tivaggasaṁpāyaṇarayāē pattō pasaïsamaō. taō pasatthatihikaraṇamuhuttajōē muhaṁ
suhēṇaṁ pasūyā ēsā. dasadisi ujjōyantō sukumālapāṇipāō jāō sē dāraō. nivēiśrō rāiṇō mettīvalassa pamōyamasābhihā
ṇāē cēḍiyāē, jahā ‘mahārāya, dēvī paümāvaī dārayaṁ pasūya’ ti. parituṭō rāyā. dinnaṁ tīē pāriōsiyaṁ. karāviyaṁ bandhaṇamōyaṇā
iyaṁ uciyakaraṇijja. harisiō nayarijaṇavaō. ūsiyāō bhavaṇēsu āṇandadhayavaḍāyāō. kayāō āyayaṇēsu maṇaharavisēsayāō,
paüttāī ca païbhavaṇēsu bajjantēṇaṁ paramapamōyatūrēṇaṁ gijantēṇaṁ jammamaṅgalagēēṇaṁ naccantīhiṁ taruṇarāmāhiṁ pecchantīhiṁ saharisaṁ vuḍdāhi
pijjamāṇapavarāsavāī vaḍḍamāṇahallapphalayāī ullāsantēṇaṁ tēriyasaṁghāēṇaṁ phaïlaṁ pāventēṇaṁ vēyāliyasamūhēṇaṁ accudāravicchaṁṭāī mahāpamō
yapisuṇayāī baddhāvaṇayāī ti. uciyavēlāē ya sababhavaṇēhitō niggayā nayarijaṇavayā, payaṭṭā ya rāyabhavaṇasaṁmuhaṁ. tē ya tahā
pecchiūṇa harisavasapayaṭṭapulaō saṁbhamāisaraṇa saharisanañcantavāravilayāsamēō nayarijaṇābhimuhamēva niggaō rāyā. vaddhāviō puttaja
mmabhudaraṇa nayarijaṇavaēhi. bhaṇiyā ya rāiṇī. tumhāṇaṁ cēva ēsā buḍḍi tti. ahiṇandiūṇaṁ sabahumāṇaṁ pecchiūṇa tēsiṁ vicchaḍḍaṁ
sammāṇiūṇa jahōciyaṁ paviṭhṭhō sabhavarṇami. ēvaṁ ca pādiṇaṁ mahantamāṇandasokkhamaṇuhavantassa samaïcchiō paḍhamamāsō. païṭāviyaṁ
nāmaṁ dārayassa ‘uciō ēsa ēyassa' kaliūṇa piyāmahasantiyaṁ guṇacandō tti. sō ya visiṭṭapuṇṇaphalamaṇuhavantō pattō kumārabhāvaṁ.
accantāisaraṇa gahiyāō kalāō. taṁ jahā. lēhaṁ gaṇiyaṁ ālekkhaṁ naṭaṁ gīyaṁ vāiyaṁ saragayaṁ pukkharagayaṁ samatālaṁ jūyaṁ jaṇavāya
hōrā kavvaṁ dagamaṭiyaṁ aṭṭhāvayaṁ annavihī pāṇavihī sayaṇavihī ajā pahēliyā māgaḍiyā gāhā gīiyā silōgō mahusityaṁ
gandhajuttī āharaṇavihī taruṇīpaḍikammaṁ itthīlakkhaṇaṁ purisalakkhaṇaṁ hayalakkhaṇaṁ gayalakkhaṇaṁ gōṇalakkhaṇaṁ kukkuḍalakkhaṇaṁ meṇḍhaya
lakkhaṇaṁ cakkalakkhaṇaṁ chattalakkhaṇaṁ deṇḍalakkhaṇaṁ asilakkhaṇaṁ maṇilakkhaṇaṁ kōgaṇilakkhaṇaṁ cammalakkhaṇaṁ candacariyaṁ sūracariyaṁ
rāhucariyaṁ gahacariyaṁ sayākāraṁ yākāraṁ vijāgayaṁ mantagayaṁ hassagayaṁ saṁbhavaṁ cāraṁ paḍicāraṁ vr̥haṁ paḍivūhaṁ khandhāvāramāṇaṁ nagaramāṇaṁ
vatthumāṇaṁ khandhāvāranivēsaṁ nagaranivēsa vatthunivēsaṁ īsatyaṁ tattappavāyaṁ āsasikkhaṁ hatthisikkhaṁ maṇisikkhaṁ dhaṇuvvēyaṁ hiraṇavāyaṁ
suvaṇṇavāyaṁ maṇivāyaṁ dhāuvāyaṁ bāhujuddhaṁ daṇḍajuddhaṁ muḍijuddhaṁ aṭijudaṁ juddhaṁ nijuddhaṁ juddhanijuddhaṁ muttakheḍḍa vaṭṭakheḍḍē vajjhakheḍḍaṁ
nāliyākheḍḍē pattacchejjaṁ kaḍayacchejnaṁ payaracchejnaṁ sajīvaṁ nijīvaṁ saüṇaruyaṁ cēti. sō ya saṁpattavisayapasaṅgasamaō vi
āsannayāē siddhibhāvassa uvasantayāē kiliṭṭakammuṇō abbhāsaparayāē kalākalāvaṁmi adaṁsaṇayāē kannagāsvapagarisassa
visayapasaṅgavimuhō tīē cēva nayarīē ōhasiyanandaṇavaṇēmu ujjāṇēsu kalākalāvabbhāsatallicchō āṇandayantō gurupayāhiyayāī
pūrayantō paṇaïmaṇōrahē saṁvaddhayantō bhiccayaṇasaṁghāyaṁ aṇuhavantō visiḍhapuṇṇaphalāī suhasuhēṇa ahivasaī.

iō ya sō visaïgajīvanāraō tō narayāō uvyaṭṭiūṇa puṇō saṁsāramāhiṇḍiya aṇantarabhavē tahāvihaṁ kiṁpi aṇuḍhāṇaṁ kāūṇa
samuppannō vēyaḍapāē rahanēuracakkabālaürē nayarē vijjāharatāē tti. kayaṁ sē nāmaṁ vāṇamantarō tti akāntō kōi kālō. annayā
samāgaō aojhātilayabhūyaṁ mayaṇanandaṇaṁ nāma ujāṇaṁ. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa taṁmi cēva ujjāgē ālekkhaviṇōyamaṇuhavantō kumāraguṇacaṁdō
tti. taṁ ca dadruṇa udiṇṇapāvakammō abbhāsasāmatthēṇaṁ akusalajōyaspta gahiō paramāraīē. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. kō uṇa ēsō maha
dukkhahēū. ahavā kimaṇēṇa jāṇiēṇaṁ; vāvāēmi ēyaṁ durāyāraṁ ti. kasāyakalusiyamaī gō tassa samōvaṁ. jāva na caēti tassō
ggahaṁ aïkkamiuṁ, tō cintiyamaṇēṇaṁ. ihaḍiō cēva adissamāṇō vijjāsattīē bhēsēmi bhīsaṇasaddēgaṁ. taō sayamēva jīviyaṁ paricca
issaï. kaō ṇēṇa vajappahāraphuṭṭantagirisahabhīsaṇō mahābhēravasahō. na saṁkhudō kumārō. īsi saṁkhuddhā vi vihasiūṇa dhīraviyā vayaṁ
sayā. ahiyayaraṁ kuvi bhō vāṇamantarō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō sē durāyārassa dhōrayā, ahō abajjā mamōvariṁ. tā daṁsēmi sē
attaṇō parama, nivāḍēmi ēvaṁ mahallaṁ kaścaṇapāyavaṁ taō ṇēṇa saṁcuṇiyaṅguvaṅgō nīsaṁsaya cēva na havissaï tti. sayarāhamēva
pāḍiā kaścaṇapāyayō. kumārapuṣṇappahāvēṇa nivaḍiō annattha. na chikkō vi saparivārō kumārō. dūmiyō vāṇamantarō. cintiyaṁ
ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō sē mahāpāvassa sāmatthaṁ ti. ahiyayaraṁ saṁkiliṭṭhō cittēṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi kuōi sabhāgaō gamaṇaraī nāma khettavālavāṇa
mantarō. taṁ ca daṇa thēvayāē sattasta appayāē vijābalassa palāṇō vijāharavāṇamantarō. kumārō vi uciyasamaē paviṭhṭhō nayariṁ.
iō ya uttarāvahē visaē sasaürē paṭṭaṇē saṅkhāyaṇō nāma rāyā. kantimaī sē bhāriyā. dhūyā ya sē rayaṇavaī nāma. sā ya rūbāi
saraṇa muṇīṇa vi maṇahāriṇī kalāviyakkhaṇattēṇa asarisī anakannayāṇa. taō visaṇṇā sē jaṇaṇī. na imīē tihuyaṇē vi uciya
purisarayaṇaṁ takkāmi. ahavā bahurayaṇabhariyā bhayabaī mēiṇī. tā nirūvāvēmi tāva niyaniuṇapurisēhi, kō uṇa imīē rūpavināṇēhiṁ
uciō, jō āsannō sē vivāhasamō tti. cintiūṇa pēsiyā disōdisaṁ rāyaüttarūpavinnāṇapariyāṇaṇanimittaṁ viyaḍḍā niyapuri
sā. bhaṇiyā ya ēē. āṇēyavyā tumbhēḍi rayaṇavaībajoggā rāyaüttapaḍicchandayā kalākōsallapisuṇayaṁ ca kiṁci añcabhuyaṁ ti.
[jaṁ dēvī āṇavēi ti] gayā disōdisaṁ. diṭṭhā ya ṇēhiṁ bahavē rāyaüttā, na uṇa rayaṇavaīrūvajogga tti. tahāvi jē maṇāgaṁ suṁdarayarā,
tē ālihiyā tēhiṁ. gahiyaṁ ca kalākōsala pisuṇayaṁ pattacchejjāi. samāgayā annē aojjhāuri. diṭṭhō ya tēhiṁ rāhāvē hēṇa dhaṇuvvēya
manmasantō guṇacandō. vimhiyā cittēṇa. pavitrō nayariṁ kumārō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. ahō sē rūvaṁ, ahō kalāpagarisō. savvaha.
aṇurūvō ēsa rāyadhūyāē. kiṁ tu na tīraē ēyaspa saṁpuṇṇapaḍicchandayālihaṇaṁ, visēsaō saïdaṁsaṇaṁmi. jaṁpiyaṁ cittamaïṇā. arē
bhūsaṇaya, diḍhē taē acchariyaṁ. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. muṭu diḍhē, kiṁ tu visaṇṇō ahaṁ. cittamapaṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē kēṇa kajjēṇa. bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
asamatthō jēṇa dēvīsaṁdēsayaṁ saṁpāḍēuṁ. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiya ‘kahaṁ viya.’bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. arē kahamamhē hiṁ ēyassa paḍicchandaō lihiuṁ
tīraï ti. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē sabasāhāraṇō ēsa visāō, annēṇāvi ēsa na tīraē cēva. bhūpaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. kiṁ amhāṇa
sēsacintāē, niuttā ettha emhē. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē utsappamha tāva ēyaṁ. tō agavarayadaṁsaṇēga rāyadhūyapaḍicchandayaṁ piva
kiṁcisāhammēṇa lihissāmō ēyapaḍicchandayaṁ ti. bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. juttamēyaṁ, tā kahaṁ puṇa ēsa dabyō tti. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ.
arē rayaṇavaïrūvamabhilihiya cittayaradārayavavaēsēṇa pecchāmu ēyaṁ ti. bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. arē sāhu sāhu, sōhaṇō ēsa uvāō. ēvaṁ
ca kaē samāṇē ‘rāyadhūyāē uvari kērisō ēsō’ tti ēvaṁ pi vināyaṁ bhavissaï tti. mantiūṇa paviṭṭhā nayariṁ. ālihiō ahimaya
paḍō. ghētūṇa taṁ gayā kumārabhavaṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya paḍihārō. bhō mahāpurisa, cittayaradārayā amhē atthiṇō kumāradasaṇassa. paḍihārēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. ciṭṭhaha tāva tumbhē, nivēēmi kumāraspa. nivēiyaṁ paḍihārēṇa. samāiṭṭaṁ ca ṇēga, jahā pavisantu tti. paviṭṭhā cittamaï
bhūsaṇā. paṇamiō kumārō. ‘uvavisaha’ tti bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa. ‘pasāō’ ti bhaṇiūṇa uvaviṭā ēē.
uvaṇīō ya aha paḍaō harisiyavayaṇēhi tēhi sapaṇāmaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca dēva amhē saṅghaürāō ihaṁ āyā. dēvaṁ guṇāṇa

lg.l: tā amhē kayaüṇṇā jēhi tuma aja diṭṭhō si
sayalapuhaīē nāhō taṁ naravara tahavi bhaṇimō ēvaṁ
tā dējaha āṇattiṁ cittakalāē sam̐guṇalavaṁ amhē
jāṇāmō paramēsara iya bhaṇiuṁ lajjiyā jāyā
aha taṁ daṇa paḍaṁ pīibhari jantalōyaṇajuēṇa
jaï ēsa kalāē lavō tā saṁpuṇṇā u kērisī hōi
amhēhi adiṭṭaüvvō annēhi vi nūṇamettha lōēhiṁ
ēvaṁvihō surūvō rēhānāsō na diṭṭhō tti
jaï vi ya rēhānāsō pattēyaṁ hōi sundarō kahavi
tahavi samudāyasōhā na ērisī hōi annassa
rūvi va mayaṇaghariṇī. cittagayā haraï cittāī
jaï puṇa maṇuyasurāsuralōēmu havija ērisī kāvi
tā aïsayakōsallaṁ tumhāṇa imaṁ dadaṁ mahaṁ cittaṁ
avaharaï ahiyaüvvaṁ niuṇaguṇā kaṁ ca na haranti
bhaṇiyaṁ na ettha amhaṁ aïsayaniuṇataṇaṁ nāhaṁ
aïsayaniuṇattaṁ puṇa etthaṁ muṇa bhayavaō payāvaïṇō
amhēhi lihiyamettaṁ naravara! daṭhūṇa kimiha niuṇattaṁ
iya tavvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ harisiyavayaṇēṇa tō kumārēṇaṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ tumbhēhi kahiṁ ēvaṁ ālōiyaṁ rūvaṁ

div.p: bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhi naravara! suṇa saṅghaüraṁmi guṇanihāṇaṁmi. dariyārimadaṇaraī gayā saṅkhāyaṇō nāma.

lg.l: amhēhi vammahamahē diṭṭhā ēsa tti kannayā nāha
amhēhi tō huliyaṁ gēhaṁ gantūṇamaha paḍaṁ ghettuṁ
na ya tīē sundarattaṁ rūvassārāhiyaṁ ihamhēhiṁ
mannē na vissayammō vi avitahaṁ taṁ khamō lihiuṁ
daṭṭu pi na najjaï abuhēhiṁ sāhiuṁ ca vāyāē
diṭṭhaṁ pi cittayammē ta ārāhijjaē kaha ṇu
sōūṇa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ guṇacandō mayaṇagōyaraṁ pattō
gahantēṇa tahāvi ya niyamāgāramaha jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇa
bhaṇa bhō vitthuyabuddhī annaṁ pasiṇottaraṁ kiṁci

div.p:
kiṁ denti kāmiṇīō? kē harapaṇayā? kuṇanti kiṁ bhuyagā? kaṁ ca maūhēhi sasī dhavalēi? sigyamēvōvalahiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇaṁ ‘nahaṁgaṇābhōyaṁ.’cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō dēvassa lahaṇavēgō. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. padama kiṁpi annaṁ ti.
visālabuddhiṇā paḍhiyaṁ.

lg.l: ki hōi rahassa varaṁ? buddhipasāraṇa kō. jaṇō jiyaï?
kiṁ ca kugantī bālā nēurasaī payāsēi 1

div.p:
īsi vihasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa ‘cakamantī.’‘ahō aïsaō’ tti jaṁpiyaṁ bhūsaṇēṇa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. dēva, maē vi kiṁci
pasiṇottaraṁ cintiyamāsi, taṁ suṇāu dēvō. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘paḍhasu’ tti. paḍhiyaṁ bhūsaṇēṇa.

lg.l: kiṁ piyaha? kiṁ ca gēdaha paḍhamaṁ kamalassa? dēha kiṁ rivugō?
navavahuramiyaṁ maṇa kiṁ? ughahasaraṁ kērisaṁ vakkaṁ

div.p:
damaïmahī (?) kā dijjaï paralōē?kā daḍḍā vāṇarēṇa? kē jāi bahū? amiyamahaṇaṁmi naṭṭhā surāsurā kērisē va dasadisihuttā? kiṁ
icchā sayalaṁ ciya tēlōkaṁ? kērisaṁ ca juvaīhi sayā dāvijjaï niyavayaṇaṁ?

kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘puṇō paḍhasu’ tti. paḍhiyaṁ bhūsaṇēṇa. aṇantaramēva lahiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa. ‘kaṇṇālaṁkāramaṇaharaṁ savisēsaṁ.
cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō dēvassa buddhipagarisō, jamēyaṁ laddhaṁ ti. dēva, mahantō ēyassa ettha ahimāṇō āsi, na laddhaṁ ca ēyama
nnēṇaṁ. bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. arē tujhaṁ pi ajja ahimāṇō avēi. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘kahaṁ viya.’bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēēṇa vi ēvaṁ
vihaṁ cēva cintiyaṁ. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘paḍhasu’ tti! paḍhiyaṁ cittamaïṇā. kē kaviṇā narinda? kā kasaṇā? tēō kāsu sāṁsaō?
ucchū kērisa va? kē ya arahiyā? kā uyahigāmiṇī? kē dhaṇuparasunaharamāyāvisabasavisayappahāṇayā jāṇasu.

kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ‘puṇō paḍhasu’ tti. paḍhiyaṁ cittamaïṇā. aṇantaramēva lahiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa. ‘pattharāmasīhāsurasappavarāhalā
vayā.’bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō accharīyaṁ, najaï dēvēṇa cēva kiyaṁ ti. vimhiyā cittamaïbhūsaṇā. bhaṇiō kumārēṇa dhaṇadēvāhihāṇō
bhaṇḍāriō. bhō dhaṇadēva, dēhi ēyāṇa dīṇāralakkhaṁ ti. dhaṇadēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō muddhayā
kumārassa. alakkhaṁ dāṇamēva natthi. nūṇaṁ na yāṇaï ēsō, kiṁpamāṇō lakkhō. tā imaṁ etya pattayālaṁ. saṁpāḍēmi ēyamēēsi kumāra.
puraō cēva, jēṇa vināyalakkhamahāpamāṇō na puṇō vi thēvakajjē ēvamāṇavēi tti. cintiūṇa āṇāviō tēṇa tatva dīṇāralakkhō,
puñjiō kumārapuraō. bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa. bhodhaṇadēva, kimēyaṁ ti. dhaṇadēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēsō sō dīṇāralakkhō, jō pasāīkō
dēvēṇa ēēsiṁ cittayaradārayāṇaṁ. kumārēṇa cintiyaṁ. hanta kimēyaṁ anja saṁpayādasaṇaṁ. nūṇaṁ pabhūō khu ēsa ēyassa paḍihāyaï, tā mēṁ
mūḍhayā dhaṇadēvassa, jassa ēgantavajjhē aṇāṇugāmiē saha jīvēṇaṁ sāhāraṇē aggitakkarāiṇaṁ payāṇamettaphalē paramatthaō avayārakāraē
payārantarēṇa atthē vipaḍibandhō tti. kettiō vā ēsa lakkhō. na khalu ēēṇa etthaṁ pi jammē ēē vi cittayaradārayā parimiēṇa
vivaraṇa ēyanimittaṁ pi asaṁkilēsabhāiṇō honti. na ya asaṁpayāṇēṇaṁ aparibhaṁsō saṁpayāē, avi ya puṇṇasaṁbhārēṇa. khīṇē ya puṇṇa
saṁbhārē adijamāṇā vi annēsi aparibhujjamāṇā vi attaṇā gōvijjamāṇā vi pacchannē rakkhi jamāṇā vi mahāpayattēṇaṁ asaṁsayaṁ na
jāyaï. kiṁ vā dāṇaparibhōgarahiyāē aṇuvayāriṇīē ubhayalōēmu ōhasaṇijjāē paṇḍiyanaṇāṇaṁ avittīkammārayamettāē tattacintāsu
kēvalāṇatthaphalāē savvahā sannāsakappāē ti. tā paḍibōhaïssaṁ ahamiṇaṁ patthāvēṇaṁ. imaṁ puṇa etya pattayālaṁ, jamannamapi lakkhaṁ
ēēsiṁ davāvēmiḥ ēsō vi ēyassa paḍibōhaṇōvāō cēva tti. cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ajjadhaṇadēva, kimēsō lakkhō tti.
dhaṇadēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, ēsō tti. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. alaṁ doṇha mēyamettēṇaṁ; tā annaṁ pi dēhi ti. dhaṇadēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō
āṇavēi vimhiyā cittamaïbhūsaṇā, cintiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ ‘ahō udārayā āsayassa.’ nivaḍiūṇa calaṇēsu mēyāviyaṁ niyamāvāsaṁ.
etthantaraṁmi samāgaō majjhaṇhasamaō. paḍhiyaṁ kālanivēyaēṇa.

lg.l: majjhatthō ciya purisō hōi daḍhaṁ uvari sabbalōyassa

div.p:
ēvaṁ sōūṇa uḍiō kumārō, gaō majjaṇabhūmi. manjiō aṇēgēhiṁ gandhōdaēhiṁ. kayaṁ karaṇijjasēsaṁ. rayaṇavaïsāhilāsō ya
ṭhiī vivi nasayaṇi jē. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. ahō sē rūvaṁ saṅkhāyaṇanarindadhūyāē. kannayā ya ēsā. tā aviruddhō saṁpaōō imīē
ti. cināyantassa samāgayā atyāiyāvēga. ṭhiō atthāiyāē. samāgayā visālabuddhippamuhā vayaṁsayā. patthuō cittayammavi
ṇōō. ālihiō kumārēṇa suvihattujja lēṇē vaṇṇayakammēṇa alakkhi jamāṇē hiṁ guliyāvaēhiṁ aṇurūvāē muhumarēhāē payaḍadaṁsaṇēṇa
ninnunayavibhāēṇaṁ visuddhāē vaṭṭagāē uciēṇaṁ bhūsaṇa kalāvēṇaṁ ahiṇavanēhasuyattaṇēṇaṁ paropparaṁ hāsupphullabaddhadiṭṭhī ārūḍhapemmattaṇēṇaṁ
lajiōciyanivēsō vijāharasaṁghāḍaō tti. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā cittamaïbhūsaṇā. diṭṭhō ya ṇēhiṁ guliyāvāvaḍaggahatthō taṁ cēva
vijāharasaṁghāḍayaṁ pulōēmāṇō kumārō ti. paṇamiūṇa saharisaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. dēva, kimēyaṁ ti. taō īsi vihasiyasaṇāī ‘nirū
vēha tumbhē sayamēva’ tti bhaṇiūṇa samappiyā cittavaṭṭiyā. nirūviyā cittamaïbhūsaṇēhiṁ. vimhiyā ēē. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhi. ahō dēvassa
savvattha appaḍihayaṁ paramēsarattaṇaṁ. dēva, aündhā ēsā citta yammavicchittī sāhēi viya niyabhāvaṁ phuḍavayaṇēhiṁ. cittayammē dēva, dukkara
bhāvārāhaṇaṁ. pasaṁsanti ya iṇamēva ettha āyariyā. ahiṇavanēhasuyattaṇēga vi ya paroppara hāsupphullabaddhadidvittaṇaṁ tahā ārūḍhapemmatta
ṇēṇa vi ya laḍiōciyanivēsayaṁ ca ettha asāhiyaṁ pi dēva jāṇanti bālayā vi, kimaṅga puṇa iyarē jaṇā. ēvaṁ ca dēva cittasatthē
pahijaï. jahā viṇā cariyāiṇā ahiyārēṇa jahā kahaṁci kila jārisayabhāvajuttaṁ cittayammaṁ nippha jaï, tārisayabhāvasaṁpattī niya
mēṇa cittayāriṇō. tā dēva, āsannō dēvassa piyadaṁsaṇēṇaṁ īisō bhāvō tti nivēiyaṁ dēvassa. īsi vihasiyaṁ kumārēṇa.
etthantaraṁmi samāgaō saṁjhāsamaō. paḍhiyaṁ kālanivēyaēṇa.

ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa ‘gurucalaṇavandaṇāsamō’ tti uḍiō kumārō, gaō jaṇaṇijaṇayāṇa sayāsaṁ. vandiyā tēsiṁ calaṇā.
bahumanniō ṇēhi. ṭhiō kaṁci kālaṁ guru mamīvē. uciyasamaēṇaṁ ca gō vāsagēhaṁ. aṇusarantasma rayaṇavaī rūvaṁ bōliē uciyasamaē
samāgayā nidā. pahāyasamaē ya diṭṭhō pēṇa sumiṇaō. jahā kila uvaṇīyā kēṇāvi sōmarūvēṇa divbakusumamālā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇa. ahimayā ēsā kumārassa; tā giṇhaü imaṁ kumārō. gahiyā ya ṇēṇa, ghettūṇa nihiyā kaṇṭhadēsē.
etthantaraṁmi pahayāhaṁ pāhāuyatūrāī. viudghō kumārō. paḍhiyaṁ kālanivēyaēṇaṁ.

ēvamākayē ‘gurucaraṇavandanāsamayaḥ' ityutthitaḥ kumāraḥ, gatō jananījanakayōḥ sakāśam. vantiaü tayoścaraṇaü. bahumatastābhyām ।
ēyaṁ sōṇa harisiō cittēṇa. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhaviyavvaṁ rayaṇavaīlāhēṇa. na ēsa sumiṇō annahā pariṇamaï, upavūhiō
pāhāuyatūrēṇaṁ, niyamiō maṅgalasadēhi, pahāē ya divō. tā āsanaphalēṇa imiṇā hōyacaṁ ti. cintiūṇa uḍiō sayaṇīyāō,
kayaṁ gurucalaṇavandaṇāiāvassayaṁ. ṭhiō atyāiyāē. samāgayā visālabuddhippamuhā vayaṁsayā. samāraddhā gūḍhacaütthayagoṭṭhī.
paḍhiya visālabuddhiṇā.
murayamaṇassa raïharē niyanvabhabhiraṁ bahū dhuyakaraggā. takkhaṇavuttavivāhā. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ puṇō pahamu tti. paḍhiyaṁ visālabuddhiṇā.

visālabuddhiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ahō dēvēṇa laddhaṁ ti. cittamaïṇā paḍhiyaṁ. bhāviyaraïsārarasā samāṇiuṁ mukkabahalasikārā. na taraï
vivarīyarayaṁ. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ puṇō paḍhasu tti. paḍhiyaṁ cittamaïṇā. laddhaṁ kumārēṇa. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇa ‘ṇiyaṁbabhārālasā sāmā.’
bhūsaṇēṇa paḍhiyaṁ. viulaṁmi maüliyacchī ghaṇavīsambhassa sāmalī suiraṁ. vivarīyamurayamuhiyā. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. puṇō paḍhasu tti
paḍhiyaṁ bhūsaṇēṇa. laddhaṁ kumārēṇaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. visamaï uraṁmi ramaṇassa.

ēvaṁ ca jāva kaṁtri vēlaṁ ciṭṭhanti, tāvāgantūṇa nivēiyaṁ paḍihārēṇa. kumāra, āsaparivāhaṇanimittaṁ vāhayāli paüṭṭō dēvō kumāra
sadāvēi tti. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ tāō āṇavēi tti. uhiūṇa pariyaṇa samēō niggō bhavaṇāō. ārūḍhō jaccavollāha; miliō
rāyamaggē naravaïssa, gaō vāhiyāli. vāhiā bahavē valhīyaturukkavajarāiyā āsā. uciyasamaēṇa paviṭhṭhō nayariṁ. kayaṁ karaṇija
sēsa. ēvaṁ ca visiṭṭhaviṇōēṇa saha cittamaïbhūsaṇēhiṁ acchiyā kaïvi diyahā. annayā ya kāūṇa rayaṇavaīrūvaguṇakittaṇa nibbharukka
ṇṭhāparāhīṇayāē añcantalālasēṇaṁ tīē daṁsaṇami ‘ēvaṁ pi tāva pecchāmi’ ti samatthiūṇa niyayahiyaēṇaṁ samālihiyā cittavaṭṭiyāē
rayaṇavaī. pulōiyā siṇēhasāraṁ aṇimisalōyaṇēṇa, lihiyā ya hiḍhē gāhā.

lg.l: hiyara vi ṭhiyaṁ bālaṁ pecchaha diṭṭhaṁ pi cittayammami
icchaï tahāvi daṭṭuṁ samūsuō antarappā mē

div.p:
etthantaraṁmi samāgayā cittamaïbhūsaṇā. ‘kumāravallaha’ tti na dhariyā paḍihārēṇa. paviṭṭhā kumārasamīvaṁ. divā cittavaṭṭiyā.
'dēva, kimēya’ ti jaṁpiyamaṇēhiṁ. īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa. tumbhaṁ vayapaḍicchandayālihaṇaṁ ti tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, mahāpasāō
tti. taō ghettūṇa nirūviyā cittivaṭṭiyā. vimhiyā ēē. vāciyā gāhā. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. dhannā khu sā rāyadhūyā, jā kumārē
ṇāvi ēvaṁ bahu manijjaï. ahavā kimettha acchariyaṁ, visaō khu sā ēvaṁvihāē bahumāṇaṇāē. tā imaṁ ettha pattyālaṁ, jaṁ sigyamēva
ēyaṁ dēvīē nivēijjaï ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ cittamaïṇā. dēva, aübbō ēsa paḍicchandaō. ahō iyamettha acchariyaṁ, jamadiṭṭhaṁ pi
nāma ēvamārāhijjaï. bhūsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ dēva, ērisā cēva sā rāyadhūyā, na kiṁci annārisa. dhannā ya sā, jā dēvēṇa ēvaṁ bahu manijaï.
patthantaraṁmi paviṭhṭhō paḍihārō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. kumāra, samāgaō dēvasantiō vissabhūī nāma gandhaviō kumāradasaṇasuha
maṇuhaviumicchaï. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ pavisaü tti. gaō paḍihārō. paviṭhṭhō vissabhūī. paṇamiūga kumāraṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. dēvō
āṇavēi. “atthi amhāṇaṁ patthura gandhaviyārē sarē vibhamō tti; tamāgantugamavaṇēu kumārō”. tō īsi vihasiūṇa aṁpiyaṁ
kumārēṇa. ahō tāyassa abaccami bahumāṇō. vissabhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, guṇā etya bahumāṇahēyavō, na avaccamettaṁ. cittamaïbhūsa
ṇēhi bhaṇiyaṁ. ēvamēyaṁ, sayalaguṇapagarisō kumārō tti. tō ‘jaṁ tāō āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa uḍiō kumārō, gaō narindabhavaṇaṁ.
iyarē vi cittamaïbhūsaṇā vimhiyā kumāravināṇāisaraṇa gayā sabhavaṇaṁ. bhaṇiō ya cittamaī bhūsaṇēṇa. arē cittamaï, saṁpannama
mhāṇa samīhiyaṁ. tā imaṁ ettha pattayālaṁ. ālihiūṇa jahāvināṇavihavēṇa kumārarūvaṁ asaṁsiūṇa kumārassa duyaṁ gacchamha, jēṇa daṭṭaga
kumārarūvāisayaṁ ciya imassa vināṇāisayaṁ ca dēvī lahuṁ saṁjōēi rāyadhūyaṁ kumārēṇa saha. ēvaṁ ca kaē samāṇē sā cēva rāyadhūyā sayala
guṇasaṁjuyā mahādēvī saṁjāyaï ti. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē bhūsaṇaya, saṁsiūṇa kumārassa gacchantāṇaṁ kō dōsō tti. bhūsaṇēga
bhaṇiyaṁ. arē patthuyavidhāō, jō na pēsēi lahuṁ amhē kumārō tti. cittamaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. arē atthi ēyaṁ, tā ēvaṁ karamha.
ālihiō kumārō. taō ghettūṇa taṁ kumārālihiyacittavaṭṭiyā duyaṁ ca ghētūṇa niggayā aojjhāō. gayā kālakamēṇa saṅghaüraṁ.
paviṭṭhā niyayabhavaṇēsu. bīyadiyahē ya gayā dēvībhavaṇaṁ. diṭṭhā ṇēhiṁ dēvī. sāhiō dhaṇuvvēyaguṇaṇāiō gandhavyasarasaṁsayāvaṇō
yaṇapajjavasāṇō kumārasantiō sayalavuttantō. daïsiō sē kumārō kumārālihiyacittavaṭiyāduyaṁ ca. taō sapariōsaṁ nirūviūṇa
kumārarūvaṁ kalākōsallaṁ ca paritudvā ēsā. davāviyaṁ cittamaïbhūsaṇāṇa pāriōsiyaṁ puṇō vi nirūviō kumārō dēvīē. cintiyaṁ
ca ṇāē ahō sē rūpasaṁpayā, ahō apratyāṇagaruō saṁṭhāṇavisēsō. taō aïsayakōuraṇa anāyasaṁtōsāē kumāradasaṇassa nirū
viyāō annāō vi cittavaṭṭiyāō. ‘ahō sē rūbapagarisāṇurūvō vināṇapagarisō’ ti vimhiyā dēvī. vāciyā ya ṇāē sā
dhūyāpaḍicchandayaheṭṭaō kumāralihiyā gāhā. harisiyā cittēṇa. cintiyaṁ ca tīē. dhannā khu mē dhūyā, jā kumārēṇa ēvamahila
sīyaï. pēsiō ya ṇāē mayaṇamañjuyāhatthaṁmi kumārapaḍicchandaō rayaṇavaīē. bhaṇiyā ya ēsā. halā, bhaṇāhi mē jāyaṁ, jahā lahuṁ
ēyaṁ sikkhēhi. gayā mayaṇamañjuyā. diṭṭhā rayaṇavaī. uvaṇīyā cittavaṭṭiyā. bhaṇiyaṁ rayaṇavaīē. hajjē kimēyaṁ ti. tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē, pēsiō khu ēsa paḍicchandaō dēvīē; āṇataṁ ca tīē, jahā lahuṁ sikkhāhi ēyaṁ ti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiya
halā, kō uṇa ēsa ālihiō. mayaṇamajuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. na-yāṇāmi nissaṁsayaṁ. ettiyaṁ puṇa takēmi, ēsa bhayavaṁ purandarō. raya
ṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. halā, sahassalōyaṇadūsiō khu ēsō suṇīyaï. mayaṇamanjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā nārāyaṇō. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ ।
halā, sō vi na ēvaṁ karṇayāvayāyacchavī. mayaṇamañjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaī ēvaṁ, tā savvajaṇamaṇāṇandayārī candō. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ.
halā, nasō vi ēvaṁ nikkalaṅkō. mayaṇamañjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ tā kāmadēvō bhavissaï. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. halā,kuō tassa vi hu harahuṁkāra
huyavahasihāpayaṁ gayassa īisō lāyaṇṇasōhāvayārō. mayaṇamanjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā sayamēva nirūvēu bhaṭṭidāriyā. taō ciraṁ
nijjhāiō rayaṇavaīē. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. halā, takēmi na ēsa amāṇusō. jaō pavaḍḍamāṇatrayavisēsassa puvvarūvaṁ pitra imaṁ lakkhīyaï,
avaṭṭhiyavayavisēsā ya amāṇusā. tahā nimēsōciyaṁ imasta niddhaṁ lōyaṇajuyalaṁ, aṇimisaṁ ca ēyamamāṇusāṇaṁ. mayaṇamañjuyāē
bhaṇiyaṁ. sukha jāṇiyaṁ bhaṭṭidāriyāē. ēvamēyaṁ, na saṁdēhō tti. ahaṁ puṇa takkēmi, bhaṭṭidāriyāē cēva ēsō varō bhavissaï.

etthantaraṁmi niyakajjasaṁga jaṁpiyaṁ siddhāēsapurōhiēṇa. kō etya saṁdēhō, asaṁsayaṁ bhavissaï. ēyaṁ sōūṇa harisiyā rayaṇavaī. bhaṇiyaṁ
mayaṇamanjuyāē bhaṭṭidāriyāē suyaṁ siddhāēsavayaṇaṁ. taō harirūparāhīṇayāē īsi vihasiēṇa bahu maniūṇa tīē vayaṇaṁ samāraddhā pulō
iuṁ. bhaṇiyā ya cittasundarī. halā, uvaṇēhi mē cittavaṭṭiyaṁ vaṭṭiyāsa muggayaṁ ca, jēṇa saṁpāḍēmi ambāē sāsaṇaṁ ti. ‘jaṁ bhaṭṭidāriyā
āṇavēi’ tti jaṁpiūṇa saṁpāḍiyamiṇaṁ cittasundarīē. samāraddhā ēsā samālihiuṁ. taō mahayā ahiṇivēsēṇa nirūviuṁ puṇō puṇō
tahārūvō cēvālihiō tīē paḍicchandaō. bhaṇiyā ya mayaṇamanjuyā. halā, upaṇēhi ēyamambāē, bhaṇāhi ya ambaṁ ‘kimēsa ārā
hiō nava’ tti. mayaṇamañjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ bhaṭṭidāriyā āṇa vēi. gayā mayaṇamajuyā. vinattā ya ṇāē dēvī. bhaṭṭiṇi, bhaṭṭi
dāriyā rayaṇavaī vinnavēi ‘nirūvēha ēyaṁ cittapaḍicchandayaṁ, kimēsa ārāhiō nava’ ti. samappiyā cittavaṭṭiyā, gahiyā dēvīē.
nirūviūṇa cintiyamimīē. ahō mē dhūyāē cittayammacaürattaṇaṁ sōhagayarō khu ēsō paḍicchandayāō. āṇāviyā ya ṇāē kumā
ralihiyā rayaṇavaïcittavaṣṭiyā, āsannīkayā kumārapaḍicchandayassa, jāva ‘añcantāṇurūvaṁ mihuṇaya'ti harisiyā dēvī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē.
halā mayaṇamañjuē, bhaṇāhi mē jāyaṁ, jahā suṭṭa ārāhiō; annaṁ ca, sabakālamēva tumaṁ ēyārāhaṇaparā havē jasu tti ēyaṁ ca tē pāri
ōsiyaṁ, tuma pi ēēṇa ēvaṁ cēvārāhiya tti; nirūvēhi ēyasta cittakōsallaṁ ti. bhaṇiūṇa samappiyaṁ sē cittavaṭṭiyādurya. ‘jaṁ maē
viyappiyaṁ, taṁ taha’ tti harisiyā mayaṇamabjuyā. gayā rayaṇāīsamīvaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhaṭṭidāriē, parituhā tē dēvī; bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇāē, jahā suṭṭhu ārāhiō tti. pēsiyaṁ ca tē pāriōsiyaṁ. taṁ puṇa na annapāriōsiyappayāṇamantarēṇa samappiuṁ jujjaï. rayaṇavaīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. halā, dessāmi tē pāriōsiyaṁ. pecchāmi tāva, kiṁ puṇa ambāē pēsiyaṁ pāriōsiyaṁ. mayaṇamanjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ bhaṭṭidā
riyā āṇavēi. uvaṇīyā sē kumāralihiyā cittavaṭṭiyā. diṭṭhā rēyaṇavaīē. vintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. hanta ahaṁ piva ettha ālihiya ti.
bhēṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. halā mayaṇamañjuē, kimaya ti. tīra bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē, dēvīē jahā suṭṭa ārāhiotti āṇavē ūṇa puṇa ima
āṇattaṁ; "annaṁ ca, sabakālamēva tuma ēyārāhaṇaparā havejjāsu ttiēyaṁ ca tē pāriōsiya; tuma pi ēēṇa ēvaṁ cēvāgahiya tti nirūvēhi
ēyassa cittakōsallaṁ ti," tahā jaṁ maē takiyaṁ, ‘bhaṭṭidāriyāē ēsō.varō havispaï,'taṁ taha tti takkēmi. taō acantasāhilāsaṁ puṇō
cittapaïgiī pulōiya vāciūga ya gāhaṁ harisavasuvellapulayāē jaṁpiyaṁ rayaṇavaīē. halā mayaṇamajuē, kimahaṁ ēsā ālihiya tti
aṇuharaï cittapaïgiī. tō accantaṁ nirūviūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mayaṇamañjuyāē. suṭhṭha aṇuharaï tina najjaï, kiṁ bhahidāriyā ālihiyā,
kiṁ vā bhaṭṭidāriyāē cēva ettha paḍibimbaṁ saṁkana ti. taō harisiyā rayaṇabaī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. kō uṇa ēpō bhavissaï. mayaṇa
majuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. takkēmi, kōi mahāṇubhāvō bhaṭṭidāriyāṇurāī sayalakalārayaṇāyarō rāyaüttō bhavissaï. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. halā,
na kayāi ahamaṇēṇa divā, tā kahaṁ mamāṇurāi tti. mayagajuyāra bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē, takkē mi, tuma pi imiṇāṁ ēmēva cittayamma
gayā diṭṭa ti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. halā, kiṁ cittayammagayadiṭṭhāē vi aṇurāō hōi? mayaṇamabjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. hōi āgii
visēsaō na uṇa savvattha. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ, kahaṁ viya. mayaṇamañjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ jahā bhaṭṭidāriyāē imaṁmi. taō īsi vihasiūṇa
nīsasiyamimīē. mayaṇamajuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. sāmiṇi, mā saṁtappa. ‘avassaṁ sāmiṇī imiṇā saṁjujjaī’ tti sāhēi viya mē hiyayaṁ.
rayaṇavaīē cintiyaṁ. kuō mē ettiyā bhāgadhēyā. dullahō khu cintiāmaṇī mandaüṇṇāṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi phuriyaṁ sē vāmalōyaṇēṇaṁ,
āyaṇṇiō puṇṇāhaghōsō. pariuṭṭhā cittēṇa. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. avi nāma ēyamavi ēvaṁ havēja tti. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā piya.
mēliyāhihāṇā cēḍī. bhagiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhaṭṭidāriē, dēvī āṇavēi, jahā ‘āsannā bhōyaṇavēlā, tā āvassayaṁ karēhi’ tti. tō
'jaṁ ambā āṇavēi’ tti bhaṇiūṇa kumārama gusarantī uṭṭhiyā rayaṇavaī. kayaṁ gurudēvayāiyaṁ niccayammaṁ. bhuttaṁ ca vihiṇā. gahiō kumāra
paḍicchandaō. ahō sōhaṇō aṅgavināsō, maṇōharā dhīralaliyayā salōṇā diṭṭhī, aïppagabbhō bhāvō, accuyāraṁ sattaṁ, gambhīra
garuō avasthāṇō. ahō īipō vi purisavisēsō havaï tti acchariyaṁ. ēvaṁ ca kumāraguṇuvittaṇaparāē aïkkantā kaïvi vāsarā.
iō ya taccittavaṭṭiyādasaṇaviṇōēṇa kumāraguṇacandassa vi ēvamēva tti. vināō ya ēsa vaïyarō kuōi mettībalēṇa. ‘uciyā
cēva saṅkhāyaṇanarindadhr̥yā kumārassa’ ti cintiūṇa pēsiyā tēṇa tīē pahāṇakōsalliyasamēyā pahāṇavaragā.

ibhō ya kumārapaḍicchandayamettadaṁsaṇaparā ‘na ēyamantarēṇa aṇubandhō muṇīyaï’ tti uciggā rayaṇabaī. paricattamimīē rāyakana
gōciyaṁ karaṇijja. samaddhāsiyā araīē, gahiyā raṇaraṇapaṇaṁ, aṅgīkayā sunnayāē, paḍivanā viyārēḍiṁ, otyayā mayaṇajaraēṇa. taō
sā ‘sīsaṁ mē dukkhaï’ tti sāhiūṇa sahiyaṇassa uvagayā sayaṇijja. tattha uṇa pavaḍamāṇāē viyambhiyāē aṇavarayamuvyattamāṇēṇamaṅgēṇaṁ
āpaṇḍuraēhiṁ gaṇḍapāsaēhi vāphapājaülāē aladdhāsāsavīsambhaṁ jāva thēvavēla ciṭaï, tāva harisabasupphullalōyaṇā samāgayā
mayaṇamañjuyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhaṭṭidāriē, ciraṁ jīvasu tti. puṇṇā tē maṇōrahā. jaṁ maē takkiyaṁ, taṁ tahēva jāyaṁ ti. rayaṇavaīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. halā, kiṁ tayaṁ takiyaṁ, kiṁ vā tahēva jāyaṁ ti. mayaṇamajuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē ēyaṁ takiyaṁ jahā ēsō cittapaḍiccha
ndaō bhaṭṭidāriyāē cēva varō bhavissaï tti, jāva taṁ tahēva jāyaṁ ti. taō kaḍisuttyaṁ dāūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rayaṇavaīē ‘halā, kahaṁ viya'
mayaṇamanjuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa. atthi ahaṁ iō bhaṭṭidāriyāsamīvāō dēvīsayāsaṁ gayā, jāva papphullavayaṇapaṅkayā saha cittamabhūsa
ṇēhiṁ mantayantī divā maē dēvī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. halā mayaṇamañjuē, bhaṇāhi mē jāyaṁ rayaṇavaī, jahā ‘puṇṇā mē maṇōrahā tuha
bhāgadhēēhiṁ, dinā tumaṁ paṇayapatthagāmahagdhaṁ aojhāsāmiṇō mahārāyamettībalamuyassa kumāraguṇacandassa. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. halā,
kimimiṇā asaṁbaddhēṇa. mayaṇamajuyāē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē, nēyamasaṁbaddhaṁ, kahāvasāṇaṁ pi tāva suṇēu bhaṭṭidāriyā. tō dēvīē
bhaṇiyaṁ ‘ārāhiō taē ēsa cittayammēṇa paritudyō ya bhayavaṁ payāvaī; jēṇa sō cēva tē akayanakannārāyadāriyāpariggahō bhattā viiṇṇō'
tti. ēvaṁ sōūṇa harisiyā rayaṇavaī. dinnaṁ mayagamañjuyāē niyayāharaṇaṁ. cintiyaṁ ca saharisaṁ ‘kahaṁ sō cēva ēva ēsō guṇacandō
tti. ahō jahatthamabhihāṇaṁ. avagaō viya mē saṁtāyō, tassa rōhiṇīsaddēṇa samāgō muttimantō viya pariōsō. mayaṇamajuyāē
bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaṭṭidāriē, tō dēvīē bhaṇiyaṁ ‘tā ēhi, manjiūṇa gurudēvaē vandasu’ tti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ ambā āṇavēi.
majiūṇa mahāvibhūīē vandiyā dēvaguravō. kārāviyaṁ mahārāyasaṅkhāyaṇēṇa mahādāṇāiyaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ ‘ṭhiī’ tti kāūṇa.
aïkkantēsu kaïvayadiṇēsu mahayā balasamudaēṇaṁ pahāṇariddhīē saṁgayā sahiyāhiṁ ahiṭiyā jaṇaṇīē aojjhānayarimēva vivāhani
mittaṁ pēsiyā rayaṇavaï ti. pattā ya māsamettēṇaṁ kālēṇaṁ. nivēiyā mahārāyamettībalassa. parituṭṭō ēsō. kārāviyamaṇēṇa bandhaṇamōya
ṇāiyaṁ karaṇijja. kayā uciyapaḍivattī. gaṇāvimō vārijadiyahō. samāiṭṭhā paüramahantayā, jahā ‘kumāravivāhāṇurūvaṁ savvaṁ karēha'
tti. kayaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ pubbakammanivvattiyaṁ cēva savvaṁ. samāraddhāō haṭṭabhavaṇasōhāō, davāviyaṁ pāulāṇa daviṇajāyaṁ, bhaṇḍārapattayaṁ vāi
ūṇa kaḍḍiyāī pahāṇāharaṇāī, nirūviyaṁ dēvanāicēlaṁ, sajjāviyā pahāṇavēyaṇḍā, bhūsāviyāō āsamandurāō, kaḍḍāviyā dhayamālōva
sōhiyā rahā, davāviyaṁ nayaracaccarēṣu tambōlapaḍalāiyaṁ. tō pasatthē tihikaraṇamuhuttajōē pasāhiō varanēvacchēṇaṁ suṇentō gēyamaṅga
lasadaṁ pecchantō pahaḍhapariyaṇaṁ namantō gurudēvē thuvvantō bandilōēṇa pahāṇasaṁvacchariyavayaṇaō samārūḍhō dhavalakarivaraṁ kumārō. ṭhiyā
ya sē maggaō visālabuddhippamuhā vayaṁsayā. taō vajantēṇaṁ maṅgalatūrēṇaṁ paṇañcamāṇāhiṁ vāravilayāhiṁ rahavarāigayarāyalōyaparivariō
ahiṇandijjamāṇō paürarāmāyaṇēṇa mahayā vimaddēṇa pattō rayaṇavaïjannāvāsayaṁ. ōiṇṇō karibarāō. paüttā kaścaṇamusalatāḍaṇāi
lakṣaṇō vihī. pavēsiō vahuyāharayaṁ. diṭṭhā ya ṇēṇa cittayammabimba pi ōhasantī rūbāisaraṇa raī pi visēsayantī maṇaharavilā.
sēhiṁ īsi palambāharā cakkavāyamihuṇasarisēṇaṁ yaṇajuyalēṇa tivalītaraṅgasōhithamuḍhigejjhamajjhā asōyapallavāgārēhiṁ karēhiṁ visthi
ṇṇaniyambabimbā thalakamalāṇugāriṇā calaṇajuyalēṇa savyāgāradasaṇīyā savvaṅgameddhāsiyā mayaṇēṇa kuṇḍamivāmayassa rāsī viya
muhāṇaṁ nihāṇamiva raīē āgarō viya āṇandarayaṇāṇaṁ muṇīṇa vi maṇahāriṇiṁ avatthamaṇuhavantī rayaṇavaï ti. harisiō cittēṇaṁ.
kayaṁ ca ṇēṇa siddhāēsavayaṇāō pāṇiggahaṇaṁ. bhamiyāī maṇḍalāī, paüttō āyārō, saṁpāḍiyā jaṇōvayārā. taō taṁ ghettūṇa gaō
niyayabhavaṇaṁ. kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ. aïkantā kāi vēlā- maṇaharaviṇōēṇaṁ. paḍhiyaṁ kālapāḍhaēṇaṁ

lg.l: avararayaṇāyaraṁ majiuṁ va turiyaṁ gō sūrō
rayaṇivahū sōēṇa va tamēṇa turiyaṁ tō gahiyā
niuṇēhi kaṁci kālaṁ gamiuṁ hiṭāu hāsakheḍḍēhiṁ
tōca kupurisariddhi bva jhijiu turiyamēva āḍhattā
duhiyamaha kaṁ va na kuṇaï uya bhō suhiyaṁ sumittassa

div.p:
kumāraguṇacandō vi ya uciē rayaṇivirāmasamaē gīyamaṅgalummī sēṇa pahāuyatūrasadēṇa vibōhiō samāṇō kāūṇa takkhaṇōciya
māvassayaṁ ucivēlāē cēva niggaō ujjāgardasaṇavaḍiyāē. ṭhiō tattha maṇōhāriṇā viṇōēṇa kaṁci kālaṁ. tō paviṭṭhō nayariṁ.
kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ. ēvaṁ ca païdiṇaṁ rayaṇavaī ē saha pavaḍḍamāṇāṇurāyaṁ sokkhamaṇuhavantassa aïkkantō kōī kālō.

anayā rāiṇō mettībalassa vithakō pañcantavāsī viggahō nāma rāyā. pēsiō ṇēṇa tassuvari vivakhēvō. da'puddharattaṇēṇa akayathāṇa
yapayāṇāinīimaggō sammamavagacchi ūṇa avasaraviiṇṇaviggahēṇa parāiō viggahēṇaṁ. jāṇāviyamiṇaṁ rāiṇō mettībalassa. kuviyō rāyā,
sayamēva payaṭṭō amarisēṇaṁ. vinattō kumārēṇa. tāya, na khala kēsarī siyālē karma vihēi. siyālappāō viggahō. tā alaṁ tami
saṁrambhēṇa. āṇavēu maṁ tāō, jēṇa pāvēi sō tāyakōyāṇalapayaṅgataṇaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā gevhiūṇa mamgāsanasaṁṭhiē
naravaī lahuṁ gaccham. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahāpasāō. alaṁ ca tannimittaṁ khēiēhiṁ sēsanaravaīhiṁ. khuddō khu sō tabassī. tā alaṁ tami
saṅkāē tti bhaṇiūṇa ahāsannihiyasēnasaṁgaō ‘alaṁ tāyaparihavalēsa savaṇē aṇavaṇīē ēyaṁmi visayasēvaṇāē vi' mottūṇa syagavaī gaō
viggahōri viggahēṇa kumārō. pattō ya māsamettēṇa kālēṇa tassa visayaṁ. vigahō vi ya ‘kumārō sayamāgaō’ ti viyāṇiūṇa sama
ssiō duggaṁ. ṭhiō rōhagasaṁjattīē ।rōhiō kumārēṇa. biiyadiyahē ya ukkaḍayāē amarisassaaṇabhatthayāē nīīṇaṁ bhiccayāē vigga
hassa samihiyayāē sāmiṇō alliyaṇiyāvavaēsēṇa asāhiūṇa kumārassa samāradō samaṁtaharō (samarō). payaṭṭamāōhaṇaṁ. visamayāē
duggassa pīḍi jamāṇaṁ pi kumārasennaṁ abhaggamāṇapasaraṁ ti ahiyayaramāḍhattaṁ jujjhiuṁ. jāō mahāsaṁgāmō. viyāṇiō kumārēṇa.
anisāmiō ṇēṇaṁ. niyattiyaṁ kahakahavi sennaṁ. bhaṇiyā ya rāyaütā. ajuttamimaṁ ayattasajjhē paōyaṇē attāṇamāyāsiuṁ. samassiō
tāva ēsō duggaṁ. rōhiyaṁ cimaṁ amhēhiṁ. na etya asarō palāiyavyassa. iṭṭhā ya mē kulaüttayā, na bahumaō tēsiṁ nāsō. sāmō
ya paḍhamō nīīṇaṁ. appō ya ēsō viggahō bhuttō ya tāēṇaṁ ṭhiō saṁbandhipakkhē. tā na juttagayaṁmi ēgapaē pōrusaṁ daṁsēuṁ. āḍhattō ya
aviṇayanāsaṇōvāō. aō mama sarīradōhayāē sāviyā tumbhē, jahā puṇō vi ērisa na kāyavvaṁ ti. tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇa.
vēi. visālabuddhiṇā uvaladdhō visaō. viiṇṇāiṁ gāmāgaramaḍambāī rāyaputtāṇaṁ. niruddhāī gāhagummayāī, niruddhō ya pajjōhārō. aï
kkantā kaïvi diyahā.

etthantaraṁmi kahaṁci paribhamantō samāgaō tamuddēsa vāṇamantarō. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa vāhayālīgaō kumārī. gahiyō kasāēhiṁ. ci.
ntiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ēsō sō durāyārō. ahō sē dhīraharuthayā, na tīraē ēsa amhārisēhiṁ vāvāiuṁ. āḍhattaṁ ca ṇēṇa imaṁ duggaṁ. tā ēya
sāmiṇō sahāyattaṇēṇa avagarēmi ēyassa tti. cinti ūṇa diṭṭō ya ṇēṇa pāsāyatalasaṁṭhiō viggahō. bahumaniō viggahēṇaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ
ca ṇēṇa. kimatthaṁ puṇa bhavaṁ ihāgaō tti. vāṇamantarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. tuha sahāyanimitta. vēriō vi ya mē ēsa durāyāraguṇacandō, na
sakkuṇōmi ēyassa uyayaṁ pecchiuṁ. addhavāvāiō ya chuṭṭō mahaṁ ēsa aojjhāē sanibhōgavāvaḍattaṇa. diṭṭhō na antarālē, diṭṭhō ya
saṁpayaṁ malayapatthiēṇa. tā alaṁ tāva mama malayagamaṇēṇaṁ. samāṇēmi antarē bhavaō viggahaṁ ti. viggahēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā
thēvami yaṁ kāraṇaṁ. kiṁ bahuṇā jaṁpiēṇaṁ. nēhi mēṁ aja rayaṇīē guṇacandasamīvaṁ, jēṇa ajjēta samāmi viggahaṁ ti. vāṇamantarēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ. sāyattamēyaṁ, tō payaṅgavittikālō cetra ēsō tti. saṁpahāriūṇa saha pahāṇapariyaṇēṇaṁ ṭhiō gamaṇasajjō viggahō. aïkkantō
vāsarō, samāgayā majjharayaṇī. bhaṇiyaṁ vāṇamantarēṇaṁ ‘ēsa dēsayālō’ ti. appapaścamō uccaliō viggahō. vijāpahāvēṇa nīō
vāṇamantarēṇa pavēsiō guṇacandavāsabhavaṇē. diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa pasuttō kumārō. bhaṇiō ya dhīragaruyaṁ. bhō bhō guṇacanda, maē saha viggahaṁ
kāūṇa vīsatyō suvasi. tā uṭhēhi saṁpayaṁ, kērēhi haïtthiyāraṁ ti. ‘sāhu, sāhu bhō vigāha, sāhu, sōhaṇō tē vavasāō’ ti bhaṇa
māṇō uhiō kumārō. gahiyamaṇēṇa khaggaṁ. etthantaraṁmi imaṁ vaïyaramāyaṇṇi ūṇa dhāviyā aṅgarakkhā, nivāriyā kumārēṇa. bhaṇiyā
yaṇa. bhō bhō sāviyā mama sarīradōhayāē; na ettha annēṇa pahariyavvaṁ. kiṁ na āvajiyā tumbhē imassa imiṇā vavasāraṇa. tā
tubbhē cēva ettha viggahasahāsayā, viggahō uga mamaṁ saha imēṇa. etthantaraṁmi vāṇamantarēṇa ‘arē khuddapurisa, kōisō tuha imiṇā vi
ggahō’ tti bhaṇamāṇēṇa samāhaō khaggalaṭṭhīē kumārō. ‘iṇa haṇa’ ti bhaṇamāṇō ya sapariyaṇō uvaḍiō vigga hō. chūḍhāī ōharaṇāī.
sikkhāisaraṇa pāyaṁ vañciyāī kumārēṇa. jāō ya sē bhāsurabhāvō. taō ukkaḍa yāē puṇgassa pagiṭṭayāra vīriyapariṇaīē duppadharisa
yāē sāmibhāvassa hīṇayāē viggahādīṇaṁ kēsarikisōraraṇa viya bhindiūṇa gaïyapīḍhaṁ vikkhi viya viggahapurisē ‘uvayāri’ tti adāūṇa
khaggappahāraṁ kēsāya gēṇa pāḍiō vigahō. kaō sē ubari pāō. etthantaraṁmi kumārapariyaṇēṇa pāḍiyā viggahapurisā, ‘jayaï
kumārō’ tti samuddhāiō kalayalō. paṇaṭṭhō vāṇamantarō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō sē pāvakammassa aṇāulattaṇaṁ, ahō māhappapagarisō,
ahō kayannuyā ahō ēgasārattaṇaṁ; ahō mē ahamnayā, jamēvamavi ēsō na vāvāiō tti. tā imaṁ ettha tāva pattayālaṁ, jamaojhāuriṁ
gantūṇa nivēēmi ēyassa viṇivāya, jaṇēmi ēyāriyaṇassa sōyaṁ. ēvamavi kaē samāṇē avagayaṁ cēva ēyassa ti. cintiūṇa
payaṭṭō ajojjhāmantarēṇa.

iō ya ‘uṭhēhi bhō mahāpurisa udvēhi, kuṇasu hathiyāraṁ’ ti bhaṇiūṇa mukkō kumārēṇa viggahō. na utthiō ēsō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇa. dēva, kīisa dēvēṇa saha hathiyārakaraṇaṁ. ajuttamēyaṁ pubi pi, visēsaō saṁpayaṁ. viṇijjiō ahaṁ dēvēṇa. pattē vi vāvāyaṇē'na
vāvāiō’ ti ahiyayaraṁ vāvāiō tti. tā kiṁ imiṇā asiliṭṭhacēṭiēṇaṁ. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. uciyamēyaṁ tuha mahāṇubhākkhāē.
ahavā kimettha accharīyaṁ, īisā cēva mahāvīrā havanti. viggahēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. dēva, kīisā mama mahāṇubhāvayā mahāvīrayā yā kiṁvā
iyāṇi bahuṇā jaṁpiēṇaṁ. vinavēmi dēvaṁ. dēu dēvō samāṇattiṁ niyanarindāṇaṁ, vāvārantu mēṁ ēē, pekkhaü ya dēvō mamāvi kāvurisa
ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. sōhaṇō kāvurisō, jō ēvamajhavasaï pasuttaṁ ca sattuṁ viṇā pahārēṇa bōhēi. tā kiṁ ēiṇā asaṁbaddhapa
lāvēṇaṁ. dinā taē mama pasuttāvāvāyaṇēṇa pāṇā, maē vi bhavaō ēsa visaō ti. gacchaü bhava. vigahēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā
annaṁ pi dēvaṁ jāēmi. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. sāhīṇaṁ bhavaō, jaṁ maē āyattaṁ ti. viggahēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. karēu dēvō pasāyaṁ mama ōla
gagāē. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mā ēvaṁ bhaṇa; tāyabhiccō tuma mama jebhāugō. tā jaï bhavaō vi bahumayaṁ, tā tāyasayāsaṁ cēva gacchasu
tti. paḍibannaṁ viggahēṇa. kārāviyaṁ ca ṇēṇa vaddhāvaṇayaṁ ti. taddiyahamēva ukkoṭṭiyaṁ duggaṁ. payaṭṭō saha viggahēṇamaojjhāuri kurō.

etthantaraṁmi samāgaō tattha bhayavaṁ samataṇamaṇimuttalēṭukaścaṇō dayālū savvajīvēsu aṇuvagiyaparahiyaraō visuddhēhiṁ caühi nā
ṇēhiṁ ‘paḍibōhasamaō guṇacandassa’ tti viyāṇiūṇa samaniō laddhimantasāhūhiṁ puṣvapariyāyamihilāhivō vijayadhammō nāmāyariō
tti. ṭhiō guṇasaṁbhavāhihāṇē ujjāṇē. diṭṭhō kumārapariyaṇēṇaṁ. nivēiyaṁ kumārasta. dēva, mahātavassī iō nāidūrē tavōvaṇē cihaï ।
ēyaṁ sōūṇa dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti. mahātavassi tti harisiō kumārō. gaō tassa candaṇanimittaṁ saha viggahēṇa pahāṇapariyaṇēṇa ya.

lg.l: diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa tadivasamēva guṇasaṁbhavaṁmi ujāṇē
dhammō va muttimantō āyariō vijayadhammō tti
uyahi ba dhīragaruō sūrō va paṇāsiyākhilatamōhō
candō va sōmalēsō jiṇindavayaṇaṁ va akalakō
daṇa ya taṁ jāō muhapariṇāmō dada kumārassa
paricintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ ahō ṇu khalu ēsa kayaüṣṇō
tā vandāmi ahamiṇaṁ bhayavantaṁ taha ya pajjuvāsāmi
sāhūṇa daṁsaṇaṁ pi hu niyamā duriyaṁ paṇāsēi
ēvaṁ ca cintiūṇaṁ vihiṇā saha vigahēṇa tō bhayavaṁ
ahivandiō ya ṇēṇaṁ āyariō saparivārō tti
tēṇa vi ya dhammalāhō tassa kaō mokkhasokhalāhassa
upavisasu tti ya bhaṇiō guruṇā caraṇantiē tō tassa
aha vandiūṇa ya guruṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa bhayavaṁ mahantaṁ mē
kōḍaṁ tuha vuttantē kahiō jō saṁpayaṁ tumaē
ōhēṇa maē ēsō tanayarajēṇāu(ṇa) vimhayaṁ daṭuṁ
tē pucchiūṇa nāō tō ya ahamāgēō iyaṁ
tā jaï na antarāyaṁ jāyaï anassa kusalōjōyessa
bhaṇiyamaha kumārēṇaṁ amha vi bhaya aṇuggahō ēsa
kīraü imassa vayaṇaṁ avā bhayavaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti
tō jaṁpiyaṁ bhayavayā nisuṇaha jaï tuma ettha kōḍaṁ ti
atthi iha bharahavāsē mihilā nayarī jaṇaṁmi vikkhāyā
tīē ahamāsi rāyā nāmēṇaṁ vijayadhammō ti
iṭṭhā ya aggamahisī dēvī nāmēṇa candadhamma tti
sā annayā ya sahasā itthīrayaṇaṁ ti kāūṇaṁ
kahiō ya majjha ēsō vuttantō kahavi vijayadēvīē
sōūma ya mōhāō gaōmi ahayaṁ mahāmōha
gahiō ya mahādukkhēṇa taha jahā vikkhiuṁ pi na caēmi
taha dukkhattassa ya mē vōlīṇā tiṇṇi'hōrattā
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa naravaï kajjēṇa viṇāulō tumaṁ kīsa
mantavihāṇa nimittaṁ naṇu jāyā tuha maē nīyā
kappō ya tattha ēsō jēṇa tumaṁ jāiō na ta paḍhamaṁ
na tīē sīlabhēō jāyaï dēhassa pīḍā vā
tā mā saṁtappa dahaṁ chammāsā āraō tuma taüē
juji si niyamaō iya bhaṇiuṇamadasaṇī jāō
mōhavasayāṇa jē jē ālāvā honti taṁmi kālaṁmi
paricattarajaka jō ḍiō ahaṁ tattha vilavantō
kiṁ bahuṇā nirayasamaṁ majjha tayā dukkhamaṇuhavantassa
jāyā ya mahaṁ cintā anō viya majjha antarappā mē
jāō pasannacittō tā kiṁ puga kāraṇaṁ ettha
gantūṇa bhūmibhāyaṁ thēvaṁ puraō jiṇassa kāūṇa
sayamavi ya jiṇasayāsaṁ jāō aha gamaṇajoggī tti
bhuvaṇaguruṇō vi tāva ya pāraddhaṁ tiyasanāhabhaṇiēhiṁ
mēhakumārēhi taō surahijalaṁ sīyalaṁ pavuṭuṁ ti
sīhāsaṇaṁ ca tassa ya rayaṇamayamahō ya pāyapīḍhaṁ tu
tēhiṁ ciya jayaguruṇō rūvi tavatēyavandraṁ va
iya tiyasē hi viraïē tihuyaṇagāhasta aha samōsaragē
puvadārēṇa tō tatya paviṭhṭhō jiṇō bhayavaṁ
kāūṇa namōkāraṁ tityasta payāhiṇaṁ ca uvaviṭhṭhō
sēsēsu vi tisu pāsēsu bhayavaō tatya tiṇi paḍimāō
pukhadārēṇa pavisiya muṇiṇō taha kappayāsi dēvīō
jōisiyā vantariyā dēvā taha bharaṇavāsī ya
tiya sahi vi jāṇāī maṇirayaṇa vihūsiyāi rammāiṁ
ēvaṁ ca niravasēsa siṭuṁ tattō samāgaraṇa mahaṁ
kallāṇaēṇa navaraṁ dēvī tatva diṭṭa ti
thēvamiha bhūmibhāyaṁ turiyaṁ gantūṇa karibarāu ahaṁ
dārēṇa uttarēṇaṁ diṭṭhō ya jiṇō jaya khāyō
jaya tihuyaṇekkamaṅgala jaya naravara lacchivallaha jiṇinda
jaya guṇarahiya mahāguṇa jaya paramāṇu jaya guru aṇanta
jaya jaya nāha sayaṁbhuva jaya muhuma nirañjaga muṇīsa
gaṇaharapamuhē ya tō namiūgaṁ sāhuṇō samvē
tiyasāīē ya tahiṁ namiūṇa jahārihē sara ṭhāṇē
aha bhayavaṁ pi jiṇavarō niyaṭhāgaṭhiyāga sabyasattāṇa
pāvēṇa sayā duhiō muhiō uṇa hōi dhammēṇa
dhammō carittadhammō suyadhammāō taō ya niyamēṇa
kasacchēyatāvasuddhō sō cciya kaṇayaṁ va vinnēō
prāṇajjhayaṇāīṇaṁ jō ya vihī ēsa dhammakasō
bajāṇuṭāṇēṇaṁ jēṇa na vāhijjaï tayaṁ niyamā
sambhavaï ya parisuddhaṁ sō uga dhammami chēō tti
ēēhi jō na suddhō annayaraṁmi va na suṭhu nivvaḍiō
sō tārisaō dhammō niyamēṇa phalē visaṁvayaï
ēsō ya uttimō jaṁ purisatthō estha vaściō ṇiyamā
ettha ya apaściō ṇa hi vañcijaï tēsu jēga tēṇēsō
suhumō asēsavisaō sāvajjē jattha atthi paḍisēhō
jaha maṇabaïkāēhi parassa pīḍā dahaṁ na kāyayā
jhāpayatraṁ ca sayā rāgāivipakkha nālaṁ tu
thūlō na samvavisaō sāvajjē jattha hōi paḍi sē hō
rāgāiviuḍaṇa sahaṁ na ya jhāṇāi vi tayāsuddhō
jaha pañcahi bahuēhi vi ēgā hiṁsā musaṁ visaṁvāē
jā dhammiyassa vittī ēyaṁ bajhaṁ aṇudvāṇaṁ
ēēṇa na vāhijjaï saṁbhavaï ya taṁ durga pi niyamēga
ēēga jō visuddhō sō khalu chēēṇa suddhō tti
jaha pañcasu samiīsuṁ tīsu ya guttīmu appamatēgaṁ
sa ciya kāyanaṁ jaïiṇā saha kāigāī vi
jē khalu pamāyanaṇayā vasahāī tē vi vajjaṇīyā u
nō dhammiyassa vittī aṇaṇuṭāṇaṁ taya hōi
ēēṇaṁ vāhijjaï saṁbhavaï ya taṁ dugaṁ na niyamēṇaṁ
ēēṇa jō samēō sō uṇa chēēṇa nō suddhō
taha anammiyāṇaṁ ucchēō bhōyaṇaṁ gihē gēmaṇaṁ
bandhāisāhagō taha ettha imō hōi tāvō ti
ēēṇa jō visuddhō sō khalu tāvēṇa hōī suddhō tti
santāsantē jīvē niccāṇiccē ya ṇēgadhammē ya
jaha suhabandhāīyā jujjanti na annahā niyamā
nicō vēgasahāvō sahāvabhūyaṁmi kaha nu sō dukkhē
piṇḍō paḍō vva na ghaḍō tapphalamaṇaīyapiṇḍa bhāvāō
ēvaṁvihō u appā micchattādīhi bandhaē kammaṁ
iharā kattā bhottā ubhayaṁ vā pāvaī sayā vi
na ya sō taō na annō paccakkhāippasiddhīō
na ya nāṇanō sō'haṁ ki pattō pāvapariṇaïvasēṇa
tassēva tahā bhāvā sabamiṇaṁ hōi uvavannaṁ
ēgantēṇa u niccō'ṇiccō vā kaha nu vēyaē sakaḍaṁ
ettha sarīrēṇa kaḍaṁ pāṇahāsēvaṇāra jaṁ kammaṁ
taṁ khalu cittavivāgaṁ vēēi bhavantarē jīvō
na u taṁ cēva sarīraṁ naragāisu tassa taha abhāvāō
ēvaṁ jīvēṇa kayaṁ kūramaṇapayaṭṭaēṇa jaṁ kammaṁ
na u kēvalaō jīvō tēṇa vimukkassa vēyaṇābhāvē
na ya sō cēva tayaṁ khalu lōgāivirōhabhāvāō
ēvaṁ ciya dēhavahē uvayārē vā vi puṇṇapāvāiṁ
tayabhinnami ya niyamā tannāsē tassa pāvaï nāsō
na puṇa amuttō muttasma appaṇō kuṇaï kiṁcidavi
akarentō ya na bajjhaï aïppasaṅgā sadēva bhāvāō
mokkhō vi ya baïddhassā tayabhāvē sa kaha kīsa vā na sayā
kiṁ vā hēūhi tahā kahaṁ va sō hōi purisatthō
tamhā baddhassa taō bandhō vi aṇāimaṁ pavāhēṇa
jaha u aīō kālō tahāvihō taha pāhēṇa
dīsaï kammōvacaō saṁbhavaī tēṇa tassa vigamō vi
kaṇagamalassa ya tēṇa u mukkō mukkō tti nāyavō
ēmāibhāvavāō jattha tō hōi tāvasuddhō tti
tā paḍivajaha sammaṁ dhammamiṇaṁ bhāvō mara bhaṇiyaṁ
iya bhaṇiūṇa jāē tuhikē tarakhaṇaṁ jiṇavaraṁmi
unnāmiyamuhakamalā puṇō vi ṭhāṇaṁ gayā niyayaṁ
tattha ya kēi pavanā sammattaṁ dēsaviraïvayamannē
annē u cattasaṅgā jāyā samaṇā samiyapāvā
etthantaraṁmi ya maē diṭṭhā dēvī tahiṁ samōsaraṇē
jāyā ya majjha cintā hanta kuō estha dēvi ti
sariyaṁ ca mantasiddhassa taṁ maē punamantiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ
paricintiyaṁ ca etthaṁ pucchāmi jiṇaṁ niyāṇaṁ ti
kiṁ puṇa maē kayaṁ parabhavaṁmi jassīisō vivāgō tti
paripucchiō ya ēvaṁ namiūga maē jiṇō nirava sēsaṁ
puvāyakammadōtaṁ taō vi iya kahi māḍhattō
atthi ihēva girivarō jambuddīvami bhārahē vāsē
nāmēṇa siharasēṇō tattha tumaṁ āsi sabararāō tti
dēvī vi ya tē ēsā tuha jāyā āsi sirimaī nāma
sa tuma imīē saddhiṁ sacchandaṁ giriniuñjadēsēsu
parikhīṇō hiṇḍantō taṁ dēsaṁ āgaō navaraṁ
daṭṭhūṇa sāhugacchaṁ aṇugampā tuha maṇami uppanā
hā ki bhamanti ēē aïvisapē vijhakantārē
gantūṇa pucchiyā tē kiṁ hiṇḍaha estha vijharaṇami
sāhūhi tō bhaṇiyaṁ sāvaya panthāu pabbhaṭṭhā
bhaṇiō ya sirimaīē taṁ sāmi mahātabassigō ēē
nūgaṁ nihāṇalambhō ēsa tuha pagāmiō vihiṇā
sāhūhi taō bhaṇiyaṁ sākkha nē yāṇi kappaṇi jāṇi
bhaṇiyaṁ tumaē taha vi ya tumbhēhi aṇugahō u kāyayō. annahakaraṇa gāī nivēō hō
pariyāṇi ūṇa bhāvaṁ navaraṁ saddhāluyāṇa guṇajuttaṁ
sāhūhi tō bhaṇiyaṁ jaï ēvaṁ vigayavaṇṇagandhāī
tā amha dēha navaraṁ phalāi cirakālagahiyāī
iya bhaṇiēṇaṁ tumaē sigdhaṁ girikandarāu ghettūṇa
tēhi vi ya tujha dhammō kahiō jigadēsiō susāhūhiṁ
paḍivanā iya tumbhē kammōvasamēṇa taṁ dhamma
bhattibharōṇayavayaṇēhi sō ya tumbhēhi gahiō tti
muṇiūṇa taha ya tubhaṁ jammaṁ kammāṇuhāvacariyaṁ ca
sāhū hi samāiḍhē kāyacamiṇaṁ ti tubbhēhiṁ
tami ya diṇami tubhaṁ jaï vi sarīra viṇivāyaṇaṁ kōi
cintēja taha karejja va tahāvi tumbhēhi khamiyavvaṁ
ēvaṁ sēvantāṇaṁ tumbhaṁ jiṇabhāsiyaṁ imaṁ dhammaṁ
tumbhēhi vi bhattīē sōūṇamiṇaṁ susāhuvayaṇaṁ ti
ēvaṁ ti abbhuvayaṁ gaēhi sāhūhi ciṇṇaṁ ca
taha cēva kaṁci kālaṁ annonnavēḍamāṇa saḍḍēhiṁ
aha annayā ya tumbhaṁ pōsahapaḍimaṁ pavanāṇaṁ
taṁ daṭṭaṇaṁ tumaē tabbhīyaṁ sirimaī niēūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ ca bhīru mā bhōyasu ti ēyassa mēṁ samallīṇā
tō sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyaṁ ti kō'ttha saṁdēhō
kiṁ tu guruvayaṇamēyaṁ pāmukaṁ hōi amhēhi
jamhā gurūhi bhaṇiyaṁ sarīraviṇivāyaṇaṁ pi tubmāṇa
jaï kōi taṁmi diyahē karejja tumbhēhi khamiyavvaṁ
tā kaha gurūṇa vayaṇaṁ sumarantēhi guṇabhūsiyaṁ nāha
aha mottūṇa dhaṇuvaraṁ tumaē tō sirimaī imaṁ bhaṇiyā
saccaṁ gurūṇa vayaṇaṁ kaha kīraï annahā suyaṇu
tuha nēhēmōhiēṇaṁ maē vi ēyamiha vavasiyaṁ āsi
tā alamēēṇa piē guruvayaṇē āyaraṁ kuṇasu
uvayāri cciya ēsō amhāṇaṁ pasavanāhō tti
iya cintintō ya tuma naharēhi viyārilō sutikhēhiṁ
ahiyāsiō ya tumaē jāyāsahiēṇa sō ubasaggō
jō kupurisāṇa sāvaya accatthaṁ durahiyāsō ti
caïūṇa taō dēhaṁ visuddhacittāi dō vi samakālaṁ
paliōvamāuyāī tatya ya bhōē jahicchiē bhottuṁ
jāyāi jattha jaha vā saṁjōyaṁ sundaraṁ ca pattāī
jaha pāviō ya dukkhaṁ virasaṁ taha saṁpayaṁ suṇasu
avaravidēhē khettē cakkaüraṁ nāma puravaraṁ rammaṁ
tassāsi agamahisī dēvī nāmēṇa bālacanda tti
tīsē garbhami tumaṁ caïūṇa muhaṁmi uvavannō
dēvī vi ya tē ranō sālassa subhūsaṇassa gēhaṁmi
tāṇa bahuēhi doṇḍa vi maṇōrahasaēhi diṇē pasatthaṁmi
tattha ya samaramiyakō nāmaṁ tu ṭhāviyaṁ guruyaṇēṇa
dēvīē vi ya nāmaṁ asōyadēvi tti saṁgīyaṁ
pariṇīyā ya taē vi ya supasatyavivāhajōēṇa
bhuñjantāṇa payāmaṁ visayamuhaṁ nāra vaccaē kālō

div.p: sapariyaṇā rayaṇavaï tti.

gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, saṁsārasamāvannā khu pāṇiṇō sabvē dukkhatarubīyanammasaṁgayā ahihavīyanti aṇusamayaṁ jarāē, utthā
rijjanti mōhatimirēṇa, vāhijjanti visayataṇḍāē, kayatthijjanti indiēhiṁ, pacanti kōhaggiṇā, avaṭṭhamanti māṇapavvaēṇaṁ, mōhi.
jjanti māyājāliyāē, palāvijjanti lōhasāyarēṇa, khaṇḍijjanti iṭṭaviōēhi, bhamāḍijjanti kālapariṇaīē, kavalijjanti maccuṇa
tti. paramatthō na kēi suhiyā mottūṇa tappaḍivakkhujjaē mahāṇubhāvē. tē uṇa, jahā kēi mahāvāhigahiyā pīḍijjamāṇā mahāvēyaṇāē
samāvannanivvēyā gavēsiūṇa kusalavejnaṁ nivēiūṇa appāṇayaṁ tassa vayaṇēṇa paḍibannā jahuttakiriyaṁ vāhijamāṇā vi tevvēyaṇāē vimu
camāṇā vāhiṇā antō-āroggalāhadhiīē agaṇēmāṇātaṁ bajjhadukkhaṁ īsi avimukkā vivāhiṇā saṁjāyavimokkhanicchayamaī ārogga

ṇandajōē bhattuṇō havaï. rayaṇavaīē bhariyaṁ. bhayavaï, na taē kuppiyavvaṁ, bhaṇāmi kiṁci ahamāulayāē. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē,
akōvaṇō cēva tavassijaṇō hōi, kimetra ma bhatthaṇāra. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaha, jaï ēvaṁ tā kō ettha pañcō, jaṁ bhayavaīē ā
iṁṭṭa ti. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, alamettha paccaēṇa. na ya vīyarāyaṇamannahā hōi. vīyarāgavayaṇaṁ ca saramaṇḍalaṁ. tadāēsēṇa ya
jaṁpiyamiṇaṁ, na uṇa annahā; tahāvi ēsō etya pañcō ttisigdhaṁ tuhāvagamaṇanimittaṁ bhaṇāmi kiṁci ahayaṁ. na taē khijjiyavvaṁ. rayaṇava
īē bhaṇiyaṁ. āṇavēu bhayabaī. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. suṇa, ēvaṁviha saravaīē nārīē gujjhapaēsē masō havaï tti saramaṇḍalē paḍhiyaṁ. ettha
ya tumaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ēvamēyaṁ kiṁ tu marisēu bhayavaī, jaṁ maē āulāē viyappiyaṁ. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. na ettha

vaī, kassa uṇa kammassa īisō mahārōdō vivāō tti. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, thēvassa annāṇaceṭṭhiyassa. kīisī vā imassa
roddayā. suṇa, thēvēṇa kammuṇā jaṁ maē pāviyaṁ ti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaï, mahantō mē aṇuggahō; dahamavahiya mhi. gaṇiṇīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. aṁtya kō salāhiyō narasundarō nāma rāyā. tassāhamimaṁ jammapariyāyaṁ paḍacca dhamnapattī ahēsi. sō ya ēgayā gaō āsa
vāhaṇiyāē. avahiōdappiyaturaēṇa vicchūḍhō mahāḍabīē. diṭṭā ya ṇēṇa majjhavhadēsayālē tīē mahāḍabīē ēgaṁmi vaṇaniujē aücca
dasaṇā isthiyā. bhaṇiō ya tīē. mahārāya, sāgayaṁ, uvavisasu tti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kāsi tuma kō vā ēsa paēsō ti. tīē bha
ṇiyaṁ. maṇōharā nāma jakkhiṇī ahaṁ, vijharaṇṇaṁ ca ēyaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. kīsa tuma ettha ēgāgiṇī. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ahaṁ khu nanda
ṇāō malayaṁ gayā āsi saha piyayamēṇa. tō āgacchamāṇīē iha paēsē nimittamantarēṇa kuviō mē piyayamō, gaō yamaṁ ujjhiuṁ

tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. kīisa taspa saïttaṇaṁ, jō aṇurattaṁ jaṇaṁ pariccayaï. rāiṇāṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. bhadē, kō'gurattaṁ viṇā dōsēṇa pariccayaï! tīē

paralōyaṁ aveksasi. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. kimimiṇā jaṁpiēṇa. jaï na māṇēsi maṁ, tō ahaṁ niyamēga bhavantaṁ vāvāēmi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ।
bhaddē, kō taē bābāīyaï. jō raṇḍāē purisō vāvāijaï, tassa jalañjalidāṇaṁ na jujjaï tti. taō paüṭā viya pahāviyā rāyasa
mmuhaṁ. huṁkāriyā ya ṇēṇa. nāyā asaṇā. taō kimimīē ti payaṭṭō rāyā sanayarābhimuhaṁ. samāgaō thēvaṁ bhūmibhāga, kāya aya
ṇḍaṁ mi cēva nivaḍiō kañcaṇapāyō. na laggō rāiṇō. jōiyaṁ ca ṇēṇōparihattaṁ. diṭhṭhā ya sā gayaṇamajhē. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. arē

cchiyaṁ maē ‘ajjaütta, kiṁ nimitta. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. na kiṁci. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. hā kahaṁ na kiṁci kahiṁ ajjaüttō, kahamīisī avīsatthaya
tti. tā sāhēhi kāragaṁ, panjāulaṁ mē hiyayaṁ ti. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. alaṁ pajjāulayāē. nibandhapucchiēṇa sāhiyō maṇōharājavikhaṇivu

cēva imīē saṁpāḍiyaṁ. kaō kila tuha santiō vēsō. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta, alamimīē dasaṇēṇa, niyāsēhi ēvaṁ mahāpāvaṁ ti ।

niyaṁ lahuṁ nivāsēha. taō tēhiṁ ‘jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi’ ti bhaṇiūṇa pubavēriēhi viya ‘ā pāvē, ā pāvē’ tti bhaṇamāṇēhiṁ gahiyā ahaṁ

kāi duhrasīlā nivāsīyaï, tahā nivāsiya mhi. vimukkā nayarakāṇaṇasamīvē, bhaṇiyā ya ṇēhiṁ. ā pāvē, jaï puṇō gayabhavaṇaṁ pavi
sasi, taō muyā amhāṇa hatthō tti. niyattā rāyapurisā. taō cintiyaṁ maē. hanta kimēyaṁ ti. ahō mē pāvapariṇaī, peccha ki

atthi ihēva bhārahē vāsē uttarāvahē visaē bambhaüra nāma nayaraṁ. tattha bambhasēṇō nāma naravaī ahēsi. tassa bahumaō viurō

ya ēsā. halā, kīsa tumaṁ vimaṇadummaṇa tti. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. piyasahi, virattō mē bhattā gāḍharatō maïrāvaīē, ajāyaputtabhaṇḍā ya ahayaṁ ।

kahiṁ sā parivasaï, sāhēhi majjha; ahaṁ tamāṇēmi tti. sāhiyaṁ bandhusundarīē, jahā kila pubabāhiriyāē. taō gayā tuma, diṭṭhā
parivāiyā. bandhusundarī tumaṁ dadrumicchaï tti bhaṇiūṇa āṇiyā tumaē, āṇiūṇa gayā tumaṁ sagihaṁ. pūiyā sā bandhusundarīē, sā
hiō sē niyavuttantō. bhaṇiyaṁ parivāiyāē. avihavē, dhīrā hōhi. thēva mēyaṁ kajja. karēmi ahamettha jōya, jēṇa sō tīsē paōsamā.

sasaṁpāiyavittī mahantaṁ dukkhamaṇuhaviya mayā samāṇī takammadōsēṇēva samuppannā caṇḍālaïtthigattāē ti. tattha vi ya daḍhaṁ amaṇōramā
piyayamassa mayaṇadukkhapīḍiyā ahāuyakkhaēṇa mariūṇa takammadō sēṇēva samuppamā savaraïsthigattāē. tattha vi ya amaṇōramā savyasa
varāṇaṁ vicchūḍhā ṇēhiṁ pallīō paribbhamantī ya visamasajjhakantārē kilēsasaṁpāiyasarīraṭhiī parikkhīṇakāyā addhāṇapaḍivanapahaparibhaṭēhi

kēdurē vā iō vattaṇi tti. taē sabahumāṇamāikkhiyaṁ. sajjhakantāramēyaṁ, iō nāidūrē vattaṇī. sāhūhi bhaṇiyaṁ. dhammasīlē, kayarīē
disīē battaṇī. taē bhaṇiyaṁ. avaramaggēṇa iō vōliūṇa imaṁ tarulayāgahaṇaṁ. ahavā ēha, ahaṁ cēva daṁsēmi tti. daṁsiyā vattaṇī.
cintiyaṁ ca suddhacittāē. ahō imē amacchariyā piyabhāsiṇō pasantarūvā abhigamaṇīyā; dhannāṇamēvaṁvihēhi saha saṁgamō bhavaï. ēvaṁ
visuddhacintaṇēṇa khaviō kammasaṁghāō āsagaliyaṁ bodhivīyaṁ. etthantaraṁmi dhammalāhiyā sāhūhiṁ suhayarapariṇāmā ya paḍiyā tēsiṁ
calaṇēsuṁ. esthantaraṁmi appārambhapariggahattaṇēṇa sahāvamaddavajayayāē sāhusannihisāmatthaō suddhabhāvayāē ya baddhaṁ sumāṇusā uyaṁ. gayā
bhayavantō sāhuṇō. gaēmu vi ya na tuṭṭō tē tayaṇusaraṇasaṁgaō suhabhāvāṇubandhō. ahāuyaparikkhaēṇaṁ ca mayā samāṇī takammadōsa
sēsasaṁgayā cēva samuppannā sēyaviyāhivassa dhūya tti. pattavayā ya pariṇīyā kōsalāhivēṇa; takkammasēsayāē ya jakkhiṇīrūvadhippala.
dēṇa kayatyāviyā ṇēṇaṁ. tā ēvaṁ vacchē duṭṭhaparivāiyāhavaṇakammavivāgasēsamēyaṁ ti.

ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa avagayaṁ ciya mē mōhatimiraṁ, jāō bhavavirāō, utpannaṁ jāisaraṇaṁ, baḍiō saṁvēgō. vandiūṇa bhaṇiō bhayavaṁ
gurū. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaḥ, aha kayā uṇa takkammavivāō nīsēsībhavissaï. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, imiṇā ahōrattēṇa. maē bhaṇiyaṁ ।
bhayavaṁ, kayā kaha vā taṁ jakkhiṇi viyāṇissaï annaüttō. bhayatrayā bhaṇiya vacchē, ajjā rayaṇīē tuha saṁhāvāsarisayāē samuppannā
saṅkō nivēiuṇa mantiṇō takayavīyarāyapaḍimālavaṇapaōēṇa nīsaṁsayaṁ viyāṇiūṇa, jahā na ēsā dēvi tti; tō ‘haṇa haṇa’ tti bhaṇa
māṇō khaggaṁ gahē ūṇa uḍhiō rāyā, jāva takkhaṇaṁ adaṁsaṇā jāya tti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaṁ, na tīē kiṁci akusalaṁ karissaï ajjaüttō
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, na hi, kiṁ tu kayatthiyā tumaṁ ti ahiyaṁ saṁtappissaï. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaya kō ettha dōsō anja uttassa,
kammapariṇaī ēsa tti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, ēvamēyaṁ tahāvi mōhadōsēṇa daḍha saṁtappissaï mahārāō. suē āgamissaï ihaī,
pekkhissaï tumaṁ. taō saha taē accaṁtasuhiō havissaï tti viyāṇi ūṇa na taē saṁtappiyavvaṁ. maē bhaṇiyaṁ,. bhayavaṁ, avagaō mē
saṁtāvō tuha daṁsaṇēṇa, virattaṁ ca mē cittaṁ bhavacāragāō. lā kiṁ mahārāyāmamaṇēga. puṇō vi vibhōgāvasāṇā saṁgamā. kīisaṁ ca
jarāmaraṇapīḍiyāṇaṁ muhiyattaṇaṁ. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu saha taē accantasuhiō havissaï ti. bhaṇiyaṁ maē.
:accantasuhiō jīvō na vīyarāyaśyaṇāṇuḍhāṇamantarēṇa havaï. tō bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. saha taē jagaïdōsanigghāyaṇasamatthaṁ dukaraṁ kāvuri
sāṇa vīyarāgavayaṇāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ karaïssaï. ēēṇa kāraṇēṇa accantamuhiō hōhi tti. bhaṇiūṇa tuṇhikō ṭhiō bhayavaṁ. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa
'ahō dhannō mahārāō’ ti harisiyā ahaṁ. hiyayatthaṁ viyāṇiūṇa bhaṇiyā ya bhayavayā. vacchē, tumaṁ pi geṇhāhi tāva savvamantaparama
mantaṁ aïdullahaṁ jīvalōē viṇāsaṇaṁ bhayāṇaṁ sāhaṇaṁ paramapayassa pūṇijja savāṇaṁ acintasattijuttaṁ māhagaṁ sayalaguṇāṇaṁ uvamāīyakallāṇa
kāraṇaṁ bhayavayā vīyarāgēṇa paṇīyaṁ pañcanamokkāraṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, aṇuggihīya hi. bhayakkhā bhaṇiyaṁ. ṭhāyasu mē vāmapāsē
puvāhimuḍa tti. ṭhiyā īsi avaṇayā, vandiō bhayavaṁ. kayaṁ bhayavayā paramagurusaraṇaṁ. tō uvaüttēṇa akkhaliyāiguṇasamēō dinnō
namōkārō, paḍicchiō maē suddhabhāvāisaraṇa. tayaṇantaraṁ ca paṇamiva bhavabhayaṁ, samāgaya viya muttimuhaṁ ti. bhayadayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
bacchē, iṇamēva aṇusarantīē gamēyavyā taē imāē ēgapāsaḍhiyāē giriguhāē rayaṇī, na bīhiyadhvaṁ ca. saṁpayaṁ gacchāmi ahayaṁ, muē
puṇō amhāṇaṁ saṇaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, aṇuggihīya mhi. gaō bhayavaṁ.

namōkāraparāē ya paramapamōyasaṁgayāē thēvavēlā viya aïkkantā rayaṇī. pahāyasamaē ya āsasāhēṇa annēsagatthaṁ samāga bhō rāyā.
pattā ya ṇē' samīvē kaïvi āsavārā. divā ya ṇēhi, harisanimmarē hiṁ sāhiyā rāiṇō. āgō mē samīvaṁ rāyā. bāhollalōyaṇēṇaṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ. dēvi, na mē kuppiyavvaṁ, annāṇa patthamavarajjhaï. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta, kō etya avasarō kōvassa; niyaduccariya
vivāgarōsamēyaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. dēvi, ahametya nimitta. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. anja utta, janmantarē viōyapaḍibaddhaniyaduccariyasāmatthēṇa
pahr̥yayaramaṇubhūyaṁ, tatya kiṁ tumaṁ nimittaṁ ti. sabahā maē kaō ēsa dōsō tti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. dēvi, sāmannēṇa viyāṇāmi aha
miṇaṁ, jamaṇādī saṁsārō kammavasagā ya pāṇiṇō. dēvī uṇa visēsaparinnāṇasaṁgayā viya mantēi. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. anja utta, ēvaṁ. rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ. dēvi, kaha diya. sāhiō maē maraṇavavasāyagurudaṁsaṇāiō namōkāralāhapajjavasāṇō parikahiyavuttantō. ‘ahō bhayavaō
nāṇāisaō’ ti vimhiō rāyā. ‘ahō asārayā saṁsārasta, ēihamettassa vi dukaḍassa īisō vivāō’ tti saṁviggō rāyā. bhaṇiyaṁ
ca ṇa. dēvi, kēdūrē iō bhayavaṁ guru tti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. anja utna, iō thōvantarē. rāṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. tā ēhi, gacchamha bhayavantadaṁ
saṇavaḍiyāē. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta, jutta mēyaṁ ti. gaō maṁ cettaṇa saha pariyaṇēṇa rāyā. dihō bhayavaṁ, vandiō harisiyamaṇēṇa,
dhanmalāhiō bhayayayā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, sāhiō mamaṁ bhayavantadaṁsaṇāiyō sayalavuttantō cēva dēvīē. jāō ya mē saṁtāsō,
'ahō ēhamettassa vi dukkaḍassa īisō vivāō’ tti. aṇēyadukkaḍasamanniō ya ahayaṁ. tā na-yāṇāmō, kimettha kāyavvaṁ ti. bhaya.
vayā bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya muṇa, jamettha kāya. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. āṇavēu bhayā. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. suppaṇihāṇaṁ vaṭṭamāṇasayalasāvajja
jōyaviramaṇaṁ saṁviggayāē aīyapaḍikkamaṇaṁ accantamaṇiyāṇamaṇāgayapaccakkhāṇa ti. ēvaṁ ca kara samāṇē mahantakusalāsayabhāvēṇa mahā
mēhabuṭṭihayāṇi viya khuddajalaśudittayāī pasamanti dukkaḍāī. taō vittharaï kupalāsō, ullapaï jīvavīriyaṁ, visujjhaē antarappā,
pariṇamaï appamāō, niyattara micchāviyappaṇaṁ, avēi kammāṇubandhō, khijaï bhavasaṁtatī, pāvijaï paramapayaṁ. tattha uṇa savvakālaṁ na
honti dukkaḍajōyā, accantiyaṁ ca nirupamamuhaṁ. tā imaṁ kāyavyaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, ēva mēyaṁ, aṇuggihīō ahaṁ bhayavayā, kusa
lajōēṇa karēmi bhayavaō āṇaṁ ti. bhaṇi ūṇa pulaïyā ahaṁ bhaṇiyā ya. dēvi, dullahō bhayavantatullō dhammasārahī. uvāēō ya savvahā
dhammō sayamannaṁ saṁkilē sakāragaṁ. na hōi dhammō gurumantarēṇa, tā saṁpāḍēmi bhayaraō āṇaṁ ti. maē bhaṇiyaṁ. anjaütta, juttamēyaṁ ।
taō davāviyaṁ rāṇā mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā aṭṭhāhiyāmahimā, sammāṇiyā paürajaṇavayā, ṭhāviōrajjē surasundarō nāma jeṭṭaputtō. taō
aṇēyasāmantāmaccapariyō saha mara sayalantēurēṇa ya mugihīyanāmadhēyagurusamīvē suttabhaṇiēṇa vihiṇā patramāṇēṇaṁ suhapariṇāmēṇaṁ
pāiō rāyā. tā ēvaṁ, bacchē, thēvēga kamnuṇā iyaṁ maē pāviyaṁ ti. aō agacchāmi. thēvassa anāṇaceṭṭiyassa, vacchē, ēsō
vivāō, pahūyassa u tiriyāirasuṁ havaï. ēvaṁ ca kammapariṇaīē samāvaḍiyāra vi assā udaē pubdhakaḍamēyaṁ ti na saṁtappiyavvaṁ jāṇa
ēṇa. rayamāyaṇṇiūṇa āvibhūyasammattadēsaviraïpariṇāmāē jaṁpiyaṁ rayaṇavaīē. bhayavaï, mahantaṁ dukhamaṇubhūyaṁ bhayavaīē. ahavā
īimō ēsa saṁsārō. sabahā kayatthā bhayavaī, nā samuttiṇṇā imāō kilēsanambālāō. haṁ pi dhannā cēva, jīēmaē tuma diṭṭhā.
na appapugṇāṇaṁ cintāmaṇirayaṇasaṁpattī habaï. tā āisaü bhayabaī, naṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti. taō viyāṇiūṇa tīē bhāvaṁ sāhiō sāva
yadhammō gaṇiṇīē. ‘ēyamahaṁ caēmi kāuṁ’ ti harisiyā rayaṇavaī. namokkārapuvvayaṁ siddhantavihāṇēṇa gahiyāī aṇuvvaguṇavbaya
sikkhāyavayāī. vandiyā gaṇiṇī, pucchiyā rayaṇavaïē. bhayavaï, ‘kī isō majjha saravisēsō’ tti pucchiyāē jaṁ taē samāṇattaṁ
"jārisō paramānandajōē bhattuṇō havaï" tti tā kīisō ajjaüttassa paramāṇandajōō, kiṁ suyaṁ kuōi ajjaüttēṇa vīyarāyavayaṇaṁ.
gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. vacchē, ēvamahaṁ takkēmi. etthantaraṁ guluguliyaṁ gandha hathiṇā, samāhayaṁ saṁjhāmaṅgalatūraṁ, paḍhiyaṁ ca bandiṇā.

lg.l: dhammōdaēṇa taṁ natyi jaṁ na hōi tti sundaraṁ lōē
iya jāṇiūṇa sundari saṁpaï dhammaṁ daḍhaṁ kuṇasu

div.p:
ḍhōiyāṇi ya sē nandābhihāṇāē bhaṇḍāriṇīē mahānāyagasaṁjuyāṇi kaḍayāṇi, samāgaō siyakusumahatthō purōhiō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇa. dēvi, dēvaguruvandaṇasamaō vaṭṭaï tti. harisiyā rayaṇavaï. cintiyaṁ ca ṇāē. na etya saṁdēhō, aṇukulō saüṇasaṁghāō tti
sammamāyaṇiyaṁ vīyarāgavayaṇaṁ annaüttēṇa, pāviyaṁ pāviyavvaṁ, ubaladdhō siddhimaggō. kahaṁ ca annahā paramāṇandasadō muyadēvayākappāē
bhayavaīē muhāō nikkhamaï. amahiyajāyaharisāē vandiyā gaṇiṇī, bhaṇiyā ya saviṇayaṁ. bhayavaï, kiṁ kappaï, ettha bhayavaīē
raïyaṇīē cihium̐, na hi. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. dhammasīlē, jattha tuma, tattha natthi virōhō. tahāvi gacchāmi tāva saṁpayaṁ. adūrē cēva
amhāṇa paḍissaō. tā puṇō āgamissāmi tti. rayaṇavaīē bhaṇiya. bhayavaï, aṇuggahō. vandiūṇamabbhuṭiyā gaṇiṇī. aṇuvva
iyā ya ṇāē. vandiūga ya niyattā urciyadēsāō. kayaṁ pōsakaraṇijja. namōkāraparāē ya aïgayā rayaṇī. pahāē ya āucchi
ūṇa sasuramaṇunāyā ya ṇēṇa gayā gaṇiṇīsamī. vandiyā gaṇiṇī. suā dhammadēsaṇā. samāgayā sagihaṁ bīyadiyahē dhammāṇusa
yō sagihatthiyāē cēva samāgayā gaṇiṇō. ēvaṁ païdiṇaṁ gaṇiṇīpajjuvāsaṇaparāē aïkantā cattāri divasā. samāgaō pañcamē
diṇē kumārō. nivēiō candasundarīē gaṇiṇīsamīvasaṁṭhiyāē rayaṇavaīē, jahā dēvi, na annahā bhayavaīvayaṇaṁ ti; samāgaō tē hiya
yaṇandaṇō.’ ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa parituhā rayaṇavaī. dinnaṁ tīē pāriōsiyaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi kumārō vi saha viggahēṇa daga naravaī sāhiūṇa viggahavutantaṁ rāiṇō sabahumāṇaṁ sammāṇiō gēṇa samāgaō
rayaṇavaïsamīvaṁ. daṭhūṇa ya ‘kaha kayatthā cetra dēvī saṁgayā gaṇiṇīē’ ti harisiō cittēṇaṁ. vandiyā ṇēṇa gaṇiṇī. dhammalāhiō
gaṇiṇīē. bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa. bhayavaï, peccha mama puṇṇōdayaṁ, jēṇa paḍibōhiō ahaṁ bhayavayā sugihīyanāmadhēpaṇa guruṇā bīyahiyaya
bhūyā ya mē taē dēvī tti; diḥ ya bhavasayadullahadasaṇā bhayavaī. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. kumāra, natthi asanjhaṁ kusalāṇubandhipuṇṇōda
yassa. ēēṇa pāṇiṇō pāvanti suhaparaṁparāē muttisuhaṁ pi, kimaṅga puṇa annaṁ. kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï vi puṇṇapāvakkhaēṇa muttī
tahāvi tassa kusalāṇubandhipuṇṇamēva kāraṇaṁ. na kusalāṇubandhipugṇavivāgamantarēṇa tārisā bhāvā labbhanti, jārisēsu pugṇapāvakkha
yanimittakusalajōyārāhaṇaṁ ti. gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ. sāhu, sammamavadhāriyaṁ kumārēṇa. ahavā na ettha accharīyaṁ. nimittamettaṁ cēva
dēsaṇā tattōvalambhē kusalāṇaṁ. ēvaṁ ca dhammakahāvāvarēṇa kaṁci vēla gamēūṇa gayā gaṇiṇī paḍissayaṁ. annonnadhammasaṁpattīē ya pari
tuḍhaṁ mihuṇayaṁ. bhuttuttarakālaṁ ca sāhiō paropparamimēhiṁ dhammavuttantō. gayāī gaṇiṇīsamīvaṁ, suyā dhammadēsaṇā. samāgayāṇi
uciyasamaēṇa. ēvaṁ ca païdiṇaṁ dhammajōgārāhaṇaparāṇa aïkkantō kōi kālō. bhāviyāṇi dhammē. kālakkamēṇēva samuppannō
rayaṇavaīē puttō. nattuyamuhadasaṇakayasthattaṇēṇaṁ ca kumāraṁ rajjē ahisiñciya pavāō mettībalō. kumārō vi jāō mahārāō tti.
tassa ya dhammaguṇappahāvēṇa aṇuratta sāmantamaṇḍalaṁ rahiyaṁ kaṇṭa ēhi alaṁkiyaṁ rajaguṇēṇa samaddhāsiyaṁ lacchīē niccapamuiyajaṇaṁ muṭṭiyāē
tivaggaṇīīē sayalajaṇapasaṁsajjiṁ dēvagurupajjuvāṁsaṇēparayāē rē jamaṇupālentassa aïkkantō kōi kālō.

annayā samāgaō jalayakālō, otthariyamambaraṁ jalaharēhi, pavāiyā kalambavāyā, viyambhiō gajjiyaravō ullasiyā balā
yapantī, vipphuriyā vijjulēhā, harisiyā vappīhayā, jāya parisaṇaṁ, paṇacciyā sihaṇḍiṇō, paṇaṭṭhā rāyahaṁsā, pavvāliyā vasu
maī, bhariyā kutārā, parattō daduraravō, ubbhinnā kandalā, ukkaṇṭhiyāō pahiyajāyāō, nivvyaṁ gōmāhisakkaṁ. pavaḍḍamāṇā
ṇubandhē ya jalayakālē sarasariyāpūradasaṇatthaṁ samaṁ ahāsannihiyapariyaṇēṇa niggaō rāyā. diṭṭhā sariyā kaḍhataṇakalilēṇa pūriyā
jalōhēṇa vittharantī sabaō, nivāḍayantī kūlāṇi, viṇāsayantī ārāmē, kalusayantī appāṇaya, saṁgayā kūrajalayarēhi, rahiyā
buhajaṇasēvaṇijjēga jalēṇa, ahiṭiyā kallōlēhiṁ, bajjiyā majjāyāē, accantabhōsaṇēṇaṁ mahāvattasaṁghāēṇaṁ bālāibhayajaṇaṇi tti ।
taṁ ca kaṁci vēlaṁ pulaśya paviṭṭhō nayariṁ rāyā. manā kara diyahā. pāya ra āsaparivāhaṇanimittaṁ vāhiyāliṁ gacchamāṇēga
puṇō payaïbhāvaṭṭhiyā saṁgayā sacchōdaēṇa vajjiyā kūrajalayarēhiṁ visiṭṭhanaṇōvabhōyasaṁpāyaṇasamatthā sa ccēva diṭṭha tti. taṁ ca daṭṭhūṇa
sumariyapuvyavuttantasma rāiṇō tahāphammaparigaïbasēṇa samuppannō saṁvēō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō ṇu khalu asārō bajjhariddhivi
ttharō, saparāvagāraō ya parama-thēṇa. ēsēva sariyā etya nirdasaṇaṁ ti. jahā imā vittharantī sacaō appaparāvagāriṇī pubōva
laddhavuttantēṇa, tahā purisō vi vittharantō bajjhavittharēṇa; sō khalu mahārambhapariggayāē nivāḍēi muhabhāvakulāṇi, viṇāsēi dhamma
caraṇārāmē, kalu sēi kammuṇā apāṇaya, saṁjujjaē kūrasattēhi, viujjaē nirīhasāhujaṇēṇa, sēvijaē ummāyakallōlēhi, vajijaē
kiccamajjāyāē. ēvaṁ ca mahāmōhāva tamajhavattī niratthiyāē ahō purisiyāē aviyāriūṇa paramatthaṁ, aṇālōciūṇa tassa bhaṅgurattaṁ,
māindayālavibbhamē tami asaï pattē vi apariciē aśyāraē niyamēṇa accantagiddhō saparāvayāraē tti. rahiō ya ṇēṇaṁ, jahā imī
sariyā payaïbhāvē vaṭṭamāṇī sōhaṇā, tahā purisō vi vijamāṇē vivēē niratyayaparikilēsarahiō saṁgaō suddhāsaraṇa vanjiō
pāvamittahiṁ jīvalōōvayārōvabhōyasaṁpāyaṇasamatthō havaï, avijamāṇē avāyagamaṇapaḍibandhē bajjhavihavavittharabhāvō uṇa vivēiṇō vi
mahantaṁ paralōyantarāyaṁ nibandhaṇaṁ micchāhimāṇassa ucchāyaṇaṁ cittanivvuīē saṁpāyaṇaṁ parikilēsāṇa paṇāsaṇaṁ nāṇapariṇaīē vēriyaṁ
saṁtōsāmayassa bandhavaṁ asañcavasāyāṇaṁ ayāṇayaṁ viyambhasuhassa viyāṇayaṁ kavaḍanīiṇaṁ vajiya kusalajōēṇaṁ saṁgayaṁ pāvāṇumaīē. tahā
jaï vi kēsiṁci dabośyārasaṁpāyaṇasamatthamēyaṁ, tahāvi ittarōtaō na annapīḍāē viṇā paramasthō sō vi saṁbhavaï. pahāṇō ya bhāvō
vayārō na-yāparicattārambhaparicattārambhapariggaḍō sacahā taṁ saṁpāḍēi. juttaṁ ca maṇuyabhāvē tassa saṁpāyaṇaṁ, kimannēṇa niratthaēṇaṁ ti.
cintayantassa samuppanō sayaladukkhaviuḍaṇekkapaccalō kusalapariṇāmō. pavaḍamāṇasuhapariṇāmō ya niyattō rāyā. sāhiō ṇēṇa
ēsa vaïyarō raya gavaī pahiyāga manīṇaṁ. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. dēva, ēvamēyaṁ, na annaha ti. karēu sanōhiyaṁ dēvō. ala ettha kālakkhēvēṇa
aïcaścalā jīvalōyaṭhiī, muhuttamētaṁ pi ya taṁ pasaṁsi jaē jaṁ pāmastha sāha gaparāṇaṁ. tō ‘kiccamēyaṁ’ ti cintiūṇa rāigā davāviya
