guṇāhiyasaṁgamēṇaṁ pakkhavāēṇaṁ guṇēsu taïhābhabdhayāniōēṇa aṇugampāibhāvaṇāē visiṭakammakhaōvasamēṇaṁ ti. indasammēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ. aha ēvaṁ vavatthira ēgantamuhasarūṣō mokkhō kahaṁ dukkha sēvaṇārūvāō saṁjamāṇuḍhāṇāō ti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma,
muṇa. jahā cigicchāsēvaṇāō suhasarūvā āroggayā, tahā saṁjamāṇuḍhāṇāō ēgantasuhasarūvō mokhō tti. na yāvi paramasthaō
dukkhasēvaṇāsvaṁ saṁjamāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ paramasuhapariṇāmajōgō visuddhalēsāṇubhāvaō ya. ēvaṁ ca samaē paḍhijjaï. avi ya—

lg.l: na vi atthi rāyarāyassa taṁ suhaṁ nēya dēvarāyassa

div.p:
annaṁ ca. jē imē anjatāē samaṇā nigganthā, ēē ṇaṁ kassa tēulēsaṁ vīivayanti? māsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē vāṇamantarāṇa
dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, ēvaṁ dumāsapariyāē samaṇē nimganthē asurindavajjiyāṇaṁ bhavaṇavāsīṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsa vīivayaï, timāsapari
yāē samaṇē nigganthē asura(riṁda)kumārāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, caümāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē gahagaṇanakkhattatārārūvāṇaṁ jōi
siyāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, paścamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē candimamariyāṇaṁ jōisindāṇaṁ jōisarātīṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, chammāsa
pariyāē samaṇē nigganthē sōhammīsāṇāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēōlēsaṁ vīivayaï, sattamāsapariyāra samaṇē nigganthē sarṇakumāramāhindāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēu
lēsaṁ vīivayaï, aṭṭamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē vambhalōgalantāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēōlēsaṁ vīivayaï, navamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē mahā
mukkasahassārāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, dasamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē āraṇaccuyāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, ēkārasamāsa
pariyāē samaṇē nigganthē gēvējāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, bārasamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē aṇuttarōvavāiyāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ
vīivayaï tēṇaṁ paraṁ surakē sukābhijāī bhavittā sijjhaï bujjhaï muccaï savvadukkhāṇamantaṁ karēi. ēvaṁ bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, na yāvi
paramatthaō dukkha sēvagā gurūvaṁ saṁjamāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ ti. indasammēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ, icchāmi aṇusaddhiṁ.

etthantaraṁmi pubbāgaēṇēva paṇāmapuvvayaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ cittaṅgaēṇa. bhayavaṁ, kē puṇa pāṇiṇō ki kaïppagāraṁ kiṁṭhiiyaṁ vā kamma
bandhanti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa.

lg.l: mōhāuṁyavaṁjāṇaṁ paṁgaḍīṇa tē u bandhaṁgā bhaṇiyā
tē uṇa dusamayaṭhiiyassa bandhayā na uṇa saṁparāyassa
apamattasaṁjayāṇaṁ bandhaṭhiī hōi aṭṭha u muhuttā
jē vi pamattā'ṇāuṭṭiyāē bandhanti tēsiṁ bandhaṭhiī
sammadiṭṭhīṇaṁ pi hu gaṇṭhiṁ na kayāi vōlaē bandhō

div.p: cittaṅgaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, epramēyaṁ; avaṇīō amhāṇa mōhō; bhayavayā aṇuggihīō daḍhaṁ icchāmi aṇusahi.

etthantaraṁmi samāgayā kālavēlā, avagayā narindāī, kayaṁ bhayavayā uciyakaraṇija. biiyadiyahē ya taṁmi cēva cēhaē avaṭṭiyassa
bhayavaō samāgaō aggibhūī ṇāma māhaṇō. vandiūga bhayavantamāidēvaṁ samarāicavāyagaṁ ca ubaviṭṭhō tayantiē. saviṇayaṁ jaṁpiyamaṇēṇa.
bhayavaṁ, sāhēhi majjha dēvayāvisēsaṁ taduvāsaṇāvihiṁ uvāsaṇāphalaṁ ca. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. dēvayāvisēsō tāra sō vīyarāgō
vajiō dōsēṇa paramanāṇī pūjiō surāsurēhi paramatyadēsagō hiō sadhajīvāṇa acintamāhappō rahiōṁ jammamaraṇēhiṁ kayakiccō
païramappa tti. taduvāsagāvihī uṇa jahāsattīē nirīhēga cittaṇa añcantabhāvasāraṁ uciēṇaṁ kamēṇaṁ rahiyamaïyārēhiṁ taduvaēsasāraṁ
aṇuṭāṇaṁ dāṇassa pālaṇaṁ viraīē āsēvaṇaṁ tavassa bhāvaṇaṁ bhāvaṇāṇaṁ ti. uvāsagāphalaṁ puṇa sundaraṁ dēvattaṁ mahāvimāṇāiṁ accharasāō
divyā kāmabhōyā suṁkulapañcāiyāī sundaraṁ svaṁ visiṭṭhā bhōyā viyakkhaṇattaṁ dhammapaḍivattī paramapayagamaṇaṁ ti. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa
harisiō aggibhūī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, nō bōyarāgō, sō paramamajjhatthayāē na kassaï uvayāraṁ karēi ‘mā annēsi pīḍā
bhavissaï’ tti; akarentō ya taṁ ‘hiō sabajīvāṇaṁ’ ti kō ettha hēū. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, muṁṇa. na khalu paramatthadēsaṇāō
mahāmōhanaüsaṇēṇa annō kōi uvayārō. karēi ya taṁ bhayavaṁ annapīḍācāēṇaṁ ti. ēsēva ettha hēū. aggibhūiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ
ēvamuvāsa gāē kō tassa upayārō, avijamāṇē ya taṁmi kahaṁ bhaṇiyaphalasiddhī, kahaṁ vā sā taotti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa.
na khalu taduvagārāō ettha phalasiddhī, kiṁ tu taduvāsaṇāō. diṭṭhā ya ēsā taduvagārābhāvē vi vihiōvāsaṇāō cintāmaṇimanta
jalaṇēhi na ya tē tēhiṁ tippanti, kiṁ tu tadaṇusaraṇajēvaṇāsēvaṇēṇa ahippēyatthassa hōi saṁpattī, na ya sā na tēhiṁtō ti.
ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa paḍibuddhō aggibhūī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ahō bhayavayā sammamāvēiyaṁ, avagaō mōhō, icchāmi aṇusāsaṇaṁ ti.

etthantaraṁmi ahiṇavasāvagō saṁgaēṇaṁ vēsēṇaṁ sapariyaṇō samāgaō dhaṇariddhiseṭṭhī. kayā bhayavaō pūyā. taō vandiūṇa bhayavantaṁ
vāyagaṁ ca uvaviṭṭhō tadantiē. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, sāhūṇa kayakāraṇāṇumaībhēyabhinnā sāvajajōyaviraī tā kahamētēsiṁ sāvayāṇa
thūlagapāṇāivāyādirūvāṇuvvayappayāṇē iyaraṁmi aṇumaī na hōi. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ sōma, avihigā hōi na u vihippayāṇēṇa. sēṭiṇā
bhaṇiya. bhayavaṁ, kērisaṁ vihippayāṇaṁ. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. saṁsiūṇa saṁvēgasāraṁ jahāvihiṇā bhavasarūvaṁ aṇavaḍiyaṁ ēgantaṇa
kāraṇaṁ dukkhaparaṁparāē, tabhigghāyaṇasamatthaṁ ca acantiyarasāyaṇaṁ jīvalōē akkhēvēṇa sāhagaṁ mokkhassa jahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhudhamma, jaṇiūṇa
suddhabhāvapariṇaī vaḍḍiūṇa saṁvēgaṁ tahāvihakammōdaēṇa aāḍivajjamāṇēsu taṁ sāvaēsu ujjaēsu aṇuvyayagahaṇaṁmi majjha yassa muṇiṇō pasa
sthakhettāiṁmi āgārāiparisuddhaṁ payacchantassa vihippayāṇaṁ ti. sēṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, ēvaṁ pi kahaṁ tassa iyaraṁmi aṇumaī na hōi. bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. gāhāvaïcōra(putta)ggahaṇavimokkhaṇayāē ettha didvantō. atthi iha vasantaüraṁ nayaraṁ, jiyasattū rāyā, dhāriṇī
dēvī. nahāisaraṇa pariuṭō sē bhattā. bhaṇiyā ya ṇēṇa. bhaṇa, kiṁ tē piyaṁ karīyaü. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajja utta, kōmuīē antēurāṇa jahi
cchāpayārēṇa ūsavapasāō tti. paḍissuyamaṇēṇa. samāgaō sō diyahō. karāviyaṁ rāiṇā ghōsaṇaṁ, jahā ‘jō aja etya purisō vasihii,
taspta maē sārīrō niggahō kāyayō.’uggadaṇḍō rāya tti niggayā savvapurisā, navaraṁ ēgassa sedviṇō chassuyā saṁvavahāravāvaḍayāē
lahuṁ na niggayā. ḍhakiyāō pōlīō. bhaēṇa tatthēva nilukkā. vattō rayaṇīē ūsayō. viiyadiyahē rāiṇā paüttā cārigā. harē
gavēsahā kō ettha na nigga bhō tti. tēhiṁ niuṇabuddhīē gavēsiūṇa sāhiyaṁ rannō. mahārāya, amugasedvissa chassuyā na niggaya tti.
kuviō rāyā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa. vāvāēha tē durāyārē. gahiyā rāyapurisēhi, uvaṇīyā vajjhathāmaṁ. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa bhīō tēsiṁ
piyā. samāgaō naravaïsamīvaṁ. vinnattō rāyā. dēva, khamasu mamēkamavarāhaṁ muyaha ēkabāramēē. ‘mā annē vi ēvaṁ karessanti’ tti na
mellēi rāyā. puṇō puṇō bhaṇṇamāṇēṇa ‘mā kulakhō bhāu’ tti mukkō sē jeṭṭaputtō. bahumanniō sēṭiṇā. vāvāiyā iyarē. na ya
samabhāvassa savvēsu ēgabahumannaṇē aṇumaī sēsēsu tti. ēsa didvantō, imō imassa uvaṇaō. rāyatullō sāvaō, bāvāijamāṇavā
ṇiyagasuyatullā jīvanikāyā vāṇiyagatullō sāhū, binnavaṇatullā aṇubdhayagahaṇakālē sāhudhammadēsaṇā. ēvaṁ ca suhumajīvanikāya
vayā bhaṇiyaṁ. paḍhamaṁ nāṇaṁ taō daya tti. nāṇapuvayaṁ sabamēva sammāṇuṭṭāṇaṁ ti. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa harisiō dhaṇariddhī. bhaṇiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ, ahō mudihrō bhayavantēhiṁ dhammō.

etthantaraṁmi pubbāgaēṇēva paṇamiūṇa bhayavantaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ asōyacandēṇa. bhayavaṁ, jē khalu īi thēvassa vi pamāyacēṭiyassa dāruṇavi
vāgā muṇīyanti, tē kiṁ tahēva udāhu annahā. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. jē āgamabhaṇiyā tē tahēvaḥ jaō na annahāvāiṇō
jiṇā. jē uṇa āgamabāhirā, tēsuiccha ti. asōyacandēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, jaï ēvaṁ, tā kīsa kēsiṁci pāṇavahāikiriyāpavattāṇa
añcantaviruddhakārīṇa vi iṭṭatthasaṁpattī viulā bhōgā dī hamāuyaṁ atuṭṭō ya tayaṇubaṁdhō; annēsiṁ ca thēvē vi avarāhē savvavivajjaō ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. vicittā kammapariṇaī. jē khalu akusalāṇubandhikammajuttā saṁsārāhiṇandiṇō khuddasattā doggaïgā
miṇō kallāṇaparaṁmuhā bhāyaṇaṁ aṇatthāṇaṁ, tēsiṁ khalu akupalapavattīē pāvabharasaṁpūraṇatthaṁ iṭṭatthasaṁpattāi saṁjāyaē, vivarīyāṇaṁ tu bhaṇiya
bhāvavivarīyabhāvaō savvavivajaō tti. asōyacandēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ. ahō mē aśṇōō mōhō bhayavayā.

etthantaraṁmi puvāgaraṇēva paṇa miūṇa bhayavantaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tilōyaṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, abhayadāṇōvaṭṭhambhadāṇāṇa oghaō kiṁ pahāṇayaraṁ ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa. abhayadāṇaṁ. rāyapatticōraggahaṇavimokkhaṇayāra etya didvantō. atthi ihēva bambhaüra
nayaraṁ, kusaddhaō rāyā, kamaluyā mahādēvī, tārāvalippamuhāō annadēvīō. annayā ya rāyā vāyāyaṇōvaviṭhṭhō samaṁ kamaluyāpamuhāhiṁ
*caühiṁ aggamahisīhiṁ akkhajūyaviṇōēṇa ciṭṭhaï, jāva aṇēyakasāghāyamiyadēhō baddhō +payaṁḍarajjūē daṇḍavāsiēṇa āṇīō
takarō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. dēva, kayamaṇēṇa paradabbāharaṇaṁ ti. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. vāvāēhi ēyaṁ. payaṭṭāviō deṇḍavāsiēṇa vaïjjhabhūmi.

taō pāṇavallahayāē avalōiūṇa dīṇavayaṇēṇa disāō akkandiyamaṇēṇa. ahō paḍhamacōrakārī asaṁpattamaṇōrahō vāvāi jāmi ahannō
tti. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa sōgiyāō dēvīō. vinattō tāhiṁ rāyā. ajjaütta, mā asaṁpattamaṇōrahō vāvāijaü, anja uttapasāēṇa karēmō
kiṁpi ēyassa. aṇumayaṁ rāiṇā, bhaṇiyaṁ ‘karēha.’ taō egāē mōyāviūṇa abbhaṅgāviō sahassapāgēṇa, mahāviō sappaōyaṁ vhāvāviō
gandhōyagāīhiṁ, dina khōmajuyalaṁ. laggā dasa sahassā. bhaṇiō ya tīē. ettiyagō mē vihavō tti. annāē karāviō āsavapāṇaṁ,
bhakkhāviō vilaṁkē, vilimpāviyō jakkhakaddamēṇaṁ, dinnaṁ kaḍisuttayaṁ. paricābhī vīsaṁ sahassāī. bhaṇiō ya tīē. ettiyagō mē
vihavō tti. annāē bhuñjāviō kāmiyaṁ, pāyāviō dakkhāpāṇagāī, bhūsāviō dibbāharaṇēhi, dinnaṁ tambōlaṁ. laggō ettha lakkhō.
bhaṇiō ya tīē. ettiyagō mē vihavō tti. maüliyā kamaluyā, bhaṇiyā narindēṇa. na dēsi tumaṁ kiṁci. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta,
natthi mē vihavō ēyassa sundarayaradāṇē. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. jīvēḷōyasārabhūyā mē tumaṁ, pahavasi mamaṁ pāṇāṇaṁ pi; tā kahaṁ natthi. tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ. ajjaütta, mahāpasāō; jaï ēvaṁ, tā dēmi kiṁci ahaṁ ajjaüttāṇumaīē. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ēvaṁ karēhi. bhaṇiō ya tīē cōrō.
bhadda, diṭṭhō taē ajabīyatarukusumuggamō. tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. sāmiṇi, suṭṭha diṭṭhō, aō cēva saṁjāyapacchāyāvō viraō ahaṁ jāvajjīva
mēvākajjāyaraṇassa. dēvīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaï ēvaṁ, tā dinnaṁ maē imassa abhayaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. sudinnaṁ ti. harisiō cōrō, mōīyaṁ
sundarayaraṁ ti. parituṭṭhā kamalayā. hasiyaṁ sēsa dēvīhiṁ. mahādēvīē bhaṇiyaṁ. kimimiṇā hasiēṇa; ēvaṁ cēva pucchaha, kimettha sundarayaraṁ
ti. pucchiō cōrō. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēga. maraṇabhayāhibhūēṇa na nāyaṁ maē sēsaṁ ti na yāṇāmi visēsaṁ. saṁpayaṁ puṇa suhiō mhi.
ēvamēyaṁ ti paḍivanna sēsadēvīhiṁ. ēsēva etthuvaṇaō tti. harisiō tilōyaṇō, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi samāgayā kālavēlā, gaō sāvayajaṇō, pāraddhaṁ bhayavayā uciyakaraṇija. ēvaṁ ca nāṇādēsēsu saphala viharamāṇassa
aīō kōi kālō. annayā ya samāgaō antijaṇavayaṁ. jāyā sissaniṣphatti tti visiṭṭhajōya rāhaṇathaṁ bhāvaṇāvihāṇaṁmi raphavāha
sannisāō nāidūraṁmi cēva vivittē asōyaüjjāṇē ṭhiō samarāiccavāyagō paḍimaṁ ti. diṭṭhō ya kiliṭṭhakammasaṁgaraṇa giri sēṇēṇa,
'bahūyaṁ kālaṁ hiṇḍāviō’ tti añcantakuviēṇa rōdajjhāṇavattiṇā cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. ēsa ettha patyāvō, na puṇa ēyārisō saṁjāyaï;
tā vāvāēmi ēyaṁ durāyāraṁ, pūrēmi attaṇō maṇōrahē; tahā ya vāvāēmi, jahā mahantaṁ dukkhamaṇuhabaï pāyō tti. taō sigdhamēva kuōi
āṇiūṇa vēḍiō jaracīrēhiṁ, sittō ayasitellēṇaṁ, lāiō aggī. bhayavayā pavamāṇajōyāisaraṇa na vēiyaṁ savvamēyaṁ. pavattē
ya dāhē jāō jhāṇasaṁkamō. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. hanta kimayaṁ ti. ahō dāruṇō bhāvō. paḍivanō kassaï ahaṁ aṇatthahēubhāvaṁ.
ahavā alamimiṇā cintiēṇaṁ. sāmāiyaṁ ettha pavaraṁ. niyattiyā cintā, ṭhiō visuddhajjhāṇē, pariṇaō jōō, jāyaṁ mahāsāmāiyaṁ,
pavattamaüvvakaraṇaṁ, ullasiyā khavagaseḍhī, viyambhiyaṁ jīvavīriyaṁ, nihayā kemmasattī, baḍiō jhāṇāṇalō, dardū mōhindhaṇaṁ,
pāviyāō laddhīō, jāyaṁ jōgamāhappaṁ, visōhiō appā, ṭhāviō paramajōē, khaviyaṁ ghāikamma, uppāḍiyaṁ kēvala nāṇaṁ ti.

ettharaṁmi bhayavaō pahāvēṇa ahāsannakhettavattī caliyāsaṇō samāṇō āhōiūṇa ōhiṇā ghettūṇa kusumaniyaraṁ jaïṇayarīē gaīē
aṇēgadēvayāpariyariō mahayā pamōēṇa āgaō vēlandharō. paṇamiō bhayavaṁ, pāḍiyā kusumavuṭṭī, vijjhaviō huyāsaṇō, avaṇīyāī
cīrāī. hanta kimēyaṁ ti saṁkhudō girisēṇō. bhaṇiō vēlandharēṇa. arē rē durāyāra mahāpāvakamma aṇajja purisāhama adaṭṭabva sōya
ṇija, kiṁ taē imaṁ vavasiyaṁ. etthantaraṁmi ya tō nāidūradēsavattī samāgaō muṇicandarāyā nammayāpamuhāō dēvīō mahāsāmantā
ya. diṭṭhō ya ṇēhiṁ bhayavaṁ, vandiō paramabhattīē. pucchiō vērandharō. anja, kimēyaṁ ti. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, appaṇō
'vagārāya imiṇā aṇajjēṇa anāyasattuṇō amayabhūyassa bhayavaō ēvaṁ jalaṇadāṇapaōēṇa pāṇantiyaṁ ajjhavasiyaṁ. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ.
ahaha ahō mōhasāmatthaṁ, anja, aïdāruṇamajhavasiyaṁ. aha kiṁ puṇa imassa ajjhavasāyassa kāraṇaṁ. candasōmalēsō bhaya vacchalō
sabajīvāṇa nibandhaṇaṁ pamōyassa aṇuppāyaō pīḍāē tti. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāya, na khalu ahametya kāraṇamavagacchāmi,
ettiyaṁ puṇa takkēmi. asuhakammōdayaō aṇēyadukkhahēka kugaïnivāsabandhavō aṇantasaṁsārakāraṇaṁ ēyassa. annahā kahamīisamajha
vassaī. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. ajja, ēramēya tahāvi bhayavantaṁ pucchamha. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. mahārāṁya, ēvaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi bhayavaō kēvalamahimānimittaṁ mahayā dēvēvandrēṇa ērāvaṇārūḍhō vajantēṇaṁ divbatūrēṇaṁ gāyantēhiṁ kinnarēhiṁ nacantēṇaṁ
accharālōēṇaṁ mahāpamōyasaṁgō āgaō dēvarāyā. sōhiyaṁ dharaṇipīḍhaṁ, saṁpāḍiyā samayā, sittaṁ gandhōdaēṇaṁ, kō kusumokkhārō
niviṭaṁ kaṇayapaümaṁ, āṇandiyā dēvā, harisiyāō dēvīō. uvaviṭṭhō bhayavaṁ. vandiō dēvarāiṇā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca. kayatyō si
bhayavaṁ, kvagaō tē mōhō, niyattā saṁkilēsā, viṇijiō kammasattū, pāviyā kēvalasirī, ubagiyaṁ bhaviyāṇa, tōḍiyā bhavavallī
pāviyaṁ sivapayaṁ ti. ēvaṁ saṁthuō bhāvasāraṁ. ēyamāyaṇṇiya ‘ahō bhagavaō siddhamahilasiyaṁ ti āṇandiō muṇicandō dēvīō
sāmantā ya. vandiō ya ṇēhiṁ puṇō puṇō bhattibahumāṇasāraṁ. etthantaraṁmi pagāiyā kinnarā, paṇaciyāō accharāō, pavattā
*kēvalamahimā, jāō mahāpamōō, samāgayā jaṇavayā.

etthantaraṁmi ‘ahō mahāṇubhāvayā ēyassa, asōhaṇaṁ ca maē kayaṁ’ ti ciniūṇa akkhiviya kusalapakkhabīyaṁ avagaō girisēṇa
pāṇō. ēsa samaō tti patthuyā dhammadēsaṇā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca bhayatrayā. bhō bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, aṇāimaṁ ēsa jīvō kaścaṇōvalō ba
saṁgō kammamalēṇa, taddōsaō pāvēi cittaviyārē, uppajjaï bahujōṇīsu, kayatthijjaï jarāmaraṇēhi, vēēi asuhavēdaṇaṁ, dūmijjaē
saṁjōyaviōēhiṁ, vāhijjaē mōhēṇa, sanivāiō viya na yāṇaï hiyāhiyaṁ, bahu mannaē apacchaṁ, pariharaï hiyāī, pāvaï mahāvayāō.
tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē paricayaha mūḍhayaṁ, nirūvēha tattaṁ, pūēha gurudēvaē, dēha vihidāṇaṁ, ujjhēha kicchāī, aṅgīkarēha metti, pavajaha
sīlaṁ, abbhasaha tabajōē, bhāvēha bhāvaṇāō, chaḍḍēha aggaī, jhāēha suhajjhāṇāī, avaṇēha kammamalaṁ ti. ēvaṁ, bhō dēvāṇuppiyā,
avaṇīē kammamalaṁmi kallāṇīhaē jīvē vimuddhē ēgantēṇa na honti kēi dukkayajaṇi yā viyārā, hōi acaṁtiyaṁ paramasōrakhaṁ ti.
tā jahāsattīē karēha ujjama uvaïdvaguṇēsu. ēyamāyaṇṇiya saṁviggā parisā. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē. bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ ti. paḍivanā
guṇantaraṁ. pūjiūṇa bhayavantaṁ gō dēvarāyā.

jaṁpiyaṁ muṇicandēṇa. bhayavaṁ, kiṁ puṇa tassa purisāhamassa bhayavaō vi uvasaggakaraṇē nimittaṁ. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. sōma, suṇa
guruō akusalāṇubandhō, sō ya ēvaṁ saṁjāō tti. sāhiyaṁ guṇasēṇaggisammāikahāṇayaṁ. ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa saṁviggō rāyā dēvīō
vēlandharō sāmantā ya. cintiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. ahō na kiṁci payaṁ, sabbahā dāruṇaṁ anāṇaṁ ti. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kīisō
imassa pariṇāmō bhavissaï. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. anantaraṁ nirayagamaṇaṁ tivyāō vēyaṇāō, paraṁparēṇa u aṇantō saṁsārō ti.
nammayāra bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kērisā uṇa narayā havanti, kērisā nārayā kīisīō vā tatya vēyaṇāō havanti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
dhammasīlē, suṇa. tē ṇaṁ narayā antō vahā bāhiṁ caüraṁsā ahē khuruppasaṁṭhāṇasaṁṭhiyā nicandhayāratamasā vēgayagahacandavaranakkha
tajōisapahā mēyavasāhirapūyapaḍalacikkhallalittāṇulēvaṇatalā amuī vissā paramadurabhigandhā kāu agaṇivaṇṇābhā kakkhaḍaphāsā
durahiyāsā asubhā narayā. avi ya thimithimentakhārōdayā calacalentahimasakarā gharagharentavasakadamā phiṇiphiṇentapūyāulā ghogya
entaruhirojjharā simisimintakimivityarā jalajalentaükkāulā kaṇakaṇentaasipāyavā puṁphuentabhīmōragā muṁsuentakharamāruyā
dhagadhagentadittāṇalā karakarentajantāulā. avi ya.

nēraïyā uṇa kālā kālōhāsā gambhīralōmaharisā bhīmā uttāsaṇayā paramakiṇhā vaṇṇēga. tē ṇaṁ tatya niccaṁ bhīyā
niccaṁ tatthā niccaṁ tasiyā niccaṁ udhiggā niccaṁ paramāsuhasaṁbaddhā nirayabhavaṁ paccaṇuhabamāṇā ciṭṭhanti. vēyaṇāō u iha vicitta
kammaṇiyāō vicittā havanti dārugā uttimaṅgacchēyā karavattadāraṇaṁ mūlavēhaṇāṇi visamajīhārōgā asandhicchēyaṇāṇi tattatambāi
pāṇaṁ bhakkhaṇaṁ vajatuṇḍē hiṁ aṅgabalikaraṇāṇi dariyasāvayabhayaṁ atthiuddharaṇāṇi ghōranikkhuḍapavēsā palittalōhitthiyāliṅgaṇāṇi savvaō
satthajōgō jalantasilāpaḍaṇāṇi mōhaparāyattaya ti ēvamāiyāō mahantīō vēyaṇāō. niruvamā ya sāhāvigī uṇhasīyavēyaṇa tti.
sulasamañjarīē maṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kērisāṇi subimāṇāṇi, kērisā dēvā, kīisī vā tattha sāyāvēyaṇāō. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
dhammasīlē, suṇa. tē ṇa vimāṇā vicitta saṁṭhāṇā sayarayaṇāmayā acchā sahā laṇhā ghaṭṭā maṭṭhā nīrayā nimmalā nippaṅkā nikaṅkaḍa.
cchāyā sappahā samirīyā saüjjōyā pāsādīyā darisaṇijjā abhirūvā paḍirūghā khēmā sivā ‘kiṁkaraamara daṇḍōvarakkhiyā lāullōvi
(i)yamahiyā gōsīsasarasa(ratta)candaṇadadaradinapaścaṅgulitalā ubaciyacandaṇakalasā candaṇaghaḍasukayatōraṇapaḍiduvāradēsabhāgā āsa
tōsattaviulabaṭṭabagdhāriyamalladāmakalāvā pañcakṇṇasarasasurabhisukkapupphapuñjōrayārakaliyā kālāgurupavaraku durukaturukadhūvaïmaghamadhentaga
ndhudhdhuyābhirāmā sugandharagandhagandhiyā gandhavaḍibhūyā accharagaṇasaṅghasaṁ(vi)kiṇṇā divyatuḍiyasahasaṁpanna(ṇaïya)tti. dēvā uṇa maṇahara
vicittacindhā surūvā mahiḍḍiyā mahajjuiyā mahāyasā mahabbalā mahāṇubhāvā mahāsokkhā hāravigaïyavacchā kaḍa yatuḍiyathambhiyabhuyā
aṁgēyakuṇḍalamaṭṭhagaṇḍayalakaṇṇapīḍhadhārī viittahatthāharaṇā vicittamālāmaülī kallāṇagapavaravatthaparihiyā kallāṇagapavaramallāṇulēvaṇadharā
bhāsuravondī palambavaṇamālādharā divyēṇaṁ vaṇṇēyaṁ divvēṇaṁ gandhēṇaṁ divvēṇaṁ phāsēṇaṁ divvēṇaṁ saṁghayaṇēṇaṁ divēṇaṁ saṁṭhāṇēṇaṁ divvāē iḍḍīē
divyāē juīē divvāē pahāē diyāē chāyāē divvāē accīē divvēṇaṁ tēēṇaṁ divbāra lēsāra dasa disāō ujjōvēmāṇā pahāsē
māṇā mahayā'hayanaṭṭagī yavāiyatantītalatālatuḍiyaghaṇamuiṅgapaḍapaḍaha(pa)vāiyaravēṇa divbāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuñcamāṇā viharanti. avi ya.

lg.l: varamuravāṇaṁ ca vō nēva ya gēyassa vocchittī
raïsāgarāvagāḍhā gayaṁ pi kālaṁ na yāṇanti

div.p:
sulōyaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, dēvā dēvasuhaṁ ca ēvaṁ bhayavayā sundaramāvēiyaṁ tā kiṁ iō vi sundarayarā siddhā siddhamuhaṁ ca.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. dhammasīlē, aïmahantaṁ khu ettha antaraṁ. kiṁ dēvāṇa sundarataṁ, jāṇaṁ jōō adhuvasarīrēṇa, dāruṇaṁ kammabandhapāra
tantaṁ, ukkaḍā kasāyā, pahavaï mahāmōhō, avasāṇindiyāṇi, garuī visayataṇhā, vicittā ukkarisāvagarisā, uddāmaṁ māṇasaṁ, aṇi
vāriō maccū, virasamavasāṇaṁ ti. kīisaṁ vā ēvaṁvihāṇaṁ suhaṁ. gandhavvāijōgō vi paramatthaō dukkhamēva. jaō—

lg.l: savvē āharaṇā bhārā, savvē kāmā duhāvahā"

div.p:
sundarā, dhammasīlē, paramatyaō siddhā, suhaṁ pi tēsimēvaḥ jēṇa tē ṭhiyā ṇiyasarūvē mukkā kammabandhaṇēṇa pariṇidviyapaōyaṇā
vajjiyā maṇōrahēhiṁ khīṇabhavasattī jāganti savvabhāvē pecchanti paramatthēṇa aparokkhāviṇō nevyāṇakāraṇaṁ buhāṇaṁ virahiyā jamma
maraṇēhiṁ ti. kiṁ vā na īisāṇaṁ muhaṁ, jō niyattā savvābāhāō paramāṇandajōēṇa. avi ya.

lg.l: na vi atthi māṇusāṇaṁ taṁ sōvakhaṁ na vi ya savvadēvāṇaṁ

div.p: annaṁ pi. atthi nāyaṁ, taṁ suṇaü dhammasīlā. sulōyaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ. tā aṇuggahēu bhaya amhē. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.

atthi khiippaïṭṭhiyaṁ nāma nayaraṁ,, jaṁ uttuṅgahiṁ bhavaṇadēulē hiṁ pāyālamuvagaēṇaṁ pharihābandhēṇaṁ gayaṇayalavilaggēṇaṁ pāyārēṇaṁ visēsiyā
dhaṇayapuri iḍhiē bhavaṇēhi ya surindabhavaṇāī. tami ya jiyasattū nāma naravaī hotthā.

lg.l: sō tīē samaṁ rāyā bhōē bhubjēi suratullē
vattē vi ya jīvavahē apahariō tēṇa vāūvēgēṇa

div.p: tō taṁmi visamadēsē khaliō āsassa aïvēgō.

etthantaraṁmi sambaddhabaddhakavaēṇa diṭṭhō savarēṇa sō rāyā. tēṇa ya ‘mahāṇubhāvō kōi ēsa puriō paḍiō bhīmamahāḍavīē, tā ka
rēmi sammamuciōvayāraṁ’ ti cintiūṇa kāūṇa tassa paṇāmaṁ gahiō āsō khalīṇaṁmi, nīō jalasamīvaṁ. uttiṇṇō naravaī, uppallā
ṇiō turaō majjiō rāyā, ṇhaviō sabarēṇa āsō dāvi(ma)ūṇa mukkō paüradu(duru)vāparasē. tō sugandhīṇi supāyāṇi kayalayaja
mbīraphaṇasāīṇi uvaṇēūṇa phaïlāṇi nivaḍiō cala gaṁmu. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa. karēu pasāyaṁ dēvō mamāṇuggahaṭāē āhāragahaṇēṇaṁ. rāiṇā
cintiyaṁ. ahō ēyassa akāraṇavacchalayā, ahō viṇaō ahō vayaṇavināsō, ahō mamōvari bhattibahumāṇō, ahō mahāpurisacēṭi
yayakāyavvujjuttayā, ahō sajjaṇapagarisō tti tā karēmi ēyassa ahaṁ āhāragahaṇēṇa dhiī. mā sē vaïmaṇassaṁ saṁbhāvissaï tti. paḍi
ssuyaṁ rāiṇā. mahāpasāō tti kāūṇa puṇō paḍiō pāēsu sabarō. uvabhuttāī phalāī rāiṇā. etthantaraṁmi. pariṇaō vāsarō,
atthamuvagō sarō, jāō sajhākālō, kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijja rāiṇā. saṁpāḍiō sē sabarēṇa varatūliṁ aïsayantō kusumasattharō. saṁja
miūṇa tūṇīrayaṁ kōdaṇḍavaggahatthō samāgaō naravaïsamīvaṁ. ‘dēva suvasu vīsatthō tti bhaṇiūṇa pāradaṁ pāsēsu bhamiuṁ. kāūṇa gurudē
vayā namokkāraṁ pasuttō rāyā cintayantō savaramahānubhāvayaṁ. tō pariṇayā savvarī, uiō aṁsumālī.

etthantaraṁmi turayapayamaggēṇaṁ samāgayaṁ rāyasennaṁ. viuddhōrāyā bandibōlēṇa. taō ḍhōiō mahāsavaïṇā paścavallahāṇa pahāṇō turu
katuraō. ārūḍhō taṁmi rāyā. caḍāviūṇa valhīē sabaranāhaṁ gaō sanayaraṁ. paviṭṭhō mahāvaddhāvaṇaēhiṁ. majiō naravaī saha pallināhēṇa.
kayaṁ gurudēvayāṇaṁ uciyakaraṇijja. taō aggāsaṇē nivēsiūṇa pallināhaṁ bhuttaṁ rāiṇā. bhuttuttaravēlāē sahatthēṇa vilimpiūṇa savaranāī
parihāviūṇa dēva yalaṁ dinnaṁ sē aṇagdhēyaṁ samatthaṁ niyamāharaṇaṁ. etthantaraṁmi samāgayā atthāvēlā. sūiyaṁ kālanivēyaēṇa rāiṇō.
uvaviṭhṭhō asthāiyāmaṇḍavē saha sabaranāhēṇa. taō pucchiō amañcasāmantēhiṁ. dēva sāhēhi, kō ēsa purisō, jō ēvaṁ dēvēṇa saṁpūiō
tti. taō sāhiō rāiṇā āsāvahārāiō pasuttadarisaṇapajjavasāṇō palliṇāhaceṭṭhiyavuttantō. taō atthāiyapurisēhiṁ pasaṁsiō
ēsa bahupagāraṁ. ṭhiyā kaṁci kālaṁ nāḍayapekkhaṇayaviṇōēṇaṁ. samappiō rāiṇā rāyasundarīē pahāṇalakkhiyāē. tajiyā(bhaṇiyā)
ṇēṇa. ahō rāyasundari, uvacariyacō taē ēsa sabbhāvasāraṁ mama pāṇadāyagō. tīē bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi. gahēūṇa ya taṁ
palliṇāhaṁ karaṁmi gayā niyabhavaṇaṁ ēsā. ārūḍhā sattamavā(cā)ukkhambhaṁmi raïharē. taṁ ca sōullōiyaṁ dēvagāivatthapūyāē sacitta
kammujjalaṁ barēṇa varacittāḍiyacandōdaēṇaṁ ōlambiēhiṁ pañcavaṇṇiyasurahikusumadāmēhiṁ pajaliyāhiṁ maṇippadīviyāhiṁ dhuvvantīhi
aṇavarayadhunnamāṇakālāgarukappūrapaürāhiṁ dhūvaghaḍiyāhi gaṇḍōvahāṇayāliṅgaṇisamēyāē tūliyāē sōviō dantamayapallaṅkē. kaō
uciōvayārō. pāiō mahumāhavāipavarāsavāī. ēvaṁ ca pañcavihaṁ visayamuhamaṇuhavantassa aïkantō kōi kālō. annayā ca vibhattō
aṇēṇa rāyā. dēva, gacchāmi. rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ rōyaï dēvāṇuppiyassa. tō dāruṇamaṇagdhēyaṁ daviṇajāya cēlāiyaṁ ca mahandhamullaṁ
dinā sē sahāyā pañcaïyapurisā. bhaṇiyā tē rāiṇā. harē pallivaī pallipaēsē mōtūṇāgacchaha tti. tē hiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi.
taō paṇamiūṇa naravaïṁ gaō sabaragāhō pattō kaïvayadiyahēhi niyapalli. visajjiyā rāyapurisā. paviṭṭhō niyagēhē. samāgaō
tassa samīvaṁ savaralōō. pucchiō ṇēhiṁ. kattha tuma gaō si, kahi vā ṭhiō si ettiyaṁ kālaṁ, kiṁ vā taē laddhaṁ. tō
sāhiō tēṇa rāyadarisaṇāiō palli pavēsapajjabasāṇō nigavuttantō. taō ahiyayaraṁ sakō uhallō pucchaï taṁ jaṇasamūhō.

lg.l: kērisaō sō rāyā kī isarūvaṁ ca hōī tannayaraṁ
kērisaō tattha jaṇō kiṁvissiṭṭō ya paribhōgō
sō sāhiuṁ na sakaï uvamārahiyami tattha raṇami
bhakkhāṇaṁ ca phalāī jubaīsu pulindayāṇa jubaīō
sō sāhēuṁ vaṁphaï nayarasta guṇē jahaṭiē tēsiṁ
nivyāēūṇa muhaṁ pugō vi tuhikō ṭhāi
ēvaṁ uvamārahiō na tīraē ettha sāhiuṁ mokkhō
navaraṁ sadahiyavyō na annahā bhaṇaï savvannū
na vi atthi māṇusāṇaṁ taṁ sokkhaṁ na vi ya savvadēvāṇaṁ

div.p: ēyaṁ āyaṇṇiūṇa ‘ēvamēyaṁ ti saṁviggā savvē. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. bhayavaṁ, kōisa puṇa sarūvaṁ siddhassa. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.

sōma, suṇa. sē na dīhē na raha(ha)ssē na vaṭṭē na tasē na caüraṁsē na parimaṇḍalē; vaṇṇēṇa na kiṇhē na nīlē na lōhiē na hāliddē na mukkilē;
gandhēṇaṁ na surahigandhē na durabhigandhē; rasēṇaṁ na tittē na kaḍuē na kasāē na ambilē nē lavaṇē na mahurē phaṁsēṇa na kakkhaḍē na maüē na
garuē na lahuē na sīē na uṇhē na niddhē na lukkhē na saṅgē na ruhē na kāu na itthī na purisē na annahā. parinā sannā uvamā cēva na
vijjaï. arūvī sattā apayassa payaṁ natthi. ‘sē na saddē nāsadē, sē na rūvē nārūvē, sē na gandhē nāgandhē, sē na phāsē nāphāsē, sē na
rasē nārasē. imēyaṁ siddhasarūvaṁ ti. avi ya sayalapavaśvarahiyaṁ sattāmattasarūvaṁ aṇantāṇandaṁ paramapayaṁ ti. ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa khaōvasama
muvayaṁ cārittamōhaṇīyaṁ muṇicandassa dēvīṇa sāmantāṇa ya. bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ. bhayavaṁ, aṇuggihīyāṇi amhē bhayavayā imiṇā dhamma
dēsaṇēṇa. samuppanō ya amhāṇaṁ bhayavaō cariyasavaṇēṇa saṁsāracārayāō nivvēō. tā āisaü bhayavaṁ, kimamhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. dhannāṇi tubbhē. pāviyaṁ tumbhēhiṁ saṁsāracārayavimōyaṇasamatthaṁ chēyaṇaṁ nēhaniyalāṇaṁ pakkhālaṇaṁ mōhadhūlīē parama
nevyāṇakāraṇaṁ ajhaṁ nāṇapagarisassa palhāyaṇaṁ bhāvēṇa saṁkilē sāiyāravirahiyaṁ bhāvaō suddhacaragaṁ ti. tamhā kayaṁ kāyanvaṁ, navaraṁ davvaō
vi ēyaṁ paḍivajasu tti. tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ. jaṁ bhayavaṁ āṇavēi. vēlandharēṇa cintiyaṁ. ahō ēēsi dhannayā, pattaṁ maṇuyalōyasāraṁ
bhāvacaraṇaṁ ti. vandiūṇa saharisaṁ kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ bhayavaō. paviṭhṭhō nayariṁ rāyā muṇicandō. davā viyaṁ āghōsaṇāpuvvayaṁ
mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā savvāyayaṇēsu pūyā, païṭāviō jeṭṭaputtō candajasō nāma rajjē. niggaō mahāvibhūīē nayarāō pahāṇasāmantā
maccasēṭilōyapariyaō nammayāpamuhantēurēṇa saha. pavvaïyāṇi ēyāṇi bhayavaō pahāṇasīsassa sīladēvassa samīvē.
kōugāṇugampāhiṁ pucchiyaṁ vēlandharēṇa. mayacaṁ, kiṁ sō purisāhamō bhayavantamuddissa attaṇōvasaggakārī bhaviō abhaviō tti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. bhaviō. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ. pattabīō apattabīō tti. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. apattabīō. vēlandharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
pāvissaï nahi. bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ. asaṁkhejjēsu poggalapariyaḍēsu samaïcchiēsu tiriyagaīē sadla sēṇarāiṇō pahāṇaturaṅgamō hōūṇa
pāvissaï, jō ‘ahō mahāṇubhāvō’ ti maṁ uddisiya cintiyamaṇēṇa. ēēṇaṁ ca pasatthavisayacintaṇēṇa āsagaliyaṁ guṇapakkhavāya
bīyaṁ; kāraṇaṁ ca taṁ paraṁparayāē sammattassa. aīēmu ya asaṁkhejjabhavēsu saṅghanāmamāhaṇō hōūṇa sijjhissaï tti. ēyaṁ sōūṇa harisiō
vēlaṁdharō. vandiūṇa bhagavantaṁ gaō niyayathāmaṁ. bhaya pi vihariō kēlivihārēṇa.

aïkkantō kōi kālō. annayā ya cōravaïyarēṇa ujjēṇīpa cēva gahiō girisēṇapāṇō, vāvāiō kumbhipāēṇa. tahāvihabhayavanta
paōsadōsaō samuppanō sattamama hīē. bhayavaṁ pi viharamāṇō kālakamēṇa gayō usahatitthaṁ. nāūṇa kammapariṇaī kaō kēvalisamugdhā
ōpaḍivannō sēlēsiṁ, khaviyāī bhavodhaggāhikammāī taō sabbappagārēṇa caïūṇa dēhapañjaraṁ aphusamāṇagaīē gaō ēkasamaēṇa tēlōka
cūḍāmaṇibhūyaṁ appattapuvvaṁ tahābhāvēṇa paramavambhālayaṁ ūttamaṁ savvathāmāṇa sivaṁ ēgantēṇa acalamarujaṁ sāhayaṁ paramāṇandasuhassa jammajarā
maraṇavirahiyaṁ paramaṁ siddhipayaṁ ti. kayā tiya sēhiṁ mahimā, pūjiyā bondī, gahiyāī pahāṇagāī, nīyāṇi suralōyaṁ, ṭhaviyāṇi vivitta
dēsē sāhiyāṇi dēvāṇa, samāgayā dēvā, divāṇi tēhi, pūjiyāṇi bhattīē, paṇamiyāṇi saharisaṁ, avirahiyaṁ ca tēsiṁ, paḍivattīē
karenti āyāṇuggahaṁ ti.

lg.l: jaṁ viraïūṇa puṇṇaṁ mahāṇubhāvacariyaṁ maē pattaṁ
tēṇē ihaṁ bhavavirahō hōu sam̐yā bhaviyalōyassa
